item.text: rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya gu h+ya ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po// rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan cing thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po// dus gsum ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i ngo bo// rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang las kyi rang bzhin/ rigs dang ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid/ rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mnga' brnyes pa de/ don chos nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang las/ rtags 'gag pa med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi skur bzhugs so// 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po

dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gshegs shing bzhugs te gzhugs par 'gyur ba'i gnas/ rgyu rin po che dang dur khrod las byas pa'i dbyibs kha dog tha dad cing ngo bo nyid brtsegs pa ste/ de yang dbyings ye shes gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang/ kun tu khyab par brdal ba chen po na/ rigs kyi yab dang/ rigs kyi yum dang/ gzhan yang sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ sgo skyong sprul skur bcas pa yang/ srid zhi dang rig pa'i tshul gyis ni/ til la mar bzhin du khyab par gnas so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las thon te// spyan snga nyid na bka' nod pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i zhu ba po nyid du bzhugs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ dus gsum dang/ srid pa gsum dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ zag bcas dang zag med/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas/ bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med pa/ thog bcas dang thog med/ rtog bcas dang rtog med/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob/ bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed/ shes pa dang shes pa'i yul/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu 'bras bur bcas pa/ snang zhing grags pa thams cad la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun tu yang khyab par gzigs rnam par yang gzigs so// de bzhin du gzigs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi mtshan nyid stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin/ smra bsam las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid/ de kho na'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du brkyang phyag 'tshal nas// dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la mnal bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to/

e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// e ma ho gsang mchog dgyes pa che/ e ma ho rnam par dag pa'i lam/ ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de nyid don// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// bdag cag rnam la bshad du gsol// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos// rdo rje 'dzin pa la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig legs par yid la zung zhig/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang da ltar dang phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs gsung par dka' ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de kho na nyid byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de ni brjod du yang med la/ snod du gyur pa yang dkon pa'i phyir ro// rdo rje 'dzin pa de bas na khyod nyid la dris shig ces bka' stsal te ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas 'khor lo 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa la bsgo ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa zhu+u ba spobs pa yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po the tshom thams cad gcod pa la the tshom yang dag yang du zhus shig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni snod ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dman rnams la yang byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka'i bsgo ba mdzad pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyis bskul ba thugs su chud nas/ 'khor mang po dang bcas pa snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs par mdzad nas/ ston pa'i zhal du bltas te gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ bsngo ba med pa'i mchod pa ma chags pa'i 'dod yon/ nam mkha' lta bur kun la khyab cing sems las sprul te/ ston pa la mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// don dam sems nyid skye ba med pa la// ston pa dang ni gnas dang 'khor// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba ci// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rtsa ba sems nyid de// rtsa ba de nyid ston pa las// gud nas bstan pa btsal ba med// bdag nyid chen po byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos// byang chub sems la gnas pa las// gud na gnas pa ma yin no// de ni gzhal yas byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i rgyu bstan phung po lnga// 'khor ba gnas bsgyur phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya de nyid byang chub sems// 'byung ba gnas bsgyur yum lnga ste// yum lnga ma chags byang chub sems// rnam shes 'khor ba gnas bsgyur sems dpa' ste// dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems// yul brgyad 'khor ba gnas bsgyur sems ma ste// gnas pa med pa byang chub sems// rtag chad 'khor ba gnas bsgyur sgo

ba ste// reg pa reg shes reg bya la// 'khor ba gnas bsgyur khro bo ste// dngos po med pa'i byang chub sems// smon pa med pa'i byang chub sems// nyon drug gnas bsgyur sprul sku ste// spros pa med pa'i byang chub sems// rtag chad 'khor ba gnas bsgyur kun bzang yab yum ste// gzung 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// 'khrul pa bzlog phyir sems las shar ba las// gud nas btsal ba ma yin gyi// btsal yang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// de bas sems nyid chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// rtsa ba de yi don rtogs nas// ci yang ma bkag chos kyi dbyings// blta ba ma bkag sems nyid nam mkha' yin// spyod pa ma bkag sems nyid rgya mtsho'i 'jings// bsgrub pa ma bkag sems nyid chen po bsgrub// phrin las ma bkag sems kyis kun la rol// dkyil 'khor ma bkag sems nyid nyid la rdzogs// dam tshig ma bkag sems las bsrung du med// mchod pa ma bkag sems las longs spyod pa// snying po bkag ma sems nyid brjod dang bral// phyag rgya ma bkag sems nyid phyag rgya yin// ting 'dzin ma bkag sems nyid ngang la shar// zhes bka' stsal pas// 'khor rnams sems mtshan med pa la mtshan ma'i skur byung bas rtag pa'i mtha' sel to// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// spros pa med pa'i byang chub sems// don dam mchog tu ji ltar bskyed// ces zhus pa dang// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ don dam pa'i kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la cung zhig mnyam par bzhag nas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams nges par legs par nyon cig byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni// brjod dang smra bsam yul las 'das// don dam kun rdzob tha mi dad// rang gi lus ngag rdo rje ste// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo las// lus ngag yid gsum ma grub par// rig pa'i skyes bu de yis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis// rang gi byang chub sems de kho na nyid la sems nas 'khod do// 'khod pas sems kyi don rtogs par gyur te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po des// rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di phul lo// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin rnam spangs tshig dang yi ge'i spyod yul min// gdod nas ma skyes rtog pa'i gnas med do// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo 'dzin pas kyang/ rang gi byang chub sems rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho chos kun stong pa'i bdag/ rang gi

ngo bo brjod du med// brjod med de ni sna tshogs pa'i/ chos rnams kun la khyab par gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dzin pas kyang// rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad phul ba 'di skad gsungs so// e ma ho mnyam nyid byang chub sems// ming du btags pa'i tshig rnams kun// mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas phyir// mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do// zhes gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'dzin pas kyang/ rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho chos su snang ba thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo brjod du med// de nyid byang chub sems su ni// mkhas pas bsgoms na rtogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya gram 'dzin pas kyang/ rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// chos kun byang chub sems nyid de// nges pa med de dngos rtog bral// de nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin te// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub// ces gsungs so// de las gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams ni// byang chub sems de kho na nyid kyi don nyams su myong ste/ rang rang gis de bzhin nyid la 'khod nas gnas so// thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis tshims pa de'i tshe na// dus gsum la sogs te 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams stong pa chen por gyur pa ni/ dpe nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang bsgrub tu yod pa ma yin no// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid kyi don nges par gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid las/ 'gag pa med pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'byung ba'i phyir na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho stong nyid rnam dag klong yangs nas// snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'byung bar mi dmigs kyang// shes rab don dam chos sku gsal ba las// mi 'gog thabs kyis snying rje nam mkhar ston// zhes bskul bas/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bskul bar mkhyen te/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang la mnal bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la khyab pa'i snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i tshe chos thams cad snying rje chen po'i ngo bo tsam du gnas par gyur to/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas/ snying rje chen po'i ngang las glu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho ma ltar byams pa'i snying rje chen po ni// mkha' ltar go yang 'byed cing kun la khyab// rig pa'i snying rje nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes bskul

to// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bskul bar mkhyen nas/ snying rje nam mkha'i ngang las rig pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par sprul te// rdo rje'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad de/ dper na nam mkha'i dbyings la nyi ma 'bum dus gcig tu shar ba'i gzi brjid lta bu'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas/ rmad du byung ba'i glu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho yid bzhin sku mchog nyi ma 'bar ba las// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje'i gar mdzad cing// brjid pa'i sku mchog rdo rje 'bar ba yis// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol/ a la la ho zhes rnam par bskul bas bskul bar thugs su chud de/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi mtshan ma/ ye shes kyi rtse mo rdo rje rtse dgu pa lta bu/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas yang rol pa'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad pa de las/ rol pa'i sku zhal gsum pa lta bu sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs so// de nas rmad du byung ba 'dis bskul lo// e ma de ni rang byung ba'i// rigs rnams kun gyi rigs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// rdo rje 'chang chen rtag pa rol pa'i sku'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i// de gzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gi gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan med thams cad yang dag spongs// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba'i// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba'i// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes bskul bar mkhyen te// bcom ldan 'das kyi hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod de// byin rlabs can du bya ba'i phyir// snga tshul gyi gnas dang 'khor tshul la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la bsdus te/ chos nyid byang chub sems su mi snang bar mdzad do// de las bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Dal a zhes cho 'phrul gyi sgra brjod pas/ skye ba med pa'i ngang las 'gag pa med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan ni// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo yi ge a ru gsal bar mdzad do// de la cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad ces bsgrags so// yi ge a yi sems kyi rang bzhin

te// chags pa'i skyon bral nam mkha'i kha dog 'dra// sems rgya che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes bsgrags so// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin a re'i 'phro 'du las/ thams cad yi ge a de shin tu yang gsal te/ de las 'di skad ces bsgrags so// byang chub sems kyi yig 'bru a// 'phros pas thugs bskul rgyud sbyang ste// thabs dang shes rab dbyangs dang sgra yig tshogs// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyi rgyu ru gsal// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ oM oM k+Sha a/ a A/ i I/ a U/ e ai/ o au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM A/ de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ni// lha mo dbyings phyug mngon phyung ste// hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis// rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas// smin ring mdzes tshul g.yon du bzhugs// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos// gzhal yas rnam par gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las snying po 'di rnams ched du brjod de phyung ngo// e yaM/ khaM/ suM/ raM/ b+h+rUM/ chos dbyings gsal ba'i nam mkha' la// ye shes gsal ba'i rlung gis bskyod// byang chub sems rgyan chu rgyun las// zhi gnas gsal ba'i sa gzhi chags// lhag mthong 'bar ba'i drod dang ldan// ye shes lnga ldan ri rab chen po la// b+h+rUM las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi gnas// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cha dgu pa// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad pa// gru chad bar khyams ldan pa dang// sgo yi 'gram logs ya phub khyung// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang// rnam thar brgyad kyi ka ba la// ye shes chen po bzhi'i gdung bres// 'khor lo'i gdan dang rin chen rgyan// rta babs rol mo'i tshogs su ldan// zhes brjod do// de nas yang bdag nyid dang 'khor rnams la rim gro bskyed de gdan bting ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces brjod do// d+ha ri ta ke tha ga te/ b+he sha ra ta/ d+ha sha ta thA ga ta sa ta la/ ta thA ga ta sarba gi ra/ tsa ta ri rid ti bra ta/ shAn+ti ga ta bo sha ta ka/ rat+na da ra/ ma pa/ a sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la/ seng ge glang chen rta dang rma bya nam mkha' lding// nyi zla pad+ma rin chen khri rkang mdzes// bde gshegs rnams la rim gro bskyed pa'i phyir// gdan gyi khyad par rab tu rdzogs/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// raM yaM khaM/ ji ltar snang ba'i dngos po rnams// skye med ngang du ro gcig phyir// ye shes bskal pa gsum gyis dngos po gsum// sbyangs nas rang bzhin chos dbyings

ngang du dag/ ces gsungs so// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badzra zhes brjod de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma chags pa'i yum la/ 'khor gyi sku bskyed pa'i phyir na/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yum dbyings phyug ma zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas nas/ chags pa'i glu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i sku mchog las// khyab pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje'i gar mdzad cing// gsang ba b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// re skong bdud rtsi'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol/ a la la ho zhes rnam par bskul bas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des// gnyis su med pa'i rol pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad cing// rdo rje'i glu 'di blangs so// a ho bde mchog 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings nyid du// 'dzum zhing 'khyil pas pad+ma'i b+ha ga ru// dga' mchog rdo rje gsang ba'i byang chub sems// dri med rin chen char dbab rgyun mi gcod/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra oM hU~M phaT/ e ka tsan+ta A+oM// a nu rA ga yA mi// zhes gsungs so// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i glu dang gar gyis stegs pa dang/ 'khyud pa dang rol pa mdzad do// de ltar rol pa'i thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub sems so// chags pa'i yum gyi byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad bsgrags so// a ho chags pa chen po dbab pa'i byang chub sems// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyi rtsa bzhi'i mchog/ dri med skyon bral pad+ma'i rang bzhin las// mu tig dri med bsil ba'i 'od zer spro'o// yang thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub sems kyis/ chags pa'i yum gyi byang chub sems la bskul ba'i cho 'phrul sgra 'di skad ces bsgrags so// a ho gsal zhing dag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// skyon gyis ma gos rnam dag byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid de// bsil ba'i 'od zer pad+ma'i gnas su spro ho// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA b+hi d+hi tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// zhes spro zhing bskul lo// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos// byang chub kyi sems 'phro 'du'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde mchog bde ba ma// byang chub sems ni rab spros pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs bskul cing// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyud sbyangs te/ slar 'dus dbyings su thim pa las// byang chub sems kyi thig ler gsal// thig le 'od kyi rang bzhin las// byang chub sems kyis kun la khyab// bo d+hi tsit+ta sarba maN+Da la/ zhes gsungs te/ de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las

'das pa'i chos thams cad yab yum lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi theg ler gnas so// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ 'phro 'du dang 'ju 'dul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam par spros pa 'di gsungs so// de nas byang chub kyi sems las yi ge rnam par spros pa/ ta thA da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ pa pha ba d+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// spros pas gsung bskul dag rgyud dag/ bsdus pas chos kyi phyag rgya thog/ ces gsungs so/ chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi yig 'bru mkhyen nas mngon par 'du mdzad do/ de nas yang yi ge las phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur par mdzad de/ badzra/ tsakra/ rat+na/ pad+ma/ badzra gan d+ha/ tsakra gan d+ha/ rat+na ga na d+ha/ pad+ma gan d+ha/ karma gan d+ha/ ut+pa la puSh+pa/ nA ga pr-ik+Sha/ rat+na sa ma ti/ tik+Sh+Na khaD+ga/ pad+ma d+ha ra badzra raM pa/ d+harmA tsakra/ rat+na bru ba ti/ dz+nyA na mu tra/ rat+na sa ma traM/ d+harmA ki raM/ ni ra ta ho pa/ du sa me g+ha pa/ puSh+pa mu tra/ su ka raM pa/ gan d+he pi pag ta/ sa ga mu tra/ d+harmA mu ta/ d+harmA e baM/ badzra ka wa tsa/ rat+na ga ya/ badzra raM/ kham baM/ ta pa ti/ dz+nyA na badzra/ d+harmA gan d+ha hrIH/ ka pA la ni ra ga ta/ badzra ti tra/ nA go ra ga badzra karma/ ang+ku sha dzaH/ hU~M pA sha hU~M/ baM s+pho Ta baM/ hoH gan d+he hoH/ rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang// rin chen pad+ma rgya gram ste// shes rab don ston dril bu lnga// ut+pal dang ni klu shing dang// rin chen myu gu ral gri dang// pad+ma dkar dang rdo rje dang// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye// gzugs mdzes me long rin chen phreng// chos kyi pi wang gar mchog ste// 'dug pa'i mchog dang me tog phreng// mar me dang ni byug pa ste// gseg shang dang ni pi wang dang// go cha dang ni po ti dang// rin chen sgrom dang me chur bstan// thabs mchog rdo rje dang ni shes rab dril bur bstan// thod pa nr-i mgo gdengs pa dang// rdo rje dang ni sbrul chen dang// rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dang ni dril bu'o// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// rtogs par dka' ba'i snying po don// bde gshegs thugs bskul 'gro ba'i shes pa bkrol// dam tshig thugs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ chos thams cad phyag rgya'i ngang du mkhyen to// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos chos sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'khor los sgyur// rin chen mang dang pad+ma 'chang// sna tshogs las la sogs pa rnams// spyan snga nyid dang phyogs bzhir

bzhugs// bzang mo spyan dang mA ma kI// na bza' dkar mo sgrol ma rnams// rang rang gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul// sa yi snying po nam mkha'i snying// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag na rdo rje dang// byams pa mai tri sgrib pa rnam par sel// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal gzhon nu rnams// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo dag la 'khod// la s+ye mA le gIrti nIrti dang// d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke/ gan+d+he ma la sogs pa rnams// rang rang sems dpa' dag dang 'khril// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang// bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// brgya byin dang ni thabs bzang ris// shAkya thub thub dang se ge dang// gshin rje'i rgyal dang kha 'bar ma// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dag la 'khod// gshin rje gshed dang stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi// phyogs kyi sgo bzhi dag la'o// rta gdong phag gdong seng gdong sbrul gdong rnams// rang rang khro bo bdag la 'khril// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun grub sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sku mdog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// e ma ho de gshegs kun gyi sku// sangs rgyas sku brnyes lus kyi nyes pa dag/ mtshan gyi me tog dpe byad 'bru chags te// sku mchog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// sku gsung thugs phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ de ltar bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i// byung khungs dngos gzhi las dang yon tan gang// bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// me leng ye shes ngang las thugs mchog tshul 'dzin cing// bde ba'i ye shes lnga don thugs chud pa'i// rnam shes bag chags sbyang mdzad rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyid sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// stong nyid ngang las sku mchog tshul 'dzin cing// bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// gzugs kyi mtshan ma sbyang mdzad 'khor los sgyur rgyal po// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// mnyam nyid ye shes ngang las yon tan tshul du bstan// rin chen dbyig ltar dgos 'dod re skong ba// tshor ba gnas su dag mdzad rin chen mdzes pa'i sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ngang las

pad+ma 'chang ba'i sku// 'dam skyes pad ltar nyon mongs skyon ma gos// 'du shes gnas su dag pas pad+ma 'chang ba'i sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// bya ba nan tan ye shes ngang las rgya gram 'dzin pa'i sku// bdag dang gzhan gyi phrin las don mdzad dpal// 'du byed gnas su dag pas sna tshogs 'chang ba'i sku// skye med chos kyi dbyings la ma g.yos kyang// nam mkha'i spyan gyis sku mchog shes rab tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i byin brlabs sdud mdzad de// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i spyan// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// sangs rgyas spyan gyis sku mchog bsam gtan tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i khyad par bskyed mdzad de// sa yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas spyan// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mA ma kI yi sku mchog sbyin pa'i tshul// nyon mongs tha ba rlan gyis spangs par byed// chu yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur mA ma kI// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// na bza' dkar mo'i sku? mchog bzod pa'i tshul// nyon mongs bag chags thams cad bsreg mdzad ma// me yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur na bza' dkar// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// dam tshig sgrol ma'i sku mchog brtson 'grus tshul// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags mthor mdzad ma// rlung gi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur dam tshig sgrol// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku sa yi snying po sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin cing// bla med byang chub 'bras bu smin mdzad pa'i// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur sa yi snying po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku nam mkha'i snying po tshul 'dzin cing// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i drwa ba gcod mdzad de// yid kyi rnam shes gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i snying po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku spyan ras gzigs kyi sku mchog sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'khor ba'i bag chags skyon gyis ma gos te// nyon mongs yid kyi gnas 'gyur spyan ras gzigs dbang sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku phyag na rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// mtha' gnyis nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms mdzad pa// lus kyi rnam shes gnas 'gyur phyag na rdo rje'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid thugs chud cing// gzugs sku byams pa mai tri sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin cing// che ba'i yon tan ma lus sku la rdzogs// sna yi rnam shes gnas 'gyur byams pa mai tri'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku sgrib pa rnam sel sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'gro ba rnams la gsung gi chos kyang

ston// rna ba'i rnam shes gnas 'gyur sgrib pa sel ba'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku kun tu bzang po sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bla med byang chub 'bras bu smin mdzad cing// mig gi rnam shes gnas 'gyur kun tu bzang po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku 'jam dpal gzhon nu sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin cing// nyon mongs bag chags tha ba 'joms par byed// lce yi rnam shes gnas 'gyur 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo lA s+ye sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// skye med chos kyi dbyings las mnga' brnyes ma// kun gzhi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur lA s+ye ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo mA le ser mo'i tshul 'dzin ma// chos nyid rig pa nyid la gsal mdzad de// yid kyi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur mA le ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo gIrti sems ma'i tshul du bstan// rnam dag 'gro la gsung gi sgra sgrogs ma// nyon mongs yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur girti ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo nirti sems ma'i tshul 'dzin cing// lus kyi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur nirti ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo d+hUpe sems ma'i tshul 'dzin cing// gsal ba'i rig pas bde gshegs tshogs rnams tshims mdzad nas// mig gi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur d+hU pe ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud cing// gzugs sku lha mo puSh+pe sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// mkhyen pa'i rig pas dus gsum sangs rgyas mnyes// rna ba'i yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur puSh+pe ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo A lo ke ste sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad// sna yi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur A lo ke/ skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang// gzugs sku lha mo gan+d+he sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// bag chags nyon mongs sgrib pa dag gyur te// lce yi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur gan+d+h+re ma// ye shes thugs kyi chos dbyings don rtogs te// gzugs sku kun tu bzang po phyag rgya'i tshul 'dzin cing// 'khor ba gnas 'dren bde gshegs kun bskyed yab// byed pa po ni gnas 'gyur kun bzang bdag nyid yab// chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med kyang// gzugs sku 'gro ba'i don du yum gyi cha 'dzin ma// 'das dang da ltar ma byon kun bskyed yum// bya ba mo ni gnas 'gyur kun bzang bdag nyid

yum// spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku brgya byin thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// brtson 'grus chos ston pham ltung med par mdzad// le lo gnas 'gyur lha yi thub pa mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku thags bzang ris te thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// yon tan tshul khrims chos ston 'thab rtsod rnam par sel// nga rgyal gnas 'gyur lha min thub pa mchog/ spros pa med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku shAkya thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bsam gtan chos ston brel phongs sdug bsngal sel// 'dod chags gnas 'gyur mi yi thub pa mchog/ spros pa med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// drang srong shAkya seng ge thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// shes rab chos ston gti mug sdug bsngal sel// gti mug gnas 'gyur byol song thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku rak+sha glang mgo thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bzod pa'i chos ston tsha grang sdug bsngal sol// zhe sdang gnas 'gyur dmyal ba'i thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku ded dpon kha 'bar tshul 'dzin pas// sbyin pa'i chos ston bkres skom sdug bsngal sel// ser sna gnas 'gyur yi dwags thub pa'i chog/ thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'jigs byed sku mchog gshin rje gshed du bstan// 'chi bdag gshin rje thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa// reg pa gnas 'gyur gshin rje gshed kyi sku// thugs nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'jigs pa'i sku mchog stobs po che ru bstan// gdos bcas phung po'i bdud rnams 'joms mdzad pa// reg bya gnas 'gyur stobs po che ru bstan// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'jigs pa'i sku mchog rta mchog dpal du bstan// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs bdud dpung rlag par byed// reg byed gnas 'gyur che mchog rol pa'i sku// thugs dam zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'jigs pa'i sku mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan// lha bdud chen po'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// reg bya gnas 'gyur bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sku// mtshan ma med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i sku mchog snying rje'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba'i sems can bla med gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// rtag pa gnas 'gyur lha mo rta gdong lcags kyu ma yi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i sku mchog byams pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'khor ba'i bag chags ma lus 'ching bar mdzad// chad pa gnas 'gyur lha mo phag gdong ma yi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i sku mchog dga' ba'i tshul 'dzin

ma// sdig pa mi dge'i las rnams 'joms mdzad pa// bdag tu 'dzin pas gnas 'gyur lha mo nyi zla spyan gyi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i sku mchog btang snyoms tshul 'dzin cing// gsung snyan bde gshegs dgyes pa bskyed mdzad de// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i gnas 'gyur lha mo thal byed ma yi sku// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha rnams kyi yon tan dang byung khungs dang dngos gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang ba mchog gi sku// sangs rgyas yang gyur dam pa'i bdag/ bde gshegs kun gyi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// kun mkhyen khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas thugs su chud de/ sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// spyir ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yid kyi bsam pa ting 'dzin te// ngag tu brjod pa snying po'i mchog/ bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya ste// spyod yul kun tu dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// de ltar rtogs na 'di mi dgos// ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pas// phyag rgya bca' dang snying po zlo// drang ba'i don du 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khyod nyid kyis// bsngags pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no// hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika hU~M// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// lag g.yon phang par mnyam gzhag ste// g.yas pa rdo rje sa gzhi gnon// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang// rab tu 'dar zhing skrag gyur na// bdud rnams tshar gcod smos ci dgos// gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyis// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// A+oM dzi ni dzika A+oM/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba la// rtse mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// gzung ba'i rtse la 'khor lo 'bar// 'khor los sgyur rgyal phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu dgyes shing mnyes par 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za// gzhan yang rin chen 'dzin nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// sA rat+na d+h+r-ika swA// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug gnas// g.yon pa rin chen 'dzin pa'i sku// g.yas pa rin chen mchog sbyin mdzad// rin chen 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde ba'i mchog rnams sbyin byed pas// 'gengs dka' ba yang 'gengs par byed// bkren las phyug por ji

zhig smos// gzhan yang pad+ma 'chang ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// AM A ro lika AM// phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las// lag gnyis rtse bsnol phang du gzhag/ ting dzin phyag rgya pad+ma'i rten// pad+ma 'chang ba'i phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang// dbang du 'gyur te the tshom med// khams gsum skye bo smos ci dgos// gzhan yang sna tshogs 'chang ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika hA// phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las// rgya gram gdengs pa'i tshul byas te// mi 'jigs sbyin par byed pa ni// sna tshogs 'chang ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// mUM d+hA twI shwa rI// thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mdzub gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te// mthe bong sen mo mig gi tshul// gung mo'i rtse la dril bu 'bar// rdo rje dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang// shi ba sos par gdon mi za// lAM dwe Sha ra tI// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag bya ste// thal mo'i rtse la 'khor dril 'bar/ nam mkha'i dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur// zhi ba'i las la the tshom med// muM mo ha ra tI// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las// gung gnyis bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par// mdzub gnyis bkug pa rdo rje'i tshul// rtse la rin chen dril bu 'bar// rin chen dbyings phyug phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// srung ba'i las kun byed pa ste// 'di yis bsrung bar byas na ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs so// pyAM rA ga ra tI/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las// pad+ma kha phye'i tshul byas te// dkyil nas pad+ma'i dril bus mdzes// pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// mos spyod chen po thob par 'gyur// tAM badzra rA tI/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mdzub mo bkug pa'i sen mo yis// sor mo gung mo'i rtse mo mnan// rtse la rgya gram dril bu 'bar// las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun// dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med// k+ShiM hi rA dzA ya hU~M// thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// gung gnyis bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum pa// mthe bong mdzub mo sen mo bsnol// srin lag the'u chung nang du bcug/ rin chen myu gu'i tshul byas te// sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// zhi ba'i las la the tshom med// traM A gar+b+hA ya// lag

pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong gis// gung mo srin lag sen mos mnan// g.yas pa'i mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// lhag ma gsum po g.yon pa'i nang// shubs nas phyung ba ltar byas pa// ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni// nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyas pa'i las la shin tu 'jig/ hriM ha hU~M pad+ma pA da ma// rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung gnyis gshibs te tshigs chen bcag/ pad+ma'i tshul du+u rab mdzes pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dbang gi las la the tshom med// dz+hiM ku ru pA Na hrI// rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung mo gnyis bsgreng snying po la// mthe bong srin lag drang brkyang ste// mdzub mo mthe'u chung ra yi tshul// rdo rje rtse lnga'i tshul byas pa// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// drag po'i las la the tshom med// mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA// thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mthe bong gnyis 'khyud dbus bzhag snying po'i tshul// sor mo ut+pal gyes pa'i tshul// byams pa mai tri'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mtshan dang dpe byad sku yang thob// th+l+hiM nis+sa ram+b+ha ya swA hA// thal mo rgyab bsnol sor mor 'khyud// mtheb gnyis steng gi dkyil du gzhag/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul// sgrib pa rnam sel phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyu 'bras chos kyi don rnams rtogs// hU~M sa rA dzA ya// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// lag pa'i rting pa dam sbyar nas// rdo rje sor mo drang brkyang ste// rin chen snye ma'i tshul du bya// kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sems can sangs rgyas sa la byang chub smin// mUM shrI aM ra gA ya// lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar te// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor 'khyud// rtsa ba dam sbyar co to dgye// klu shing yal ga gyes pa'i tshul// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dge ba'i lo tog smin par mdzad// oM badzra lA s+ya sa ma s+t+waM// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// mtheb gnyis drang du gyen du bsgreng// sen mo me long tshul du bya// lA s+ya ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rig pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la gsal// A+oM rat+na mA le sa ma ya ho/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis brkyang nas// mdzub gnyis bsgreng ba g.yas g.yon dgye// smin mtshams phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul// mA le ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mi brjed pa yi gzungs kyang 'thob// hrI girti rA go\u0f85 haM// g.yon brkyang mthe bong srin lag mnan te pi wang 'dzin// g.yas kyi srin mtheb gnyis kyis brdeb pa'i tshul// pad+ma girti'i phyag rgya yin// sngags

dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// 'gro rnams kun la chos kyi sbyin pa 'gyed// AM nirti rA ga yA mi// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje rol pa chen po yis// dgyes pa chen po gar gyi tshul// las kyi nirti'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs kun dgyes spyan yang mnyes// A+oM badzra d+hu pe d+hu// rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi srin mtheb kyis// spos khang yu ba 'dzin pa'i tshul// badzra d+hu pe'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// snying rje'i don mthun 'gro don byed par 'gyur// oM rat+na puSh+pe pu// rdo rje thal mo phyir bkyed de// mtheb gnyis so sor 'khyud byas te// me tog 'thor ba'i tshul byas pa// badzra puSh+pe'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// byams pa'i mchod sbyin thob par 'gyur// aM pad+ma A lo ke hrIH// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mtheb gnyis bsgreng ba mar me'i tshul// A lo ke yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dga' ba'i mchog gi don spyod 'gyur// oM badzra gan+d+he gan// lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo dgye// mtheb kyis mdzub mnan dung phor dbyibs// g.yas kyi sbom po dbang mos 'thor ba'i tshul// dri chab ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// btang snyoms don gyi sgra snyan sgrogs par 'gyur// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M/ rdo rje thal mo nang du bsnol// srin lag gnyis bsgreng rtse mo ste// mthe bong mthe'u chung gung mos 'khyud// rdo rje rtse lnga'i tshul du bshad// kun bzang bdag nyid yab kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dngos po kun gcod ye shes ngang du mkhyen par mdzod// a a a badzrI b+ha dra sa man+ta A// sor mo drang brkyang lag rting dgye// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo bsgreng// dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul byas pa// kun bzang bdag nyid mo yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mtshan ma kun gcod chos kyi mtshan nyid gsal bar byed// oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ g.yas g.yon sor mo drang brkyang ste// srin mtheb pi wang brdeb pa'i tshul// lha dbang brgya byin phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// le lo brtson 'grus sa la 'khod// oM mu ne hU~M truM swA hA// rdo rje sor mo phan tshun bsnol// mtheb gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs la sbrel// rdo rje go cha'i tshul byas pa// thags bzang ris kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang la bsrungs na mtshon mi tshugs// oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo rting bsnol nas// mtheb gnyis dkyil bzhag srog shing la// sor mo gseg shang bum pa'i tshul// shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun spyod dge tshogs 'phel

bar mdzad// oM mu ne praM swA hA// rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung mo srin lag brkyang sbyar te// glegs bam tshul du byas pa ni// shAkya seng ge'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rtag tu chos la longs spyod 'gyur// oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA// rdo rje thal mo khong stong las// rtse sprad tshigs zur sgrom bu'i tshul// kha 'bar ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// longs spyod mang po thob par 'gyur// oM mu ne ye swA hA// g.yas sor gdengs pa me ri ltar// g.yon gyi snyim pa chu yi tshul// glang mgo can gyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar// hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita dzaHphaT// rdo rje khu tshur nang du bsdam// mthe bong gnyis ni gyen du 'degs// thod pa nr-i mgo gdengs pa'i tshul// gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs kun skrag par byed// pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// gung gnyis gshibs pa'i rtse mor bya// mdzub mo mthe'u chung rwa yi dbyibs// rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'joms par byed// pad+man+ta kr-ita hr-I phaT// lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar nas// mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du mdud// mdzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// rta mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs kun dbang du sdud// A+oM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita ho phaT// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba las// gung mo gnyis ni drang por brkyang// mdzub mo mtheb chung rtse sprad phyi ru 'gyed// mthe bong srin lag rtse sprad nang du btud// rdo rje rgya gram gyes pa'i tshul// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs rnams rdul du rlog/ badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT// rdo rje khu tshur rgyab sbyar te// mthe chung lu gu rgyud du mdud// mdzub gnyis rtse bkug lcags kyu'i tshul// rta gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs spyan 'dren snying rjes 'gro don mdzad// rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT// gong gi phyag rgya de nyid las// mdzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// phag gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas bzhugs su gsol ba dang// byams pas sbyin pa chen po mdzad// pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// mtheb mo 'dzub mo lu gu rgyud// lcags sgrogs tshul du byas pa ni// sbrul gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyal ba brten mdzad kun kyang dga' bar

mdzad// karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje thal mo phan tshun bsnol// gung mo rtse sprad bsgreng byas te// rtse mo dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul// seng gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes mdzad 'gro don kun la snyoms// zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'i ngo bo dang/ yon tan rnam par bshad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas yab gyur dam pa'i bdag/ bdag la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la// dbang skur byin rlabs tshul bzhin mdzod// ces bskul ba mkhyen te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis// hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang gzhal yas khang nyid kyi thugs kar bsdu ba mdzad de/ rgyun lam dang gshegs shul nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i bstim gnas su 'khyil ba las/ thams cad lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen por gnas par mdzad do// de nas hU~M hU~M ma hA ga Na sa ma ya ho// zhes pa'i sgra brjod cing/ yab yum nyid kyang chags pa chen po'i chos nyid byang chub sems su gnas pa las/ cho 'phrul gyi sgra ru hU~M hU~M zhes bsgrag nas/ smon pa med pa'i gsung rtags kyi yi ge hU~M hU~M gnyis su gsal bar mdzad do// yang cho 'phrul gyi sgrar badzra dz+nyA na g+haN+Da zhes brjod pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i thugs rtags rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis su gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang cho 'phrul sgrar hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ zhes brjod de// rang bzhin med pa'i yab yum gyi skur gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang/ rjes su chags pa bskyed pa'i phyir na/ rdo rje dang pad+ma rgyas par mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// dz+nyA na badzra e A+oM hU~M phaT/ e a A+oM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ a nu rA ga yA mi/ a nu rA gA ya ho// de nas yang gsang ba'i byang chub sems las/ 'khor dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha' la gsal bar mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Da la hU~M hU~M/ de nas yang b+ha ga gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor du rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi sgrar brjod do// hU~M s+pha ra Na phaT dzaH zhes brjod de/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rgyas par mdzad do// de nas yang sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi sgrar brjod do// A+oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// A+oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wAka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma

hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma wa ko\u0f85 haM/ de nas yang 'khor rnams la rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes lngas dbang bskur ba'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi sgrar brjod do// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ A+oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ A+oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+ya nuSh+Than dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma \u0f84ko\u0f85 haM// zhes gsungs te/ byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur bas/ 'khor rnams 'gro ba'i don la thogs pa med par byin rlabs dang yang ldan/ dbang yang thob nas/ thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la rag par gnas so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// rnam par dag pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog/ sna tshogs las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ rnam dag sgra chen khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// ye shes gtso mchog khyed la 'dud// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba'i// sangs rgyas 'khor lo khyod la 'dud// yid bzhin re ba kun skong ba'i// nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la 'dud// 'dam skyes pad ltar sku 'khrungs pa'i// pad+ma 'chang ba khyed la 'dud// 'gro ba tha dad 'dul ba'i bye brag can// sna tshogs 'chad pa khyod la 'dud// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba la// sku gsung thugs kyis sprul pa yis// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad rigs// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul ba thugs su chud de// la lar sku yis don mdzad pa// 'gro rnams kun la sdig spong gzugs// sprul skus so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba rnams la gshin rjes 'dul// sgrib pa rnams la kha 'bar gzugs// dud 'gro rnams la seng ge'i gzugs// mi rnams kun la 'jig rten du// 'khor los sgyur rgyal lta bu'i gzugs// lha min rnams la thags bzang ris// lha rnams la ni brgya byin gzugs// tshangs ris rnams la lha chen gzugs// chags bral rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba las// mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs 'dul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs ni// la lar sde snod gsum dag tu// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar gsung rab bcu gnyis su// la lar stong phrag brgyad cu

bzhi// la lar brgyad khri bzhi stong du// gti mug mdongs pa'i 'gro gang la// sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// zhe sdang can la rdo rje 'dzin// nga rgyal can la rin po che// 'dod chags can la pad+ma 'chang// phrag dog spyod pa'i las goms par// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor// 'gro ba'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de snyed sgra skad sna tshogs ston// la lar lhums na gnas pa'i tshul// la lar lhums nas gshegs par ston// la lar khyim pa lta bu'i tshul// la lar khab nas rab tu byung// la lar dka' thub dka' ba spyod// la lar byang chub mchog sems bskyed// la lar bdud bzhi 'dul bar ston// la lar rdo rje gdan la gshegs// la lar byang chub shing dbang drung// la las bskul ba'i sa las bzhengs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor// la lar cho 'phrul chen po ston// la lar mya ngan 'das tshul ston// la lar sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lar chos kyi glegs bam ston// la las phyi rol 'byung ba'i las// chos dang mthun pa'i sgra skad 'byung// la lar mu stegs lta bu'i tshul// la lar 'jig rten bsam gtan tshul// la lar sa bcu rim gyis 'byung// la lar spyan lnga rnam par dag/ la lar mngon shes pha rol phyin// la lar khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// la lar 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs cho 'phrul ji ltar ston// zhes sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa las/ 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// e ma ho gsang sngags ngo mtshar che// e ma ho ston pa'i cho 'phrul che// e ma ho ngo mtshar cho 'phrul che// e ma ho sngags kyis mi 'dul med// 'di ci ya mtshan ngo mtshar ro// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu tshur gshegs shig/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid la// su zhig mos pa'i skyes bu des// mi bya ba ni gcig kyang med// mi bsgrub pa ni gcig kyang med// rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang// ma byin blang dang mi tshangs spyod// rdzun dang phra ma ngag rtsub dang// zas su sha dang bshang gci dang// rnag khrag don mo 'thung ba dang// ngan zos ngan spyad thams cad kyis// gsang ba 'di nyid 'grub par 'gyur// pha dang khu bo mes po dang// bu dang spun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems kyis gsad byas na// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'khrungs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// gdol pa mo dang phyal ba mo// 'dod pa'i sems kyis sbyor na ni// pad+ma'i rigs su

skye bar nges// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag skrag sngangs te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa'i bdag nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ slar gsos te rtog pa stsal du gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar mkhyen te/ de nas byang chub sems de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing 'khyil ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstims te/ byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag slar dran pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig mi 'dzum par bltas te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams rang rang gi 'du shes ngan pa de thong zhig/ byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// de nyid 'jig rten sna tshogs te// phyag rgya'i tshogs chen de nyid do// chos rnams sgyu mar dbang bsgyur bas// de la dngos po ga la yod// ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang// de la dngos po yod mi 'gyur// byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med// dmyal ba'i gnas nyid bla med gnas// sdug bsngal nyid na byang chub sems// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa nyid na mngon sangs rgyas// byang chub spyod sgo ji snyed pa// de snyed 'bras bu bde la 'khod// nges don de la 'dus par byos// zhes gsungs pas// byang chub sems dpa'i de dag som nyi dang bral nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin la dmigs nas 'khod do// de tshe 'gro drug sems can rnams// las kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur yang// log lta'i mthus bsnyems ma dad pa// ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kun// sangs rgyas bstan la dad par gyur// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la ma dad pa'i rgyu 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ byang chub spyod pa'i lam mchog la// 'gro ba ji snyed dad pa las// las kyi log lta ma dad pa'i// rgyu dang rkyen ni ji ltar lags// ma dad pa ni ci yi phyir// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs// 'bras bu smin pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dka' 'thub can gyi sems can de// legs pa'i rgyu las ma byung ste// med pa'i gzung 'dzin rtog ngan rgyu// rkyen ni chags sdang spyod la zhen// lta ba log pa nyon

mongs lnga// de yi las kyi dbang btsan pas// 'bras bu ma dad rgyu ru smin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs chen te// sde ni gdol pa'i 'byung por gtogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// log pa'i sems can chen po de// ci yi thabs kyis dad par 'gyur// ma dad nges na ji ltar gdul// btul na yon tan ji ltar 'thob// ma btul ma dad skyon ni ci// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// log lta'i mthus bsnyems sems can de// bden pa'i gzhung gis gdul bar bya// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan na// phyin ci log tu chos spyod nas// lha dang mi yi srid brlag ste// kha lo log par bsgyur nas kyang// sangs rgyas dman rigs su lus la// sems can kha lo log par bsgyur nas kyang// don la ma dad skyon yod do// btul na yon tan dpag med de// dus gsum rtsad gcod 'khor ngos sprug/ 'khor ba chos nyid chen por 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab tu rgyas// btul bas don la dad par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma dad pa yi sems can chen po de// las la bab pa'i thugs rje yis// bde ba chen po'i gzhung bkon nas// bde chen sa la dgod du gsol// zhes bskul bas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas/ sprul pa'i thugs kyi cho 'phrul mdzad de/ ye shes kyi sprin mgon ni dbyar gyi char sprin bzhin gtibs/ chos nyid drod chen po ni nam mkha'i rlan bzhin du g.yos te/ sprul pa'i sku char gyi rgyun bzhin du babs pa ni// dpe byad kyi sku la mtshan gyi me tog chags par mdzad/ gsung chags pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi bye brag sna tshogs bsgrags nas/ bden pa'i gzhung gis 'dul bar gzas na/ rU tra nag po des se gol lan gcig brdabs nas mi 'dul mngon pa'i nga rgyal skyes te/ go'u ta ma khyod kyis bdag 'dul ba ma lags sam/ khyod rang rang gi gnas su dka' thub kyi bde ba la gnos shig/ ces zer te ma nyan to// rdo rje phur pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bde ba chen po'i gzhung gis ma dad pa gdul bar gzas pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul ba mdzad de// kye ma'o sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// snang ngo kun tu rab tu 'dir// srid pa'i log pa gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po yi dwags te// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung// drag po rang gi dka' thub kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// drag po rU tra'i gdug dbal

gyis// 'gro rnams thal rlog 'jigs byed 'di// gdul bar bya ba'i 'os mchog ste// snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus la// sdug bsngal lam gyi rgyun bcad de// bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs// zhes gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis/ bskul ba'i don de thugs su chud de/ zhi ba dang bden pas mi 'dul bar dgongs nas/ 'gro ba dang tshul bstun te gdan tshogs chen po bcas te/ 'di skad dag gi 'gro ba mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen po dag/ 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ltar// da ltar dus 'dir byung ba ste// bde bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro drag gtum pa yis// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur// mi bzad chen pos sdug bsngal te// dug gsum sa la mngon zhen pa'i// ji lta ba yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan gti mug chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa// shin tu gtum pa'i sems can de// ji ltar de dag bzhag gyur na// bag chags ngan pa'i chu rlan gyis// bdud kyi tshogs su mngon 'phen nas// rig 'dzin pa yi rgyud gcod cing// bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig 'gyur bas// de tshe las kyi mun pa yis// 'gro ba ma rig mun par 'khyams// dug nad rims nad phra men ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren nyid// srid pa gsum po 'joms byed cing// dam tshig gnyan po 'dral byed pa// ji lta ba yis thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das nga rgyal chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon phyung ba// las kyi gdug pa'i rU tra de// rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar khro bdag gtum pa ltar// da ltar tshe 'dir byung ba ste// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// 'bar khro 'khrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltara'atshams pa bzhin du 'os// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang// khros pa'i sprin nag gtibs pa yis// mngon spyod 'bar ba'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyis ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun bya// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das phrag dog chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las// log rtog

phyin ci log gis bcings// dngos por rang gar zhen pa yis// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang// dam tshig la sdang rnam spyong phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod// ces bgros so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// zhi bas mi 'dul bar dgongs nas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bka'i mol ba mdzad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de ltar bgros pas rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa de dag dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i spyod pa can dngos po'i lam la mngon par 'chel ba/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mthus bsnyems nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pas/ 'jig rten phung bar byed pa rnams/ zhi bas phan par byed pa'i skal ba la ma bab ste/ rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis gdul bar gzig te/ thams cad dgong pa gcig tu gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad gnas kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar bsdu ba mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang du mi snang bar mdzad nas// chos nyid de bzhin nyid la dmigs te gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po des/ chos kyi dbyings de kho na nyid las khros pas/ nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa ngang gis mi gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid dang/ don de nyid kun la khyab cing gsal ba'i kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin/ snying rje chen po dang gsal ba nyid du kun la khyab pa ni/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu la mngon par 'du mdzad de/ nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa las/ mtshan ma'i rgyu'i snying po yi ge hU~M sngon po// ye shes can gyi 'od du 'bar bar shar te/ des rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'od du mtshon cing 'dzin rtog zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// srog gi go ru rtogs pa'i hU~M de las/ snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ mi rtog pa la gnas pa'i hU~M de las/ cho 'phrul gyi sgrar snying po 'di rnams ched du brjod do// e ag+ne dz+wa la maN+Da la e/ yaM karma rak+sha haM/ ra rak+ta sa man dz+wa la maN+Da la/ su badzra su me ru/ keng ni ri ti keng/ raM dz+waM la raM/ zhes bsgrags pas/ zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la// phrag dog 'bar ba'i tshubs mar ldan// chags pa rak+ta'i rba klong 'khyil// gti mug chen po'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal chen po'i me ri 'bar// zhes pa ste/ dbang chen yum lnga'i nam mkha'i ngo bor shes par mdzad pa ni/ 'byung ba yum gyi gzhal yas khang mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de las yang b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he hU~M zhes pas/ ye shes lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi brtsig pa la// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang bar mdzes pa

yi// rta babs la sogs rin chen rgyan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// 'dod yon lnga dang rol mo'i tshogs su bcas// zhes pas// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang mngon par shar bar mdzad do// b+h+rUM b+han+d+ha dz+nyA na badzra b+h+rUM/ zhes pas/ b+han+d+ha skam rlon mang po'i brtsig pa la// gnam lcags ngur mo 'bar ba'i gzer chen btab// gzungs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu phreng chen po dang// kha nas me 'bar sna nas dud 'thul te// mAM sa'i sa gzhi rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang// dri chen skyang nul dri chu'i zham chu chag chag dang// rnag dang chu sair chol bur 'khyil// mi 'gyur btab pa'i ka gdan la// zhing chen ka ba lha chen ka zhu btsug/ mchog chen gdung bres mchog bran phyam bkram ti ra'i dral bkod nas// zhing chen bla re tsit+ta'i tog/ nya chen 'phen dang chu srin za ra tshag/ zhing chen khog stod khog smad dam dum ral rol dang// grags grugs lang ling gsur chen du ba la// dur khrod bya rnams ha ha ru lu'i sgra skad di ri ri// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i nyi zla mthongs nas 'char// rnam thar chen po bzhi yi sgo bzhi na// bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs/ zhes pas ma dad pa de dang tshul bstun pa'i phyir na dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang e baM ma ya ra dz+wa la raM zhes pas// gru gsum mthing nag drag po ste// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// mu khyud zlum po zhi ba'i ngang// brub bzhi ser po rgyas pa'o// smug nag gru gsum 'bar ba lha yi bzhugs gnas te// ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// phyi ni yid bzhin rin chen te// nang gi dur khrod 'bar ba'o// zhes pas gdan tshogs dang 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang ma a pa sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la zhes pas/ rtag pa zil gyis gnon pa'i nyi ma dang// chad pa zil gyis mnan pa'i zla ba dang// rtag chad skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma ste// zil gnon gdan du mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de las hU~M sa ma tiSh+Tha badzra hU~M zhes pas// cho 'phrul gyi sgra bsgrags shing// gdan gyi ge sar la rgyu yi hU~M nyid shar te// bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad yi ge hU~M du shar bar mdzad do// hU~M de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi go ru rtogs par mdzad do// badzra dz+nyA na badzra e zhes pas/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i lte ba la hU~M gis mtshan pa gcig tu mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad/ thugs phyag mtshan rdo rjer gnas par gyur to// de las dz+nyA na sa twa kI la ya hU~M zhes pas/ rdo rje de nyid la sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rjes

bsgral ba'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad de// lus yod na grib ma yod pa'i tshul du yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe chos thams cad sku phra mo'i ngang du gsal ba las/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ dIp+ta na tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT// ces cho 'phrul gyi sgra bsgrags te/ phyag rgya chen po yab yum gnyis kyi sku mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe chos thams cad yab yum phyag rgya chen por thams cad sangs rgyas par mdzad de/ de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can kun/ kun rtog gi zhe sdang gis bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// b+h+rUM A+oM A~M hU~M swA hA/ badzra rat+na tsakra pad+ma khaD+ga kA ya wAka tsit+ta gu Na karma/ dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ zhes pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo// dbu la rdzogs pa'i rigs lngas bsrung ba dang/ dbang bskur bar mdzad do// yang A+oM AHhU~M kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// zhes pas// dus gsum gyi chos ma lus pa'i ngo bo// sku gsung thugs rdo rjer sbyin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// hU~M hU~M hU~M a mr-i ta su ti phri du kI la ya hU~M tung zhes pas/ srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i sems can gyi ngo bo// byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin rnams/ bka' nan gyi tshul gyis sku la brgyan par mdzad do// de'i tshe na zag pa med pa'i sku rdo rjes gtam par mdzad do// de nas yang dz+nyA na sa twa kI la ya hU~M zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems dpa'i ngo bo dang/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA baM hU~M hU~M phaT// ces pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang// sngags kyi ngo bo dang/ A+oM hU~M hri phaT ces pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngag pa sgo srung dbang gi rgyal po dang// dz+nyA na badzra A+oM hU~M phaT// e a oM zhes pas ye shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' dang/ gsang ba'i ngo bo mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo dang de'i rkyen dang/ de'i rtags 'byung khungs dang/ de'i gnas bsrung ba ste/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dgongs par mkhyen to// ma dad pa'i sems can chen po de dang tshul mthun pa'i phyir na/ zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag/ rol pa chen po'i phyag drug dang// brjid pa'i dor thabs zhabs bzhi dang// sku yi bem ldir che ba dang// gsung gi tsham rngams bsgrags pa dang// thugs kyi dgongs pa chen po dang// dpa' zhing shin tu brjid pa'i cha byad do// de nas dregs pa chen po des/ srog bcad pa'i khrag rjes yod pa de dag gis thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su sku+u la brgyan no// thal ba'i tshom tshom yod pa de dag gis mtshan ma spros pa med pa'i don gyis nyid la brgyan no// zhag dang bcud kyi khyal khyil ni/

don dam bcud kyi rang bzhin gyis khros pa'i sku la byugs so// dka' thub can gyi sems can de'i bgo ba'i bye brag la/ mun pa glang gi ko shun ni stobs bcu rdzogs pa'i na bzar sku+u la gsol// chags pa'i zhing chen ni// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i chos gos su mnab/ zhe sdang rdzongs la zhen pa'i stag lpags ni/ dpa' gtum gyis 'gro ba'i don la thabs mkhas pa'i sham thabs su brgyan no/ !/ yang nga rgyal gyi drod 'bar ba ni// ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba dang// 'phro ba 'du bsreg pa dang// klong ba 'khyil pa mi bzad ste// nyid kyi sku+u la gnas par mdzad/ gdug pa can rtag chad kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa de/ zil gyis gnon cing spa bkong ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams khengs pa yang khros pa nyid la rgyan mdzes par mdzad do// thod pa skam rlon gyi phreng thod de dag ni/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs kyis khros pa nyid kyi rgyan du byas so// gdug cing zhe sdang ba'i sbrul bkris la sogs pa de dag ni/ mnyen lcug yum bzhi'i gzungs su byin gyis brlabs te/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags kyis khros pa nyid la brgyan no// gzung 'dzin la zhen pa'i sgra shin tu 'jigs pa de yang/ zil gyis mtha' gnyis gnan pa'i phyir/ nyid la 'khyil bar mdzad de/ 'dod pa'i yon tan dang/ kho'i longs spyod pa'i bye brag la 'dod pa'i rgya mtsho las ma thar ba'i phyir na/ kho'i gnas 'khor na khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba de dag ni/ khros pa'i rgyal pos pad+ma rak+ta las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te gsol to// nyon mongs pa la mngon par 'chel ba'i/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzab de dag ni/ dri chen las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te gsol lo// zhe sdang gi rdzongs la zhen pa'i go ro tsa na dang rkang rus kyi bcud de dag/ byang chub sems las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te zhal du bzhes so// rnag dang chu ser gyi zham chu 'bab pa de dag ni/ rdo rje dri chu las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te zhal du bzhes so// bsgral ba'i don 'chel ba'i sha dang 'bu shin tu che ba de dag ni/ mAM sa las bdud rtsir sprul te zhal du rol lo// khros pa'i rgyal pos/ dregs pa'i sems can de'i gnas khang dang tshul bstun pa'i gzhal yas ni gsal bar mdzad/ lus ngag gi rgyan gdos pa dang bcas pa de dag ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan du don dang bstun/ zag bcas kyi longs spyod de dag ni/ zag med kyi bdud rtsi mdzad de/ gdug pa de dag dang tshul bstan te/ kho'i gdos pa de dag dang bstun par bzhed pas/ kho chags sdang la zhen pa'i dbang gis ma dad de/ nga rgyal gyi de'u ma chogs/ gti mug gi mun pa ma sol/

chags pa'i 'dam las ma thar/ zhe sdang gi mnar sems dang ma bral/ phrag dog gdug rtsub ma zhi nas/ phan zhing zhi bar ma gyur to// de tshe stong gsum 'jig rten kun// thugs rje chos kyi char gyis brlan// sman dang 'bru rnams thams cad kun// 'gro ba'i gsos su byin brlabs te// rtsa ba sdong po dar ba dang// yal ga lo ma me tog dang// snying po 'bras bu bcas par smin// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun/ ra sA ya na'i rdzas la spyod pa las// dka' thub can de de nyid bdud kyi lta ba la mngon par dad pas/ chags sdang gi rang bzhin longs spyod par dad pa las/ thams cad 'khor ba bdud dang 'dra ba'i zas rnams thugs rje'i rtsi btang bas/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i zas la rol te spyod pa las/ dregs pa de nyid nges pa kho nar dad par ma gyur to// de nas khros pa'i rgyal po des ma dad pa de'i gzung 'dzin dang rtag chad kyi mtha' bsal ba'i phyir// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos kyi sgo mo dang// theg pa chos kyi brag dang// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam grangs te/ drang ba'i don phyir nges don gsungs pa las/ 'gro kun dad cing grol ba las/ dka' thub can de nges par ma grol ma dad do// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po des/ dregs pa pho mo rnams kyi chags par 'dod pa de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M e a ra li ru lu ru lu sa ma ya dza zhes brjod pas/ dregs pa'i ma dang sring mo dang bu mo dang sles mo dang bran mo dang chung ma rnams/ srog gi snying pos ma bzod nas/ rdo rje khros pa'i thad du yud tsam gyis phyin pa las/ gsung ma chags pa'i tshangs pa'i mgur ni bzhes/ zhal bzhad spyan gzigs smin rings 'gyur// rol pa'i mdzad spyod rnam par stegs pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ma thar nas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku kun gyi thad thad du 'khril ba las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos ma chags pa thabs kyi sbyor ba kun la mdzad de/ chags pa'i rgyu'i sa bon de chos nyid byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du spros pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams chags pa'i 'dod chags pa/ mchog tu yang dag par skyes nas gnas so// de'i dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha zhes brjod pa las/ dkar mo dang ni rkun mo dang/ gtum mo dang ni rmongs mo dang/ ro langs ma dang/ lcam mo dang/ thal byed sme sha ma tshogs rnams/ re re la yang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rang rang gi cha lugs lag cha stan dang bcas te/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ he he he he he he he he/ zhes brjod pas/ seng gdong wa gdong stag gdong khyi gdong dang// bya rgod gdong dang dur bya'i gdong// bya rog

gdong dang 'ug pa'i gdong/ re re la yang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ cha lugs dang lag cha stan dang bcas te 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ phaT phaT phaT phaT ces brjod pas/ rta gdong phag gdong seng gdong sbrul gdong rnams/ re re la tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ cha lugs dang lag cha stan dang chas nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa'i sprin las/ dzA dzA dzA dzA/ dzA dzA dzA dzA/ zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje pho nya drug cu'i tshogs rnams gong bzhin no// yang dgyes pa'i sprin las/ ha ha ru lu hU~M zhes pas/ pho ging dang mo ging rnams kyang gong ma bzhin no// de nas 'dod pa zhi ba dang/ ma hA rak+ta kro tI phaT ces pas/ dregs pa mo rnams rang rang gi gnas khang ga la ba der yud tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas dregs pa chen po des shin tu yang mi dga' ba'i 'du shes skyes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag las khyad par can med na/ bdag gi gnas khang dang cha lugs dang byed spyod dang yo byad rnams byin nyams la/ khros pa de ni gzi byin dang ldan/ ma la sogs pa rnams kyang kho'i tshig nyan par gyur to// sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can mang po yang gnas 'khor 'dir byung/ kho bo rang lugs kyi chos la yang khros pa'i rgyal po de bden pa'i gzhung med par smra na/ ji ltar spog snyam pa las/ dregs pa de zhe sdang gi me chen ni spar/ chags pa'i rgya mtsho ni gting nas g.yos/ mun pa'i skar khung ni char sprin ltar gtibs/ phrag dog gi zug rngu ni bslang/ nga rgyal gyi de'u bskyed de/ nyong mongs pa'i sgra ru ru lu ru lu ni sgrogs/ gdug pa'i lag cha kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing spogs par gzo ba las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos// rak+Sha tri gu sa ma ya mu dra'i sgra bsgrags pas/ kha TAM ga'i lag cha de nyid phrog nas/ rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag mtshan du phyag drug g.yon gyi bar bar bsnams so/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ kho'i nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru lu ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po oM dang hU~M gi bar du bcug ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ zhes khros pas bzlas pas// dregs pa de nyid skyes bu gang dag lce bcad pa bzhin du/ lan blan pa'i glags med par shes pa nyams par mdzad do// de nas yang cung zhig na log par rtogs pa'i sems can de/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yid la byas te/ lus ngag yid gsum shin tu yang khro zhing gtum gdug par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mthu ston pa las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ chos kyi ma 'dul ba'i sems can de/ drag po mngon spyod kyis bsgral bar dgongs nas/ bsgral ba'i don de

yang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbang mi za ba'i phyir/ dbang byin rlabs 'dod pa'i phyir/ oM ta thA ga ta kro d+ha sa mA dza zhes pas/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams/ chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las/ gzugs kyi sku 'gag pa med pa'i sku ru bzhengs te gnas so// de la rol pa'i tshig 'dis bskul lo/ hU~M srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang/ dbang dang byin rlabs blang ba'i phyir/ 'gyur med sku ru gnas pa de/ ye shes khros par gshegs su gsol/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes bskul bas/ bde bar gshegs pa de dag sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la til gang ba bzhin du byon no// de nas ta thA ga ta na mo badzra zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ rdo rje'i phyag mngon par mdzad do// de nas yang ta thA ga ta ma hA dI pa d+hU pa puSh+pa su kha gan+d+ha i daM pU dza sa ma ye hU~M zhes brjod pas/ tshul khrims dri mchog ting 'dzin me tog dang/ lhag mthong mar me zhi gnas chu rgyun dang/ bsil mngar ar+g+ha dag pa lha'i zhal zas kyis mngon par mchod de/ 'di skad ces bskul la/ ye shes lha mchog gshegs nas kyang// phyag 'tshal mchod bzhes thugs bskul bas// dbang dang byin rlabs stsal ba dang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan du gsol/ zhes pas bskul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bskul ba'i don de thugs su chud nas/ thams cad rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs las snga tshul bzhin du zhugs pas/ shin tu yang byin rlab dang ldan par mdzad/ de bzhin rigs lnga'i ngo bo thams cad rigs ma 'chol bar thim pas ni/ sku dang ye shes rigs kyi ngo bor dbang bskur/ dregs pa de dang tshul bstun pa'i phyir na/ gdos bcas kyi rgyan mang pos khros pa'i sku la brgyan pa de dag las don dang mthun pa'i mtshan mar bstan te// rab brjid mang la mang bas ma lus spa bkong bar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ oM dz+nyA shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra ces pas/ theg pa dgu dang rab ldan pas// sa dgu'i rtog pa kun bcom ste// he ru dgu yi rang bzhin gyi// ye shes dgu ldan rtags 'di byin// zhes gsungs te/ las kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi dang por rtags kyi phyag rgya byin no// yang oM dz+nyA na pany+tsa badzra/ ye shes lnga dang rab ldan pas// mchod rten rtags kyi rdo rje 'dis// dug lnga 'joms pas gnas lnga stongs// dam skong rigs snyems ye shes lnga yi rtags// zhes gsungs te/ mchod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni/ rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi bar bar bskur te/ dregs pa de dag 'dul bar dbang bskur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ rdo rje khros pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma ho log pa'i lam gyis mnar ba las// thabs

kyis 'dul bar ma gyur te// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// ye shes khros pas 'dul bar 'gyur// de bas mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskul bar mkhyen te/ nyid kyi ye shes rigs kyi khro bor sprul te/ khros pa'i sprin phung du bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje khros pa dang khros pa'i sprin de dag gis/ hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro ta dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyog mtshams thams cad/ khro bo 'chol bas lhag gis gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// tshig rab tu tshig kun tu rab tu tshig go/ 'thor 'thor kun tu rab tu 'thor ro// ldeg ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'gul 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// de'i tshe 'jig rten phung bar byed pa'i dregs pa de ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi che ba ston cing ma 'dul lo// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos// A+e baM mAM ya/ badzra tsakra raM zhes pas/ dregs pa de rdo rje 'khor lo 'bar ba'i drwa bar bcug/ phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni lus la bkod nas gnas so// de nas A+oM badzra kI li kI ya la/ ra tri ru dra rak+sha/ ha sa ya ra na/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ces gsang ba'i sngags 'thon te/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad rdo tshan la chu 'dus pa bzhin du skams te gnas so// dregs pa'i sems can de nyid du dung sems kyi gya gyu dang/ lus kyi gzi byin che bar ston pa las/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ra tri ru dra rak+sha A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ chags byed dang snying po la lus sems rnal bar mdzad do// khros pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi zhabs 'og tu brdzis te gnas so// de nas dregs pa de shin tu yang mi bzod pa'i tshig gis/ 'o sha thong dpa' bo sgeg pa rab tu thong/ thugs rje'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod de'am/ zer zhing phyir 'bros par gzo ba las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya tra tri rU tra rak+sha shIg+h+raM A na ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ yan lag mdzod spu'i bsti gnas la/ tsha tsha dang skar mda' bzhin du 'phros te 'khor bas/ lus kyi bsgul bskyod kun med par/ rus sbal rgya mtshor zhugs pa bzhin du gnas so// de nas yang dregs pa de sgrib pa sbyong ba'i phyir na/ rdo rje khros pa'i zhabs kyis kyang shin tu gzir te// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ra tri rU tra ra sha dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT// ces sngags 'thon te/ bsam gzhi dang ngag gnas su 'phros shing 'khor bas// dregs pa de sngar spyad pa'i las ngan de dag gis 'di lta bu'i

las ngan nyams su myong ba dran te/ mi bzad pa'i 'o dod 'bod cing lus zhum sems nyams te gnas so// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ rdo rje phur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces pas yum dang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las/ rdo rje phur pa khro bo las kyi phur pa ste/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog mthing// sku smad man chad zur gsum la// thod rlon sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// dug gsum stong pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang// bag chags 'dral ba'i s+t+wa re dang// zil gnon ri rab 'debs pa'i phur bu 'dril// ral gri'i sgra la phur bu'i so// rigs kyi dbu brgyan thugs la 'bar ba'i srog/ sku+u la khros pa'i me dpung 'bar ba gcig 'thon te/ bka' nod pa'i tshul gyis spyan snga nyid na gnas so// yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A+oM A hU~M swA hA/ zhes pas ye shes kyi ni yi ge lngas/ gnas lngar byin brlabs dbang bskur 'od kyi 'bru'o// A+oM hri phaT ces pas ni/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlab mdzad/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ spro bsdu phrin las sa bon no// 'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas rnams// de yi sku la 'jug pa'i phyir// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya A be sha a a/ khros pa'i phyag drug phyag rgya gnyis// sras mchog de yi sked nas bzung// sor bcu rigs kyi yab yum bcus// sbyor ba'i byin rlab 'phro 'du las// de nas sku gsung thugs nyid du// byin brlab bzla ba mchog tu mdzad// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dz+wa la dza la hU~M phaT// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+Than hr-i da sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya tsit+ta tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ sras kyi dam pa mchog de la// mchod de thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di brjod do// A+oM laM hU~M laM/ staM b+ha ya nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ 'di rnams zur chags/ b+ha ga wAn/ hrIHSh+t-I wI kri/ badzra hU~M kA ra/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI ya la/ dzaHhU~M baM ho/ sarba big+h+nAn kI la ya hU~M phaT/ badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M A/ zhes pas dregs pa'i snying la gdab// a nyid byang chub sems kyis bkrus// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyid la bstim// phur bu nyid kyang gzi byin bskyed// 'od dang mthu dpung lhag par bskyed// de nas rgyal ba thams cad la// rdo rje'i tshig tu 'dis bskul te// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag dang gzhan rnams la// gnod cing gdug sems ldan pa dang// dge ba'i bar du gcod pa rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlab kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// lus ngag rdul du bshig byas nas// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM badzra kI li kI la ya ra tri rU tra rak+Sha tsit+ta tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M

phaT// ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnas lnga la 'khor zhing thim pas/ nyon mongs pa las grub pa'i gdos bcas kyi phung po bshig par mdzad do// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku za byed du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ A+oM badzra dz+nyA na dz+wa la raM zhes gsungs so// rdo rje ye shes kyi me dbal dud kha 'bar ba zhig rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yon dang por phul te nyon mongs pa gnas su dag cing/ zhal du gsol bar dbang bskur ro// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kyang dregs pa de'i bag chags kun/ rdo rje ye shes kyi me dbal gyis bsreg nas/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ra tri rU tra rak+sha b+hin+d+ha ya b+hin+d+ha ya ha ha zhes pa'i sngags 'thon te/ phung po lhag rol la 'khor zhing zhal du rol lo// de'i tshe dregs pa'i rgyal po de yang/ rdo
