rje khros pa'i lto khyim na bde ba'i gnas su phyin te// las dge sdig gi don mthong ste gnas pa las/ rdo rje khros pas phyag brang la bsnol nas/ kun rdzob dang tshul bstun te btsir bas/ mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyil te slar dran pa brlag par gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje khros pas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam nas khro bo sme sha 'thon te/ A+oM badzra kI li kI ya la ra tri rU tra rak+sha badzra yak+sha kro ta bi dza ya kha kha khA hi khA hi// zhes bskul te/ des mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho de dag slar rngubs pas dran pa rnyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sku// shin tu bde ba'i gnas gshig nas// snam du bton pa thugs rje chung// bdag kyang rgyal ba'i bka' la thogs// zhes gsol zhing/ 'di skad ces sdig pa bshags so// bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chod nas// da lta tshe lus 'dir skyes phan chad du// lha mchog khyod dang smon lam mthun sdebs pas// dus 'dir zhal mthong yi dam lhar gsol na// dus tshigs 'di nas bzung nas yi dam la// snying po byang chub mchog la mi gnas par// tshe rabs 'khor ba gar skyes gar byung yang// gsang ba'i lha mchog khyod dang mi 'bral zhing// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig la// mi 'da' gnas dang yun du bdag bsrung gi/ lhag chad 'gal 'khrul mchis pa mthol lo bshags// las kyi dbang gis bar chad ci byung yang// dpal chen khyod kyis gong bzhin zil gyis gnon// dngos grub mchog stsol shes rab lha mo'i sku// zhes bshags so// de nas yang dregs pa de shin tu dga' ba dang dad pa'i sems skyes nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo khyod la rim gro bskyed pa dang// bdag gi sgrib pa spyong ba'i phyir// bdag gi lus 'di gdan du 'bul// e ma ho dpa' bos bzhes su gsol// ma sring chung ma bu mo slas kyi tshogs// dpa' bo khyod kyi 'bangs su

'bul// 'bangs su 'bul lo bka' la thogs// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ de nas de'i ma dang chung ma bu mo slas kyi tshogs rnams kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dbus su mchi ba'i skal med kyis// dkyil 'khor mu ran mtha' la zhog/ phud la 'tshal ba'i skal med kyi// lhag ma kha chus bran la gsol// zhes gsol te/ dregs pa chen po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ lus gnad du phul bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byang/ rna bas chos nyan pas shes bya'i sgrib pa byang/ rgyal ba'i pha 'bab mngon pas rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor zhal mthong bas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs te/ grub pa mor khas blangs nas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs bskang bar yang dam nos te gnas so// dregs pa chen po'i ma dang chung ma dang slas mo dang bu mo dang/ bran mo rnams ni/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mu ran la bzhag ste/ bka' la btags te dam tshig byin nas/ mda' bsgags nas gnas so// de'i tshe na dregs pa chen po'i nye 'khor/ 'dod chags dang gti mug dang phrag dog dang nga rgyal la sogs pas so sor dregs pa'i// tshangs pa brgya byin dang ma hA de ba dang// khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po rnams/ rang rang gi che ba ston cing khro zhing gtum mo/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos khro gtum pa de dag 'dul ba'i ched du/ sras mchog bud+d+ha rin chen pad+ma las kyi phur pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas// ma chags pa'i yum la rjes su chags pa bskyed de// rol pa'i byang chub sems las// A+oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM A+oM hU~M phaT// swA rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM traM hU~M phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hrI hU~M phaT/ hA karma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hA hU~M phaT/ ces pas ni/ de bzhin khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ rin chen khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ pad+ma khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ las rab khro bo las kyi phur pa rnams 'thon te/ smug nag ser nag ljang nag sngo nag dmar nag gcer bu rnams// sku stod zhal gsum phyag bzhi la/ sku smad so so'i phur pa las kyi dbyibs bzhi dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan rang rang rigs kyi mtshan mar brgyan/ dbu+u la rigs bsrungs thugs la srog kyang 'bar// thod rlon sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams// zlum 'khyil gru bzhi zla gam gru gsum gdangs pa yi// gdan la bkod de bka' nod tshul du gnas// byin brlab dbang bskur la sogs rim par mdzad do// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po yis// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya/ 'di skad ces bskul te/ drag po sgrol ba'i las la btsud do// A+oM zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar la 'phro ba'i

sku bzhengs pa// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug dregs pa chen po bsgral du gsol// swA gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs la// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal dregs pa chen po bsgral du gsol// aHzla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar la 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs pa// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags dregs pa chen po bsgral du gsol// hA gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ma 'phro ba'i skur bzhugs pa// las rab 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog dregs pa chen po bsgral du gsol// zhes bskul bar mkhyen nas// na maHsa man+tA nAn kA ya wAg tsit+ta badzra NAM/ A+oM g+ha g+ha g+ha tA ya g+ha tA ya/ sarba duSh+taMn mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA la wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ bud+d+ha kI la ya ba ra bid+yan hU~M phaT/ rat+na kI la ya kI grih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ pad+ma kI la ya ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ karma kI la ya bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags brjod cing/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i phyag gis rigs bzhi'i phur pa'i sked nas rim par bzung zhing dregs pa bzhi sgrol bar mdzad do// de'i tshe dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ sras mchog dam pa de la 'di skad ces bsgos shing skul bar mdzad de/ 'di skad ces cho 'phrul gyi sgrar mngon par dus gcig tu sgrogs so// kye ma sangs rgyas mang po'i sras// dge ba'i bar chad byed pa dang// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// ring par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnams par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du bsdu byas te// lus dang ngag sems rdul du bshig nas kyang// dug gsum sha khrag zhal du bsdus rngubs nas// bsgo ba'i las rnams khyed kyis grub par gyis// zhes par bskul te/ bstab cing bsgral bar mdzad do// de'i don gyis 'byongs stongs mnyes skongs 'bras bu rdzogs par mdzad do// de nas yang dregs pa de lnga'i chung ma de dngos 'dzin ma dang/ rtag pa mo dang/ mtshan ma can dang/ chad pa mo dang// smug mo la sogs pa rnams/ rang rang gi che ba ston cing shin tu yang chags pa dang ldan pa las/ yang khrag 'thung rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ gsal ba rdo rje dang/ sdud pa rdo rje dang/ 'bar ba rdo rje dang/ g.yo ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ 'khor lo 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ rin chen 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ pad+ma 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ las rab 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma rnams/

nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ yum chen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las 'thon te/ rgyan dang cha lugs dang/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams/ rigs kyi sras dang cha mthun te/ dregs pa pho rnams gong bzhin bsgral te tshar bcad nas/ sras mchog la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas yang dreg po chen po de'i nye 'khor na/ 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jig rten pa'i las la grub pa'i phyogs skyong ba bcu ste/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ me lha dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ chu lha dang/ rlung lha dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dbang ldan dang/ sa bdag rnams/ brnab sems dang/ ma byin len pa dang/ log par blta ba dang/ srog gcod pa dang/ phra ma dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yems pa dang/ ngag 'khyal pa dang/ ngag rtsub po dang/ gnod sems dang/ tshig brlang po dang/ mi dge pa bcus dregs nas/ nga rgyal gyis mthu ston cing shin tu yang bstan pa la ma dad pa'i tshul ston pa la/ de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus rol pa'i stobs dang/ bzlog pa'i stobs dang/ 'joms pa'i stobs dang/ 'jigs byed kyi stobs dang/ gzhon tshul gyi stobs dang/ brjid pa'i stobs dang/ shugs 'chang ba'i stobs dang/ gzir ba'i stobs dang/ gnon pa'i stobs dang/ 'degs pa'i stobs dang/ stobs bcu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ma chags pa'i yum la chags pa'i tshul du rol lo/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ khros pa'i rgyal po hU~M kA ra zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du rnam par rgyal ba dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ gshin rje'i gshed po dang/ mi g.yo mgon po dang/ rta mgrin dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang/ khro bo stobs po che la sogs pa rnams 'thon te/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhabs bzhi dang ldan zhing/ zhal mdog dang phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i cha lugs su byung ste/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi'i steng 'og tu 'phros te gnas so// de las khros pa'i rgyal pos la sogs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces bskul lo// rdo rje khros pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ma dag mi dge las spyod cing// dge ba'i bar chad byed pa 'di// sngon chad dam bcas de bzhin du// mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab// ces bskul dbang bskur nas/ ye shes kyi phur pa rdo rje khros pas phyag tu re re bskur nas/ dregs pa bcu sgrol bar mnga' gsol bas// khro bo bcus bskul pa'i don de thugs su chud par mdzad/ hU~M gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha

badzra phaT/ hu lu hu lu badzra phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badzra phaT/ ts+tshi n+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha badzra phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha badzra phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya badzra phaT/ ces gsungs shing/ phyag gi phur pas dregs pa rnams rim par mngon par bsgral lo// de nas yang khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha ka pA la hU~M zhes brjod pas/ khro bo rnams kyi phyag g.yas g.yon dang por/ rdo rje 'bar ba dang dung chen 'joms pa byin te/ A+oM badzra kro ta khA hi khA hi zhes bskul bas/ khros pa rnams kyis mi dge bcu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje tho bas gtun khung du brdungs te/ zhal du gsol bas/ khro bo rnams dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha zhes bsgrags so// de'i tshe 'khor ba mi dge ba bcu las rgyal nas/ dbang bcu la mnga' brnyes pa ni/ mos pa la dbang ba dang/ byang chub la dbang ba dang/ ye shes la dbang ba dang/ tshe la dbang ba dang/ skye ba la dbang ba dang/ chos la dbang ba dang/ yo byad la dbang ba dang/ las la dbang ba dang/ smon lam la dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba la sogs brnyes so// de ltar mdzad pas skye ba'i rgyun bcad/ nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs/ 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom/ 'chi bdag tshar bcad/ rtag chad kyi mtha' bsal/ las dge sdig gi shan phye/ log pa'i don la ye shes kyi mthu bstan/ 'khor ba'i bdud la thugs rje'i rtsi btang/ khams gsum sku gsung thugs su bzlog che ba'i yon tan gyi stobs kyis zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags su/ khro bo rnams kyi snam nas phyogs skyong bcu bton te/ rnam par shes pa ni rdo rje dang de bzhin du 'khor lo dang rin chen po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs rnams su shes bya dag nas/ chos skyong ba'i bsrung mar dbang bskur/ lus rnams ni rang rang gi khro bo rnams la/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir gdan du dbul/ lag cha mda' gzhu dang/ rdo rje gdeng pa dang/ me dpung 'bar ba dang/ dbyug to dang/ spu gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ ba dan dang/ be con dang/ kha TAM' ga dang bum pa rnams ni/ rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag mtshan du rang rang gi khro bo'i phyag bar par phul te bsnams so// de nas yang phyogs skyong rnams kyi rigs ma ste/ tshangs pa'i chung ma dang/ brgya byin gyi chung ma dang/ me lha'i chung ma dang/ gshin rje'i chung ma dang/ srin po'i chung ma dang/ chu lha'i chung ma dang/ rlung lha'i chung ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi chung ma dang/ dbang ldan gyi chung ma dang/ sa bdag gi chung ma rnams/ skyon bcu la bag chags brtas pa ni/ ma rig pa'i skyon dang/ zhen pa'i skyon dang/ shes bzhin ma yin pa'i skyon dang/ g.yeng ba'i skyon dang/ 'chal ba'i skyon dang/ le lo'i skyon dang/ rmongs pa'i skyon dang/ phur pa'i skyon dang/ khong khro ba'i skyon

dang// rtsod pa la dga' ba'i skyon dang// rgyu'i tshogs ma bsags pa'i skyon no// de lta bu'i skyon gyis 'chel pas// bstan pa la ma dad pa de 'dul ba'i phyir na/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ pha rol phyin pa bcu'i don la mnyam par bzhag ste/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ g.yos pa'i tshul gyis ma gos pa'i yum la rol te/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ zhes pas/ khro mo rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang/ khro mo rdo rje mda' snyems dang/ khro mo rdo rje sder mo dang/ khro mo rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang/ khro mo rdo rje gtun khung ma dang/ khro mo rdo rje gtum mo dang/ khro mo rdo rje mda' snyems ma dang/ khro bo rdo rje rlung 'byin ma dang/ khro bo rdo rje gsod ma dang/ khro mo rdo rje bskyod ma rnams 'thon te/ stong pa nyid kyi dbyings las chos nyid kyi sgra bsgrags/ skye ba med pa'i dbyings las don brnyes/ rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings las khams gsum thugs rjes gzung/ mi dmigs pa'i dbyings su mtshan ma'i dngos po bsdus/ mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom/ chos nyid dag pa'i dbyings kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson/ yang dag pa'i dbyings kyis nyon mongs pa'i gnas su brdeg/ gsal zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings las bag chags kyi dngos po sun phyung/ rtog med sgrol ba'i dbyings su sgrib pa'i bag chags bsad/ g.yos pa chen po'i dbyings kyi mi dge ba'i skyon bskyed de gnas so// de nas dregs pa'i bu pho ste sems can gyi lus la/ phag dang stag dang g.yag dang sha ba dang/ gzig dang/ byi la dang/ spyang ki dang/ seng ge dang/ drod dang/ dom gyi mgo btags pa rnams rmugs pa dang/ rnam smin med pa dang/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang/ shin tu chags pa dang/ gnyis ka ma yin pa dang/ mngan sems kyi g.yo dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ mtshan ma nyams pa dang/ las log pa dang/ mos pa las gyur pa yis/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad ste/ shes rab ma yin pa dang/ gsal ba ma yin pa dang/ bde ba ma bstar ba dang/ don ma rtogs pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang mi ldan pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzems pa dang/ dge ba 'phel ba ma yin pa dang/ rang bzhin med pa mi shes pa dang/ gnyid dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa la sogs par spyod pa'o// de rnams sbyong zhing gdul

pa'i phyir na/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus rtog 'joms dang/ dpa' brtul dang/ rdzis tshor dang/ dus 'jug dang/ spyod rdzogs dang/ thabs mkhas dang/ za byed dang/ rigs btsun dang/ gsod byed dang/ myos byed la sogs pa'o/ de rnams dang/ tshul mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ ma chags pa'i yum la thabs kyis rol te/ dgyes pa'i sprin las/ ha ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha ha/ zhes brjod pas ni/ sras 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo dang tshul mthun pa'i mgo btags pa bcu byung ste/ dregs pa'i bu pho rnams grong bzhin btul te bsgral nas dam la btags so// de nas yang dregs pa'i bu mo ste/ sems can gyi lus la smig bu dang/ bya rgod dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ khwa dang/ pu shud dang/ khra dang/ pha wa dang/ sre mong dang/ byi ba'i mgo btags pa rnams ni/ chags pa dang/ yid g.yo ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ rtsod pa ldang ba dang/ le lo byas pa dang/ spyod pa 'chal pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ 'tsho ba 'chal pa dang/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la sogs pa las byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa dang/ sems rgod pa dang/ sems 'byed pa dang/ dge ba la mi 'jug pa dang/ tshig brlang po dang/ bag med pa dang/ spyod pa brlang po dang/ khrel med pa dang/ log par 'tsho ba dang/ dgongs pa ste sems ma zhi ba dang/ g.yo sgyu dang/ de rnams spyod par gyur te/ de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na ni/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ mi 'gyur ba dang/ thogs med dang/ gsal byed dang/ mthong byed dang/ thal byed dang/ bkra byed dang/ g.yo byed dang/ btsal byed dang rtsol byed la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa'i sprin las/ he he he he he/ he he he he he/ zhes pas ni/ yang gong gi sems can dang tshul mthun pa'i sras/ 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo btags pa bcu byung ste/ gong bzhin btul te bsgral nas dam la btags so/ de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba'i phyir na/ don mthun dang don spyod dang/ sbyin pa dang snyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ma chags thabs kyis rol pa las/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ zhes bskul bas/ lha mo pu shud kyi mgo dang skye ga dang/ srin bya dang/ khra la sogs pa'i mgo can bzhi 'thon te/ gzhal yas kyi sgo bzhi la 'khod de/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ drag po la sogs pas don mdzad de/ snying rje dang/ byams pa dang/ dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi ngang du gsal bar mdzad do/ de nas yang

dam sri dmar po chen po zhes bya ba/ gsang sngags la skur pa btab cing smad pa las gyur pa zhig/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bar chad byed cing/ 'tshe ba las/ sangs rgyas ma lus pas/ rdo rje khros pa la bka' stsal pa/ bka'i bsgo ba mdzad pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i don rtogs par dka' ba las ni/ sdig chen dam sri 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos/ nyon cig las kyi dam sri 'di// nged kyi bka' las khyod ma 'da'/ zhes bskul bas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ dam sri de la ye shes kyi mtshon gyi phur pas mgo la brgyab ste/ mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du bkas te/ de'i tshe na yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di 'thon te/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dam sri gaM pa ri b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ces bsgral bas rnam shes rgyal ba'i sras su byas/ sha rus dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang/ don snying dur khrod kyi rdzas kyi mchod pa ru rol/ de'i slas mo dang bu mo dang ma dang sring mo chung ma rnams ni/ rdo rje khros pa la pad+ma'i mdangs phul te/ rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskang bar dam bcas so// de ltar dregs pa can thams cad bsgral zhing tshar bcad pa/ de'i tshe na ni/ 'jigs byed skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'di skad ces mnos te/ dam chos gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// dngos grub bar chad byed pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya'o// zhes gsungs te/ sring mo dang bcas pas dam mnos nas/ bstan pa skyong bar zhal gyis bzhes so/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kyang lung phog ste/ dam las 'das na snying po 'dis khyed nyid kyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs te bsgral bar dam bcas so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba A na ya ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs so// de'i tshe na dregs pa'i gtso mos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bstabs te bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// ma ma pa shaM ku ru hU~M/ zur chags/ ma taM dz+nyA ka ra i dan d+ha ti ma ma karma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya zhes bstabs phul te/ phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskang bar byas nas/ mthu'i bdag nyid du mtshan gsol lo// de nas yang bdud nag po bkrag med kyi bu mo dang/ gza' bi tri ba tra'i bu mo dang/ btsan shu bo lag rings kyi bu mo dang/ klu 'jog po'i bu mo rnams bsgral zhing sbyar bar dgongs nas/ rang dam srog gi snying po bstabs shing phul nas/ rdo rje phur pa'i dam mnos/ a dzi te ya/ a pa ra dzi te ya/ dza ye bi dza ye/ mA yar sai nA pra marda na ye/ zur chags/ zhes pas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i thugs dam bskang bar byas te/ sa bdag chen mor mtshan gsol lo// de nas yang 'jig rten phung bar byed pa ste/

lcags kyi khyi mo ral pa can dang/ lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu dang/ zangs kyi wa mo rkang gsum dang/ gser gyi 'phar ba lce brgyad ma la sogs pas/ 'gro ba kun sgrol zhing za ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ bsgral bar dgongs pas srog snying phul te dam mnos so/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ma tha ma badzra zhes pas/ pho nya shwa nar mtshan gsol lo// de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa pho mo/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim pas btul bsgral sbyar gnas bstabs dam la btags par mdzad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje khro bor rol pas ma dad pa btul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa des/ bcom ldan 'das khros pa'i sras mchog sku gsung thugs gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa las mchod pa bstabs te/ A+oM kI li kI la ya kro ta kro tI ha he phaT/ dI pa d+hU pa puSh+pa su kha gan+d+ha i daM/ a mr-i ta ba lin+ta rak+ta bo d+hi tsit+ta ho/ zhes pas phyi dag pa'i mchod pa dang/ nang khyad par gyi mchod pa dang/ gsang ba dga' ba'i mchod pas rgyun du mngon par mchod pa'o// mdzad spyod kyi don bsdus pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa ni/ e ma ho/ bdud bzhi bcom nas yon tan drug ldan la// yod med mtshan ma'i dngos po kun las 'das// don dam thugs ni 'da' dka' shin tu gsang// gsang ba'i gsang sngags ma lus kun gyi gtso// thams cad ma lus mnga' brnyes bdag po'i sku/ bcom ldan 'das gsang bdag rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu thams cad mkhyen mdzad do// ston pa'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// skye med ye shes ngang las rdo rje kI la ya// zhe sdang 'byongs pas dmyal ba'i 'jig rten stongs// thugs kyi dam tshig skongs te rdo rje'i rigs kyang brnyes// gsal la ma 'dres me long ye shes brnyes// rdo rje 'dus pa 'chang ba'i skyes bu nyid la yang phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ 'gag med ngang las sangs rgyas kI la ya// gti mug 'byongs pas byol song 'jig rten stongs// sku yi dam tshig skongs te de bzhin gshegs kyang brnyes// dmigs su med pa'i ye shes chen po brnyes// sku mchog dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ gnas med ngang las rin chen kI la ya// nga rgyal 'byongs pas lha min 'jig rten stongs// spyi yi dam tshig skongs te rin chen rigs kyang brnyes// kun la snyoms pa'i mnyam nyid ye shes brnyes// yon tan dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod// dmigs med ngang las pad+ma kI la ya// 'dod chags 'byongs pas mi yi 'jig rten stongs// gsung gi dam tshig skongs te pad+ma'i rigs kyang brnyes// kun

mkhyen so sor rtog pa'i ye shes brnyes// gsung mchog dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ 'gro med 'ong ba med pas las rab kI la ya// phrag dog 'byongs pas yi dwags 'jig rten stongs// 'chal bar dam skongs las kyi rigs kyang brnyes// don grub bya ba nan tan ye shes brnyes// phrin las dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ e ma ho/ shes rab rang bzhin dag pa las// dbyings kyi rang bzhin gru gsum gsal bar mdzad// dbus nas byang chub sems kyis mtshan// skye med don rnams ston byed ma// shes rab dbyings ma de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ dngos med dbyings las dngos po'i tshul 'dzin ma// rdo rje rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi yum/ nam mkha'i 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin ngang// chos kyi dbyings la mnga' brnyes khro mo rgyal// rdo rje rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog med ngang las rtog pa'i tshul 'dzin cing// sangs rgyas rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi yum// sa yi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin ngang// gsal ba'i dbyings la mnga' brnyes khro mo rgyal// rdo rje 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ mtshan med dbyings las mtshan ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// rin chen rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi yum// me yi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin ngang// tsha ba'i dbyings las mnga' brnyes khro mo rgyal// rin chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ tshad med dbyings las chad pa'i tshul 'dzin cing// pad+ma rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi yum// chu yi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin ngang// pad+ma 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rmugs byed dbyings las rmugs pa'i tshul 'dzin ma// las kyi rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi gzungs// rlung gi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin ngang// g.yo ba'i dbyings las mnga' brnyes khro mo rgyal// las rab 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rol pa'i stobs las khro bo hU~M kA ra// tshangs pa tshar bcad rnam shes hU~M du sdud// skye shi rtsad gcod stong nyid ye shes snyems te mos pa'i dbang// khro rgyal hU~M kA ra la phyag 'tshal bstod// bzlog pa'i stobs las khro bo rnam par rgyal// brgya byin tshar bcad ma byin len pa spangs// mtha' gnyis rgyal bas me long ye shes snyems te sems pa'i dbang// khro rgyal rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'joms pa'i stobs las khro bo dbyug sngon can// me lha tshar bcad log lta dbang du sdud// 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom ste ye shes snyems te ye shes la yang dbang// khro rgyal dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs byed stobs las khro bo gshin rje gshed// gshin rje tshar bcad srog gcod dbang

du sdud// 'chi bdag bdud bcom mnyam nyid ye shes brnyes// tshe la dbang mdzad khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la bstod// gzhon tshul stobs las khro bo mi g.yo mgon// srin po tshar bcad phra ma dbang du sdud// rtag chad mthar ma g.yos pas mtha' bral ye shes brnyes// tshe la dbang mdzad khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon la bstod// brjid pa'i stobs las khro mchog rta mchog dpal// chu lha tshar bcad 'dod g.yems dbang du sdud// rgyu 'bras rim par phye ste kun rtog ye shes brnyes// chos la dbang ba'i dbang rgyal rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ shugs 'chang stobs las khro bo gzhan mi thub// rlung lha tshar bcad ngag 'khyal dbang du sdud// gzhan gyi mthu bcom ma 'dres ye shes snyems te yo byad dbang// khro rgyal gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzir ba'i stobs las khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// gnod sbyin tshar bcad ngag rtsubs dbang du sdud// bdud la rtsi btang nan tan ye shes snyems// las la dbang mdzad khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil la bstod// gnon pa'i stobs las khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'byung po tshar bcad gnod sems dbang du sdud// khams gsum las rgyal don yod ye shes snyems// smon lam dbang mdzad khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal la bstod// 'degs pa'i stobs las khro rgyal stobs po che// sa bdag tshar bcad tshig brlang dbang du sdud// khams gsum sku gsung thugs su stobs te che ba'i ye shes brnyes// rdzu 'phrul la dbang khro rgyal stobs po che la bstod// ye shes pha rol phyin pas khro mo sgra 'byin ma// tshangs pa'i chung ma tshar bcad ma rig skyon yang sel// stong nyid dbyings las chos nyid sgra sgrogs te// khro mo sgra 'byin ma la bstod// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pas ye shes rnam snyems ma// brgya byin mo ni tshar bcad zhen pa'i skyon yang sel// skye ba med pa'i dbyings las don brnyes te// khro mo rnam snyems ma la bstod// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pas rdo rje sder mo la// me lha mo ni tshar bcad shes bzhin skyon yang sel// rang bzhin med pa'i rjes su khams gsum thugs rjes gzung// khro mo sder mo ma la bstod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pas khro mo dur khrod ma// gshin rje'i chung ma tshar bcad g.yeng ba'i skyon yang sel// mi dmigs dbyings su dngos po'i mtshan ma bsdus// khro mo dur khrod ma la bstod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin las khro mo gtun khung ma// srin mo mtshar bcad 'chal pa'i skyon yang sel// mtshan ma med pas 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom// khro mo gtun khung ma la bstod// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pas rdo rje gtum mo ste// chu lha mo ni tshar bcad le lo dbang du sdud// chos nyid dag pa'i

dbyings kyis 'gro ba'i don la gtum// khro mo gtum mo de la bstod// shes rab pha rol phyin las rdo rje mda' snyems ma// rlung lha mo ni tshar bcad rmongs pa sel// dag pa'i dbyings kyis nyon mongs gnad du brdeg/ khro mo mda' snyems ma la bstod// thabs kyi pha rol phyin las khro mo rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// gnod sbyin ma ni tshar bcad skur ba'i skyon yang sel// gsal zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings kyis bag chags sun 'byin ma// khro mo rlung 'byin ma la bstod// stobs kyi pha rol phyin las khro mo gsod ma ste// dbang ldan mo ni tshar bcad khong khro'i skyon yang sel// rtog med sgrol ba'i dbyings su sgrib pa'i bag chags bsad// khro mo gsod ma de la bstod// smon lam pha rol phyin las rdo rje bskyod ma ste// sa bdag tshar bcad rtsod ma dga' ba'i skyon yang sel// g.yos pa chen po'i sems kyis mi dge'i skyon bskyod de// khro mo bskyod ma de la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog 'joms chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya phag gi mgo/ rmugs pa las byung tshangs pa'i bu pho dang// shes rab ma yin gsal bar byed// khro chung phag gi mgo la bstod// dpa' gtum chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya stag gi mgo/ bden med brgya byin bu dang rnam smin bde la btsud// khro chung stag gi mgo la bstod// rdzis tshor spong ba'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya g.yag gi mgo/ gsal byed me lha'i bu dang tshul bzhin ma yin don dang bstun// khro chung g.yag gi mgo la bstod// dus 'jug chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste sha ba'i mgo/ chags pa las byung gshin rje'i bu pho dang// bden pa ma yin sel bar byed// khro chung sha ba'i mgo la bstod// spyod rdzogs chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya gzig gi mgo/ gnyis ka ma yin las byung srin po'i bu pho dang// ma rtogs pa ni yid ches pas// khro chung gzig mgo de la bstod// thabs mkhas chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya byi la'i mgo/ g.yo las gyur pa'i chu lha'i bu pho dang// brtson 'grus ma yin don dang ldan// khro chung byi la'i mgo la bstod// za byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya spyang ka'i mgo/ tshul nyams las byung rlung lha yi// bu dang kha na ma tho med par byed// khro chung spyang ki'i mgo la bstod// rigs btsun chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste seng ge'i mgo/ mi dge las byung gnod sbyin bu pho dang// dge 'phel ma yin rgyas par byed// khro chung seng ge'i mgo la bstod// za byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya dred kyi mgo/ las log las byung 'byung po'i bu pho dang// rang bzhin med par mi shes 'bras bur che// khro chung dred kyi mgo la bstod// myos byed chen po'i ting

'dzin las// phra men ma ste dom gyi mgo/ myos byed las byung sa bdag bu dang gnyid sel te// khro chung dom gyi mgo la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi 'gyur chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste smig bu'i mgo/ chags pa las byung tshangs pa'i bu mo dang// sems rgod pa ni zhi bar byed// khro mo smig bu'i mgo la bstod// thogs med chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste bya rgod mgo/ yid g.yo las byung brgya byin bu mo dang// 'du byed sems pas dbang du sdud// khro mo bya rgod mgo la bstod// gsal byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste bya rog mgo/ phrag dog las byung me lha'i bu mo dang// dge la mi 'jug skul bar byed// khro mo bya rog mgo la bstod// mthong byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste 'ug pa'i mgo/ rtsod pa las byung gshin rje'i bu mo dang// tshig brlangs po ni dbang du sdud// khro mo 'ug pa'i mgo la bstod// thal byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste khwa yi mgo/ le lo las byung srin po'i bu mo dang// bag med pa ni rjes su bskul// khro mo khwa yi mgo la bstod// bkra byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste pu shud mgo/ spyod 'chal las byung chu lha'i bu mo dang// brlangs po spyod pa dge bar spyod// khro mo pu shud mgo la bstod// sgrib byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste khra yi mgo/ tshul khrims 'chal pa las byung rlung lha'i bu mo dang// khrel med pa ni chos nyid ngang du bcom// khro mo khra yi mgo la bstod// gso byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste pha wang mgo/ 'tsho ba las byung gnod spyin bu mo dang// log pas 'tsho ba dang du len// khro mo pha wang mgo la bstod// btsal byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste sre mo'i mgo/ bdag 'dzin las byung dbang ldan bu mo dang// sems g.yeng rgod pa zhu bar mdzad// khro mo zer mo mgo la bstod// 'gug byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste byi ba'i mgo// nyon mongs mtshungs ldan sa bdag bu mo dang// g.yo dang sgyu ni mi gnas te// khro mo byi ba'i mgo la bstod// don mthun las byung lha mo lcags kyu ma// zhi bas don mdzad tshad med snying rje brnyes// de bzhin rigs kyi mngag gzhug ma// lha mo pu shud mgo la bstod// don spyod las byung lha mo zhags pa ma// rgyas pas don mdzad tshad med byams pas brnyes// rin chen rigs kyi mngag gzhug ma// khro mo skye ka'i mgo la bstod// sbyin pa las byung sna tshogs sgra sgrogs ma// dbang du spyod pas tshad med dga' ba brnyes// pad+ma rigs kyi pho nya las mkhan ma// lha mo srin bya'i mgo la bstod// snyan pa las byung lha mo dril 'khrol ma// drag shul spyod pas tshad med btang snyoms brnyes// las kyi rigs

kyi mngag gzhug ma// gsang ba'i pho nya khra yi mgo la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang gsang ba sngags kyi don gsol ba ni/ kye ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo de'i/ gsang ba'i sngags rnams bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus// dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gsang sngags 'di rnams ched du brjod de// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ A+oM bud+d+ha kI li kI ya la sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ traM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ hrIHpad+ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ ha karma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT// A+oM badzra dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT// A+oM badzra kro tI dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ A+oM bud+d+ha kro tI dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ traM rat+na kro tI dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT// hrIHpad+ma kro tI dIp+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ ha karma kro tI dIp+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta nI la daN+Da hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/[¿]A+oM badzra kro ta Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ha ya grI ba hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta a pa ra dzi ta hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ zur chag A+oM badzra kro ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro t-I dI ba ya ti hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI lA se ki hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI tA+e tA hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI sta na pa ti hU~M phaT/ badzra kro ti mu sa lI hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tA dza ya ti hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI sha bya ti hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI sa byaM mi ta hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ti ma ra NI hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ti tsun+da ya te hU~M phaT/ ha badzra sU ka ra mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra g+h+ra mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra tsa ma ra mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra ha ri Na mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra di pI mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra pi DA la mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra shwa na mu kha hU~M phaT/ he badzra sed+ha mu kha hU~M phaT/ he badzra tak+Shu mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badzra r-ik+Sha mu kha hU~M phaT/ he badzra u se ka mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra gr-iD+D+ha mi khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra dro Na mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra u lU ka mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra kA ka mu khI hU~M phaT// he badzra bak+Sha ti mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra pa tI mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra ti tI la mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra ba ku la mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badzra ka si ka mu khI hU~M phaT// dzaHbadzra b+hai ra be hU~M phaT/ hU~M badzra rat+na bag sha ta hU~M phaT/ baM badzra a mr-i ta hU~M phaT/ hoHbadzra ma ra Na hU~M phaT/ ces rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi ma nor ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang/ bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags

dang// bskul ba las kyi sngags rnams ched du brjod do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor rgyas bar bstan pa las// sdud pa pos mchod cing bstod nas/ gsang sngags kyi don zhus pa dang/ de'i lan rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu la/ rmad du byung ba'i glu sna tshogs pas mngon par mchod nas// ma dad pa'i sems can chen po de dag la/ de lta bu'i mdzad spyod bstan pa/ e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan can no// de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag dang ni gnas// 'khor dang phur pa yo byad dus tshod rnams// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ khros pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// rnal 'byor don zhus ya mtshan che'o// e ma ho nyon la yid la zung/ gang zag sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rigs bzang kun gyis bkur zhing kun la mdzes// dbyibs legs gsang ba nyon mongs chung// longs spyod ldan zhing sgo yang spyod pa mdzes// gang gi las la ma rmongs bzo ba'i bye brag phyed// phyi nang sde snod thams cad la// thos bsam bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i// las su dge bcu ldan zhing chos spyod tshad med ngang la gnas// bstan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dul khrims sdom pa yi// ngang la gnas te dam tshig bsrung// bla med theg pa rnam gsum la// bye brag sgrub pa'i nyams drod ldan// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid phrin las bye brag phyed// ting 'dzin las su rung ba'i drod tshad rtags mthong ba'i// dbang gi rim pa ma lus rdzogs pa yi// de ltar ldan pa rdo rje bla ma yin// de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'breng// de dang mi ldan skyon du gyur pa'i bla ma ni// gsang sngags spyad dka' 'bras bu bla ma la ltos pas// tho co ras chod gzu lums ma yin par// thabs ky-i rim pas spang bar bya'o// gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// gnod spyin mo yis sbar rjes sam// gnod spyin mtshon chas bshas rjes sam// klu bdud dag gi rgyu srang ngam// rten dang 'bral ba'i ya ga can// rnal 'byor bsam pas spang bar bya'o// spang na dngos grub myur bar bshad// ma spangs nam phugs rang la gnod// steng 'og bar snang brtag pa ni// 'khor lo gnam la pad+ma sa// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje brag/ gzhung ldan bkra shis dam pa'o// dbyibs legs lung pa ran pa dang// 'bru khung chu shing 'tshams pa dang// gcan gzan mi rgod nyam nga med// mi dang mi min rgyu srang nyul// 'di ni yid 'ong dam pa ste// de ni dang du blang bar bya'o// spang

dang dang du blang ba ni// bdag gi ting 'dzin nyams dang sbyar// ting 'dzin zab na ngan pa bdam// ting 'dzin g.yel na bzang po bdam// ting 'dzin drod dang ldan gyur na// ngan pa'i las rnams gong ma der// sgrub pa la sogs byas na yang// ngan pa'i las kyis ran pa 'grub// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang// grims phyin shugs kyis ting 'dzin gsal// bzang po'i las su bsgrub gyur na// yun du bsring na phung 'tshing med// de bas gzhung dang ldan par bya'o// 'khor gyi rim pa bstan pa ni// kha gtsag g.yo sgyu med pa dang// rem la nyams shed ldan pa dang// brling po gzhan gyis bslu bar lci// skos nyams dus la rub pa ni// gang zag pho mo de lta bu// sgrub pa phyi yi 'khor du bya// rgyal thebs stobs dang ldan pa dang// las mkhan bye brag phyed pa dang// brtul zhugs 'chang ba'i ging chen dang// drod tshad zin pa'i spyan mthong dang// gtsang sbra phyed pa'i g.yos pa ni// sgrub pa rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rigs bzhi 'os bzhi tshul bzhi dang// yon tan bcu gcig ldan pa ni// tshan ldan bkra shis yum mchog ni// dgyes skong gsang ba'i 'khor du bya'o// phur pa yo byad mtshan nyid ni// phur pa'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams ni// zhi ba'i phur pa'i rgyu ru bshad// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams ni// rgyas pa'i phur pa'i rgyu ru bshad// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams ni// dbang du phur pa'i rgyu ru bshad// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams ni// drag po'i phur pa'i rgyu ru bshad// rmig zlum rkang la zhi ba bya// 'dab chags rkang la rgyas pa bya// rkang leb rkang la dbang yang bya// sder chags rkang la drag po bya// lo ma me tog yal ga med// shir shing nag po'i myu gu la// drag po'i phur pa bya bar bshad// pho mo 'dod pa'i srid ma zin// slos po ru leb mtshan la ni// de la dbang gi phur pa bya// pho dang mo yi mtshan ma dang// ma ning nag po'i mtshan ma la// de la rgyas pa'i phur pa bya// bu tsha rigs rgyud srid ma zin// dre'u rta nag po'i mtshan ma ni// de la zhi ba'i phur pa bya// 'di ni kun rdzob phur pa'i rgyu// rtogs pa'i don la mi dgos pas// ma rtogs don du bstan par zad// kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// gzhan nas rgyu nyid btsal mi dgos// btsal yang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// phur pa'i tshad ni 'di lta ste// rang byung chen po'i phur pa las// sems nyid gsal ba'i tshad btang na// don dam du ni mi dgos te// dman pa'i don du tshad bstan to// sor bzhi pa dang sor drug pa// bcu gnyis su ni yang dag bshad// rtse mo'i phyogs ni ma nor bar// rtsa ba la ni rgya mdud bya// myu gu'i ngos su rtsi mo bya// spyi bor sor

gcig rgyan mdud bya// sked par de bzhin bya ba ste// stod kyi dbyibs ni sor brgyad la// rtse mo zur gsum zer sor bya ba ni// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam zur gsum ste// rtse mtshan so so'i dbyibs su ni// dbang drag gnyis ni chu srin kha nas byung// zhi la zur drug rgyas la brgyad// ri rab lta bu brjid che ba// kun rdzob dbyibs su byas pa yin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba thugs kyi ye shes la// yon tan tshang ba'i tshul lam dbyibs// de nyid rtogs na 'di mi dgos// rgyu rkyen ma 'gags don shes na// rtsa ba rtse mo dbyer med do// ma rtogs pas na de bstan no// legs pa'i yon tan bsam las 'das// legs na yi rang dod na gdung// nyes pa'i skyon ni 'di yin te// gang dgar byas na bka' las 'gal// snyed bcod byas na tshul las nyams// ngan dgur bshams na rtog par 'gyur// byams pas phyogs med phan gdags shing// ma chags dga' bas mngon bsgrubs te// byams pa phan gdags smon pa bya'o// las ni 'bum lnga'i bshags pa ste// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa tsha tsha 'bum// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa gsung rab 'bum// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa srog 'don 'bum/ khyad par dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa tshogs mchod 'bum// lhag pa'i dam nyams gang la bshags pa 'bum/ 'bum lnga'i bshags pas sdig pa mtshams med 'byang bar 'gyur// nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras/ 'bum phrag tsha tsha gdab cing bshags shing bskang gso rgya cher bya'o// las dang don dam kun rdzob sems bskyed dgos pa ni// dper na ras dkar tshos su 'jen pa bzhin// rnal 'byor pa yi nyes pa dag gyur na// bde gshegs skur 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ma dag rgyu yis mi 'grub ste// dper na sa bon rtsi nyams pas// 'bras bu 'byung ba ga la srid// de nas nan tan cher bskyed nas// sngon du 'gro ba'i don la dad cing brtson par bya// zhes gsungs so// de skad gsungs pas rdo rje 'dus pa la sogs pa 'khor rnams ni/ phyi rabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du sngon du 'gro ba la gus pas don thugs su chud par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro ba'i don rgyas par zhus lan du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas// bcom ldan 'das la yang rmad du byung ba'i mchod pas mngon par mchod de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// rigs dang ye shes kun gyi 'byung gnas te// dam chos bye brag kun la mnga' brnyes pas// ji ltar sprul kyang thugs kyi gdeng mi g.yo// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba

rjes su sgrub 'dod pas// bdag nyid dang ni gnas dang 'khor// sa chog sta gon dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa dang// 'jug dang dbang bskur phan pa'i yon tan skyon dang las kyi mtha' btul rnams// bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs 'dus pa'i gtso// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i don zhus ya mtshan che'o// nga yis bshad kyi khyod kyis nyon// rdo rje bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni// blo yangs rgyud la mkhas pa dang// sems kyi rnam rtog choms pa dang// ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang// phyi nang sde snod thams cad la// som nyi med de the tshom med// sran thub mi ldog dad pa che// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan phal la mi spel ba// rdo rje rigs kyi bla mar gsungs// rkyen thub mi ldog dam tshig gnas// yid kyi sgo nas shin tu sbyangs// man ngag lung la rtag dga' zhing// sna tshogs sna tshogs ci sgo nas// bla ma'i thugs ni mnyes byed pa// rdo rje rigs kyi bu yin te// gsum mam bcu phyed man chad do// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams dang// mdangs dkar shar du gzhol ba yi// gangs ri rdo rje'i brag dkar ni// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub gnas yin// sa yi cho ga bstan pa ni// gnam dang sa dang bar snang rnams// rdo rje'i gur btsal brag ri brtags// de nas bus gang tsam du rko// sa yi ro lnga bsal byas nas// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya// khengs nas lhag na dngos grub rab// kha ta chad na dngos grub 'bring// ma khengs gyur na gzhan du spo// mngon du snang ba'i mi rnams la// rin chen rin nam bden pas bslang// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas// mchod dang gtor ma nges thogs nas// lag gnyis 'khor los sa yi lha mo sbran// mchod la dbang bcol bden tshig bsgo// de bas legs shing dang bar bya// yo byad dam pa byang chub sems// sems kyi stobs kyis rtsol nus na// thams cad ma lus yo byad yin// lha grangs tshang ba'i phur pa dang// bsgrub pa rdzas kyi phur pa dang// nyung dkar gu gul rak+ta rnams// bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i yo byad do// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas te// bdug pa mar me me tog bshos// gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang// gtso gzungs lhag pa'i byang chub sems// mchod pa gsang ba'i yo byad do// dur khrod sha khrag la sogs pa'i// khyi spyang wa 'phar sha khrag dang// mar zhag 'o ma khrag rnams kun// ma mo bsten pa'i yo byad do// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang// lcags sna lnga yi phur pa ni// dam sri mnan pa'i yo byad do// mdzes pa'i gtor ma phur

pa bcu// 'bar ba mtshams kyi yo byad do// shun chen ko ba stag lpags dang// dar gyi snying non phyag rgya'i phur rung dang// cod pan stod g.yogs smad dkris sprul chun rnams// sngags pa rgyan gyi yo byad do// mAM sa pany+tsa dza gad tshe// tshim byed kun tu rgyug pa dang// gal phyi ka ta ri dang zla tshes dang// zla phrom zla rgyas a sa la// 'byor pa tshogs kyi yo byad do// sman dang spra ba gtsags ma ni// nad 'joms sman gyi yo byad do// go dang phub dang mtshon cha rnams// bar chad dgra bzlog yo byad do// bya nag lug nag bsgral ba'i zhing// nyams chag skong dang rkyen bzlog yo byad do// de ltar bstan pa'i yo byad rnams// sgrub pa lo zla'i yo byad ldab tu bya// ma sma pa dang ma sme ba'i// tshogs par 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// byang chub sems ni rgyu yin te// phyi ma'i rkyen gyi tshul du gnas// rgyu rkyen tshogs pas 'bras bu chud mi za// 'jug pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i don ldan na// dus tshod med de kun kyang dus// spyod yul kun tu sgrub pa'i dus tshod yin// ma rtogs don du 'di bstan no// dbyar dgun ston dpyid nam sla tshar ba bzhir// dbyar gyi ngo la 'jug pa ni// dbyar dgun ston dpyid zla dus so// stag glang rta bya'i nyi ma la// phur bu mig dmar nyi ma pa wa sangs// rgyal stod rgyal smad spo dang wa// nyi ma skar ma gza' dus su// yo byad ma lus tshogs 'gyur na// sgrub pa la 'jug dus tshod yin// ma tshogs bar du dus tshod med// ces pas ni/ phyis rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag rnams phun sum tshogs pa drug gi don gyis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba la mgo mi rmongs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phun sum tshogs pa drug gis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ zhugs len du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas// phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams// sngon du bya ba'i cho ga la mgo mi rmongs par bya ba'i phyir na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu ma la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i mchog/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bya ba'i las ni gang// rgyal mchog khyod kyis bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni/ rnal 'byor sngon du bya ba'i las// don dam kun rdzob gsum yin te// don dam sngon du 'gro ba ni// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs 'dod phyir// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bsam gtan gyi ni phyag rgya lngas// lus sems mnyam par bzhag byas te// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// dam pa don gyi byang chub sems// rgyu rkyen gang las ma byung zhing// mi 'gyur byang chub

brtan par bzung// kun rdzob sngon du 'gro ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi byang chub sems// bde gshegs sras bcas spyan drang bzhugs gsol dmigs// phyag 'tshal mchod pa ci 'byor 'bad// sdig bshags yi rang skyabs gsol zhing// 'gro ba ma lus don gyi phyir// snying rje mchog gis gzhi bzung ste// sa bdag 'khor lnga nyid la ni// gtor ma byin te gzhan tu btang// nyi ma rim par 'gro ba bzhin// lto 'phye gzhung du brtags nas ni// lnga tshan nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// sa bdag nyid la dbul bar bya'o// rgyal po rnams la khru bcu gnyis blon po rnams la brgyad du bya// dmangs la de bzhin drug yin te// shin tu 'thas shing legs byas la// dmigs su med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs med ngang du dag par bya// dkyil du gtsang ma'i gdan bting la// gdeng ldan bdag nyid mdzes byas dbus su 'dug/ zur chag/ shiSh+tsa bzhi nyid phyogs bzhir gnas// dus gsum bzhugs kun spyan drang mchod// yid kyis rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya// de nas blo ldan bzhi po yis// rigs bzhi'i ngang la gnas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig ces// sngon byung bzhin du gsol ba gdab// de nas phyir nyid song nas ni// rdo rje'i stabs dang rol pa'i gar// rdo rje'i lta bas kun bltas te// bar chad bgegs bskrad dkyil 'khor bsrung// gzhung las 'byung ba de byas na// de la bar chad yongs mi 'byung// gzhung dang mi ldan las byas kyang// ngal ba'i tshi chad don med 'gyur// des na nan tan bskyed par bya// sta gon rim pa bstan pa ni// rin chen bum pa brgyad nyid la// gtsang sbra dag byas dri yis byug/ phyag rgya bris nas gdan la bzhag/ bgegs bskrad bsang gtor rim par byas// stong nyid ngang las gzhal yas khang// gcig ni las te gnyis pa mchod pa yin// gsum pa khams gsum rnam rgyal te// lnga pa tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mchod pa gsum gyis nges mchod la// lnga tshan nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// sngags dang ting 'dzin gsal rdzogs nas// kha rgyan btsugs te gzungs thag gdags// rdo rje bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad// lha rnams kun la tshang bar bya// bum pa ma lags rgyal po lags// rgyal po sngags kyis btab nas ni// rgyal po chen por mnga' gsol gyis// rgyal po'i tshul du bzhugs su gsol// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzogs nas// mda' dang phur bu ral gri dang// me long dar sna srung skud dang// dbu rgyan snying nan phyag rgya'i phu rung dang// stod g.yogs smad dkris dkar por bya// dbang du gsol ba'i lha mo nyid// mchod nas sa gzhi nyid la bstim// pho brang dbus nas sgau bzhi ru// dri yi thig le

bzhi bcu gnyis// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mdzes byas la// spyan drang bstim mchod gsal ba gdab la// rdo rje 'chang chen 'di zhes pas// nam langs gyur nas dkyil 'khor bri// khyed rnams la ni mchod byed dang// slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rab tu bsten te 'jug par bya// sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lho mo khyod// bdag cag sgrib sbyong tshogs skyed phyir// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// sta gon la ni bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhU~M swA hA dz+nyA na pany+tsa hU~M phaT/ A+oM d+hu pa sid+d+hi hU~M/ rat+na maN+Dal sid+d+hi hU~M/ bru hi gar+b+ha sid+d+hu hU~M/ a mr-i ta A be sha a a/ A+oM AMH hU~M sid+d+hi gu ru a/ pany+tsa li ka A be shA A/ kalpa br-i k+Sha hU~M AH/ blo ldan khrus kyis dag byas nas// mdun bstar me tog lag thogs nas// skye rgas na dang 'chi ba yi// chu srin pir sogs 'jigs byed pas// 'dod par mdzad pa khyod 'ba' zhig/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// mgon po chen po bdag la stsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pas// dam tshig chen po bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po chen pos gzhug tu gsol// dbang ldan phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni// tshom bu lnga dang ldan par bya// bskyed dang bstim phyag mchod gzabs te// A+oM badzra kro ta hU~M hU~M phaT/ tsakra sa twa A+oM/ pad+ma sa twa hrIH/ badzra sa twa hU~M/ sku gsung thugs su sbyar byas nas// lus ngag yid gsum bsrung ba dang// rnam thar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// dam tshig dam pa bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems kyang bskyed par bya// 'khor ba dag las bskyab par bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur bgyi// da ni dad par rab tu skyed// A+oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M phaT// bsrung ba'i don du bsrung skud la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gdab// slob ma'i dpung pa g.yas par bcings// lus kyi nyes pa dag pa dang// bsrung dang sta gon gnas par mdzod// A+oM badzra a 'dzi sa sham pa ri na hU~M phaT/ dur khrod so shing dor ba nyid// ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gang du rab tu dor// dbang gis ltas rnams bstan du gsol// bi shud+d+he sarba hi ni hU~M phaT// sa sham sho d+ha ya/ sarba bi na ya hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi chen po chu nyid las// gsang ba'i sngags kyis btab nas te// blud nas lus kyi nyes pa dag/ sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod// theg pa gzhan nas

ldog bya'i phyir// theg pa chen po'i spro ba bskyed// bdag nyid chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis// de ring bdag nyid thob pa nyid// gang gis khyed cag rgyal ba kun// sras dang bcas pas bstan 'di la// skye bzhin pa na bdag chen gyis// thams cad yongs su 'dzin la gnas// des na khyed cag theg chen la// rigs bzang po ru nges par 'gyur// de yi lam mchog dpal dang ldan// theg pa chen po las byung ba'i// khyed rnams kyis ni bgrod gyur pa'i// ma 'ongs pa na bde gshegs 'gyur// yod med dag las rnam par 'das// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// chos rnams kun la zab gyur cing// rab tu spros te gnas med pas// spros pa thams cad spangs pa yin// rab spros rnams kyis rab tu spros// theg pa chen po'i tshul gnas na// 'di nyid du ni chos thos 'gyur// seng ge'i nyal thabs rab tu brtags// ku sha myu gu rtse ma nyams// de las byung ba spyi bor gzugs// gzhan dag stan du gding bar bya// 'di ru nyol la ji lta bar// rmi lam mthong ba ston cig ces// de skad brjod la slob ma bsnyal// de nas sa stegs gru bzhi la// dam rdzas bdud rtsis ga dar bya'o// srad bu dog pa kha dog lnga// ma nor phyogs bzhags mchod pa bshams// bde gshegs rig lnga'i rgyal ba la// mchod gsol ye shes thig blangs nas// srad bu nyid la thim gyur nas// blo ldan grogs mchog yid 'ong gzugs// gsal bar ldan nam byin gyis brlab// chags bskyed sbyor ba'i brdas bskul te/ byang chub sems ni bsnol mar bstims// srad bu nyid kyang byang chub sems// de las rdo rje'i skur gyur te// dag pa tshangs pa'i thig gis ni// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya// de nas thig cha rim par dbye// mtshan ma ye shes thig tu gsal// rin chen lnga yi phye ma la// yang na 'bru sna rnam lnga ste// yang na sa dang rdo la bya// byin brlabs bsam rgyud nges par bzhag/ mkhas pas thogs la dkyil 'khor bri// srad bu'i tshad ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur te// sar pa legs bkal dgu bsgril ba// mdzes shing gsher ba byas pa yis// dang la tshangs thig gdab bya ste// bla ma shar la blo ldan nub// bdag nyid me lha'i mtshams 'dug ste// blo ldan rlung gi phyogs song ste// tshangs thig dang po gdab par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gom stabs kyis// bdag nyid lho yi phyogs song ste// blo ldan gnod sbyin phyogs 'dong ste// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab par bya// bdag nyid srin po'i phyogs song la// blo ldan byang shar nyid song ste// gru thig gnyis pa gdab par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis// bskor nas me lha'i phyogs song ste// shar gyi thig cha rim par dbye'o// phyogs gzhan de bzhin

bsgyur te gdab// gdab pa srad bu'i thig tu gsungs// kha dog don ni rigs dang sbyar// re khA gre so bslang ba 'dra// mtshon rtsi kha ba bab pa bzhin// g.yas su bskor zhing rgyun mi gcad// ye shes thig la mi 'gong ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis 'og nas 'dzul bar bya// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po ni// rdo rje gzugs dang bcas par bri// cho ga bzhin du mdzes par dgod// spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal te// 'khor los sgyur dang rin chen 'byung// pad+ma 'chang dang sna tshogs las// phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// gzugs dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o// phyi rol 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// rim pas spel te dgod par bya// bar khyams la ni thub drug ste// sgo bzhi sgo srang 'khor dang bcas// sku'am phyag rgya'am yi ge'am// ma nges pa ni rgyal bas gsungs// bla re 'phan gdugs la sogs dang// rgyal mtshan brgyad nyid 'bar 'dra gzug/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ma lus dang// mchod dang rol mo ci 'byor 'bad// dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i rim pa'o// cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni// bskyed dang dbang bskur rim pa dag/ sngon byung bzhin du rjes 'jug pa// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i las kyang bya// mnyes nas nye bar 'grub pa'o// 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni// de nas slob ma gdong g.yogs te// bgegs bskrad sangs gtor bdug pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gtso bos dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab tu 'jug tu gsol// sems can don du bdag stsol bas// bzod par mdzad de dgongs su gsol// skal dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu// las gang spyod pa ci la dga'// bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug par 'tshal te bag chags kyis// bsgrib pa rab tu sbyangs byas te// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang ni nod par 'tshal lags so// khyod ni de ltar 'dod yin na// snod dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang// dad pa chen po'i snga ltas su// yon dang dad pa ci zhig yod// bdag gi lus dang srog la ma chags par// rta dang glang po nor gyi dbyig/ gser dngul bya ris zor skyogs dang// g.yu dang byu ru man shel dang// g.yi spyang dar zab gos kyi mchog/ 'bangs dang rkang 'gros yul mkhar rnams// ma zhum pa yis dbul bar bya// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// zhi ba'i dam tshig bdag la stsol// dpa' bo chen po dbang gi lha// sdom pa bdag la bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas gar mkhan las byung ba'i// gsang ba

chen por 'jug par 'tshal// phyir mi ldog pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang mchog skur// gsang ba kun gyis rigs tshogs su// bdag ni ma 'ongs slob dpon shog/ de ring khyod kyi snying la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gnas// gal te tshul 'di dral 'gyur na// skad cig gcig gi dral te gshegs// de bas dam las ma 'da' zhig/ A+oM badzro da ka hU~M/ de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi// phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi// nga yis ji skad bsgo ba bzhin// nges pa kho nar bya dgos so// bdag la smad par ma byed cig/ gal te smad par byas na ni// tshe yi 'du byed byas nas kyang// dam chu 'di yis rkyen byas nas// dmyal ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur ta re// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni// lha dang bla ma spun mi spang// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// gsang ba gzhan la spel mi bya// sku gsung thugasas kyi dam tshig ste// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nges thub na// dam chu 'di yis rkyen byas nas// ye shes sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// me tog phreng ba bzang po 'di// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rab drung dor// 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// pra tI ts+tsha ho// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rig pa'i me tog 'di bor bas// gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha// gtso bor rigs te bsgrubs nas ni// dngos grub rigs ni the tshom med// skal ldan khyod la sbyin par bya// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi// mtshan ni rdo rje che ge zhes// rdo rje kun grags yin par nges// rdo rje'i mtshan gyis kun grags shog/ sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// gser gyi gtsags bu thogs nas ni// mig gi ling tog bsal ba ltar// thugs rje ye shes thabs ldan pas// mi shes pa yi rab rib dang// ma rig mun pa bsal du gsol// deng khyod rdo rje sems dpa' yis// mig kun nye bar zhi mdzad pa'i// mig dbye ba la brtson par bya'o// rdo rje'i mig ni bla med 'gyur// badzra dz+nyA na tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi// rang bzhin dag pas rnyog pa med// gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid// dad pa'i thugs kyis blta bar gyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs kyi// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// badzra maN+Dal prA be sha ho// mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i ngang// nyon mongs mi spong gos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs gsol// dbang bskur bar bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems rdo rje sangs rgyas

kyis// bden pa chen po ji ltar byin// bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don slad du// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag dbang skur// rin po che yi dbang 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te// mkhas pa kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya'o// tra gsang ba gsang mchog mya ngan 'das// de la sogs pa gsang ba kun// don du brtags shing mnyan pa las// kun la bsgrag par bya ba min// d+harmA d+hA tu maN+Da la hU~M A be sha A// hrIHbye ba brgyad cu'i sgra dbyangs kyis// gang 'dod skyes bu tshim par byos// shes rab don gyi dmigs dang sbyar// che chung don gyis so sor bsgrags// yongs la bsgrag par bya ba min// A+oM d+harmA d+hA tu pra be sha phaT// ha yi 'bar ba'i tshogs mchog la// karma'i tshogs mchog gsal sgro thim// khyod ni las rnams byed pa yin// rnam bzhi'i phrin las kun byos shig/ e baM mA yA maN+Da la sid+d+hi hU~M/ rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung// gnyis med rgyal bas mnyes mchod pa// bde gshegs rgya?l ba kun dang sbyor// sa mi ta hU~M badzra kA ya badzra hU~M/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten stong gsum du/ rigs mchog rnams kyi phyag rgya tshul// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa por// thams cad ma lus dbang rnams sbyin// A+oM AHhU~M swA hA// ma hA gu ru hU~M/ glegs bam chag shing rdo rje dril bu dang// cho ga gsum ldan me long phyag rgya rnams// rna ba lce dang snying mgo lag pa g.yas pa ru// A+oM AHhU~M swA hA/ rin chen pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo gzhal yas su// 'phro 'dus rigs gsal spyan dang bsnyims mchod bzlas pa bya// gsol gdab thim gyur so so'i dbang dang ldan par bsam// sbas pa shes rab ye shes dbang// gnas dang bla ma gzungs bcas te// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan bu yis me tog bar// de nas bla ma slob dpon gyis// rdo rje rigs kyi bu mchog la// yang dag sems kyi gtan tshigs bzhin// bus kyang ji bzhin nyams su blangs// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang// snying po lnga dang phyag rgya lnga ste sku lnga dang// phreng ba gdugs dang go cha bza' btung dbang byin no// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa'i// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yi// dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya'o// A+oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka te sa ma ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen rtse// dpag tu med pa'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma rgya gram khang bu lnga/ ze'u dbrog khang bum dbang bskur ro// badzra bud+d+ha rat+na pad+ma khaD+ga mU kU Ta traM traM/ cod pan 'di ni mdzes pa ste// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'dis// rtag chad gnyis las grol 'gyur zhing// 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pa'i// mya ngan

'das pa'i go 'phang thob par shog/ A+oM ta thA ga ta badzra laM b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// gsung gi de nyid bsdus pa'i don// de bas snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ro// A+oM AHhU~M swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri mtshon chen lnga// phyag rgya lnga yi dbang bskur ro// A+oM badzra tsakra rat+na pad+ma khaD+ga mu dra hU~M phaT// e ma ho bde gshegs kun gyi sku// mtshan dang dpe byad dpag tu med// mi 'gyur mi shigs rigs kyi gtso// de bas rigs lngas dbang bskur ro// A+oM sa twa badzra hU~M/ bai ro tsa na A+oM/ rat+na sam+b+ha wa traM/ pad+ma a mi d+he ba hrI/ karma a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ gzung dang ting 'dzin me tog phreng// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa te// sku yi rgyan du gyur pa'i phyir// de bas phreng bas dbang bskur ro// A+oM rat+na mA le puSh+pa ho// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i dngos po kun bcom nas// phyin ci log gi bgegs chen bsrung// de bas go chas dbang bskur ro// badzra kA wA tsa badzra rak+Sha hU~M hU~M// gdug mdzes gser gyi yu ba can// skyabs chen byams pa chen po ste// nyon mongs gdung ba sel ba'i rtags// de bas gdugs kyis dbang bskur ro// A+oM badzra sUr+ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ bza' dang bca' dang btung ba'i tshogs// kha mngar skyur bska 'am brlag ro mchog ste// dza gad tshe dang zla rgyas dang// tshe 'dzin mAM sa kun tu rgyu// tshims byed 'jam des zhal zas kyis// nyin mtshan rtag tu bde legs shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ gsang ba nang gi dbang bskur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// bla med rdo rje slob dpon gyis// me tog phung po'i dkyil 'khor bya// rab bskyed spyan drang mchod byas la// rigs kyi bu yis zhu ba dbul// bla mas gzung ma byin brlabs te// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang// 'dod pa de la sbyin par bya// rigs bzang nyi shu lon pa'am// mtshan ldan sems phebs gang du bzung// rigs ngan mtshan ngan sems mi phebs// da ni spang bar bya ba yin// phan yon bstan par bya ba ni// dbang mchog bskur bas bu mchog de// 'jig rten me yis mchod cing bkur// bde gshegs rnams kyis sras su dgongs// lha mo rnams kyis grogs su mthong// chos skyong srung mas stongs grogs byed// 'gro don spyad kyang mi 'grib cing// 'khor 'dab rgyas shing bsam pa 'grub// tshe yi 'du byed byas na yang// rig 'dzin sa la nges par 'khod// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za// gzhan yang 'jig rten 'phos ma thag/ las kyi dbang gis gar skyes kyang// zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad du// gos sam ming la shes bstim nas// cho ga'i rim pa

'di byas na// rigs nges pa yi sras nyid du// 'dag la rgyas btab ji bzhin no// gzhan yang yon tan dpag las 'das// skyon gyi rim pa bstan pa ni// bla med mnyes par ma byas sam// dam med dbang rnams ma mnos nas// nyan 'chad sgom zhing las byed dang// rdo rje bla ma byed pa dag/ tshe thung dmyal ba'i gnas su ltung// 'jig rten 'dir yang gnod pa dag/ 'khor du mi nad phyugs nad 'byung// yul du sad dang ser ba 'bebs// 'jig rten mi yi ya ga dar// de yi skyon du shes par bya'o// las kyi mtha' bsdus bstan pa ni// gtor ma tsho gsum gnas su gtang// gshegs dang bsdus dang gzugs brnyan zhal phyes la// lus bsrung go bgo bka' nan spyod lam bya'o/ zab pa'i dbang gsum dbang bskur na// gzungs ma de dang de dag la// yon yang bla ma'i phyed shas dbul// dam tshig bsrungs de brda dang ldan par bya// ma byas pas na mnar med 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhi ba rjes su bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi don du drag po'i las bya ba'i dmigs gang la bya ba 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i yab// dka' thub can gyi dregs pa chen po de// mngon spyod rol pas bsgral ba e ma ho// ngo mtshar che'o// e ma ho ya mtshan can no// de'i rjes su spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni gang la bya// de yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i yab chen pos bka' stsal pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sku// kun la bya bar gzhung las med// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing// dam tshig me shes dam can bka' gcog pa// 'di ni bsgral ba'i zhing du gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral zhing ni// srog don bka' dam las kyis nyams// mtshan ma 'dod pas nyams dang bdun// pha ma mkhan po slob ma gsod// rdo rje nang dme byed pa dang// srog las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// slob dpon bka' bslu mngan dang dbye yi sems// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod gsang ba gzhan la spel// don las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// gsang sngags tshul spyod rnal 'byor la// rku mtshangs bru zhing ya ga 'dogs// bka' la skur 'debs 'khor rnams log par khrid// rtags kyi don bstan log par 'dzin// bka' las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// skur ba'i gzhi byed lta ba rgyab tu bor/ spyod pa log pa dang du len cing spyod// bka' yi gzhung bor phyin ci log la mkhas// dam las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// sngon chad mkhon pa'i gzhi med [(]5[)]

par// rgod cing bzhin ldog nyes med gzhan la gnad du 'dzug/ bdag gis nyes par ma dran par// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'ded pas// las kyis nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// gnyis med don la phyogs char 'dzin// lta ba sgro skur ras chong zhe gcod pa'i// skye med chos bshad mtshan ma'i chos su gzung// lha srin bran du ngas 'khol gyi// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig yod// nga nyid dpal yin nyams su ma mo byung// zer zhing gzhan la khro zhing 'tshe// mtshan mas nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// shes rab rnam gsum gsal med par// gzhan pas mthu che btsan 'dod pas// las kyi gtso ru mtshan ma spyod// rang gi ngo gdong khrag byugs te// mi thod zhing chen lag na thogs// dmar dong gtor yang glo la btags nas 'jig rten ma mo bsten cing 'bod// spyod pa'i don bor mi 'tsham las rnams byed// tho co brlang po'i spyod pas bka' gzhung smad// rnal 'byor pa la ya ga 'dor// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhabs nas drangs// 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i thugs dang 'gal// sha za ma mo'i gzan tshogs bkram// mchog sems mi ldan sems kyi nor brus nas// shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phung bar shes kyang sngags 'chang 'joms// gnyen zhing btsun yang thabs kyis smod// thob tu 'dod nas gsang sngags rku// bza' ru 'dod nas sgrub pa po'i// phud dang longs spyod brkus nas za// dug tu shes kyang lto ru za// 'dod pas nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing// 'di ni dam nyams bsgral bar bstan pa'o// dam tshig mi shes dam can bka' gcog gi/ gsang sngags gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// sdang bar byed na pha yang rung// gnod par byed na ma yang rung// gnad du 'dzug na spun yang rung// dam las ldog na mched kyang rung// snying ring byed na grogs kyang rung// de ni bka' gcog bsgral ba'i zhing// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos gsol pa// de ltar bsgral ba'i zhing de la// bsgral ba'i yon tan ci ltar lags// ma bsgral pa la skyon ni gang// zhes gsungs pas// rdo rje khros pa'i yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bsgral ba'i yon tan 'di lta ste// de dag bsgral bas rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams btul na bstan pa gnyan// dam med bsgral na bar chad nyung// med par gyur na bstan pa rgyas// nyams pa med na dkon mchog che// de bas yon tan bsam mi khyab// ma bsgral ba yi skyon bstan pa// dmyal khams 'phel la mtho rim 'grib// gzhung spyod rnal 'byor sgyid lug nas// gsang sngags theg pa'i chos sgo 'gag/ dam chos spang ba'i gzhir gyur nas// don la mi mthun skyon yod do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po

las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po la/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku// bsgral ba'i zhing rnams bstan pa de// mngon sum bsgral ba'am thabs kyis bsgral// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// mngon sum bsgral ba ma yin gyi// thabs kyis rim pas bsgral bar bya'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa// thabs kyis bsgral bar gsungs pa de'i// dmigs pa'i rten ni gang la bya// bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa'i rten ni ling+ga'o// ling+ga'i rim pa ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ graug mkhar sa dang mi phung sa// gangs kyi dum bu ju tshe'i phub// srub ma'i lo ma zhing chen ras// ske tshe dang ni ldong ros dang// thal chen dang ni rak+ta dang// gshang ba'am ni gci ba ste// bcu gnyis thod pa'i nang du brdung// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya muD+ga ra a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT// zur chag/ lug thug ra thug gcin gyis sprus/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sa sham b+hi shwa d+ha baM kha~M hU~M phaT// dur khrod ku sha'i rtsa dag la// dgra dang bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bya// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya nr-i tri mA ra ya phaT a// de la gong gi dam rdzas byug/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya e ra ka hU~M phaT/ mkhar nag skud pas ske nas gdags// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya aM ku sha hU~M dzaH/ de ni gdab pa'i ling+ga yin// shing shun tshon gang pa gcig la/ de la dgra bgegs gzugs brnyan bya// de ni gzir ba'i ling+gar bshad// ras sam gro ga'am shog shog la// dgra bgegs gzugs brnyan rdzogs bri ste// kham shis nag la gdags pa ni// 'di ni bstab pa'i ling+ga'o// ma ning nag po'i thod pa la// gru gsum 'bar ba cha drug la// yan lag mgo dang gsang gnas bya/ gru gsum rtse la 'khor lo drug/ mtha' ma myu khyud zlum pos bskor// 'khor lo drug gi cha la ni// sngags dang 'phyongs gnyis mthun bsdeb pas// dgra bgegs ming dang gzugs bris la// spyi bor A+oM dang kI la ya// dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// g.yas su hU~M la g.yon du phaT// 'doms su mA ra ya yang dgod// 'di ni gnan pa'i ling+ga'o// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// dgra bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bca' ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gong du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i// mi shes rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan bca' ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga gang// rjes 'jug don du bstan du gsol// rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa// sa dang mtshams dang go ma yi// thig dang tshon dang phyag rgya

dgod// rgyan dang mchod rdzas phyag btsal ba'o// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lha mo la// spyan drangs mchod don gsol pa ni// bar chad bgegs rnams zhi ba dang// sa yi dngos grub bdag la stsol// zur chag/ pe a kra ma sid+d+hi hU~M/ phyag na rdo rje dbang gi mthus// ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs bzhi nas// dpal ldan rgyal po chen po bzhis// phyogs srungs re ba skong du gsol// bar du gcod pa mtshams chod cig/ bai shra pa Na ye// d+h+r-iSh+ta rASh+ta ye/ bi ru D+ha ka pe/ bi ru bAk+Sha ye/ sa ma ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas chen 'dir// las kyi dbang gis bar chad byed// bka' las 'da' byed dam sri 'di// gnan cing spar ba'i dus la bab// kI la ya mA ya ra ya/ rak+Sha rak+Sha to tse phyang/ hU~M badzra swA hA/ dkar dmar ljang ser mthing sogs pa// rigs lnga'i byin rlab ye shes 'od// ma 'dres ra ri med pa'i mdog/ rigs rnams so sor kha dog gsal/ kI li kI la ya A+oM AHhU~M swA hA// maN+Da la sid+d+hi hU~M/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// so so'i gzhung du byin brlabs nas// mchog tu mdzes pa dgram par bya'o// A+oM ma hA pU dza sa ma ya hU~M// thugs las bsrung ba'i khro rgyal bcus// mi dge bcu rnams tshar bcad nas// rnam thar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// cho ga bzhin du phur pas gdab// ma dag pa rnams tshar chod cig/ gardza ha na da ha pa tsa b+han+d+ha// hu lu tiSh+Tha ts+tshin+da bin+d+ha s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ thabs dang shes rab ldan byas la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig btab pas// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas la// rdo rje thig cha rim par dbye// e maN+Da la badzra sid+d+hi nAn/ gnod nas dag pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga// sku lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// bder gshegs rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bshams pa dang// drang ba'i don phyir gzhal yas chag chag gdab// A+oM AHhU~M swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta maN+Da la sid+d+hi hU~M phaT/ sku'am gsung ste phyag rgya thugs// dbus nas mtha' yi sgo bzhi ru// rdo rje srin po'i lha rnams kun// bdag la rim par bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badzra phaT/ zhing chen bla re 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan dang// lda ldi ras ros dam dum sha rus khrag/ 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// gdos bcas don dang bstun zhing dgod par bya'o// ma hA rak+ta keM smi ga ta maN+Da la hU~M// rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rnal 'byor spun grogs rnams// ma bu'i 'du shes nyer bzhag nas// rnal 'byor spyod mchog phyag bgyid do// shrI badzra na mo// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// so so'i gzhung du byin brlabs te// mchog tu mdzes par dgram par bya// ma hA

pu dza sa ma ye hU~M// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du bca' ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das khros pa'i rgyal po la/ 'di skad ces gsol te/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas chen du// dregs phyed rnams ni bsgral ba bzhin// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i gnas ni gang du bya// rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa// bsgral ba'i gnas ni don bshad pa// de yang rtogs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// sems la chos nyid mi gsal zhing// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel ba yis// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po de// shar lho byang shar gang rung du// rdo rje drag po'i las bya'o// der ni nges 'grub phung 'tsheng med// dam tshig nges thub ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo// don spyod rtags kyi blo can gyis// drag po'i gnas su bya ba la// gsang ba tsher ma can gyi ri// gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni gri 'dra ral gri'i shul// sa ni gru gsum me dpung 'dra// logs la dur khrod gling yod pa// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang// dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang// brag la ra rod mang ba dang// ngam sa grogs po gting zab dang// stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra chu srin kha// ba glang sna mtha' brag dang chu yi bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// sngon chad lha mi'i g.yul sa dang// g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon 'thab dang// bsad bcad sa dang ma rungs pa// srin po bsgral ba'i bcas gzhi dang// srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang// g.yul ngor bskol ba'i sa mkhar rnams// mang po bsad pa'i phung ba'i sa// brag ni srin po ngus pa 'dra// ri ni thal phung snyil pa 'dra// lung pa me yis bsreg pa 'dra// shing rtsi rkang thang bros pa 'dra// sgang de'u mi ro phyung ba 'dra// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung// rgya gram lam dang 'byung po'i srang// drag po'i las 'di bya bar shes// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgral ba'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor dang// bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor gang lags pa// bder gshegs khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ sngags mkhan dag gi yon tan ni// rigs kyi rnal 'byor gral du smos// tshul bzang ngang tshul bzang la shis pa des// dang po shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la yid ches nas// de nas nges par dbang thob ste// theg pa mtha' dag sems la gsal// phyogs med lta ba gdeng du

'jog/ sgrub pa rnam gnyis rgyal por bsgrubs// phrin las thogs med snying rjer spyod// dam tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin bsrungs// rgyud dang sgrub thabs mtha' dag tshang// phyogs 'dzin spang la mkhas pa bsten// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu 'chang// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i nyams drod ldan// phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid ngang la gnas// rnal 'byor rtags ldan dam pa yis// las su bya ba chud ma zos// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'brub khung dang 'khor lo dbye ba'o// de la 'brub khung rim pa bstan pa ni/ drag po'i gnas sam dkyil 'khor shar lho ru// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor khru gang tsam du bya// gru gsum sum brtsegs kha khyer la// za byed zhal dang mda' gzhu bcas// mtshon cha lnga dang rtsang gis bskor// mthing nag dar gyis zhal bkab pa'i// 'khor lo'i rim pa dbye ba ni// sngar shi'i ro gos khrag can nam// bkra mi shis pa'i zhing ras la// drag po'i las la rab brtson pas// dur khrod rkang gis smyu gu bya'o// khyo dgu shi ba'i mngal khrag gis// phyi dro'i dus na bri bar bya// rgya ru chag khru gang yod la// sgo dang gru chad bar khyams dang// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ste// nang rgyas zhi ba dbang drag bri// rgyas pa la ni dmigs pa ni// yan lag nying lag rdzogs par bya// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// drug pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// rtsibs mchan brgyad kyi cha la ni// dang po sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// yan lag mgo dang gsang gnas la// gsum pa sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// snying po dang ni tsit+ta la// gnyis pa sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// tsit+ta ha lce'i rtse mo ru// bzhi pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// nyon mongs lnga yi gnas lnga ru/ lnga yi sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// gzhan yang so so'i gnas rnams su/ yab rnams bskul ba'i snying po brjod// 'di ni thabs kyi 'khor lo yin// phung srin nag po'i thod pa la// phrin las rnam bzhi gong bzhin du// mtha' la gru gsum nyi shus bskor// rgyas la dmigs pa gong bzhin du// sngags kyi rim pa gong bzhin no// yig 'go g.yon la yig gzhug g.yas// phyir dmigs pa la dgod gong ma bzhin// dang po sngags dang tha ma gnyis// gru gsum dag gi cha la dgod// gzhan yang so so'i gnas rnams su// yum rnams bskul ba'i sngags kyang bri// 'di ni shes rab 'khor lo yin// ras sam gro ga'am shog shog la// phrin las bzhi rnams gong bzhin de// sgo dang bar khyams de bzhin te// 'khor lo'i cha la rin chen dbyibs// gzhan rnams la yang gong bzhin de// dang po tha ma rin chen la'o// 'di ni nang gi 'khor lo ste// gzhan yang so

so'i gnas rnams su// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mdzes par bya'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sgrol byed slob dpon las dang gzugs brnyan 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ phyi rabs pas bsgrub pa'i drod dang/ rtags dang rdzas bsag pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// rjes su gzhung spyod rnal 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i rdzas ni ji ltar bsag/ bsgrub pa'i rtags dang drod tshad ci// rgyal ba dpa' bas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ bsgral ba'i rdzas su bstan pa ni// rgya tshil 'gro sad ma dud sme rdzas dang// bdab pa'i zhabs ma mngag pa'i nyung dkar dang// mtshon gyi 'dab lnga skud pa dang// dug dang ma rungs sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang// lcags phye zangs phye dug gtor dang// sri shing hom dang gnan pa'i thod pa dang// 'di ni drag po bsgral ba'i rdzas// grub pa'i rtags ni 'di lta ste// 'phar dang 'chog dang chags pa dang// 'gul dang ldeg dang mchod pa'o// 'od dang du+u ba 'byung ba dang// rnal 'byor nam mkhar 'gro ba dang// sa la mi thogs chur mi 'bying// 'di ni rtags rab bstan pa yin// mtshan ma'i ling+ga 'gul gyur ram// dmigs rno nyams dang rtags byung na// bar gyi rtags su bstan pa yin// tha mal rmi lam ston par 'gyur// rtags kyi mtshan nyid la yang ni// grol sa dang ni ngo bo ste// de yi ngo bo brtags par gces// drod tshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// bdal ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos nyid mnyam la blo bzhag nas// ci yang mi dmigs bsam las 'das// chos nyid lta ba'i drod tshad de// ga Na 'ching gral med
