pa'i ngang// dam rdzas blang dor med pa dang// ta na skye shi med spyod dang// 'di spyod pa yi drod tshad yin// dngos su snang ba skur grub cing// sgra ru grag pa gsung du ste// dngos med snang ba thugs grub na// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i drod tshad yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang// bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar shes te// thams cad kun tu dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i drod tshad yin// byar med nyid la spyod byed cing// gang la spyad kyang bde gshegs las// byed pa mi dmigs phrin las te// 'di ni phrin las drod tshad yin// dbri snon med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gol sa med pa'i sa la gnas// blang dor med pa'i dbang rdzogs na// 'di ni dbang gi drod tshad yin// dam pa'i gzhi nyid bde gshegs la// zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig tu shes// dam tshig dam pa mchog gi gzhi// 'di ni dam tshig drod tshad yin// de ltar rtags dang drod tshad zin pas

ni// drag po'i las la brtson par bya'o// rtags dang drod tshad ma zin na// drag shul spyad kyang las mi 'grub// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// rdzas dang rtags dang drod tshad gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos// rmad du byung ba'i tshig gis gsol pa// kye ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// yon tan phrin las kun kyang dbyer med pa// kun gyi bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan che'o// zhes bstod nas ni// de yi rdzas su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i dus ni gang la bya// zhes gsol pas// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// rtags dang drod tshad bstan pa ni// drag po'i las la 'jug pa'i don// bye ba'am ni sa ya'am// 'bum mam bdun 'bum bzlas pa ni// bzlas pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la// lo ni gsum gyis 'grub par ni// ting 'dzin bar gyi de ltar ro// de ltar 'grub na drag po'i dus// de min bar du dus tshod med// drod tshad rtags la ma bab cing// grangs kyi bsnyen pa ma tshang bar// dus kyi lo zla yun thung na// drag shul spyad kyang mi 'grub ste// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa drag po las la 'jug par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ting nge 'dzin gyi de nyid de// phyi rabs don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ting 'dzin de nyid bsdus pa'i don// legs par bshad cing mdor bstan gyi// nges par nyon cig yid la zung// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thig pa shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru sgom par bya'o// A+oM ma hA shun+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra sa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ d+harmA d+ha tu maN+Da la hU~M/ hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta// hU~M e ag+ni maN+Da la yaM karma rak+sha hU~M/ ra rak+ta maN+Da la/ su badzra su me ru hU~M hU~M/ raM dz+wa la raM/ keM ni ri ti keM/ b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he ban+d+ha dz+nyA na b+h+ruM/ e baM mA yA raM// ra tri rU tra rak+sha maN+Da la/ ma a pa sUr+ya tsan+da pad+ma maN+Da la hU~M/ s+pha ra Na phaT// saM ha ra na hU~M/ dz+nyA na badzra s+pha ra Na phaT// saM ha ra Na hU~M/ dz+nyA na sa twa kI ya la hU~M/ kI la ya s+pha ra Na phaT// saM ha ra Na hU~M/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT// badzra dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// zhes pas bdag nyid rtsa ba'i

dkyil 'khor du gsal bar mdzad do// phaT ni so sor bskul ba las// chags pa'i ting 'dzin gsal gyur te// yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// mchod pa gsang ba so sor thim// byang chub sems ni spros pa las// dang pos bdag nyid rdo rjer bsam// gnyis pas sras mchog gsal byas pas// phyogs skyong dgug dang gdan bting la// gsum pas hU~M gyur gsung rdzogs pa'o// de nas bskul bas phyag rgya rdzogs// de las phyogs bcu'i khro bo rnams// sngags kyi rim pas rdzogs gsal gyur// khro bo khro mo rol pa las// ha dang he las 'khor rnams bskyed// de nas byang chub sems 'phros pas// snying po phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du las// so so bsgoms pa'i tshul rdzogs pa'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA ga yA mi// a nu ra gA+o\u0f85 haM// ma ha bo d+hi tsit+ta hU~M/ bsta badzra taM/ kI la ya mu ti dzam a pa sUr+ya tsan+da pad+ma maN+Da la// hU~M hU~M badzra na na ha/ 'di ni phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ro// phur pa rdzas kyi ngo bo las// byang chub sems ni spros pa las// rigs kyi sras mchog rnam lnga nyid// spyan snga nyid dang phyogs bzhir bsam// byin brlabs la sogs sngon 'byung bzhin// gzi mdangs chags bskyed thugs bskul te// A+oM ma ku la rta la pra ta la hU~M phaT// badzra bai ta lI maN+Da la hU~M phaT/ badzra ma hA maN+Da la hU~M phaT// phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ro// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rjes 'jug ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ khros pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag gi sras su lha rnams bskyed pa dang/ de'i sras su bdag bya ba'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ 'khor ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir// rang gi ngang tshul de bzang lags// sngags dang bskul tshig 'di yang brjod// byang chub sems kyi dbang spros pas// ye shes 'od kyis lus rtog sbyangs// gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag la// gsum gyis byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru// thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyibs// rdo rje las byung yum gyi mkha'// chos kun byang chub sems gnas su// lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgras// rab tu gsal bar brjod pa'i sgra// byang chub sems ni gsal bar thim// de las hU~M zhes rab brjod pas// gsung gi phyag rgya nyid rdzogs nas// thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar// de las phra mo'i sku spro bsdus// phyag rgya chen po'i sku nyid rdzogs// de nyid sbyor ba'i byin brlabs las// b+ha ga nyid du lha rnams bsam// dza dang phaT kyi rtsa sngags kyis// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bdag dang stan la dgod// badzra ba kI la

ya phaT dza// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa'i rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa'i rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig/ A+oM A~MHhU~M kA ya wAka tsit+ta dz+nyA na A be sha A// A+oM A~MHhU~M maN+Da la sid+d+hi hU~M/ kI la ya kro ta kro tI ha hi hU~M phaT/ saM ha ra Na hU~M/ ma hA g+ha na sa ma ya ho/ hU~M hU~M badzra g+han d+ha/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ dIp+ta tsakra ha naha na hU~M phaT/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Da la hU~M phaT// lha rnams rtsa ba'i sngags gzhug tu// dza phaT ces ni kun la gdags par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rjes 'jug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bde gshegs rgyal bas 'khor rnams la// byin rlabs dbang bskur ji bzhin du// rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ yi ge 'bru gsum rim pas su// srog gi rta la bskyon nas su// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i ting 'dzin las// byin rlabs gsum ni nges pa ru// sngon byung bzhin du byin gyis brlabs// srog gi hU~M las 'od 'phros pas// rigs lnga rgyal ba'i thugs bskul to// sngon byung bzhin du sngags brjod cing// ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur ro// A+oM badzra sa ma ya dza tiSh+Tha badzra// shrI badzra na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra hU~M/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlab 'dir stsol cig/ ces dbang dang byin rlab nod pa'i phyir na/ dus gsum gshegs bzhugs byon rnams kun// rdo rje khro bor bzhengs gsol drangs// phyag 'tshal dga' bas mchod pa bya// zhes gsol ba gdab bo// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// bsnyen pa'i rim pa gang ltar lags// khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyis// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen rnams// nges par 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// gsang bsngags kyi byin brlabs so// a b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab pa'i gnag pa de kho na la'o// don dam pa dang kun rdzob bsnyen sgrub bzhi rdzogs nas// rtags dang mtshan ma 'byung

ba gdon mi za// rtags dang mtshan mas bsgrub pa'i drod tshad zin pa dang// bkra shis mtshan ldan b+han+d+ha ka pA la// ci 'byor btung ba snum pos bkang byas nas// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs tshang la gsol ba gdab// thun mong dbang gi dngos grub blang// bkra shis brjod de gsol byas na// rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur// cho ga 'di yi byin brlabs kyis// gang zhig mos pa'i dad ldan de// dbang bcu thob nas tshad med don dang ldan// phrin las thogs med dbyings dang ye shes don mthong 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho khros pa'i bdag nyid can// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor de// spyan drangs mchod pa ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa ni/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin rtag ldan pas// sa mA dza yis gsol btab nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan yang drangs// tiSh+Tha badzras brtan byas nas// dgyes pa chen pos phyag btsal te// mchod pa'i rim pa sngon byung bzhin// des ni las rnams ma lus 'grub// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// 'gyur med ye shes lha gnas pa// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod bzhes te// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// zhes brjod do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing mchod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rang bzhin can// dregs pa sgrol mkhas thugs rje'i dpal mgon te// thugs rje'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje chen pos dregs pa bsgral ba'i zhing// rjes bsgrub drod tshad zin par nges pa des// dgra bgegs dmigs pa bsgral ba'i rim pa gang// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ drag pos bsgral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang por gnod pa'i dgra bgegs de// lha dang rgyab brten dpung dang dbral// de nas nges par gzugs la bstim// 'gyur ldog med par byad du gzhug/ gzi brjid phrogs te smyo ru gzhug/ phur pas btab ste nges par bsgral// rdul du byas te tshogs la dbul// las rnams drug po re re la yang// de la drug drug sum cu drug/ cho ga gzhung sngags dang

ting 'dzin phyogs dang rdzas dang thabs// sngon byung rjes 'jug 'khor bkra shis/ de lta'i don dang ldan na ni// gang la dmigs pa gdon mi za// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'jig 'gyur na// sdig can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa can bsgral ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes phur pa btab pa bzhin// dmigs pa'i dgra dang bgegs rnams la// rdzas kyi phur pa bstim pa'i las ni gang// bde gshegs rgyal bas bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ dbye ba drag po las kyi rigs// bstim pa zhi ste de bzhin rigs// gzir ba rgyas te rin chen rigs// byad la dbang ste pad+ma'i rigs// gdab la drag ste rdo rje'i rigs// bstab pa lha phur nyid la bya// de ni spyi yi las su bshad// gdab pa'i gnas ni du zhig yod// bka' stsal pa/ gdab pa'i gnas ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// sngon byung dregs pa lnga bsgral la// lte ba nyid dang gsang ba dpung mgo dpy-i+i la gdab// dregs pa chen po bsgral ba yin// sems nyid rtsad bcad snying la gdab// dregs pa'i phyogs skyong bsgral ba yin// bsgral ba'i rnam shes brgyad la gdab// dam sri chen po bsgral ba bzhin// dgra bgegs mgo la de bzhin gdab// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs pa yin// yar dang mar gyi bdun rgyud bcad// de ni gdab pa'i las su gsungs// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa// dregs pa'i sems can chen po la// dkyil 'khor lha yis gzir ba bzhin// rjes su gzir ba ji ltar bya// bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi las// gzir ba'i mtshan nyid 'di yis ni// dgra bgegs gzir zhing gnan bya na// ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// snying la tsit+ta 'khor gzir sbyaung// tsit+ta sgo bsrung sbyor ba yis// mgo la la ka'o bros gzir sbyong// dam la gtogs pa'i ma tshogs kyis// khro bcu 'khor bcas sbyor ba yis// lus kyi gnas bcur gzir cing sbyong// rigs kyi yum lnga'i sbyor ba yis// sgo lnga'i rnam shes gzir cing sbyong// sgo ma bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// yan lag bzhi yi mtshan ma sbyong// dam la gtogs pa'i ma tshogs kyis// g.yang gzhis shun lpags sbyong gzir bya// rol pa'i pho nya tshogs bcas kyis// dus gsum sha rus khrag rnams sbyar// ye shes rol pa'i bro gar gyis// ma lus kun kyang gzir bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa// ye shes 'bar ba'i khro tshogs kyis// rdo rje thod pa'i tho gtun du// dregs pa bsgral nas gsol te dge ba yin// rjes su 'jug na ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa// mkha' yi gtun khung bde

gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings nyid du// srid gsum ma lus phur pas thebs// kha tham dbyings su bsgral bar bya// kha tham dbyings su bsgral byas nas// hU~M hU~M bgyis pas dbang du+u bsdus// phaT kyi kun tu gtor bar byas// sha khrag khams gsum gang bar bton// khA khA bgyis pas lhag ma bzhes// hi hi dgyes pa'i sgra bsgrags pas// bzhes shig rol te gsol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i mdzad spyod tshe// rdo rje ye shes me dbal gyis// dregs pa'i sha rus bsregs nas rol pa bzhin// rjes su bsgrub na ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ brub khung nyid du bya ba'am// yang na gzhung dang mthun pa ru// me thab gru gsum sum brtsegs la// dkyil du rdo rje nag po bzhag/ dang po dkar la gnyis pa nag/ gsum pa ser por bya ba ste// zla gam yang ni dmar po bya// mu khyud dkar la gru chad ljang// bar khyams nag la sgo rigs sbyar// dur khrod shing ngam tsher ma can// khru gang gru gsum dbyibs su brtsigs// yam shing nag po rtse mo ma nor bar// rtse mo gru gsum dag tu bzhag/ tshe the'u rtsa rtse ma nor bar// rtsa ba mi yi tshil gyis byug/ sngags pa'i chas gos nag po la// byang du kha bltas 'greng nas 'dug/ dur khrod gnas sam ma bdun khyim// yid 'ong me tog shing brgyan pa'am// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dgang gzar gru gsum khyud gang la// dkyil du e yis mtshan par bya// blug gzar zlum po rdo rje dkyil du mdzes// phyi nang bsreg rdzas gsang ba nag por bya// shan pa'i khyim nas blangs pa'i mes// yam shing nag po spar bar bya// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas// raM las dam tshig me lha bsam// ye shes me lha snyan gsol spyan drang bstim phyag 'tshal// mchod pa'i rim dbul bstod pas dgyes byas nas// 'dod don gsol nas me lha gzhal yas bsam// de nang dkyil 'khor spyan drang bzhugs gsol mchod// bstod pa'i rgyal pos don rtags gang rung bstod// 'dod don gsol te phrin las bcol// bsgral ba'i ling+ga cha gcig dang// dgra bgegs gzugs brnyan gsal byas nas// dgug bstim phur pas rab gdab cing// nyung dkar brdeg cing gu gul bdug/ mtshon gyis 'debs gtub skud pas dam bcings nas// gtor ma gnyis kyang legs byas nas// mtshon cha'i char dang gtun brdung las byas te// lha yi tshogs la thim par dbul ba ni// klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// 'bar 'phrog 'khrug pa'i me spar nas/ gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// bsreg shing rdo rje 'bar ba yi// bka' las 'da' byed sdig chen rnams// rdo rje

me dbal snying bsregs nas// dngos por 'gyur ba'i gnas rnams kun// tshor dogs med par bsreg par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsungs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod tshe// dregs pa zhabs 'og mnan pa bzhin// rjes bsgrub gnan na ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa ni// shing gcig drung dang ma rungs pa// rgya gram lam du bya ba dang// klu yi gnas dang 'byung po'i srang nyid du// dkyil 'khor gru gsum rgya sol 'dag/ de nang gnan pa'i rdzas bcug ste// dbang gi phur pa drag btab nas// dur khrod g.yam pa sngon po la// zhing chen dag gi sur khrag gis// nam mkha' sngon po gru gsum la// rdo rje rgya gram bzhi yis mdzes// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ldan// yi ge dza dang mdzes pas ni// phur pa de yis spyi nas gnan// sems ma rdo rjes dam tshig bskul// sku gsung thugs kyi stobs kyis mnan// be con nyid kyang las kyis stongs// mche bas sha khrag zos par byad// nyung dkar brdeg cing gu gul bdug/ ting 'dzin 'byung chen bzhi yis ri rab bsam// de nyid las kyi lha nyid kyis// shin tu gnan pa'i mchog tu gsungs// las kyi mnan pa'i 'byung nang dus zad 'di// hUM las kyi rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud kyis gnan par shog/ ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ dregs pa bsgral ba ni slar gsol sngar bzhin// dgra bgegs bsgral na ji ltar bsgral// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ ta na ga Na sbyor ba mdzad// drag po las kyi bsgral ba rnams// rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus rdubs nas// mi ldog dbyings su phaT kyis 'phangs// zla dkyil rlung gi sbyor bas bskyod// dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// hU~M du gyur pas rnam par dag/ skur gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gror thar pa'i thabs// de ltar bskyed la mi gnas te// ma g.yos dbu ma'i don dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su bzhag/ bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid du// de lta bu yi don ldan na// bsgral ba byas dang 'gal med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bstim gzir gdab bstab bsreg mnan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol ba ni// ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri// thabs ni gang/ zhes gsol ba dang/ bka' stsa la pa ni// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud zlum// gru bzhi pa la 'khor lo brgyad// bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhi bcas// gru gsum nag la zla gam dmar// mu khyud dkar la gru bzhi

ser// gong ras ljang la 'khor lo ser// rtsibs mchan dmar la mtshams byed dkar// gru chad ljang la bar khyams dmar// sgo ni rigs bstun rta babs mdzes par bya// dur khrod rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// dbus su bcom ldan yab yum ste// zla gam gru gsum rtse mo dang// mu khyu?d gru bzhi dag la dgod// rnam rgyal gshed po rta mgrin dang// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid dang bzhi// rang rang gzungs dang sras bcas te// phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// dri za gshin rje klu rnams dang// gnod sbyin gdan la mkhas pas dgod// dbyug sngon mi g.yo gzhan mi thub// khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid dang bzhi// rang rang gzungs dang sras bcas rnams// mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// me lha srin po rlung lha dang// dbang ldan gdan dang bcas par ro// mdun du hU~M chen 'khor lo bcas// rgyab tu stobs chen de bzhin du// tshangs dang sa bdag gdan la gnas// dbus kyi gnas las bzhi mthun te// phyi rim gru gsum nyi shu bya// bar khyams sgo rnams de bzhin te// dur khrod rin chen brtsegs pa la// ka ba brgyad dang gdung bcu gnyis// rta babs dur khrod rin chen brgyan// kha dog yang ni rigs dang sbyar// yang na dmar nag nyid du bya// gru gsum rnams ni yum gyi shes rab mkha'// nyi shu rtsa gcig shes par bya// yab rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma nor bar// thams cad ngo bo dgod par bya// sras kyi phur pa gong bzhin te// sgo ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// dbus su zla gam sgo can gru gsum mdzes// mu khyud phyi rim rin chen 'bar ba brgyad// de yi phyi rim snam bu+u la// dkyil 'khor nyi shu las bzhi tshang bar bya// bar khyams sgo dang rgyan rnams de bzhin te// zla gam dmar la gru gsum nag/ sgo ni mi 'gyur mthing nag ste// sgo khyams shin tu mdzes byas la// mu khyud dkar la rin chen sngo// zur mtshan dmar la mtha' sdud dkar// gru chad nag la khyams bzhi ser// las bzhi'i dbyings ni gang dang mthun// khyams dang sgo rgyan de bzhin te// dbus su bdud 'dul yab yum ste// spyan sngar rdo rje 'dus pa gzungs mar bcas// phyogs bzhi rin chen dag la ni// rigs bzhi'i sras mchog rim par dgod// mtshams la rigs kyi yum bzhi ste// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu la// thabs dang shes rab gong bzhin no// gzhan rnams kyang ni de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor de skad gsungs/ rdo rje phur pa gsang pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol ba ni/ rdo rje khros pa mi bzad

pas// dregs pa chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rgyud bskul zhing// drag shul rjes su spyod pa'i tshe// lha rnams bstod bskul ji ltar lags// mi bzad khros pas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// mi bzad khros pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung bdag nyid dpal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// me dpung kha T+wAM ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdzu 'phrul chen po bzhi yis zhabs dag gis// dregs pa pho mo nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'jigs byed sku la dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// glang chen stag chas zhing chen g.yang gzhis bklubs// thod sbrul la sogs sku la rgyan gyis brgyan// thal chen zhags dang rak+ta'i thig les brgyan// rdo rje gshog pas srid gsum zil gyis gnon// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// dpa' sgeg 'jigs su rung ba'i sku mnga' ba'i// rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs byed gsung gi mchog/ snying rje rngams dang zhi byed thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon nas yum chen e ka tsa ti ma// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing// kha T+wAM ut+pal dril bu dang// b+han+d+ha rak+ta rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol// ri rab phur bu 'dril zhing 'debs// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan cing// gsang ba'i yum chen nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje nyid las 'khrungs pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las dus la bab// rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zur gsum po// rdo rje s+t+wa re kha T+wAM ri rab phur bu 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril tshangs pa brgya byin gdan la bzhugs te las rnams ma lus mdzad// zhe sdang chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// smug nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zlum// 'khor lo s+t+wa re ri rab phur bu 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril tshangs pa'i gnas la bzhugs te zhi ba'i phrin las mdzad// gti mug chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ser nag zhal cig phyag bzhi sku smad zur bzhi ste// rin chen s+t+wa re kha T+wAM ri rab phur bu 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril ma hA de ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzad// nga rgyal chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku smad zla gam re// pad+ma s+t+wa re kha T+wAM ri rab phur bu 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril khyab 'jug gdan la bzhugs te dbang [(]6[)]

gi phrin las mdzad// 'dod chags chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ljang nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zur gsum ste// rgya gram s+t+wa re kha T+wAM ri rab phur gdab// de ltar sbyor ba byas gyur na// tshig gi dbang gis srin po 'du 'gyur te// slas dang grogs su the tshom med// rus phreng la sogs rgyan thogs nas// bdag la dbang bskur byed 'gyur na// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci bstan yang// chos nyid mnyam las ma g.yos na// bu yi dam tshig shes 'gyur te/ e ma ho bu ni rdo rje che// shin tu brtse ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// ma ltar dgos pa'i don byed 'gyur// brtul zhugs phyag rgya ldan 'gyur na// bran dang sring mor the tshom med// ma bcol bzhin du las rnams byed pa ni// nor bu rin chen bzhin du re ba skongs// de ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'o// bdag gi bu mo'i tshogs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'o// rig 'dzin sa la smin te mngon pa nyid// rjes 'jug gang zhig rnam shes phung po yul dang khams rnams kun// ma spangs gnas su dag ste sangs rgyas 'di yis 'grub// las kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrubs pas sangs mi rgya// brda dang rtags bstan de kun sgrib pa ste// mtshan ma'i chos kyis ting 'dzin g.yeng ba'i rgyu// de bas sems dang sems las byung ba 'bad par bya'o// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'dul ba nyid// ye shes mkha' 'gro grub pa'i shugs las 'byung ba ste// don dam de la bsgrub pa'i rtags m-i bca'o// sngon gyi dam pas gsung rgyu tshogs bsag phyir// las kyi mkha' 'gro ging dang ma sring pho nya 'bar tshogs la// tshogs kyi lhag ma kha chus bran te sbyin// dam bcas bzhin du gsal ba'i las bcol lo// spyan drangs ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// gtang rag tshul du mchod phul la// nyes pa bshags te don gsol nas// gzhal yas nyid du gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kun// bdag nyid chen po'i sku+u la bsdu// de nas rim gyis mi dmigs par// thig le byang chub brtan par bzung// gzugs brnyan zhal phyis chag chag gdab// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bsgrub cing/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma yongs su dam la btags pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po la/ rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa/ thabs kyi spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// khros pa'i rgyal la dbang bskur bzhin// rjes su 'jug pa ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas// khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// dod tshad rtags ldan bla ma yis// brtul zhugs 'chang ba'i slob ma'i phyir// yid 'ong me tog rgyas pa'am// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// mchod rten drung dam kun dga' ra// der ni dbang gi las bya ste// sa chog mtshams rnams gong dang 'dra// gnyis pa sta gon bya ba

ni// dkyil 'khor dam rdzas chag chag gdab// lha rnams rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le bya// thod pa'i bum pa bcwa lnga la// dur khrod skra yis kha rgyan bya'o// ro ras dag gis mgul brgyan te// zhing chen dag gi gdan la bzhugs// de nas slob ma sta gon ni// ba su ta yis srung skud bya// dur khrod rkang la so shing bya// rdo rje dri chu'i kha dag bya'o// dbang gi yo byad ma lus kun// skabs der nges par bsog par bya'o// de dag sngags dang bskul tshig rnams// zhi ba'i las dang 'dra ba ste// thabs ni bdag nyid khros pa'i las su bsgyur cing bya'o// thig tshon cho ga gong bzhin te// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// sgo dang bar khyams sgo khyud dang// de nas thigs bskor gnyis byas la// nang tshan brgyad brgyad nyid du bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu// dbus su zla gam gcig byas te// mdun rgyab gnyis su zla \u0f84gam bzhi// phyogs kyi le'u tshe las gzhu'i dbyibs// phyi rim brgyad cha nyis 'gyur la// dbang gi zla gam bcu drug bya// zla gam rnams ni dmar par bya'o// las bzhi'i dbyibs ni rigs dang sbyar// gzhan yang mdzes shing legs par bris// dbus su khros pa'i rgyal po ste// mdun stengs logs bzhi khro bo bzhi// phyi rim zla gam bcu drug dgod// spyod phyogs bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bzhi// sras kyi phur pa lnga po dgod// gru mtshams bzhi la phyag rgya bzhi// sgo bzhi dag la sgo bsrung ste// zla gam nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga nyid// khro bo nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// thabs mchog yab kyi ngo bo'o// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med don// rgyan dang mchod pa mdzes par rdzogs// cho ga'i rim pa gong bzhin du// de nas gzhugs pa'i rim pa nyid// zhi ba khro bor bsgyur zhing bya// de nas dbang gi rim pa nyid// rang la sku yi cha rkyen dbang// sngon byung bzhin du bskur ba ni// phung po ma spangs ngo bo nyid// gsang ba'i snying po brjod las 'das// rak+sha me dbal skur bsgoms te// lhang nge ba ru nges pa gsal// A+oM badzra kI li kI ya la sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT// e ma ho de ni rang byung ba'i// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// 'khor ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir// ye shes sems dpas dbang bskur ro// dz+nyA na sa twa/ kI la ya A/ srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing// byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// khams gsum ye shes skyed pa'i phyir// dbu la rigs lngas dbang bskur ro// oM AHhU~M swA hA// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// pha rol phyin pa drug gi rtags// rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan gyis// rgyu drug gnas su sgrol bar shog/ zhag gi zo ris don dam bcud kyi rgyan rgyun kyang// rak+ta'i thig le thugs rje chags pa'i

rtags// thal chen thig le mtshan ma spros dang bral// mtshan ma gsum gyi don dam mtshon par shog/ ma hA tig sna/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA kiM ni ri ti/ skam po chos sku+u ra ri longs spyod rdzogs// rlon pa sprul pa'i sku yin te// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs kun dang// sku gsum ngo bor dbang bskur ro// ma hA ka pA la hU~M/ sbrul rigs bzhi yi chun 'khril te// mnyen la 'khril ba sku yi rgyan// zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin pas// phrin las bzhi yis gdug pa zhi bar shog/ ma hA nA ga hU~M/ glang chen ko rlon stobs bcu'i brjid du ldan// tshul khrims g.yang gzhi thabs la mkhas pa dang// stag lbags sham thabs dpa' bar ldan pa yi// na bza' rgyan gyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ khams gsum zil gnon rdo rje gshog pa 'di// srid gsum 'degs byed rlung gi rang bzhin pas// g.yas pa thabs la g.yon pa shes rab ste// rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ ye shes gcig las kyang 'dul thabs bye brag tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// rtags kyi khro chung tshon gang gis// dka' nan chen pos 'gro don byed par shog/ kham nag ral pas stong nyid don rtogs ston// mthing nag thal ba'i chun 'phyangs kyis// 'khor ba rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' sangs te// ma g.yos dbu ma chen po'i don rtogs shog/ 'bar ba thugs rje'i rang bzhin dang// 'phro bas khyab pa'i thugs rje dang// 'du ba dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// gleng ba zad pa'i phrin las dang// 'khyil ba'i gnyis su med pa'i don// rdo rje me yi dbang mchog thob par shog/ de ni sku yi cha rkyen no// de nas mdzad pa phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba ni// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams kyis// rab tu gsor te dril byas nas// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur bas// gnyis med chen po'i byin rlob shog/ gu gul sbyar ma'i rdzas mchog dam pa 'dis// sras mchog kI la ya yi gzi mdangs rab bskyed nas// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur cing// 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par shog/ nyung dkar rgyal po'i sras mchog 'dis// bder gshegs sras mchog rnams kyi ni// thugs dam chen po bskul nas kyang// 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par shog/ rak+ta'i rgyal po chags pa'i bdag nyid 'dis// 'gro ba'i don la thugs dam rab bskul zhing// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams su// thugs rje chag pas don rnams byed par shog/ thugs rje chen po'i cod pan 'di// thabs dang shes rab rtags yin te// gzung 'dzin mtha' rnams rab spangs te// dbyings dang ye shes mtshon par shog/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas te// dus gsum sangs rgyas mnyes mchod cing// 'gro ba'i don la thugs bskul zhing// mchod sbyin

stobs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ bsgrub pa'i shes rab tshon gang ba// gsang ba'i sngags kyis rab bskyed la// dus dang rgyan du bzla dgos pas// 'dzab bsnyen 'di yis dbang bskur ro// di ni mdzad pa phrin las kyi dbang ngo// drag po bsgral ba'i dbang ni// dbyings dang ye shes don dam pho nya dang// thabs dang shes rab rtags kyi pho nya dang// 'khor ba'i gnas nas dgra bgegs 'gug pa'i phyir// mngag pa pho nya'i phur bu gzung// phyag rgya bzhi ldan phur bu 'di byin pas/ dgug dang bcings dang dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// bar chad dgra bgegs ling+ga la 'debs par shog/ rdo rje gdab phur 'di byin pas// ye shes dbyings la phur pa 'debs pa'i rtags// mtshan ma thabs kyi phur bu 'dis// gdab pa'i ling+ga shes pa la// thabs mchog phur bu 'debs par shog/ mtshon cha lnga ldan phur bu 'di byin pas// 'joms byed rdo rje gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang// gtub pa'i ral gri brdung ba'i dbyug to dang// gnon pa'i rgya gram phrin las kyis// ma rig rgya mtsho 'dral bar shog/ rin chen rgyas pa'i phur bu 'di byin pas// dmigs pa'i mthu dang rtsal byed lha la sogs// gnas su bskrad cing rdzu 'phrul phrogs nas ni// rang nyid tshe dang dbang thang rgyas par byed par shog/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bar ba'i tho tshogs kyis// 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyong ba'i phyir// mtshan ma'i dngos po rdul du rlog par shog/ drag po'i mchod gtor 'di byin pas// dam can rnams kyi thugs bskul zhing// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul du rlog par shog/ dbang mchog dug gi gtor ma 'di byin pas// gnod byed ma lus myos shing 'tshubs pa dang// bag chags sbyong phyir sdig pa mthol gyur nas// myos 'tshub 'bab chol smyo ru chug/ rdo rje srin po za byed dang// rdo rje srin mo zhal gdangs par// sha rus khrag ste drug gsum mchod pa yis// dug gsum stongs nas sku gsung thugs ldan shog/ klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// 'bar 'phro 'du klong me lce de// ya ma me yi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams ma lus mnyes byed shog/ zil gnon ri rab phur pa 'di byin pas// skal med byung ngan dus zad rnams// byang chub sems ni ma skyes par// gnon byed stobs kyi dbang thob shog/ rigs ngan sme sha gdol pa'i rigs// kha cig kha ral gzungs ma la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bkod// dbang bskur rim pa gong bzhin no// gong gi gzungs ma de nyid las// zab mo'i dbang yang de bzhin bslang// de ltar dbang rim rdzogs gyur na// mi zhes bya ba bde gshegs yin// sangs rgyas zhes ni gud na med// de yis las rnams 'grub par

bshad// de ltar drag po'i dbang rdzogs nas// gnon byed ma lus rang bzhin du// zhe sdang gting nas ma g.yos kyang// rang ngam shugs kyis sgrol 'gyur na// dmigs pa bcas na smos ci dgos// de ltar dbang mchog ma thob par// bsgral ba nyid las btson byas kyang// rang nyid tshe yi bar chad nas// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen po lhung// de bas nan tan bskyed par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ bde gshegs rol pa'i rjes 'jug pa'i// rdo rje'i dbang rdzogs rnal 'byor pas// rjes su 'jug dang dam tshig rtogs// bsrung ba'i dam tshig rnam pa gang// phyi rabs don du bstan du gsol// rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// rtogs pa'i don nyid yin pa ste/ de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// rtogs pa'i don rtogs bde gshegs kyi// zhal nas gsungs pa'i gdams ngag ste// de yi don la 'das na tshig par 'gyur// gdams ngag rim par bstan pa ni// rtogs par bya ba spyi yi dam tshig yin// bsrung bar bya ba khyad par dam tshig ste// gnas par bya ba lhag pa'i dam tshig yin// mdor na rnam pa gsum du gsungs// yan lag rnam par phye bas rim pa ste// don dam gnyis med ston pa'i rdo rje mched rnams la// lta log ngan sems rku 'phrog brdeg la sogs// ngan du smras shing gnod pa dngos su bgyis// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa dmyal ba'i rgyu// dang po dam tshig bcas pa bzhin// bzlas brjod sngags dang snying po bar mi gcad// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin no// ye gsang thabs kyis chod nas mi rtogs bzhin du don med spel byed na// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa dmyal ba'i rgyu// sbyor dang sgrol ba ma byin len pa dang// tshig brnyan dang ni rdzun spyod pa// nyon mongs rang gar spyod pas ngan song rgyu// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi ngo bo la// ma rig log par mthong bas spangs byas te// mi spang dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin de// dri chen dri chu dmar chen mAM sa sems// so so'i rnam par rtog pas ma 'byongs te// gnyis med don las 'gal ba de bzhin no// phung po 'byung ba kha dog dbang po yul// gnyis med lta ba ngang las ma rtogs te// ye shes lnga yi don 'gal gong bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// rigs kyi khyad par ye shes lnga yang snang// ye shes dmigs med don la ma rtogs pas// grub pa'i 'bras bu med pas dmyal ba'i rgyu// sa la 'jug cing spyod pa'i rnal 'byor

pas// spyi yi dam tshig don mang yang// don dang bstun pa'i nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// drang dang nges pa'i don du rtogs par bya// khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba ni// gcan gzan rgyal po seng ge dag/ gsad par bya ba'i 'os ma yin// za ma tog gi rin chen dag/ dug rnams spyo ba ma yin no// rin po che yi lcug ma dang// rtsad nas gcad par bya ba min// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ khong du btung bar mi rigs so// pad+ma rgyas pa'i ze'u 'bru dag/ kha dbye spyad par mi bya'o// bug rdol can gyi snod dag tu// gsang ba'i bcud rnams blugs pa min// ma brtags pa yi zas dang nor// mi bsrel bcad par mi bya'o// shel gong bzhin du gsal zhing dag pa dag/ 'dam du bsnub par mi bya'o// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ rin chen gser gyi snod du blugs pa las// dug can dag tu ga la blugs// dgos 'dod bskang ba'i yid bzhin nor bu dag/ thab tu bsreg par yang mi bya// bya rgyal khyung gi gshog pa dag/ bcag par bya ba ma yin no// gnam lcags ngur mo'i mtshon cha dag/ sa la brdab par mi bya'o// stag gzig sgrol ba'i las byas pa'i// las kyi mtha' ma mi rtul lo// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa dag/ bshig cing 'dral bar mi bya'o// rdo rje ra bas bskor ba dag/ gom mtshams bshig par mi bya'o// mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma dag/ gsad cing bsnub par mi bya'o// rdo rje chu bo'i 'ol kha dag/ bcad cid bsgyur bar bya ba min// rgyal po rtags kyi phyag rgya dag/ gzhan la sbyin bya'i rigs ma yin// rdo rje mkhar rdzong gtam pa dag/ rmang nas bzlog ste mi bshig go// rgyal mtshan rtse la btags pa'i nor bu dag/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis dbog par mi bya'o// khyad par bstan pa'i dam tshig don mang yang// mdor bsdus pa ni nyi shu'i don dang bstun// sa la gnas shing spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag gzhan gnyis kyi don du bsrung bar bya'o// lhag pa'i dam tshig gnas par bya ba ni// mdor na rtsa ba bzhir bstan te// spyod pa rgyun dang rang bzhin lta ba dang// lta ba'i nyams drod gal mdo nges pa bzhi// yan lag don nyid bshad pa ni// spyod pa rgyun la dam tshig bzhir gnas te/ gnyid kyi dgra spang myos 'gyur dgra bgegs gzhom// gsang ba'i brda bsrung le lo'i bdud gzhom mo// rang gzhan blta ba'i dam tshig bzhir bstan te// srid gsum yongs su bsgral ba dang// khams gsum zhing du bsgral ba'i ngang// dus gsum mi ru bsgyur ba dang// 'khor ba gnas su dag par blta'o// lta ba'i nyams drod dam tshig gzhir gnas te// gdal ba chos nyid lta ba ye 'byams su// rig pa'i ye shes lta ba ye gsal du// sprul pa'i phyag brnyan lta ba ye gnas su// khyab

pa'i snying rje lta ba kun khyab pa'o// gal mdo nges pa'i mdo gsum mo// ma khrel ba yi tshul dang ni// ma nyams pa yi mdo dag dang// mthar phyin pa yi rtags nyid do// ma khrel ba yi tshul la gnyis// bde gshegs thugs kyis ma bas dang// gang zag yid kyis ma dpyad pa'o// nyams pa'i don la bzhir gnas te// zla bos nyams dang zhor la nyams// dbang med nyams dang kun tu nyams pa'o// mthar phyin rtags kyis de bzhin bzhir snang ste// dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang// byin rlab che zhing rig pa chags pa gnyis// yid 'ong 'byung zhing 'dod pa grub pa dang// mang pos bkur zhing grags pa thob pa bzhi'o// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig don la gnas par bya'o// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams// rtog shing bsrungs te gnas par byas gyur na// sa gzhi chen po 'dra ste kun kyang bskyed// nam mkha' dngas pa 'dra ste go yang 'byed// sreg pa med dang 'dra ste bag chags sreg/ rlan pa chu dang 'dra ste dag par byed// g.yo ba rlung dang 'dra ste 'thor par byed// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ste re ba skong// gcan gzan seng ge gzhin te zil gyis gnon// gzhung du bsrungs na rang snang 'bras bur 'char// rgyun tu bsrings na sangs rgyas sa la spyod// de la sogs te yon tan bsam mi khyab// nyams par 'gyur bas mi 'grub ste// dngos su nyams na ljon shing mes tshig 'dra// zur gyis nyams na sa bon mes nyams 'dra// kun tu nyams na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// de yis bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub ste// slar la rang sems rlag pa dang// 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong ba dang// 'jig rten sgro dang skur ba'i gzhi// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis// skad cig tsam yang smra mi bya// smras na dam bca' 'bras bu brlag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor de// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang du blangs te bsgral bar bya// bsgral ba zhi ba'i mchog yin no/ zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag pos/ dam tshig gsang ba'i bkod pa mdor gsungs shing bstan to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig rim par phye ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang nyid las mi gzhan pa'i rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa des/ he ru ka dpal la yang gsol ba ni// gdug byed rU tra la sogs pa'i// tshe dang gzi byin kun phrogs te// khros pa'i lha tshogs tshe dang gzi byin rgyas mdzad pa'i// rol pa'i mdzad spyod e ma ngo mtshar che'o// de yi rjes spyod rnal 'byor pas// khro bo'i[(]tsha[ )]'gro ba'i tshe nyams tshe ldog tshe 'thor

ba// rjes su bsgrub na ji ltar bgyi/ zhes gsol pa'i don thugs su chud de/ bka' stsal pa ni/ tshe dbang chen po'i gnas dag ni// 'khor lo gnam la pad+ma sa// ri bo chen po rab dben dang// yod 'ong me tog rgyas pa ste// dbyibs 'dra'i sa gzhi rab tu brtag/ yang na ldong gcig ma dang mes reg dang// lung gsum mdo dang dur khrod gnas// 'bab chu chen po'i ngos su bsgrub// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang// gdon rnams zhi bar bya dang// srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bsal ba'i phyir// phyi yi gtor ma btang nas ni// rab tu gsang ste rgyan rnams bsags// dur khrod bdag po khyo shug dag/ brjid pa'i stobs kyi gnan par bya// dang po sa yi lha mo mchod// 'khor rnams kun la gtor ma sbyin// bden tshig bsgo ste gnas su btang// lto phye gzhung du brtag byas nas// brkos la sa yi ro lnga bsal// shin tu 'jam la snum pa'i sa// 'thas par legs pa nyid du bya// khru gang gyen du 'phags pa yi// chur ni gru bzhi nyid du bya// bkra shis ras bal skud pa la// shin tu gsar zhing mdzes pa ye// mkhas pas rab tu thogs nas ni// thig gi cha ni rnam par dbye// byang chub sems kyi thig le bya// lha rnams spyan drangs bsam mchod bstod// phyag 'tshal sta gon gnas gsol gdab// bkra shis pa yi rgyu yin no// khrus byas phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab// srung skud tshems shing kha dag bya// ku sha'i stan 'dug ltas brtag ste// rtags kyi tshad rnams gces par bshad// rin chen sna lnga'am dri zhim shing// yang na sa las byas pa yi// bum ba'i mchog nyid mdzes par bya// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka'i// tshe yi ye shes khyad par las// pad+ma 'dus pa spyan sngar te// rdo rje 'dus pa nub phyogs su// gzhan rnams go rim bzhin du bsam// gzhan yang 'byung lnga'i snying po lnga// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang/ spos lnga la sogs mgul chings gzungs// kha mngar skyur rlan snum pos dgang// tshe 'dzin mchog dang zas kyis brgyan// rgyan dang mchod pa bye brag sogs// bu mo gzhon nus bkal tshon skud// gos rgyan mdzes pa yid 'ong gzungs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod par ldan// thig gi cho ga rim par bya// kha dog lnga yis mtshan par bya// cho ga bzhin du rgyas byas la// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin du// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// b+ha ga he yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje'i brag gis rnam par gtams// dbang gi zla gam nyi shu gcig/ chu skyes pad+ma pa tras brgyan// zla gam yum gi ngo bo la// yab rnams thabs kyi phyag rgya ru// sku gsung thugs nyid gang rung dgos// spyan sngar pad+ma 'dus pa ste// phyogs cha bzhi la rigs bzhi'o// sgo bzhi dag tu sgo srung dgod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa ni// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa

bkram// lta ba spyod pa mthar phyin pa'i// lung dang man ngag tshad mas brgyan// dad pa mi ldog dam tshig gnas// byang chub sems la rab gzhol cing// byams dang snying rje ldan pas bsgrub// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog rtog las 'das// 'di ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// de yi che ba'i byin rlab las// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// bu mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// smel pa can gyi mthu chen gyis// rnam gsum dag tu nan tan bya// rin chen la sogs bum pa la// dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhis bkug la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'i mchog/ lus ngag yid la bstim par bya// nr-i nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yis// tshe bzhag gnas ni de bzhin no// yang nas yang du dgug byas nas// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang// dbyings su yang ni spa bar bya// rdo rje cho gas bsrung ba ni// brtan cing 'khor los gdab par bya// snying po 'byung lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang// za ma tog dang rin chen dang// bum pa bzang la sogs pa yis// gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba'o// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyis khro bo ste// phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus thul bar bya'o// tshe dpag med pa'i dbang du bsgrub// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang// tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub chen po// thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel mo// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'gyur// phyag na rin chen gang ba yi// phyag rgya sna tshogs ci yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// gsang ba'i 'gro drug thams cad la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin na// de las phan pa'i nus mthu med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen ni// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags bzlas cho ga bar mi gcad// 'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya// A+oM A+oM A+oM A+oM A+oM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ aM aM aM aM aM/ swa swa swa swa swa/ hA hA hA hA hA/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ bA bA bA bA bA/ dzrA dzrA dzrA dzrA dzrA/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu yu/ shA+e shA+e shA+e shA+e shA+e/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ A A A A A/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs

kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro drug tshe rnams dbang du sdud// gshol dang gtun shing phyag rgya yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug nas// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te// dbang drag chen po la sogs pa'i// bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i tshe drag tu dgug par bya'o// 'khor lo'i 'bru la bstim par bya// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga ste// nr-i yi gnas lngar bstim par bya// A+oM AMHhU~M/ badzra kA bA ga tsa/ badzra ra ga hU~M/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta nr-i/ ta ya a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bru lnga spos lnga snying po lnga// gsang mkha' rab ldan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma nyams gsang sngags bsgom// rgyan cha lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pas sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par bya// gdod nas byang chub snying po la// rnam rtog las kyis 'khor ba rnams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug thabs mkhas pas// 'khor ba'i dra ba bkral nas ni// yab yum gnyis med mkha' la bsgral// sgrub pa po yi las su ni// brtul zhugs bskyed de sbyor sgrol brtsam// de dag sngags kyi dam tshig ste// ming gis mi bya mi rung ngo// gal te byas na ltung bar 'gyur// ma byas na yang ltung bar 'gyur// rab brtags bsgom ste bya bar gsungs// rab bskyed spyan drangs mchod byas nas// bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin brtson par bya'o// 'bum mam sum 'bum bzlas nas ni// ma btab bzhin du las rnams 'grub// bsgrub pa'i bar chad byed pa dag/ nyin mtshan gung la rab bkug ste// gzugs la phab ste bcings la bzhag/ ting 'dzin bsar te rab tu gdab// mgo dang tsit+ta lte ba la// gsang gnas yan lag bzhi la gdab// bden pa bdar zhing yang nas yang// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// bcu gnyis sam ni rtsa gcig gis// sked nas bskor la gnad du brdeg/ gnan cing gzir ba'am de bzhin te// de nas tshe yi dngos grub dag/ nges pa nyid du blang bar bya// bde gshegs mtshan brjod bkra shis gsol// rol mo yid 'ong mnyes mchod 'bul// gtor ma tshogs gsum gnas su dgye// bsdu dang bsrung ba de bzhin te// rigs ma bsnub par bskyed par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gzi byin tshe gsang bar [(]7[)]

bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems can po// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bde gshegs rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// drang ba'i don du kun rdzob don bstan nas// nges pa'i don du byang chub sems rtogs bzhin// phyi rabs don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes bya bas ni// gsol ba'i don bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs chud do/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid la cung zhig mnyam par bzhag ste/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// don dam byang chub sems kyi don zhus pa ya mtshan che'o// byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni// thams cad kun gyi rgyu 'bras te// rgyu las 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir// kun rdzob don bstan ming grib cing// 'bras bu don dang ldan pa ste// kun rdzob kun la mi gnas pas// 'bras bu don dam byang chub sems nyid sbyang bar bya'o// nges don gzod nas ma skyes rang bzhin ni// rnam par dag pa'i yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs kyi sku// rig pa'i rgyal po rang byung bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// thabs kyi rgyal po bdag gnas par// 'gro kun bla med gnas su bsgral// chos kun rtsa ba sems yin pas// brtags shing don du rang sems bzang// sems nyid rtsa ba'i don rtogs shing// 'gyur med klong du don mnyam na// gnyis med don gsal ting 'dzin te// lus kyi bsgul bskyod phyag rgya la// spyod yul kun tu dkyil 'khor ro// byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur// phur pa byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba gdar sha bcad// byang chub sems kyi phur bu yis// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis grub// mnyam pa'i rgyal po'i rig pas gdab// phur pa chos nyid dbyings kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa des// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med de// gnyis med ma bcos chos dbyings la// rang rig byang chub sems kyis gdab// phur bu 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das// ma rtogs gzung 'dzin dngos dang bral// dngos po kun bral phur pa yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// don la gnyis med mya ngan 'das// gdab dang mi gdab gnyis las 'das// phur pa skye ba med pa'i don// ma skyes gdal ba'i phur pa yis// dbyings la btab pas rig pa shar// sems la btab pas don dam rtogs// khyab gdal rang bzhin phur pa yis// snang srid kun la khyad par gdab// de ltar rtogs na thebs pa yin// mngon sum gyur na phebs pa yin// tshig las 'das na sangs

rgyas yin// grangs las 'das na brjod du med// rang bzhin phur pa'i don nyid ni// phur pa bla ma chen po yin// phur pa chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// phur ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// gnyis su med pas mya ngan 'das// phur ni thabs kyi rgyal po yin// pa ni shes rab dag pa'i don// gnyis med mnyam pas rdo rje'i sku// phur pa kun khyab nam mkha' 'dra// phur pa kun gsal nyi zla 'dra// kun la snyoms pa'i ngo bor snang// chos kyi chos nyid phur pa yin// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid phur pa yin// sems kyi sems nyid phur pa yin// phur pa rgyud kyi rgyal po yin// phur pa lung gi bla ma yin// phur pa man ngag nges pa'i don// gnyis med gsal bas bskyed pa yin// khro bo pho nyas 'jig rten gang// 'phral la gang ba ma yin te// ye nyid nas ni gang bar gnas// gsal bar byas pa skye ba yin// nyams 'og tshud na bsgral ba yin// gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin// lhangs kyis rtogs na thebs pa yin// thugs rjes zin na dam tshig yin// de lta bu yi don ldan na// 'khor ba ngan song mya ngan zlos// sdug bsngal byang chub mya ngan zlos// sems can sangs rgyas mya ngan zlos// yul ni dbyings su mya ngan zlos// mkha' yi gtun khung bde gshegs su// rig drug sems can mya ngan zlos// sems ni chos nyid mya ngan zlos// thams cad 'byung rgyu sems yin pas// sems las rang byung chos med do// sems nyid grol bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi bye brag rnam grangs bstan par zad// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin no// rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// 'dzin rtog med pa'i phur pa la// dbyibs dang kha dog mi gnas na// gzugs dang kha dog so sor grags// log rtog phy-in ci log bzhir bcings// gnyis med don du byang chub sems// 'pho 'gyur med pa phur pa'i don// mi dmigs nam mkha'i klong du bsgrub// ma nor ma bcos dbyings nyid ni// de ni rang bzhin lhun grub gnas// de la sems kyi 'bras bu ni// rgyu mchog 'bras bu yi ge hUM// gnyis med mtshon pa'i lam bzang po// srid gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum kun las 'das par bsam// de ni bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing// bcom ldan 'das dang skal ba gcig/ byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems// de ni rgyu 'bras ma bkag chos// bsgrub pa'i ye shes tshon gang ba'o// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// sku dang ldan par rab brgyan cing// khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzad// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// sku yi tshogs ni rab brgyan te// thugs la

'bar ba'i srog kyang bzhugs// dbu+u la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsrung// khro bo mang pos gzir mnan nas// yul ni rnam par sgrol ba'i thugs// srid gsum khro bor rtogs pa'i ngang// srid pa gsum yang khengs zhes bya// de nas phur pa'i byang chub sems// rang byung gzugs med kun khyab pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// khams gsum ye shes bskyed nas ni// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i rtags// phur pa ye shes khro bo la// nyi zla ri rab phur bu'i rgyan// shin tu brjid pa'i ye shes kyis// kha gting med pa'i phur pa la// khro bo'i tshogs kyis rab brgyan nas// rang byung ye shes shar ba'i phyir// khams gsum dbang du yang dag bsgrub// khams gsum gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// dag pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// tsham rngams gzi byin glog ltar 'bar// khams gsum rtsa dag bcad pa'i phyir// me dpung gsum gyis khams bsregs shing// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// spyan drang bzhugs gsol dbyer med bstim// gnyis med gsum gyis khams bsregs nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i phrin las bsgrub// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur nas// rang byung sku ru rnam dag cing// rab tu srog gi gong shar nas// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gsal// dus gcig le brgan 'bar bar ldan// snying ga lce steng spyi bo nas// yi ge 'bru gsum 'phro 'du las// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab dbang yang bskur// hU~M oM AH/ rnam par shes pa ye shes mchog/ rang byung phur bu mya ngan 'das// srog dang dbugs kyi byin brlabs ni// nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nyid las// gnyis med don gyi sku byung bas// byang chub sems kyi phur bu yis// snang srid chos dbyings ngang nyid du// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyi grub// snang srid phur bu shar ba'i phyir// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams la// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba'i phyir// yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// lag tu blangs te dril bas kyang// khams gsum snang ba'i dug rnams te// dag pa'i dbyings su sgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// phur bu'i ri rab phyag rgya ste// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung thugs// rang byung phur bur byin gyis brlab// rab tu sdug bsngal gsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje rab tu kI la ya// dngos po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// drag tu gsor dril byas nas kyang// chos sku ye shes shar ba'i phyir// sems kyi yul ni rnam bsgral te// ye shes sku yis khyab par gnas// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu// snang srid phur bur shar ba na// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// chos

dbyings thig ler shar ba'i phyir// ma lus phur pas 'debs zhes bya// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo las// rdzogs nas rang gar gsal phyir du// byang chub sems kyi khyad par gyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i phyir// khams gsum gsol bar bsgral bar bya// nyon mongs ye shes gnas gyur cing// srid gsum dbyings su bsgral bar bya// de nas a las rnam dag pa'i// srid pa gsum du gsal 'tsher nas// bdag dang phur bu byang chub sems// sems can lus la bstim byas te// spros shing bsdus pas khrus byas te// 'khor ba gsum ni mya ngan 'das// de nas yum chen gnyis su med// gnyis med don gyi nges pa las// bskyed pa med pa'i ri rab kyis// dmigs pa med pa'i chos dbyings las// mkha' yi gtun khung bde gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings nyid du// g.yos pa med pa'i ye shes kyi// lha yang rung ste bsgral byas nas// srid gsum phur pas thebs zhes bya// snang srid skye 'gro phur bu'i gzugs// mtho nas gcig tu gyur pas na// ho zhes rab tu dga' ba yis// shin tu snying po 'di brjod do// hU~M rang byung mchog sems gsal phyir du// mnyam nyid rtsal gyis bdag nyid bsgral// de bzhin hU~M gis drangs nas kyang// phur bu gzi ldan thob 'gyur cing// gnyis med chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// yul de'i sems ni hU~M du snang// 'od dang 'od zair phur bu las// bdag la 'dus pas tshe ru thim// de gnyis med kyis bsgral phyir ro// bdag gi rnam shes tshogs brgyad nas// gang zhig gnas pa'i mchog rnams la// rdo rje phur bu mang shar nas// de yi tshogs brgyad dag par bya'o// khams gsum chos nyid gdar bcad phyir// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i tho tshogs kyis// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar 'gyur// rtog 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug des// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos spags par bsgral// shin tu gsol pas dgyes bstar nas// za byed kun la bstab par mdzod// ha ha bgyis pas dgyes par rol// hU~M hU~M bgyis pas dbang du sdud// kha kha bgyis pas lhag ma bzhis// bdag dang gsum du ldan nas kyang// byang chub sems kyi dbang spros pas// phung po rdul du rlogs nas kyang// sha khrag khams gsum dag par dmigs// hU~M gis rab tu nam mkha' gang// phaT kyis kun tu gtor byas nas// rdo rje ye shes tshon gang gis// khams gsum byang chub sems bskyed dang// 'gro ba ma lus don bya'i phyir// srid pa'i gdar sha bcad nas kyang// spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// ljang gu las kyi sa bon te// dmar po srog gi sa bon yin// mthing ga he ru ka yi thugs// spros

pas thig les nam mkha' khyab// thams cad 'dus pas shin tu brjid// grub na sems kyi phung po tshol// khams gsum dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bsgral ba'i phyir// srid pa'i gdar sha bcad nas kyang// spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// byang chub sems kyi gol sa bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jig mtha' med// de ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das la rtag pa'o// sgrib pa med pas mthar phyin te// btsal du med pas ye nas grub// bsam pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// 'dzin dang rtogs pa rnam sangs nas// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// lhan ne bar yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyal// mi nub pa yi rtags bcas shing// rdo rje sems dpa'i mkha' la nub// nub mtha' med pas shin tu spangs// yid ni chos nyid mya ngan 'das// rnam shes hU~M du mya ngan 'das// hU~M nyid byang chub sems kyi gzhi// byang chub sems ni phur pa ru// srid gsum ma lus mya ngan 'das// phyi nang gsang bas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad// mthar thug pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin phur pas lhun gyis grub par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phur bu byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las dang lus kyi dbang btsan nas// tshe yi dus byas las kyis lus sems bral 'gyur na// lus sems gnas sbyang dge ba'i stongs ni gang// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa ni// lus sems gnas sbyang dge ba'i stongs bya na// gang zhig lus sems bral 'gyur na// zhag grangs gzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad du// las 'di byas na stongs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor rtsal shugs ldan pa yis// snod ni gzhal yas bcud ni lha// dngos snang sku+u la sgra grag gsung// rang bzhin med pa thugs yin te// sku gsung thugs su gsal ba dang// de yi byin rlab sprul pa yis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bkang nas// a nr-i su tri pre du dzas// rgyud drug gang na gnas kyang sems drangs la// gsal bar thugs rjes lus la bstim// de bzhin yang du yang du bya// rnam rtog lus su+u gsal ba des// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// phyag 'tshal gsol btab 'jug par bya// dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs rnams kun// g+ha na sbyor ba'i gzi byin rnams// drang don de la rab bstim rnam rtog lus gnas sbyangs te// gser zhun bzhin du sems gnas pa// nyi zla pad+ma'i dbus dmigs te// spar dang 'phang ba'i sngags brjod de// yab rnams thugs bskul rdo rje'i lam byung

ste// yum rnams gsang ba'i dbyings su 'khyil// de las phyogs bcur rab 'phros pas// dus gsum bde gshegasas yab yum rnams// bskul ba'i rang bzhin thugs chud nas// g+ha na chen po'i sbyor ba mdzad// sbyor ba'i 'od zer tshur 'dus pas// gsang ba'i byang chub sems dbang bskur// de nas lha rnams tshang ba'i bstod bsngags kyi don brjod de// ma spar bzlog ste brjod pas ni// lha rnams kun gyis gsang dbang bskur// de nas bsdu ba'i sa bon gyis// gtso bo nyid kyi thugs kar bsdus// rdo rje lam drangs pad+mo'i dkyil// dbyings nas yi ge phyag rgya'i skur gsal te// de la phan pa'i dbang rnams kyis// bcu drug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar// sku yi cha rkyen rdzogs par bskang// de ni sems sbyang rim par bshad// de yi lus la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gsal// brtul zhugs phyag tshang ging chen gyis// ro ni rab tu gshig gyur na// gang nas sha rus khrag bcas kun// dum bu dum bur gtub nas ni// don rtogs lha yi tshogs la 'bul// dang po gzhung ldan gnas su ni// gzugs brnyan dam pa mngon bzhengs la// las kyi rim pa rdzogs pa dang// khro bo rol pa'i stangs stabs dang// khro mo gsang ba'i gar tshogs dang// phra men mgo brnyan 'dzin tshul gyis// ro de nyid ni blang bar bya// chu mchog dag gis bkrus nas ni// dri yis byug ste ras kyis gril// de la lha yi snying po dgod// sreg khang rim pa bzhi brtsegs te// dang po bam dbyibs gnyis pa e// gsum pa yA gzugs bzhi pa mA// dang po las kyi nyon mongs zhi bar bya// gnyis pa las kyi gshed lcags drag pos bsgral// gsum pa las kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste// dbang rnams rdzogs par ro la bskur// bzhi pa zhi khro'i lha rnams kun// de yi sku la rgyas bar bsam// me nyid zhal gyi ngo bo yi// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// bstod de 'dod yon gsol ba gdab// yang na 'byung ba me nyid la// dam tshig me lha bskye?d nas ni// ye shes me lha spyan drangs mtshon// de nyid gzhal yas nang du lha// ngas bsam spyan drangs bzhugs gsol mchod// de nas ro de rab bshig nas// lha rnams kun la bstod mchod 'bul// de bzhin lus kyi gnas 'byongs nas// sems nyid sbyong ba gong ma bzhin// yang na dkyil 'khor mngon bzhengs nas// lha rnams kun gyi gang gnas su// ro bshig dur khrod rdzas su dbul// lha rnams spyang drang mchod bstod bskul// snying po byin dus rnal 'byor rol// des ni dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// de nas las rnams rdzogs par bya// sems gnas dkyil 'khor drug tu ldan// ngan song sbyong dang mtshams dang ni// gsal ba'am snying po sbyor dang sgrol// dbang

la sogs pa drug tu bya// de ltar las rnams ci byed kyang// tsit+ta rtsa lag yab yum dang// sgo lnga'i rnam shes yul bcas pas/ sras mchog khro bo yab yum mo// spyi gtsug gnas bzhi hU~M mdzad 'khor// dpral ba'i mtsho bzhi rnam rgyal 'khor// lag g.yas lha bzhi dbyung sngon 'khor// chags byed srid bzhi gshin rje 'khor// rkang g.yas lhu bzhi mi g.yo 'khor// gsang ba'i gnas bzhi rta mgrin 'khor// rkang g.yon lhu gzhi gzhan gyis mi thub 'khor// thugs kar gnas bzhi bdud rtsi 'khor// lag g.yon lhu bzhi khams gsum bskor// snam khung gnas bzhi stobs chen 'khor// yan lag sde bzhi sgo ma bzhi// de las sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun// dam la btags pa'i dam can skong// yang na rtsa ba'i rim pa la// yang na nyon mongs rim pa la'o// de ltar las kyi stangs byas na// lus sems bral ba'i gang zag de// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas// mngon sangs rgyas la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po dang// gang zag gang yang tshe'i dus byas nas/ dge ba'i las kyi stangs gdab pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bde gshegs rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gi bdag/ blang dor med pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// drag po nyon mongs la zhen pa'i// zag bcas longs spyod rnam lnga po// zag med bdud rtsir rol pa dang// thugs rje gsal gyi mdzad spyod kyis// 'bru dang sman rnams thams cad kun// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gsos su mdzad pa'i che// rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bgyi// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol te// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gis bka' stsal pa// e ma ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// bdud rtsi'i don zhus pa ya mtshan che'o// bdud rtsi'i don nyid bshad bya na// nyon mongs pa yi bdud nyid la// thugs rje chen po'i rtsi btang na// khyab pa'i thugs rje chen po yis// dbyings su 'khyil ba'i bdud rtsi'i don nyid de la bya'o// kun rdzob rtags su bsgrub bya na// kun rdzob kyis ni bsgrub pa ste// srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang 'khor yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin snod// de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman// bcud kyi rtsa ba lo ma rnams// dbyer med ngang du bsog par bya// de la nges pa'i bsam pa yis// nges pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// mi phyed dgu dang ldan pa yis// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// thams cad ma lus don bya phyir// bdud rtsi dam pa bsgrub par bya// rin chen ri dang sman ljongs dang// rtsi sman 'khrungs

pa'i sa phyogs sam// nags tshal dra bas gtibs pa'am// yid 'ong me tog rgyas par bsgrub// 'khor du bya ba'i rim pa yang// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yis// nyi shu'am bcu'am yang na nyi shu lnga// khrims dang sdom pas bcing pa min// dang por ra ba'i tshos brgyad la// der ni brtsam pa'i dus yin te// rtags kyi don nyid mthong ba'am// dus ni bcu drug nyid la don// yo byad ma lus ldan 'gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ma tshogs pas ni sgrub thag ring// de bas yo byad ldan par bya// bkra shis mchog ldan b+han+d+ha lnga// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtsa brgyad stong// dbang po ra sA ya na kun// so so'i rigs dang sdom phye la// sman gyi bsrung ma so sor bstim// dam rdzas rnams kyi rtog pa gzhom// rigs kyi kha dog dar gyis dgab// mtshan ldan bkra shis gzungs thag gdags// bkod pa brgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkon mchog dag la mchod bya yin// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs 'di tsam par// bar chad bgegs rnams bsal phyir du// phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyu 'grul bsdams// 'bar ba mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro// nyon mongs bag chags gzhom pa'i phyir// 'bum lnga'i bshags pa bya ba ste// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// khrol bu+u la ni 'khaur lo ste// gdung bzhir ka ba brgyad gtong ba'i// bzhi dang brgyad dang sgo bzhir bcas// phye ba'i dus na brgyad cha bzhi// ka ba 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen sgo bzhir bcas// gong bu'i dus na zla gam kha sprod sgo bzhir bcas// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs lnga dang ni dgu bcu gsum// gsang chen rigs gcig bsnyen pa yis// des ni khrol bu sbyangs pa ste// ye shes lnga'i 'phro 'du'i bsnyen pas phye ma sbyong// dgu pa'i sngags kyi gong bu la'o// 'phro 'du 'ju 'dul dkyil 'khor ro// bstan pa lnga la mkha' lnga'i dbyings// dung byed lnga la gsang ba'i mtshan bris la// btsag pa'i tshags snod yab yum ste// srang ni thabs dang shes rab po// btsags btags bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla gam sgo shar bstan pa la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris la// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// bdag nyid ngang rang rang bzhin gyis// lta ba'i phul du bdud rtsi lta ltangs yin// lta ba'i gdeng chen nyid la nges bzhag na// lta ba bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// dam rdzas dag la blang dor med pa dang// g+ha na dag la 'ching 'grol med pa dang/ ta na dag la skye shi med spyad pa// spyod pa bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// spyi yi dam tshig brtag par bya ba dang// khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba dang// lhag pa'i dam tshig gnas par bya ba dang// dam tshig bla med gdeng ni de ltar

bshad// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// gnan bzlog drug tu gcig tu ste// phrin las bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// phye ma khrol bu gong bu gang la yang// rtags drug mngon du byung byung du// gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin bsgrubs na// bsgrub pa bla med gdeng ni 'di ltar bshad// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mthar thug dbang// 'dod pa de la rab sbyin pa// dbang mchog bla med gdeng ni 'di ltar bshad// thun mong dang ni thun mong ma yin pa// don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dngos grub bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// bla na med pa'i gdeng brgyad kyis// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog bsgrub nas// sangs rgyas mchod cing rang zos na// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dam rdzas sman sna re re la yang// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing// byin rlab mthu byin de bzhin no// de yi nus mthu+u dpag las 'das// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog k-I la yas// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal po che// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// sbyor dang skong dang bzlog pa dang// gnan dang gzir ba'i phrin las rnams// phyi rabs don du ji ltar bstsam// kun mkhyen khyed kyis bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas// khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa ni// a ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// sems can phyi rabs gzhan don phyir// phrin las don zhus ya mtshan che// phrin las rim pa bstan pa ni// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// rmug par gyur pa'i sems can la// sna tshogs las kyis zhi bar sbyar// bkra shis bde ba'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog gzung// rdo rje 'dus par bsam bya zhing// dkar la zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bas rgyal// rin chen kha dog dkar po'am// dkar po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zlum po drug btab ste// zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs la// snying po byams pas mchod sbyin bya'o// yam shing dkar la spar ba'i me// dkar la mngar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// zhi ba'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya// dngul phye 'bras chen dkar po la// gtor ma byas te zhi bar bya// sa yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gti mug las kyis 'chel ba rnams// zhi bar gyur pa'i dbyings su rol// 'di ni zhi ba'i las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// phongs gyur pa yi sems can la// sna tshogs las kyis rgyas par bya// tsan+dan me tog nags tshal dang// nyams dga' skyed mo'i

tshal du ni// lcug phran ma yi yum mchog gzung// rin chen 'dus pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// ser po gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la// rin chen chu skyes dag gi brgyan// rin chen kha dog ser po'am// ser po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zur bzhi btab pa ste// rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs nas// byams pa'i sems kyis mchod sbyin bya// ser po'i shing las spar ba'i me// kha ba'i ro ldan ser po'i rdzas// rgyas pa'i tshul gyis sbyin bsreg bya// gser phye 'bras chan ser po la// gtor ma byas te rgyas par bya// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// nga rgyal las kyis 'chol rnams la// rgyas par gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams la// chags par gyur pa'i sems can la// dbang du bya bar rab tu gsungs// zla mtshan can nam chu gling du// sdong gcig ma yi gzungs ma gzung// pad+ma 'dus pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma mda' gzhu 'od kyis brgyan// zangs la sogs pa'i rin chen nam// dmar ba'i shing las byas pa yis// phur pa zla gam lnga btab la// dmar smug 'dra ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings phyug spyan drangs te// dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// dmar po'i shing las spar ba'i me// skyur la mngar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// dbang gi tshul du sbyin bsreg bya// zangs phye 'bras chan dmar po la// gtor ma byas te dbang du bsdus// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'dod chags las kyis 'chel ba rnams// dbang du gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di ni dbang gi las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can la// drag shul spyod pas las bya ste// rkang gcig shing ngam dur khrod du// rigs ngan sme sha mes reg gzung// las rab 'dus pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// nag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor la// gtsang thod rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// lcags la sogs pa'i rin chen nam// tsher ma'i shing las byas pa yis// phur pa zur gsum drug btab ste// mthing nag 'bar ba'i lha tshogs rnams// drag pos 'dul phyir spyan drangs te// btang snyoms khros pa'i mchod sbyin bya'o// tsher ma'i shing las spar ba'i me// drag po'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya// lcags phye 'bru nag sha khrag la// sbyar ba'i gtor ma drag shul spyad// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams// brlag par gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di ni drag po'i las su bshad// chags pa'i don du sbyor ba ste// dbang po yul la sbyor ba dang// chos can chos nyid sbyor ba dang// shes pa shes par bya ba'i yul la sbyor ba ste// chos rnams skye ba med par sbyor ba dang// chos nyid

skye ba med par sbyor ba las// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum skur bskyed de// yab yum sbyor bas khro bo khro mor bskyed// khro bo khro mo sbyor ba las// phra men mngags thabs bskyed par bya// yab yum sbyor ba las sras mchog yab yum bskyed// sgo ma bzhis sbyor ba'i brdas bskul te/ yab yum thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par sbyor ba dang// mtshan ldan bkra shis yid 'ong gzungs ma// dri rtsis skyon sbyangs gos dang rgyan phreng gdags// rnal 'byor nyid la'ang de bzhin te// rgyan gzungs gsal g.yon spel byas nas// bdag nyid lhar bsam gzungs nyid yum// bdag gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// thabs mchog nyi shu rtsa lnga bsam// yum la shes rab ma rnams bsam// rang bzhin gnas nas dgug gzhug bstim// mchod don gsol ba gdab bya ste// lcags kyus spyan drangs zhags pas 'khyud// lcags sgrog bsdams te dril bus dgyes pa bskyed// yab yum dgyes pa'i rol mo dang// lus kyi gnas rnams sprad pa ni// yum rnams chos dbyings gzhal yas su// yab rnams ye shes byang chub sems// dmigs med bde ba'i sbyor bas gtim// ma chags mnyam pa'i dgyes pa mchog/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis mi dbye bar// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// bde chen byang chub sems su mchod sbyin chen po thim byas nas// chags pa spyad kyang bla med thob par 'gyur// bka' lung gtan tshigs tshad mar mi ldan par// mtshan med gzungs btsal 'dod chags dngos spyod na// 'bras bu yul med ya ga'i gzhi dar nas// tshul chos chags pa spyod pas 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'di ni sbyor ba'i las su bshad// srog gcod phyir na sgrol ba ste// snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams dbyings nyid la// rig pa byang chub sems su snang ba ye shes te// gnyis su med pas mtshon pa mya ngan 'das// de ltar rtogs pas khams gsum thun mong dang// thun mong ma yin thugs rjes sgral ba'o// snod kyi 'jig rten shes rab gzhal yas la// bcud kyi bsdus pa'i khro bor shar// khams gsum thugs rjes thun mong du bsgral ba'o// bstan pa la gnod zhing bcu gnas nas blang phyir/ gzhung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas 'khor phur pa yo byad dus ldan te// gzugs brnyan dam pa bzhengs te ting 'dzin rig pa bsar/ rang bzhin mchod bsgrub rgyal ba'i bka' la bsten/ dmigs pa'i rten ni bcas/ dbab dbral gzir btab gtub bstang rol te/ shes pa'i gnas sbyangs nas ni/ sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar ba la// bsgral bar byas kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i bka' la ni khungs phyung/ mthu rtsal 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa mchod/ don dang mi ldan par sgrol ba'i

las byas na/ spyod rtsing khe rngams 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung// 'di ni sgrol ba'i rim par bshad// nyams pa'i phyir na bskang ba ste// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga la rten bcas nas// yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lngas dngos po dang/ mtshan ma'i bag chags sbyangs te/ phyag 'tshan 'bar ba lngas ni/ gzugs su snang ba'i bag chags sbyangs te/ dug lnga'i rten ye shes lngar bsgral nas/ rigs lnga'i thugs kyi rgyud bdud rtsi lngas dbang bskur bas/ bde bar gshegs pa sku gsum gyi ngo bor bzhugs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskang ste/ don dam pa'i bskang ba dang/ dgongs rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ rgyu mchog gi skongs gyur yang/ mtshams bcad phrin gdags me tog dor te/ mig dbye lha ngo bstan/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang// rnam shes 'byung ba dmigs pa yis// lha rnams kyi thugs dam dbyings su bskangs nas/ ka ta ri ni byin brlabs ral gri ging dbang bskur/ rgyu lnga'i sgo dgag dug lnga zhe bcad de/ rnam shes gnas spar dbang bskur mi ldog sa la dgod/ sha khrag la sogs tshogs kyi mchod par 'bul// de yi don ldan rnal 'byor pas// srog bcad bsgral bas rnam shes thugs dam bskangs// de yi don dang mi ldan pa'i// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dgongs rgyud mi gsal spyod pa'i don 'khrul nas// bskangs kyang mi skongs slar nyid 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'di ni bskang ba'i rim par bshad// yid gnyis za phyir bzlog pa ni// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// mi bde'i gnas su gting 'khyams pas// thugs rje nyi zer 'dra ba yis// lus sems sku gsung thugs su bzlog pa'o// 'di ni 'khor ba ru bzlog pa'o// mu stegs lta spyod log pa dang// nyan thos la sogs lta tshogs dman pa rnams// sngags pa lta spyod 'khrul pa rnams// lta ba spyod pa bstun te ya cha bar khrid pa ni// log dman 'khrul pa ru bzlog pa'o// byang sems sangs rgyas rgyu nyid la// nyon mongs bdud kyi rgyu byas phung po'i bdud du smin// lha yi bdud kyis bar du glags btsal nas// 'chi bdag bdud kyis bar chad byed pa'i tshe// don rig rtsal shugs ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bka' yi gzhung dang mthun pa'i rdzas bsags te// rgyu mchog mtshan ldan dag la rten bcas nas// srog brjes sems sbar sha khrag rdzas kyi bzlog/ skad cig tsam yang lus sems ma bral bde thob dge spyod de// dge spyod thabs med nams kyang 'khor ba'i rgyus bzlog nas// dge ba skad cig tsam yang sangs rgyas rgyu// dge ba'i don sad rtsa ba'i bzlog pa'o// dam med rtsal shugs mi 'chang rnal 'byor tshul spyod pas// dge don sad med gzhan gyi rigs kyi gnyer phab nas// tshig tsam bstod pas rang gi che skyes te// don du

sha lpags 'dod phyir bzlog pa byed// dman mchog mthu byin kun kyang ngas bzlog na// 'jig rten rkyen dbang can dag smos ci dgos// de skad zer zhing bzlog pa'i las byed na// mi bzlog rang gis gshed mar 'ong ste 'khor ba'i rgyu// bzlog pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bshad// gnod byed sa la gnan pa ni// don dam sems la gnod pa ni// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la// bag chags grangs rim bzhi gnas pa// phung po la gnas tshogs drug yul ma btang bar// bag chags thams cad mnan te kun gzhi ngo bor gnas// des ni don nyid don mthong ste// don dam bden pa'i mnan pa'o// gnas dang dkyil 'khor rdzas dang cho ga thabs// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// 'gog byed bgegs rnams gnan byas na// spogs pa'i thabs med de la thar dus med// kun rdzob bden pa'i gzhung du mnan pa'o// dkon mchog bden pa'i bka' la mi bden par// 'jig rten 'di yi drag po'i dbang bzung nas// mthu chen dregs pa'i lha klu'i gnas rnams su// de mchod de la las kyi mthu ltos shing// de la lhar gsol dgra bgegs gnod byed pa// de ni 'jig rten log pa'i mnan pa ste// chos 'gal ya ga'i gzhi ste de mi bya// gnan pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bshad// 'gran sems can la gzir ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes ye nas gnas pa la// bag chags nyon mongs 'gran 'dzug pa// rig pa'i ye shes bsar te chos dbyings ngang du gzir// mthar thug don gyi gzir ba'o// dpal chen 'bar ba'i cha byad kyis// 'gran sems rU tra gzir ba ni// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// 'di ni rtags kyis gzir ba'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgrub pa la// 'gran sems can gyi dgra dang bgegs// ras sam gro ga'am shing shun la// ming ngam yang na gzugs bris la// khrag 'thung thugs rtags phur pas gzir// 'di ni rdzas kyi gzir ba'o// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gdeng zhugs la// 'og tu gzhug cing kun tu gzir// 'di ni bsam sbyor kun tu gzir ba'o// gzir ba'i rim pa 'di ltar bshad// ces gsungs pa/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas bdag gzhan gyi don las byed pa las mgo mi rmongs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdag gzhan gyi don gyi phrin las rim par phye ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bde gshegs ting 'dzin mchog gi bdag/ sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bza' btung gos rgyan bya byed dang// spyod pa 'gro nyal 'dug ldang ba'i// rgyun tu ting 'dzin ji ltar lags// ting 'dzin mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste// 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// za ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// gtsang sme med par zas rnams kun// snod chen dag gi nang du bsog/ mdun du bzhag ste sems bskyed nas// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bskul ba gsum gyis dngos po spyod// byin brlab gsal btab mchod phul phrin las bcol// byin bsdu'i dngos grub yin// lhag ma byin te gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba'i don du smos lam gdab// A+oM badzra kI li kI li la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M raM hU~M yaM hU~M khaM/ b+h+rUM b+han+d+hA ma a pa maN+Da la/ oM AHhU~M ba liM ta pu tsa hU~M/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ kro ta kro tI ha he phaT sa ma ya dzaH/ A+oM badzra dz+nyA ba ma hA pU tsa pany+tsa ba liM ta a mr-i ta rak+ta bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA ar+g+haM pra tI dza ho/ dzaHshri bAn kha raM khA hi/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ ha ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ shIn+taM puSh+tiM bA shaM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ A+oM AHhU~M/ lo ka pra ti pa na d+harmA tA sid+d+hi hUM AH/ rak+sha yak+sha ma ma b+h+yo dza pUts+tsha sa ma ya hU~M swA hA/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta dr-i sh+ya ho ya hi gats+tsha/ sa ma ya ho// dga' ldan lha yi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byor ldan longs spyod spyan 'phel rgyas// sbyin pa rtag tu longs spyod cing// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par shog/ a la la ho// btung ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// brlan dang gsher gyis bsdus pa yi// 'bru bcud dza gad la sogs btung ba la// gdeng ldan drang ba'i 'phro 'du las// ma mA ki yi ting 'dzin bsam// 'byung ba bcud ldan phyag
