rgya yis// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ pyAM mA ma ki trAM trAM/ hU~M badzra badzra/ dag pra ba ba ya nan hU~M swA hA/ bsil mngar bdud rtsi'i ror tsha ngo bor brlabs// sbom po dbang mo thabs dang shes rab kyis// rtsir gyur sman gyi 'phro 'dur gsal// lha yi tshogs la thim par mchod// A+oM AMHhU~M gis byin bsdus te// rang nyid 'thung bas sgrib byang nas// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin pheb// bgo ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// reg bya bgo ba'i bye brag rnams// 'jam dang rtsub pa gnyis med par// gsal ldan ho yi 'phro 'du yis// gan+d+he reg bya'i lhab lhub can// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya gan+d+he pany+tsa li ka pU dza ho// nad med lang tsho bde ba dang/ mtshan gyi me tog thob par 'gyur// rgyan phreng rgyan gyi ting 'dzin ni// rgyan dang bye brag thams cad la// legs dang mi legs dbyer med par// nges ldan traM gi 'phro 'du las// mA le rin chen phreng thogs ma// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ mA le rat+na pU dza sa ma ya ho/ bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa mchod// byin bsdus lhag ma bdag nyid gdags// sha bkrag gsal zhing mdangs chags dang// dpe byad 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur// bya byed rgyun gyi

ting 'dzin ni// bya dang mi bya dbyer med par// mkhyen ldan ha yi 'phro 'du las// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// byed pa po ni ye shes te// bya byed dbyings las ye shes rol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ karma d+harma dz+nyA maN+Da la/ pU dza sa ma ya ho// bya ba byed pas don dang ldan// spyod pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// spyad par bya ba'i rdzas rnams kun// nges par ting 'dzin rab gsal bas// sgrib sbyong phyir na bkol ba ste// spyad pas tshogs chen shes rab thob// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya pra dz+nyA gu h+ya pU dza sa ma ya ho// nyal ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// bying rmugs g.yengs dang 'phyo ba spangs// myos 'thib gnyid kyi dgra bcom ste// seng ge'i nyal thabs rab tu brtag/ gsal ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin de// rtag chad gol sgrib ting 'dzin mtha' spangs te// brjod med bsam med brjod bsam las 'das pas// chos dbyings bde ba chen po'i ngang du gsal// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma hA shu n+ya tA/ des ni don dam tshogs chen rdzogs// lta ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// dngos po mtshan mar ldan pa med// nges don chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// 'gag pa med pa'i sku bzhengs pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI ya la wA ka tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M// lus ngag yid gsum gyi sku gsung thugs// 'gro ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// grub ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// drang don tshad med phyir nyid 'gro ba ste// nges don dmigs med 'gro ba'i don du brtag/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya A+e baM mA yA d+harmA karma hU~M/ 'gro ba 'dul phyir gshegs pa ste// gzhan gyi don du 'gro ba bdag gi don// 'dug pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag nyid ston pa'i rang bzhin de// gang na gnas pa gnas kyi mchog/ nyer gnas 'khor ni rang bzhin khyad par 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor// brjod pa thams cad bstan pa dang// de ltar 'dzom pa dus shes bya'o// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya maN+Da la hU~M hU~M// des ni phun sum tshogs par 'dug par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas/ sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin las su rung ste// sa la smin par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin rim par bye ba'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho gsang mchog de nyid bdag/ sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid yongs su rtogs bya'i phyir// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la brten de nyid kyis// sgrib sbyang tshogs rdzogs 'bras bu rdzogs par bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dang ni maN+Dal dang// sku gzugs dang ni mchog rten dang// glegs bam dang ni phreng ba dang// rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang// mchod rdzas dang ni rol mo dang// [(]8[)]

'di rnams de nyid ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i don du thugs su chud de/ de kho na nyid bcu'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid don zhus e ma ya mtshan che'o// de nyid dam pa bstan par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// gzugs brnyan spyi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs dang ting 'dzin bsgom// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ste// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// rdul tshon kha ba bab pa bzhin// re khA gri so bsgreng ba ltar// gzhal yas khang ni tshul lam dbyibs// legs shing mdzes par bris pa ni// gzugs brnyan spyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// lha yi go bgo gnas rnams su// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma gang// bkod nas mi shes drang phyir bstan// lhag pa gzugs brnyan mngon bzhengs pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbu gnas par// ting 'dzin snying po cho ga yis// gzhal yas dam pa bsam bya ba// gnas kyi ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ro// de yi bzhugs pa'i sa gnas su// cho ga gsum mam lnga nyid kyis// lha yi rnal 'byor gdeng ldan de// nges pa nyid du bsam pa nyid// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste// ting 'dzin khyad par dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid bdal ba chen po la// rang byung ye shes 'khor gyis brgyan// dmigs par gsal yang dmigs med pa// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// khro bo'i bsam pa drang don du// 'gag pa med pa'i phyag rgya bzhengs// bde gshegs bzhugs phyag mchod sgrub pa// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor de// rang bzhin don gyis gnas pa yin// 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid do// maN+Dal de nyid brtag pa ni// dge don maN+Dal rtsom pa brtson 'grus te// 'bu srin sems can bsal ba bzod pa'i mchog/ ga dar byi dor byang chub tshul khrims de// sman dang dri yi skyang nul sbyin pa yin// me tog phud bu bkod pa shes rab bo// de nyid lha ru bsam pa bsam gtan te// spyan drang bzhugs phyag mchod bskor thabs su shes// sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te stobs// de yi 'bras bu thob pa ye shes so// 'gro ba'i don du shes pa smon lam nyid// maN+Dal don gyis pha rol phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur// de phyir maN+Dal de nyid don la brtson par 'bad// sku gzugs kyi de kho na nyid ni// zangs lcags gser dngul la sogs pa// bzhu nas lugs su blugs kyang rung// dur khrod tshon rtsi rnam lnga yis// khang bu'i logs sam thang ka la// thabs la mkhas pas bris pa'am// ra dang ba so sa rdo shing// kun la 'bur du btad pa ste// mkhan po gang yang shes rab

ldan 'gyur par// legs shing dod la tshad dang ldan par bya// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs nyid la// nges pa'i ting 'dzin rtse gcig tu// yang dag par ni bsam byas nas// sku byis sku khrus gsol ba dang// dbu bshad snyan spabs bsal te spyan dbye shangs sdu btog/ tshem 'dru ljags bzhar nas// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang bstim phyag mchod de bsgrub byas nas// bkur 'os mchod 'os phyag bya'i gnas// 'khor ba ma stongs bar du+u na// zhal bsro bkra shis dbang bskur mnga' gsol nas// sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten du de nyid bya'o// mchod rten kyi de kho na nyid ni/ dang por dad ldan rnal 'byor don spyod pas// gzugs brnyan mchod rten mngon bzhengs na// sngags mkhan rab kyi blo ldan pas// rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya ba ni// 'og gi 'gram bting dge ba bcu// bang rim dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi// gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po bzhi// bum rten snang ba'i dbang po lnga// bum pa byang chub lan lag bdun// srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yin te// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsum// char khebs skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de// bya ru thabs dang shes rab la// tog ni mi dmigs chos kyi sku// dril bu chos nyid stong pa'i sgra// dar 'phyangs 'khor ba'i thabs las 'das// rgyu 'bras chos las grub pa'i sku mchog la// sku phyi sku khrus gsol te gzhal yas bsam// de nyid ma nor bsam pa'i gzhal yas su// sku gsung ngo bo gang yang rung ba'am// 'di ni sprul pa'i sku nyid de// spyan drang bstim mchod don gsol gdab// phyi mtha' mu yi bar du'am// 'khor ba mtha' brlags bar du ni// sku gdung mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// glegs bam de nyid bstan pa ni// glegs bam thabs dang shes rab la// shog bu theg pa'i sa gzhi ste// zhi gnas lhag mthong zhing ni rgyags// dbyings dang ye shes kha rgyags gnyis// thig ni ma nor bden pa'i lam// dmigs skor chos dbyings spros dang bral// snyug gu rig pa'i ye shes te// byang chub sems rtags snag tsha yis// yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya bri// byed pa po ni dam tshig can// legs shing tshad dang ldan byas nas// sngags mkhan dam tshig blo can gyis// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas de// gsung gi de nyid byin bsdus nas// glegs bam nyid la bstim par bya// de nyid 'jig rten ma stongs par// gnas par byas te zhal bsros la// de yi don bsgrags chos kyi char phab pas// 'gro ba'i shes bkrol bde gshegs gsungs brnyes te// glegs bam de nyid dus gsum mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// bgrang phreng de nyid bstan pa ni// rag sha'am ni rang su

yis// yang na gdug pa'i tsher ma'i shing// phreng ba chen po brgyad nyid ni// ba su ta'am rgyus chen la// dgu sgril dag tu byas nas ni// brgyus pa'i mdo la bsnyen phur gdags// mthe bong mthe chung gnyis kyis bgrang// bdag nyid mi phyed dpal yin te// phur pa sras mchog kI la ya// phreng ba yi ge bcu dgu ste// phreng thag dbugs kyi rta nyid do// phar 'gro ba dang tshur 'dus pa// mgal me klad la bskor ba'am// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa'am// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'gro tshur 'du rgyun mi gcad// bgrang phreng de nyid don la gnas par bya// rdo rje'i de nyid bstan pa ni// gnam lcags thog gi lcags dag gam// phal pa'i lcags ni gang rung ngam yang na// shir shing la sogs gdug pa'i shing nyid la// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni// lte ba pad+ma gnyis bskor bya// de la nges pa'i blo can gyis// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal bar bsam// lte bar dpal chen 'bar ba nyid// yar gyi rtse la sras mchog lnga// mar gyi rtse lnga gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do// yar 'bum mar 'bum steng 'og khro bo ste// pad+ma brgyad la phyogs mtshams khro bo'o// hU~M/ ye shes 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'di// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i thabs kyi sku// bde chen yab yum sku bzhugs pa// dgyes pa mchog gi phrin las mdzad du gsol// rdo rje'i de nyid rab tu gnas par brtag/ dril bu'i de nyid bstan pa ni// 'khar ba dang ni ljon dmar la// dril bu tshang dang ldan par bya// rnal 'byor nges pa'i blo can gyis// de nyid shes rab rig pa'i gzhal yas khang// rnal 'byor khro mo'i dkyil 'khor dgod// lte ba zlum po 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// rwa lnga rgyas 'debs yum lnga ste// lung ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid yin/ spyi yi rtse dang lce la ni// steng 'og khro mo rnam par bsam// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po la// phyogs mtshams khro mo rnam par bsams// rang bzhin shes rab khro tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyug sbyugs pas spyan drangs nas// shes rab ma la bstim mchod bsgrub// de yi sgra bsgrags dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes// 'khor ba'i sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// hU~M/ shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin de// chos nyid stong pa chen po'i sgras// 'khor ba'i bag chags zil gyis gnon// dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang mnyes// dril bu'i de nyid mchog tu bshad// mchod rdzas de nyid bstan pa na// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas gang la yang// dbul gnas 'bul byed dbul ba'i rdzas// phul bas sgrib pa gang dag 'bras bu gang thob dang// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang// 'di brgyad ldan pa mchod pa'i de nyid don// mchod pa de nyid don la brtson pas 'bad par bya'o// rol mo'i de nyid bstan pa ni// rtse 'jo byed spyod la sogs dang// bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang// ba dan dar

gyi lda ldi dang// bro gar glu tshogs la sogs dang// 'bud dang brdung dang gsil dkrol brdab pa dang// sdug mdzes mi sdug 'jigs pa'i bye brag rnams// tha dad sna tshogs dbul ba yang// nam mkha' skye ba med pa las// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba yang// phul bas chos nyid ngang la bzhes// rol mo g.yeng ba'i rgyu yin te// mi g.yeng chos nyid glur gyur yang// rol mo'i de nyid don dam rtogs pa'o// de nyid bcu yi don dam gang rtogs pa// rnal 'byor de ni shes rab can// mi zhes bya ba bder gshegs yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// de kho na nyid bcu'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu tham pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// dam chos gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// bar chad sku dgra byung gyur na// gzhan nyid skrag par bya ba'i phyir// thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang// mi nad phyugs nad rgyun mi 'chad par btang ba dang// smyo ba dang ni 'bog pa dang// myos pa dang ni rgyug pa dang// 'thab tu gzhug dang bskrad 'gyur na// thabs dang rim pa ji ltar lags// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ gsol ba thugs su chud nas/ gzhan skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de la thog dbab par 'dod pas/ lcags sna lnga la drag po'i phur pa byas te// klu nag po'i gnas su dkyil 'khor nag po gru gsum byas la// 'bras kyi zan la klu nag po'i gzugs byas la/ klu yi rgyal po dgug gzhug bstims nas/ phur pa rdo rje 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ klu'i rgyal po de la btab nas klu gnad la bor nas thog dus su phebs par 'gyur ro// ser ba dbab par 'dod pas/ shir shing nag po la phur pa byas te/ 'bras ser po'i zan la khyab 'jug gza'i rgyal po'i gzugs byas la/ bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyi gdeng dang ldan par byas la/ lce pog nag po'i dud pas bdug cing// khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su// khyab 'jug nyid gzugs la phab ste/ phur pas btab nas gnad la phab na// ser ba dus bzhin du phebs par 'gyur ro// mi nad gtong bar 'dod pas// mi gang rims kyis shi ba'i mchog phur g.yas thogs la/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor zla gam dmar por byas te/ rims kyis shi ba'i ro ras la bram ze nag mo'i mngal khrag gis ming rus bris te/ zi ra nag po'i dud pas bdug ste/ dgra bgegs bkug la bstims nas/ pad+ma 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ phur pas btab nas dgra bo'i sa la sar sbas na mi nad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// phyugs nad gtong bar 'dod pas// seng ldeng gi phur pa thogs te phyugs nad

kyis shi ba'i snying khrag gis ma he 'am/ rta mchog gi pags pa la/ phyugs nor gyi ming bris nas phur pa btab ste// phyugs lhas sam bres su btab na/ phyugs nad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// smyo bar 'dod pas bram ze'i mchog phur g.yas pa thogs la/ nags tshal chen po'i gnas su dkyil 'khor chen po ser po gru bzhi pa gcig tu byas te/ rtsa kun ma'i lo ma la gzugs byas la/ d+ha du ra yi du bas bdug ste/ gzugs la phan nas phur pas lce la btab ste// yi dwags gnas pa'i sar mnan na// mi de smyo bar 'gyur ro// myos 'bog par 'dod na/ gser shing ngam skyer pa'i phur pa thogs te/ ras sam gro ga la a gar gyi khu bas ming rus bris la/ gong ma bzhin las byas pas 'byung po gnas pa'i sar sbas na mi de 'bog par 'gyur ro// myos par bya ba 'dod pas rgyal rigs kyi mchog phur g.yas pa thogs te/ ri bo 'dus pa'i rtser dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po byas te/ dug shing gi lo ma la gzugs byas te// tsan+dan dkar po'i thang chus ming bris te/ mi tshil gyi du bas bdug ste// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas nas/ gzugs la phab na/ spyi gtsug tu phur pas btab nas/ ma mo'i gnas su sbas na/ mi de shin tu yang myos par 'gyur ro// lkugs par 'dod pas/ shug pa'am 'jag gi phur pa thogs te/ gro ga'am shing shun la sngags lkugs nas shi ba'i klad khrag gis ming bris te/ gong bzhin du phur pas lce la btab nas/ sa bdag gnas pa'i sar sbas na// mi de shin tu yang lkugs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'thab par 'dod pas ni// dmangs rigs kyi phur pa g.yon pa thogs la/ shing rkang gcig gi gnas su/ dkyil 'khor nag po gru gsum byas te// 'ug pa'i pags pa la/ bya rog gi khrag gis kho dang mdza' ba'i ming bris te// sbrul dang smig pa lto sbyar ba'i bar du bcug la// tshon skud kyis bcings nas/ rdo sol nag po'i mes bsros te// las rab 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/ ming byang gnyis kyi bar du phur pas btab la// dur khrod kyi shing ring sa la btags la/ rlung chen po la phyar na// mdza' bo dang 'thab par 'gyur ro// bskrad par 'dod pas/ rma shing gi phur pa thogs te/ rlung gi rnga mo'i pags pa la rak+tas ming dang/ rus yul khyim gyi ming bris la/ gong bzhin du las byas te// khyim gyi rtsigs rmang du sbas na/ mi de yul dbyung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan skrag pa las kyi rim pa 'di ni// las dang po pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin las su rung zhing rtags mthong drod tshad zin pa rnams kyis ni/ gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gzhan skrag par byed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de

nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa yis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal/ rdo rje phur pa'i don bsgrub pa'i tshe/ bdug dang thugs skul chags pa rab bskyed phyir// nyung dkar rgyal dang gu gul sbyar dang rak+ta bsgrub// rdzas su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid de// de yi thabs ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyung dkar rgyal po sgrub 'dod pas// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// ya lag med pa'i b+han+d+ha bshams// maN+Dal gru gsum skyang nul bya'o// gu gul chu yi khyad par sbyar// yab yum dri chen dur khrod sa// khrag chen bcas pa sa bon bsres// thabs dang shes rab chus bran te// mthing nag dar gyis kha bkab nas// maN+Dal dbus su de bzhag nas// mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor 'bad// b+han+d+ha khang pa sa bon lha/ bskyed dang spyan drangs rim par mchod// mtheb mdzub nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// khro bo sngo nag mtshon cha 'dzin// thugs las 'thon zhing bskur brlabs nas// gsang sngags 'di nyid 'bum du bzlas// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya bai tA \u0f84li kro tI maN+Da la rak+sha rak+sha hU~M phaT/ ces bzlas te/ byug 'dug dus drug tshang bar bya// bar chad bgegs rnams drag tu bskrad// sa bon kha 'bus myu gu 'khrungs pa dang// sgrub po'i g.yas su nye ba yis// gnas su gru gsum thur du brko// sa yi ro lnga bsal ba yi// dbyar zla ra ba'i nya la ni// bzang po'i mtshams su b+han d+ha sba'o// zla ba ngo drug bar du ni// gsal gdab bzlas brjod bar mi gcad// ston zla tha chung nya la brda'o// rul dang bam sums ma shor bar// nyi grib mtshams su+u legs bskams na// grub pa'i 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// dgun zla ra ba'i nya la zhal bsro dngos grub blang// de yis bder gshegs thugs bskul zhing// sdang dgra gdon bgegs rdul du rlogs// rnal 'byor lus sems mgul du gdags// rtag tu lus la bcangs pa las// g.yel bar byas na mi rung ngo// gu gul sbyar bar 'dod pa yis// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la 'jug/ maN+Dal gru bzhi gcig byas la// ba glang lcags kyi b+han d+ha bshams// rwa mig nya mgo skra spu'i gzhob// khyi spyang phag gi dri chen dkar// skye sne 'u yi 'bras bur dug gi lceb// zi ra d+ha dur lce pog mu ze khrag chen dang// 'khril shing dri spos puSh+pa me tog thang chu dang// 'ug mig khrag klad sbrang rtsi ske tse gcan gzan sder mo rnams// nges par bsags te cha snyoms la// ra phod lug phod pong reng byang chub sems kyis bran// tshon gyi skud pas dam bcings la// kha ral ma yi zhabs nas gril// tsan+dan me la dros tshad bsro// maN+Dal dbus su de bzhag la// ba su ta yi

gzungs thag gdags// bdag gtso lha mo pe ta li// bsam gtan gsal bar rab zhugs te// pe ta drag mo 'khor lo can// nyi ma hU~M dang ldan pa la// spyan drang bstims mchod rim par bya// de nas bsnyen pa 'di bzlas te// ma grub bar du rgyun mi gcad// A+oM badzra kI li kI ya la d+hu pe pe tA li ma gu la rta la rta la pra rta la hU~M phaT/ dal med rgyun du bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin 'dris shing 'phro 'du gsal ba dang// 'od dang dri dang du ba 'byung// yang na grod drod cha gzung ste// rtags byung nas ni nges bsam ste// lha mchod de thig le bya// des ni gzi byin thob par byed// lus la bcangs na gdon bgegs 'joms// dud btang dgra la bdug gyur na// lha dang rgyab brten 'bral bar 'gyur// rtags rnams mngon du byung nas ni// rul dang sums dang ma bam par// ri lu byas te rnal 'byor bcad// gu gul sbyar ba'i rdzas su gsungs// rak+ta sgrub par 'dod pa yis// chu gling gnas su 'dug nas ni// maN+Dal dmar po zla gam bya// dgun zla ra ba'i nya la 'jug/ pad+ma can gyi b+han d+ha ru// gzhi'i rak+ta dang/ rigs kyi rak+ta dang/ sgrol ba'i rak+ta dang/ me tog gi rak+ta lnga dang/ rtsi'i rak+ta lnga dang/ 'bras bu'i rak+ta lnga dang/ shing gi rak+ta lnga dang/ chu yi rak+ta lnga dang/ rak+ta sum cu so gsum bsog/ de la sbyor ba'i rak+tas bran/ le brgan dar gyis kha bkab nas// seng ldeng me la dros bsros nas// maN+Dal dbus su de bzhag ste// bdag gsal chags pa'i dbang can bsam// dgug bstim mnyes nas bsnyen pa bya// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma hA rak+ta rA ga sa ma ya pU dza hU~M phaT/ ces ni 'bum mam bye ba bzlas/ mngon du khol lam rlangs pa phyur// yang na lud dam 'phags gas nas// lha la mchod de bdag nyid btung// chags pa skyes kyin mdangs kyang dmar// khams gsum mo yis pad+ma'i mdangs// chags skyes nas ni 'bul du 'ong// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byug brdeg bdug pa'i rdzas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye ma ho// bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud 'di nyid bdag cag la sogs pa ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ de la rnal 'byor du bgyi ba'i gang zag dam pa de la ji ltar blta bar bgyi// ma dad cing skur ba'i nyes pa ni gang/ sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang// gang gi ring la bshad/ de ltar gyi bstan pa 'di nyid la/ srid pa gsum la dad pa can gang gi ring la dar bar 'gyur/ phyi'i dus na sangs rgyas gang gi ring la ston par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan cing bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa ni/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal

po/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po'o// lung thams cad kyi spyi bo/ man ngag thams cad kyi 'byung khungs so// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse'o// spyod pa thams cad kyi lam mo// dam tshig can gyi srung gnas so// phrin las thams cad kyi rim pa'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ngo bo yin te// 'on tang na rdo rje 'dus pa chen po// dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mtshungs so// 'on tang na gsang ba'i yi ge 'di/ gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de na ni/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po nga nyid gnas par shes par bya'o// gnas 'khor de nyid na 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa phun su tshogs par 'byung ba shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las yin parashes par bya'o// 'on tang na gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags la/ rim gro dang bkur sti dang/ mchod pa phu dud du byas te/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ bri bar bya'o/ bklag par bya'o// mnyan par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o/ mchod par bya'o/ sems par bya'o/ bsgom par bya/ bsgrub par bya/ bshad par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rdo rje 'dus pa yang rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la 'di rnal 'byor du bgyi ba'i gang zag dam pa de ni// khyed la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de sems can lta bur mi blta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta'o// rdo rje khros pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga nyid dang/ so sor ma yin tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dus pa khyed nyid dang 'dra ba ste// de bzhin du 'das pa dang da lta dang ma 'ongs pa rnams dang tshul mthun dbye ba med pa'o// yang rdo rje 'dus pa ma dad cing skur ba'i gang zag de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas par/ lung ma bstan par ma nges pa'i bsam pa can// shin tu 'joms pa'i sems kyi bla ma la bkur sti mi byed cing/ zab mo'i donal 'grib pas/ don du gnyer ba chud gson cing phyi gyis sde pa'i khar gtong ba/ sgrib pa stug cing bsam pa log pa can/ yid gnyis za zhing 'dzums pa'i bsam pa can/ de lta bu'i rna lam du/ 'gro zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur bas skur cing smod do// de yis las kyi rnam par smin pa mi bzad de// rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la ma dad cing/ skur pa'i dbang gis/ dmyal ba'i gnas na yang rdo rje mi bzad par bskal pa gsum du skyes so// de yang tshe 'phos na byol song gi gnas nas kyang/ bkol spyod can du bskal pa gsum du gnas so// de nas tshe 'phos nas yi dwags kyi nang na yang/ sgrib pa can gyi sgrib pa can du bskal pa gsum du gnas so// de nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang na mtha' 'khob sdig pa can spyod pa'i gnas su

bskal pa gsum du gnas so// de nas tshe 'phos nas lha ma yin gyi nang na yang 'thab cing rtsod pa can du bskal pa gsum du skyes so// de nas tshe 'phos nas kyang lha dbul po tshe ring po'i gnas su bskal pa gsum du skyes te/ bskal pa chen po bco brgyad du rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi dad pa'i tshul dzin cing/ de lta bu de ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ thugs rje thabs mkhas pas mdzad spyod kyis bsgral bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di 'byung ba ni shin tu yang dkon no// dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog 'jig rten du brjod pa dang mtshungs te gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ni sngon byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'od srung chen pos/ 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'i chos nyid kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i dus su/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di yang ma brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus de'i 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i theg pa 'di yi snod du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ma bshad do// sngon thog ma'i bskal pa kun bkod ces bya ba byung ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas sngon byung gi rgyal po bya ba de'i bstan pa la rgya cher bsgrags te/ nges pa'i don rgya cher spyod do// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la shin tu dad par gyur te/ rnam par grol ba'i lam chen po la bkod do// rdo rje 'dus pa chen po/ da ltar gyi bstan pa 'di nyid kyang/ lung bstan pa'i dad pa can ni/ lha'i gnas su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pas spyod pa la/ klu'i gnas su ni klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la sogs pa la/ 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs kyis lung bstan cing rgya cher grags par 'gyur la/ mi'i gnas su ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dza zhes bya ba tshogs bsags pa de la/ ri ma la ya zhes bya bar phyag na rdo rjes lung bstan cing/ des ni mi'i gnas su rgya cher spyod par 'gyur ro// de yang skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis spyod par 'gyur te/ ched 'ga' ni dar/ ched 'ga' ni nub/ ched 'ga' ni mngon du byung/ ched 'ga' ni gab cing sbas/ la las ni tshul bzhin du spyad de sngags kyi mthu stobs kyang rnyed/ phal cher 'dra tshul log par spyod pas ltung gnas su 'gyur bas/ 'gro ba la la ni dad/ la la ni ma dad ste/ dus nam zhig na snyigs ma lnga'i dus 'ong ste/ sprul pa'i skus bstan pa'i tshe na dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid/ da ste bskal pa bye ba 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa me tog bkod pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ da ltar dang tshul mthun pa zhig 'byung ste/ des gsang ba'i theg pa 'di rgya cher

ston par gyur ro// sangs rgyas gzhan gang gis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ston par mi 'gyur te// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i 'di nyid kyi snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// rdo rje 'dus pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcangs shing bskur ba'i skyon yon dang/ dus gsum kyi sangs rgyas gang gis dus gang la gsungs pa zhus lan du bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs dang/ 'jig rten pa'i chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ mchod pa dus mas ni mngon par mchod cing lan stong du brkyang phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ e ma ho/ bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bdag gzhan gnyis kyi dpal mnga' zhing// phyin ci log bzhi spangs pas khyab par mthu byin che// gzung 'dzin rnam spangs ma g.yos rdo rje de// don rtogs drang don nges pa'i don khros pa'i sku gsung thugs// ston pa'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma ho/ dgyes pa chen po yum gyi mkha' klong nas// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par sbyor// gnyis med theg le byang chub dag pa'i sku// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// bka' yi 'khor lo gsang ba'i 'khor la bstod// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi thugs// mi nub chos srog dbang po 'dzin byed pa// smra ba'i seng ge zhu ba'i spobs par ldan// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje nyid la 'dus// rdo rje 'dus pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma ho// sku gsung thugs klong gsung gi chos mchog bdud rtsi che dang mtshungs// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kun gyi mdzod du bzhugs// 'das dang ma byon da lta rnal 'byor bgrod pa'i lam// theg pa kun las 'phags pas 'og ma zil gyis gnon// don dam bden pa'i mdzod ni dmigs pa'i sgron mar snang// bstan pa rgya mtsho'i chos la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa'i bzhugs pa'i gnas mchog khyad par can// bka' yi dam chos ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// shes rab b+ha ga dus gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas// phyi nang gsang gnas de la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa gnas 'khor dam chos 'byung ba'i dus// 'das dang ma byon da lta dang// ma nges dus na gang 'tshams pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i dus la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mngon par bstod do// de nas yang sangs rgyas 'dus pa la sogs 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje 'dus pa la bsgo ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'dus pa khyod ni/ bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ zhu ba sbobs pa dang ldan pa ste/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i phyir/ rgyud kyi don bsdu bar gsol lo// zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas rdo rje 'dus pas bskul ba'i don thugs su chud de/ gsol ba ni/ e ma

ho/ bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/ rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i rgyud kyi don nyid rab bsdus nas/ gnas shing rtogs par ji ltar bgyi/ zhes gsol pas/ 'di'i bar tshig dam snyam/ zhes bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dus pas brgyad khri bzhi stong sgo mo dang/ yan lag bcu gnyis sde snod dang/ bsdus pa'i sde snod rnam pa gsum dang/ theg pa'i bye brag bstan pa yang/ bkri ba'i don du bstan pa ste/ nges don bsdus pa rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di nyid/ khyod la sogs dang da ltar phyis 'byung yang/ lta spyod sgrub dang phrin las dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin rnams/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las gsal bas na// lam gyi nang na nye lam dang po ste// rdo rje 'dus pa khyod la gtad// gsang ba'i rgyud 'di nub par gyur ta re/ zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dus pa/ shin tu yang dga' ba'i yid g.yos nas/ rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje gnas su gsor zhing/ 'di skad ces dam bcas so// e ma ho/ bde gshegs kun gyi gtso/ kun gyi don bsdus te rdo rje gsang ba rgyud 'di la/ bdag la sogs pas da lta phyis spyod pas/ lam gyi nang na nye lam dam pa bgyis te/ gang dag blta ba la dang bas rgyud 'di'i blta ba'i lam la blta bar bgyi'o// gang dag spyod pa la dga' bas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi spyod pa'i lam la mngon par spyod par bgyi'o// gang dag sgrub pa la mos pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi sgrub pa'i lam la mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o// gang dag phrin las la gus pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi phrin las kyi lam la phrin las su bya'o// gang dag dkyil 'khor brtsam pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lam la mngon par rtogs par bya'o// gang dag dbang nod par sems pas/ rgyud 'di nyid dbang gi lam la mngon par nod do// gang dag dam tshig bsrung ba'i sems yod pas rgyud 'di'i dam tshig gi lam la mngon par dka' thub tu gnas par bya'o// gang dag ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog par 'dod pas/ rgyu 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la mngon par bsgom par bya'o// 'on tang na bdag dang phyis 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di'i chos kyi srog shing mngon par gzug go/ chos kyi rnga mngon par rdung ngo// chos kyi dung mngon par 'bud do// chos kyi char mngon par dbab po/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun 'chad med par bskor ba ste// mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen por gnas par bgyi'o// zhes dam bcas so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rtsal bsdams te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la zhugs te// mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das nyid ni dgongs pa chos kyi

dbyings la mnal lo// rgyud kyi don bsdus pa de de dag ni rin po chen po gser gyi glegs bam la baiDUr+ya zhun mas bris nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum gyis// srid pa gsum du chos kyi char mngon par bab pas/ lha dang klu dang mi'i rnal 'byor rnams/ tshom bu'i las la ma chags par rig 'dzin byang chub kyis blangs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud yongs su bzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kI la ya gu h+ya A sha ya ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ phur pa gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po badzra kI la ya drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i nang nas bzhengs nas/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba dang/ dregs pa can dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod par byed pa thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs la ma bab ste/ thabs mkhas pa'i sku drag po'i phrin las kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ sku rab tu khros pa mi bzad par bstan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs las gsang ba'i sngags 'di phyung ngo// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rab tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs bgrad pa/ spyan bzlog pa/ mche ba gtsig pa/ sku gsung thugs shin tu mi bzad pa gcig tu gyur to// rab tu mi bzad pa'i thugs ka nas// thugs ye shes kyi sa bon las/ gsang ba'i sngags 'di phyung ngo// e raM yaM khaM/ e raM yaM su keM/ b+h+rUM b+han+d+ha b+h+rUM/ zhes 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi snang ba chags shing/ ye shes kyi cho 'phrul du bsgyur to/ nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ karma shrI he ru ka zhes brjod pas/ khro bo karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag/ sku shin tu mi bzad pa 'thon to// de nas khro bo karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la badzra kI la ya 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya// dpyang thag chad pa'i ngan song 'khor ba la// thugs rje bzung nas cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di// 'di lta bu yi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che// 'di yi rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// stong pa'i don rtogs ji ltar lags// e zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// raM yaM khaM ra su keM/ b+hUM b+han+d+ha b+h+rUM/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar can/ kI la ya yis lung 'di bstan du gsol// bde bar

gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas badzra kI la yas/ karma he ru ka'i tshig gsan nas/ 'di skad bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ nga yi rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// dang po stong pa nyid du bsgom// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// thugs ni yang dag rdo rje nyid// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog rtog las 'das// de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya// de ni chos kyi sku nyid la// bzhin ni ma nor pa yang yin// nyid ni bcos su med pa'o// ma hA shU n+ya tA yis ni// rtog pa'i dngos po zil gyis gnon// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yi// sku mi mtshon pa rgyu'i ting 'dzin/ hUM nyid byang chub sems rang bzhin// raM/ raM las me yi dkyil 'khor gyis// dngos por snang ba'i sdug bsngal bsal// dngos po rtag pa ther zug bsreg/ yaM/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal ye shes rlung gis bskyod// phrin las thogs pa med pas don yang mdzad// khaM// khaM las ye shes chu yi dkyil 'khor gyis// nyo mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags ljan ljin rnams// dag pa ye shes chen po'i klong du bkru// e/ e las nam mkha'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med// bskal pa 'khrug zhig 'khor ba stongs pa ltar// chos nyid mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du bsgom// yaM// yaM las ye shes rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sra mkhregs ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyis// thams cad 'degs pa'i stobs kyis shugs dang ldan// ra/ ra las rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho ste// 'khrugs pa'i klong dkyil thugs rje chen po'i ngang// sdug bsngal dbang 'dus 'bras bu gcig tu shar bar mdzad// su/ su las gser gyi sa gzhi yis// thams cad brten cing 'degs par byed// keM/ keM las rus pa 'bar ba'i ri rab spungs pa la// rgyud drug rus pa'i phung po ri rab la// 'khor ba gnas su dag nas cho 'phrul dngos grub bstan// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bskyed par bya// b+h+rUM/ b+h+rUM las ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bla 'og khyab par ni// phyi dang nang med kha dog so sor gsal// b+han+d+hA b+h+rUM/ thod pa skam rlon ye shes dkyil 'khor la// mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// ye shes cho 'phrul rtog pa gzhil ba'i lung// dur khrod dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed par bya// b+han+da dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la hUM/ zhes pas b+han+da'i gzhal yas khang// mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la// 'bras bu lha la mngon du shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang oM badzra kI li kI ya/ dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngang las/ yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma mngon du phyung ste/ nyid kyi sku la 'khril pa'i tshul du bzhugs par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa

shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya// stong gsum ye shes gzhal yas khang// thugs rje rnam dag mun sel skyon mi gos// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du// byang chub sems kyi thigs par shar// srog sems go ru shar bas rdo rje gzhon nur shar// tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang du ye shes sems dpa'i thugs// rdo rje'i chang gzung bzlas pa'i yi ges bskor bar bsgom// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnams// thugs rje byang chub sems su bdag dang gnyis su med par bsgral// dam tshig snying rje bsgral bas bsad mnan ma yin no// bdag dang khams gsum bsgral ba'i lus ngag yid gsum ni// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung thugs su gtams// bdag dang snang srid rnam par shes pa'i tshogs// 'dus ma byas nyid rdo rje dbyer med bsgom// de nas dregs pa can thams cad gti mug gi dbang gis/ rgyu 'bras kyi don ma rtogs shing/ mtshan ma med pa'i don dang rnam par bral/ mtshan ma can la zhen cing chags pas/ ngan song gsum du bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong nas// las kyi 'bras bu smin pas// las kyi srin por skyes nas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus shin tu 'jigs shing rmongs/ sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang/ srog dang bral bar bgyid/ de'i don la thugs rjes dgongs nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHdzaHdzaH/ phaT phaT phaT/ kI la ya ti ra baM/ hU~M dzaHkI la ya sod chom gtogs/ zhes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs dam rjes su dran par gyur/ nyid kyi sku las kyang sras mchog grangs med pa thon par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can thams cad bsdus nas bsgral bar gyur to// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ hUM kA ra dang sgra 'byin ma// rnam par rgyal dang rnam snyems ma// dbyug pa sngon po sder mo dang// gshin rje'i gshed po dur khrod ma// mi g.yo mgon po gtun khung ma// rta mgrin rgyal po gtum mo dang// ta ki rA tsa mda' snyems ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rlung 'byin ma// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod byed ma// stobs po che dang rdo rje bskyod ma dang// gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa'i phra men yang// phag mgo stag mgo g.yag mgo dang// sha ba gzig dang byi la'i mgo/ spyang mo'i mgo dang seng ge'i mgo/ dred dang dom gyi mgo ru bstan// smig bu bya rog bya rgod mgo/ 'ug pa khA dang pu shud mgo/ khra yi mgo dang pha wang mgo/ sre

mo'i mgo dang byi ba'i mgo/ yang sprul pa sum sprul grangs med kyis// srid pa'i rlung yang mi thar gtams// de nas bcom ldan 'das badzrakI la yas/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi 'bras bu rgya mtsho tsam du rngubs nas badzra kI la ya yi 'od zer sku+u la bstim/ dran pa rnyed de/ badzra kI la ya'i yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong ngo// de'i tshe badzra kI la ya'i 'bangs su dam bcas mna' bor nas/ lus khro bo rnams kyi gdan du phul/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'i grogs dang tshogs bskyang bar dam bcas so// rgyal rnams btson du bzung ba yis/ 'bangs rnams chams la phebs par 'gyur/ de'i tshe phyogs skyong ba rnams// khro bo'i zhabs 'og tu zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba kI la ya/ gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa can btul ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la/ 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa'i rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ gsung dang thugs kyang de bzhin no// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs stsal du gsol// zhes 'khor rnams kyis phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang gsum dang// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// stong gsum ma lus 'od zer 'phro// thams cad byang chub sems su gyur// bsdus pas sku gsung stobs chen po// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur ro// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po las dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang khro bo karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya/ rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas ni gang du gang du bgyi// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum sku gsung thugs// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas badzra kI la yas/ gnas kyi khyad par 'di gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ gnas kyi khyad par bstan pa ni// phur bu bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung// rgya gram lam du bya ba dang// ngam grog gnas dang khang stong du// rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor bya// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang// bsgrim zhing shugs kyis ting 'dzin gsal// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bdag gi gzugs phung brlag pa [(]9[)]

dang// tshe dang srog la bar chad 'ong// nags tshal chen po ga na bar// der ni legs par dpyad pa ni// klu yi mig dang 'byung po'i srang// sa yi bgegs dang ma rungs sa// mi shis pa yi sa min par// las kyi bya ba'i gzhung brtsams na// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// yun ring bsgrub na 'grub par 'gyur// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan bya// 'bru sna tshogs dang gnam sa legs// dbyibs legs lung pa ran pa ni// bkra shis gzhung bzang gnas yin pas// gnas kyi dam pa yin zhes bshad// drag po'i las su bya ba la// dang por phur sgrub pa'i gnas// nags ri tsher ma can gyi shing// gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni gri mda' ral gri'i shul// sa ni gru gsum me dpung 'dra// logs la dur khrod gling yod pa// mkhas pas brtags te btsal byas na// 'di ni phur pa'i sgrub gnas yin// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang// dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang// brag la rad rod med pa dang// grog po gting zab ngan pa dang// stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra chu srin kha/ ban glang sna 'thab brag chu'i bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs sa// 'di ni phur pa gdab gnas yin// bsad pa'i gnas su bstan pa ni// sngon chad lha mi phung sa dang// g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon 'thab dang// bsad bcad sa dang ma rungs shul// srin po bsgral ba'i bsha' gzhi dang// srog bcad bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang// g.yul ngo bshams pa'i sa mkhar bsnyil// mang po bsad pa'i phung ba'i sa// brag ni srin mo ngu ba 'dra// ri ni thal phung bsnyil ba 'dra// lung pa me yis bsregs pa 'dra// shing rtsi rkang thang 'bros pa 'dra// sgang gshongs mi ro sbas pa 'dra// 'di ni brdeg cing bsgral gnas yin// sems la chos nyid mi gsal zhing// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel bas ni// gnas 'di dag tu yongs mi bya// nam phugs rnal 'byor bdag la gnod// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bkra shis sa yi gnas dag tu// yin ring bsrengs na gdon gtol med// dam tshig ma nyams nges thub dang// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo can gyis// gnas ni de dang de dag tu// cho ga'i las 'di brtsam par bya// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// de lta bu yi sa rnyed nas// yul sa de yi bdag po la// bden pas bkrol lam sa rin bcal// de nas zhag grangs 'di tsam mam// drag po'i las 'di ma grub par// gnas 'di rnal 'byor bdag yar bas// gtor ma byin pa 'di long la// ma grub bar du gzhan su dengs// bkra shis pa yi smon lam gdab// de skad byas la gtor ma sbyin// bsgo ba'i las rnams gnyer yang gtad// de nas gzhung bzhin dkyil 'khor brtsig/ khams

gsum srid gsum dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rak+ta chags pa'i dbang gis chag chag gdab// srid gsum ye nas ye shes chen po lnga// gti mug sogs pa'i dug lnga gnas su gzhom phyir du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// rin chen sna lnga'i kha dog tshon// 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab cing bri bar bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab po// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab// dbus su drag po gru gsum la// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gru bzhi zhi rgyas so// gru chad bzhis ni rab tu brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// dregs pa bcu gcig bsnol mar bsgom// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan dag la// badzra ku mA ra yang bskyed// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// rnam par rgyal ba yab yum bskyed// shar lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// me lha bsnol ba'i gdan dag la// dbyug pa sngon po yab yum bskyed// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bskyed// lho nub 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bden bral bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// mi g.yo mgon po yab yum bskyed// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// klu dbang bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// rta mgrin rgyal po yab yum bskyed// nub byang 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// rlung lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gzhan gyis mi thub yab yum bskyed// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yab yum bskyed// byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dbang ldan bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// khams gsum rnam rgyal yab yum bskyed// mdun du tshangs pa'i gdan steng du// hUM mdzad yab yum bskyed par bya// rgyab tu+u sa bdag gdan la ni// stobs chen yab yum bskyed par bya// de dag g.yas g.yon gnyis su ni// phra thabs g.yas la phra men g.yon// yang sprul gsum sprul bskyed par bya// sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi dag dgod// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha ru// so so'i snying po bris la ni// dngos grub rten ni nub tu gzhag/ thod pa'i tshal bu bcu gcig tu// tshil chen me mar bcu gcig btang// tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa bya// mchod pa'i smon lam brgya dang stong// rak+ta mang po mtsho ltar rlobs// mAM sa mang po ri ltar spung// shun chen sa gzhi sprin ltar gtib// zhi bran mang po 'phan du bkram// gzhan yang rgyan rnams gzhung bzhin dgram// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu/ dbus su

pho brang dkar zlum por// yig 'bru a re tshon gyis bri// snying po'i zhabs la a re gdags// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// sgo rnams zur la gtad par bya// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// gru bzhi sgo rnams sgo la gtad// yig 'bru trAM swA gang rung dgod// lha snying zhabs la trAM swA gdags// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa lags// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// pad+ma 'dab brgyad thig tu gdab// pad+ma re la zla gam re// steng du yi ge aM re dgod// lha snying zhabs la aM re gdags// dbang gi dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// maN+Dal gru bzhi 'doms gang la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab// 'khor lo re la gru gsum re// yig 'bru yig tshon phaT re dgod// lha snying zhabs la phaT re gdags// drag po'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// sgo rnams sgo khyud kun dang mthun// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bur du gdon// kha dog rigs dang mthun par bri// sgo yi phyi logs snam bu la// gru gsum brgya dang rtsa brgyad bri// dug dang gdug pa tsher ma can// lcags thag nag pos bsdams la ni// yig 'bru dz+wa la raM rnams dgod// hom nag dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ k-I ya la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la/ karma he ru kas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye/ bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// lha la dbang bskur mi 'tshal lam// byin gyis brlab na ji ltar brlab// ces gsol pa dang/ badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la// mchod bstod phyag 'tshal gzhung bzhin bya// gsol gdab dbang yang nod par bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las lnga ru bskur// phyogs bcu'i srog la dbang bskur nas// srog ni ye shes gyur nas ni// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// ya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// gnyis su med par bstim byas nas// bdag nyid grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam// bdag nyid thugs ka'i 'od zer las// lha mo mang po slar 'thon nas// bdag la mchod pa byed par bsam// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum du// rnam snang mi bskyod snang mtha' yas// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje bum// 'bru gsum po la yig 'brus bskor// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon las// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// srid gsum byang chub sems su bsgral// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang// slar 'dus bdag

gi gnas su thim// thugs nas rim par dbang bskur bas// bdag nyid lhun grub sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid khro rgyal yin pa'i phyir// sku las ye shes 'od zer 'phro// khams gsum ye nas sangs rgyas yin// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems su bsgral// slar 'dus bdag la dbang bskur ro// dar gyi de ni gzungs thag la// dkar dmar mthing ser rin po che// bdag dang khro bo phur pa rdzas// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// rigs dang sbyar te spro bsdu bya// rin po che yi sbu gu ru// re re la yang gsum gsum dgur// dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par bya'o// bum pa lnga la rgyan chas brgyan// so so'i lha yi snying po yi// zhabs la dpa' bo 'bru lnga gdags// nyung dkar bzlas la bstim par bya// rdo rje dril bu rin po che// po ti la sogs so so'i sngags kyis bstim// phyi dbang dus su so so'i zhabs la gdags// yungs kar bzlas la bstim par bya// rna ba'i dbus kyi bcud bsdus rtsa la ni// yig 'bru trAM bsgom spro bsdus pas// ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed par bya// po tis dbang bskur nyan pa'i dbang// thugs ni rin chen gzhal yas khang// yi dam lha ni gsal bsgom la// ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur bas// yi dam lha nyid zhu bar gyur// gang gis dbang bskur sgom pa'i dbang// lag mthil nyid kyi rtsa nyid la// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas khang// ye shes tshon gang don yod grub// thugs ka'i rgya gram yig 'bru hA// las kyi rigs kyi bzlas pas bskor// rdo rje rgya gram dbang bskur ye shes sems dpa' zhu// phrin las dbang bskur dam pa yin// lce dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// dbus su snang ba mtha' yas bskyed// pad+ma AM la bzlas pa'i yig 'brus bskor// gsung rab dril bus dbang bskur ye shes sems dpa' zhu// bshad bzlas gnyis kyi dbang bskur mchog yin no// dbang rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin du// mkhas goms grub pas dbang bskur bya// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bri// mkhas pas lha phur rim pas 'god// b+han d+ha'i nang du bzlas nyung bsags// phur pa bcu la khro bcu'i snying po bri// logs la snying po dpal la las bsngags so// brgya mtshams stong mtshams mchod bstod gzhung bzhin bya// nyung dkar rgyal pos dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms la// phur pa dar gyi cod pan gzungs thag gdags// rin po che yis sbu gu khong stong byang chub sems// logs la sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru 'khrigs// de yi rtsa ba yan lag gsum du sbrel// byang chub sems rtsa dang ni ngag dag rtsa// sems gnas dran gzhi tsit+ta'i rtsa la 'bral// sku

gsung thugs kyi 'phro 'du grangs med spro// re re la yang gsum gsum mo// phra mo'i ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// sran ma sran chung nyung dkar til// ting 'dzin mi gsal bzlas pa bya// bdun 'bum nyi khri them pa dang// phur pa'i rtags rnams dus su 'byung// rnal 'byor dad dang ldan par 'gyur// de yis dbang rnams rim bzhin bskur// rjes 'jug dbang mchog 'dod pa des// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa'i phyir// slob dpon lung dang ldan pa des// bdud rtsi khar blug mna' yis bsgag/ a mr-i ta yis na ra kan// bzlas pa'i chu ni kha ru blug/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs ni// khyod kyis gzhan la ma smra zhig/ gal te gzhan la smras gyur na// sdug bsngal chen pos thar mi 'gyur// srog la bar chad myur du 'ong// sems can dmyal ba chen por skye// de las thar pa'i dus med 'gyur// khyod la dam tshig dpog pa ni// yi dam lha la rtag par gnas// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcod// bla ma mig gi 'bras ltar blta// rdo rje spun la brtse gdung che// gsang ba'i man ngag thabs mchog 'di// snod ngan gzhan la mi spel lo// rgyud 'brel blo zhen sgrub la zhugs// sbyor sgrol mchod pa rgyun mi gcod// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu chongs// blta ba nam mkha' bcos pa med// spyod pa sa gzhi bzhin du gyis// dam tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin srungs// gsang ba'i sdom pa 'da' dka' ba// gsang sngags zab mo ston pa'i slob dpon la// smad sems 'phya sems byas na ni// dngos grub med cing dmyal bar ltung// srog la bar chad myur du 'ong// de ltar dam tshig phog pa dang// gsang sngags zab mo'i dbang mchog 'bras bu la// las 'phro skal bar ldan dang mi ldan pa// lus bkrus gos gtsang bskon la nyal du gzhug/ gsang sngags zab mo'i sgor zhugs dbang mchog thob/ rdo rje slob dpon phyag cha gnang gi rmi// thugs kyi dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// lag tu ba dan thogs pa dang// kun gyi dmag dpon byed cing rmi// sku la rgyan cha 'dogs shing rmi/ sku yi dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// gser g.yu lus la btags shing rmi// gzhan yang zangs lcags rin po che// bdag gis btags dang 'chang ba rmi// yon tan dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// lag tu pad+ma me tog thogs// nyi dro zla gsal mi mthong ba// rgya mtsho chen po brgal gyin rmi// bdag gi lus kyang bshas nas ni// sha khrag mi yis bgos kyin rmi// gsung gi dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// mda' gzhu go mtshon thogs pa dang// rtsi shing mang po bsrel ba dang// nam mkha' la ni 'phur gyin ni// phrin las dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// gsang sngags zab mo dbang gi 'bras bu la// las dang skal bar ldan pa'i

rigs kyi bu mchog de// bdag lus srog dang nor la sogs// bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dbul// rdo rje rigs kyi yon yin no// bran dang bcas pa'i 'dod yon lnga// 'khor lo can gyi yon yin no// rin chen sna lnga la sogs dang// glang po rta dang ma her bcas// rin chen rigs kyi yon yin no// ma sring bu mo chung ma dang// rab tu brgyan pa dag dang ni// rgod ma la sogs mo chags rnams// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yon du dbul// rta dang ma he glang chen dang// rdzas kyi bye brag mang po bkal ba ni// las kyi rigs kyi yon du dbul// slob dpon pad+ma'i khri la bzhugs su gsol// gser la sogs pa rin po che// dar gyi thum por bcug la ni// gzhan yang rdzas rnams ci 'bul ba// slob dpon nyid la gtor de dbul// rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka yi// ye shes sems pa nyid la phog/ 'od zer du ni 'phros pa las// slob ma yi ni thugs ka ru// ye shes sems dpa' nyid la thim// thim pas 'od du zhu bar gyur// a khaM bI ra pU dza hU~M/ de skad brjod la bskor ba bya// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dbang gi rim pa bskur bar bya// dang po rgyu 'bras mi bslu bstan// de ltar 'bul byed slob ma la// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang bskur bya// bu mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// lan gsum tshul du nan tan bya// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// zhal bu ka pA la ru bsam// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis blang// sku gsung thugs su bskul bar bya'o// dngos grub chen po thob par nges// dngos grub rnam gnyis mi ldog pa// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa/ skra ni ser la li ba dang// mig la kri ka chags pa dang// 'bras bu dkar nag phyed pa dang// so la so zho chags pa dang// rkang pa'i byin pa phra ba dang// lus la dri zhim nad kyang nyung// nu ma chung la sked skabs dod// skad kyang ngang pa gzhon nu 'dra// lce 'jibs ma mchu so yis 'drad// nu ma mnye zhing kha gnyis sbyar// mkha' gsang gnyis ni byin brlabs la// e steng nyi ma pad+ma brgyad// zla ba rdo rje rtse lnga AH// s+t+waM dang ho yis bskul la ni// de la gnyis med sbyor bar bya// pad+ma la ni rdo rje zhugs// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mar 'khyil// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa// byang chub sems chu rab phab nas// gsang ba'i pho brang dbus su ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rnams bskyed// skad cig ma yi spro bsdus zhu// dkar 'tsher byang chub sems su gyur// byang chub sems ni spyan drangs nas// byang chub sems ni bsag pa'i snod// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA la// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// dbang bskur dngos grub bstim par

bya'o// gang zag rnams la skur ba ni// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song gsum du ltung mi srid// lha dang mi yi dbang por 'gyur// bskyed rim la ni sems zhugs nas// bum pa'i dbang thob sems zin nas// thar pa'i lam las ldog mi srid// zab mo'i dbang ni thob gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa non pa zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang mchog badzra kI la ya// sras mchog phur pa'i dkyil 'khor gang// gsang ba las kyi dkyil 'khor gang// zhes gsol pa dang/ kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ sras mchog phur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad kyi// lus ngag yid kyis gus par nyon// las la sbyor ba'i dus su ni// gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor la// me 'od 'bar bas bskor ba bri// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag la// phyi rim sgo rnams nyis brtsegs su// nang rnams phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la// gru gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig la// sras mchog nyi shu rtsa gcig dgod// phyi rnams phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// gru gsum brgya ni rtsa brgyad la// gnan phur brgya dang rtsa brgyad dgod// 'di ni sras mchog dkyil 'khor ro// gsad pa las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor byang shar mtshams su ni// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// hom khung gru gsum gdengs pa la// rtse mo lho yi phyogs su bstan// dug gi chu yis chag chag gdab// ro bsregs sol bas nag por byug/ bang rim gsum dang ldan par bya// hUM dang phaT kyis bskor ba bri// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rtsang gis bskor// rgya grog dmar po'i tshad dang ni// mtshal khams chu yis khyer ba dang// srubs ma'i lo ma gangs kyi dum bu dang// dri chen dri chu bse yi ras ma dang// so dog gzhi blang ling+ga thal skya'i mdog/ dpral bar dus bris snying gar ming bri'o// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// hom khung nang du mgo bstan la// skra bshig sgren mor phyung bar bsam// de nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin can// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// srid gsum phur bur bsgrub pa'i phyir// slob dpon 'khor gnas phun sum tshogs// 'tsho ba zas dang sgrub rdzas rkyen bzlog sman// phyi nang rgyu 'grul

mtshams kyang bcad// rgyu las byung dang rkyen las byung// bar gcod dngos grub thob tu mi ster bar// ting 'dzin bsar la phyi mtshams nang mtshams bcad// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs nas// phra thabs yang sprul sum sprul dang// dam la btags pa'i dam can rnams// spyan drang mchod bstod gzhung bzhin bya// bsnyen pa bdun 'bum nyi khri gdon// byi ba sa yas gdon mi za// mchod pa dus drug rgyun mi gcad// dam can srung ma 'khor bcas la// drag po'i gtor ma byin nas ni// gang la bya ba'i phrin las bcol// mgyogs byed ye shes pho nya yis// ting 'dzin bsar te gnas nas dgug/ gzir gnon drag pos bsnun par bya// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// thugs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// phra men drag po'i las la bskul// ting 'dzin bsar te las la bskul// bka' nyan phrin las pho nya yis// dam can gnad phab bskul ba yis// ting 'dzin bsar te gnas nas dgug/ gzir gnon drag pos brdung bar bya'o// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las gsum// dkyus dang phrin las sbyar ba ni// skor tshoms gsum du sbyar bar bya'o// dug gtor khrag dang nyung dkar gyis// ling+ga la ni thun du brab// 'go ba'i lha dang bral bar bya'o// gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug/ 'bros kyis mi thar gnad gzir bya// steng na phur bu'i ser ba dbab// drod tshad gtan la phebs pa dang// brtul zhugs bskyed de gdab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sras mchog phur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o/// de nas yang karma he ru kas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// 'khor ba dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// srid gsum phur pas gdab pa la// phur pa'i rgyu ni ci la bgyi// de yi tshad ni ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan 'byung ba ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phur pa'i rgyu rnams ngas bshad kyi// drag po lcags kyi phur pa la// gri lcags mde'u rnying rtags phyin dang// gnam lcags thog gi lcags dag dang// gcod dang rno dang sra la sogs// steng du sor gcig rgya mdud bya// rked par sor gcig rgya mdud do// ngos brgyad rin chen zur brgyad la// khro rgyal gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang// bar gyi rgya mdud brtsegs ma la// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med do// gzhal yas rang bzhin brtsegs mar gnas// rtse mo zur gsum drag por

bshad// dbang la zangs kyi phur pa'o// rgyas par gser la sogs pa ste// zhi ba dngul dang tsan+dan no// rtse mo'i dbyibs ni so sor bstan// gzhan yang tsher ma can gyi shing// rab tu mi srun gnas dag nas// gang dag skyes pa gang yin dang// dug dang gcan gzan gdug pa can// rab tu gdug pa'i gnas dag na// skyes pa'i shing mchog tsher ma can// skyer pa dang ni seng ldeng dang// gang dag skyer ldeng mdzo mo shing// rtsa ba'i logs su rgya mdud la// rtse mo'i logs su zur gsum bya// dbyibs dang kha dog gong dang mthun// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tsher ma can// gong ma de rnams ma 'byor na// gdug pa'i shing mchog gang rnyed pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor la// yid la dran zhing gsal bsgom bya// sngags dang bya ba ma nor na// des kyang grub par gzhung las bshad// 'di dag ring thung tshad bstan pa// sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa// bcu gnyis pa dang bcwa brgyad pa// de las thung bar ma gsungs te// de las ring bar yongs ma bshad// sor bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi tshad// sor brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi tshad// bcu gnyis skye mched bcu gnyis tshad// bcwa brgyad khams ni bcwa brgyad tshad// rtags dang sbyar te de rnams bshad// rtags phyin pa yi lcags rnams la// de yi yon tan bshad pa ni// dper na nags kyi sdong po la// sngon chad bcad pa'i s+t+wa re dag/ de dag chod par gyur na ni// chod mi chod kyi the tshom med// de dag sngon chad ma bcad na// chod dam mi chod yongs ma nges// de bzhin rgyu yang de dang 'dra// mdor na rnal 'byor rtsal mchog gces// re re la yang skyon med de// yon tan yod par 'di las bstan// nag po shing gi dug can la// phur pa byas pa'i yon tan ni// nag po gzhan gyis mi tshugs la// dug gis pha rol gsod par byed// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams la// phur pa byas pa'i yon tan ni// skyer pas tshe dang longs spyod 'phel// mdzo mos dbang du bya ba 'grub// gzhan yang kha dog rigs dang sbyar// mdor na bde gshegs sa bon gyi// byin gyis brlabs pa gces par bshad// de bas kyang ni dam tshig gtso// rnal 'byor rnams la dam pa bsngags// dang po gzhung las byung ba bzhin// de dag ma nor bshams par bya// tshogs pas the tshom med ces bya// bsham pas bya ba chud ma zos// kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni bsngags pa ste// rgyu yi rgyal po rang shar ba'o// gzhan yang phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// zangs lcags 'khar ba gang yod pa// de yang dod cing legs par bya// ma dod pa yi skyon rnams ni// gar dgar byas pas tshul las nyams// stab chol byas pas bka' las 'gal// rnyed btsan

byas pas byin rlabs chung// yod btsan byas pas bsgom mi bde// ngan dgur bshams na rtog par 'gyur// legs par bshams pa yi rang zhing// tshogs par bshams pa gzhung dang mthun// dod par byas na dang ba skye// bka' bzhin byas na byin rlabs yod// mdor na rtogs pa gtso bo yang// rtogs pa'i don la mthar phyin na// rnam par mi rtogs yongs mi dgos// ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pas// log pa'i phyogs rnams 'dul slad du// 'di la rgyu bshams 'byung ba yin// mi rtog pa la rtog mi dgos// rnam par rtog la khro 'dul bzang// nyon mongs pa la gnyis pos 'joms// rtog pa bsal bar bshams pa gces// gzhan la tshugs 'dod grangs ma ltos// rtags phyin 'dod na yun du bsrings// don la rub 'dod ma g.yel gyis// rings par 'dod na brtson 'grus skyed// don 'di yid la bzhag nas kyang// sngags pas de la nan tan skyed// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya// phur pa bskyed pa ji ltar bgyi// byin gyis brlab na ji ltar brlab// blta ba ci la dmigs pa lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phur pa dang po bskyed pa ni// mtshon pa'i phur pa gzhal yas khang// bde gshegs spyan drangs gnas na bzhugs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul// 'od zhu bdag gi thugs kar thim// byang sems hUM ni yungs 'bru tsam// ngag dag lam nas gsung 'phros pas// las gnyis byas nas rlung sgrom zhugs// sku nas rim par de bzhin du// dung khang nang nas gsang lam brgyud// pad+ma las 'phro 'od phung las// so so'i yig 'bru phyag mtshan gyur// kI la ya yi sngags brjod pas// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug la// sku smad lcags phur zur gsum po// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// s+t+wa re rgya gram kha TAM phur pa 'dzin// de ni sras mchog bskyed pa'o// byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa ni// chos sku'i dbyings nas sprul skur bzhengs// thugs kyi rdo rje mi 'gyur ba// zhe sdang rtse gcig ldan par brlab// de nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rigs kyi khro tshogs 'khor bcas bskyed// lha grangs brgyad cu rtsa drug la// so so'i snying pos dbang skur bas// rang rang sku

la 'jug par nus// longs spyod rdzogs skur byin gyis brlab// de nas rigs lngar byin brlabs te// gnas lngar 'bru lnga bskyed pa ni// so so'i snying po gnas su bstim// rigs lnga'i dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs pa// rigs rnams 'dus pa'i khongs su brlab// de nas thugs nyid mi 'gyur bar// ye shes rtse gcig byin gyis brlab// zur gsum phaT gsum drag po'i rtags// logs gsum hUM gsum drag dal snyoms// ri rab tshul du rab brjid pa// sku yi rdo rje sku yi stobs// sku stobs brjid par byin gyis brlab// gsung gi rdo rje gsung gi stobs// gdangs skad drag por byin gyis brlab// thugs kyi rdo rje thugs kyi stobs// 'dod dgur bsgyur bar byin gyis brlab// nyung dkar khrag dang gu gul gyis// bdug cing byugs la gzi byin bskyed// de nas bdag nyid chen por byin gyis brlab// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du ma// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i steng// hUM gzhag kun tu bzang po'i mkha'// g.yon pa'i a las zla dkyil 'khor// a bzhag kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// gnyis med byang chub sems las ni// g.yas pa'i gung mo'i steng du A+oM// de las rnam par snang mdzad do// mthe bong steng du hUM bsams la// de las rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// mdzub mo'i steng du trAM bsam ste// de las rin chen 'byung ldan sku// srin lag steng du hA bsams la// don yod grub pa'i sku ru bskyed// mthe'u chung steng du AM bsams la// de las snang ba mtha' yas sku// so so'i snying pos sku bskyed la// yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// thal mo mnyam sbyor byas la ni// A+oM dang badzra an dza li// hUM zhes yongs su brjod nas ni// sor mo cung zad bsnol nas ni// badzra ban d+ha hUM zhes pas// sor mo rab tu bsnol te bsdam// sa ma ya ho s+t+wAM kyis bskul// phur pa lag gnyis bar du gzhug/ dbus su phur bu bcug la dril// A+oM dang badzra A be sha yas bstim// bde gshegs sku ni nyung 'bru tsam// grangs med spro bsdus phur la thim// badzra sa twa rA dza hUM// sras mchog rdo rje phur pa'i thugs// rigs lnga yab yum sbyor ba yis// byang sems sras mchog nyid la bstim// stong gsum khengs pa'i 'od zer spro// gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug/ khyi khrag ra khrag rnams kyis byug/ dug sna mang po rnams kyis byug/ byin brlab gzi byin bskyed la ni// phur pa sras mchog chen por bsam// gyen du gsor zhing 'di skad do// hUM bzhi gsal 'phro hUM bzhi'i tshogs las bskyed// dbu+u la rgya mdud bstan pa thabs kyi rtags// rtsibs la zur brgyad bstan pa khro bo brgyad// rin chen zur brgyad bstan pa khro mo

brgyad// dbus su rgya mdud bstan pa shes rab rtags// rtse mo zur gsum bstan pa sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// steng 'og gnyis su bstan pas khro bo gnyis// khong stong byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nas// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ma g.yos che mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sdug bsngal log par 'khyam pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rjes dbyer med dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa'i// thabs kyis bsgral ba'i skal dang mi ldan kyang// shugs kyis bsgral ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul// lta ba gang la dmigs pa ni// phur pa sras mchog dam pa'i mchog/ phur ni chos kyi dbyings nyid la// pa ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// phur ni bde ba chen po'i klo?ng// pa ni pha rol phyin pa nyid// phur ni sku dang thugs kyi dbyings// pa ni sku gsung thugs su shar// phur ni ma bcos pa yi dbyings// pa ni ye shes chen po'o// phur ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// phur ni shes rab chags med klong// pa ni thabs mchog 'dod dgur bsgyur// phur ni kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// pa ni rgyal ba kun gyi yab// phur ni kun gzhi bde chen nyid// pa ni rnam shes ye shes gsal// phur ni thig le chen po la// pa ni ye nas ma bcos pa'o// lta ba'i rgyal po nges pa'i don// gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag ma skyes shes rab dbyings// don la dgongs pa'i cho 'phrul ni// snying rje chen po'i cho 'phrul lo// rig pa'i rgyal po rang gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ thabs kyi rgyal por bdag gyur pas// srid gsum 'khor ba dbyings su sgrol// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sras mchog gi phur pa byin gyis brlab pa dang phur pa'i lta ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// sangs rgyas kun gyi lam chen po// sngon tshe dregs pa btul ba'i don// de ltar rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas// dmigs ni gang dang gang la bgyi// bsgral ba'i dmigs rnams ji ltar lags// gnyis med gtso la bdag zhu 'tshal// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ bsgral ba'i dmigs rnams bstan pa ni// kun la bya bar gzhung las med// nyams par gyur pa bdun yod de// dam las nyams dang bka' las nyams// don las nyams dang las kyis nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// log pas nyams pa

bdun po la// 'di la nyams pa zhes bya ste// de dag so so'i mtshan nyid ni// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha dang ma dang mkhan po gsod// slob ma gsod dang ngan sems can// 'di ni nam yang ltung bas na// bsgral ba'i dmigs gcig 'di yin no// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bslus dang// ngan sems dpya sems byed pa dang// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod dang// gsang ba'i man ngag sbas pa rnams// snod med rnams la ston pa dang// 'di ni nyams pa chen po ste// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs gcig yin// bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dam la btags na sku mtshang 'dru// sgrub zlar sbran na kha yogs 'dogs// man ngag bstan na skur pa 'debs// bden par bstan na log par khrid// don rtags bstan na gol sar 'dzin// 'di ni nyams pa chen po ste// 'di la bsgral ba lhur yang brtsam// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'byin// tan gaN sbyor ba dngos su byed// lta ba ting 'dzin rgyab tu bor// spyod pa brlang po dang du len// khro gtum nga rgyal rang gar gtong// don gyi man ngag log par go/ pha rol 'dren la log pa'i chos// phyin ci log gi don la mkhas// bka' gzhung bor bas rtsom pa che// log par spyod pa mtha' dag yod// 'di ni rU tra dngos yin te// mngon spyod bsgral kyang sgrib mi 'ong// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang skyes gnas mi gcig par// bsgral ba'i las kyi glor 'ongs nas// sngon chad 'khon 'gras yongs med par// klag la bab par dran nas kyang// zhi ba drang pos mi nyan par// nyes med gzhan la 'dzugs pa dang// dpung pas bsnyems nas klan ka tshol// kha lce rgod cing bzhin ldog nas// brgal ba med par bdag la rgol// dprog rnyed med par bdag la 'phrog/ bdag gis nyes pa ma dran cing// bdag gis brgal bar ma bsams kyang// las kyi bdag la gnad 'dzugs shing// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'ded pa// las kyi nyams pa 'di yin pas// 'di ni bsgral ba'i dmigs gcig yin// gzhan yang las kyis nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar ya ga tshol// phan pa med par bdag la 'tshe// 'ong rgyu med par sgrub par 'ong// las kyis nyams pa'i rtags yin pas// 'di la bsgral ba lhur yang brtsam// las kyi 'khor ba sdig med bshad// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs char 'dzin pas nyams// lta bas sgo khung khyud kyang byed pas nyams// rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs dkrugs nyams// rang bzhin med

pa'i chos bshad kyang// mtshan ma can gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran du+u ngas 'khol lo// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig yod// nga yi nyams su dpal chen byung// nga ni khro bo'i rgyal po yin// gzhan yang khro zhing 'tshe la sogs// 'di ni mtshan mas nyams pa ste// bsgral bar byas kyang dam mi nyams// log par gyur pas nyams pa ni// mnyan nas go rtogs med pa ru// la lar mthu che rtsal 'dod pas// las kyi don du mtshan ma spyod// sdig pa'i phyag rgya mi mgo thogs// ral pa gsig cing so gtsigs nas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha glo la 'dogs// zhing gi pags pa phrag la bkal// sgro ba nag po sha dang tshil// snod gang khur zhing log chos spyod// spyod pa ma nor gzhung bor nas// bya bar mi 'tshams sna tshogs byed// ngo dang gdong pa khrag gis byug/ tshul 'chos dam 'dral sna tshogs byed// tho chor spyod cing dam mi bsrung// spyod pa brlang pos bka' gzhung smod// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhabs 'dren byed// rnal 'byor sngags pa'i rkang nas 'dren// dpal chen khrag 'thung thugs khrel bskyed// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i gzan tshogs bkram// rnal 'byor yongs kyi sme btsog byas// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs gcig yin// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod chags nor gyis snying brus nas// shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phung bar rtogs kyang sngags 'chang 'joms// dug tu snang yang lto ru za// gnyen pa yin kyang thabs kyis smod// thob tu 'dod nas gsang sngags brku// bza' ru 'dod nas rnal 'byor za// zas su sgrub po'i longs spyod rku// nor du gzhung spyod rnal 'byor 'joms// 'di dag 'dod pas nyams pa ste// 'di dag bsgral na rnal 'byor btsun// btul zhing tshar bcad bstan pa gnyan// med cing stongs na bar chad nyung// 'di dag bsgral bar ma byas na// mtho ris 'grib la dmyal khams 'phel// rnal 'byor dam can sgyid lug nas// theg pa chen po'i chos sgo 'gag/ 'di dag bsgral bar byas na ni// rnal 'byor bsgrub la bar chad med// theg pa chen po'i mthu dar bas// legs pa'i yon tan brjod las 'das// thabs kyi tha ma tha ma na// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal chung yang// 'di dag bsgral ba byas pa ni// dmyal ba'i gnas su yun thung 'gyur/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni de lags na// brdeg pa'i dus tshod ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig

karma he ru ka/ brdeg pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// gnam stong dang ni tshes brgyad dang// bcwa lnga nyi shu gnyis la bya// mig dmar phur bu'i gza' rnams kyang// brdeg pa'i dus la bab par bya// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhung btsug nas// bsnyen bsgrub cho ga tshang byas la// 'dzab grangs bdun 'bum nyi khri 'don// bzlas brjod nyin mtshan rgyun mi gcad// rtags dang mtshan ma phyin pa dang// brdeg pa'i dus la bab par shes// nam gyi gung dang nyi ma dros// de la brdeg par rab tu shes// dur khrod chen po gang na bar// bsgral ba la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// rgya gram yam ni gang na bar// brdeg pa la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// 'di dag brdeg pa'i dus tshod kyang// srod la zhugs nas tho rangs kha// 'di dag brdeg par yongs mi bya// 'di dag brdeg par bya ba ni// yun ni lo zla tsam du bsring// grangs ni bye ba 'bum du bzlas// mchod pa dus drug rgyun mi gcad// cho ga bzlas brjod tshang byas nas// dbang po mngon sum khugs na rab// tha ma mig rnon la sogs pas// der ni nges par 'ong ba yin// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// dang por bsgrub par khas blangs nas// ma thon bar du dus tshod yin// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal ba yis// bsnyen pa bdun 'bum nyi khri gdon// rab 'bring gsum gyi rtags rnams kun// dus der mi 'byung mi srid do// brdeg pa'i dus tshod rab mchog yin// brdeg mi dgos par lhun gyis grub// yang na brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// lha snying gdags sngags gzir gnon dang// drang zhing bkug la dbab pa dang// mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phra men drag po'i las la bskul// lha snying gdags sngags gzir gnon bya// drang zhing bkug na dbab pa dang// mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// bka' nyan chen po'i dus la bab// dam can gnad dbab las la bskul// lha snying gdags sngags gzir gnon bya// mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// rnal 'byor rgyud grol blo zhen pas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyi// gab sbas man ngag sbyor shes shing// man ngag gsum po skor tshoms kyis// rim gyis dbang med gnad phab nas// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par byed// gal te bka' bzhin ma byas na// kho rang mgo gas snying tshig go// de phyir bla dgug pho nya gtang// zhag bdun gyis ni khug par 'gyur// 'di dag btang nas brdeg par bya// bla dgug pho nya gtang bya ste// hUM dpal gyi pho nya las mkhan [(0[)]

mo// dkar mo dung gi mche ba can// mkha' la 'byung ba'i mdzod 'khyil ma// lag na spu gris sems can sgrol// zhal du sems can snying khrag rngub// sprul pa thog thog ser chen 'bebs// pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// bskal pa brgyad khri'i pha rol nas// dam las 'das pa'i bla 'dren ma// nyams pa'i bla la nan ma chung// lho yi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// nag mo lcags kyi lan tshar can// khyung gi khra thogs g.yas pa na// b+han+d+ha gri thogs gsod la rngams// tshangs pa 'khyil ba'i cha lugs can// mi sdug mgo la gcer bu'i lus// pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// bskal pa brgyad nas bla 'tshol ma// dpag tshad bye bar srog dbugs 'gugs// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// nub kyi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// dmar po nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ma// gdug pa 'dul ba grang ba sel// gsod la rngam pa'i las la brtson// mche gtsigs g.yang gzhi gos su gon/ pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// rab tu mi srun bla 'gug ma// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// ljang nag 'khyil pa'i thod gdengs can// ser mo ral can 'bum gyis bskor// phyag na ral gri nag po bsnams// pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// sngon nas dgra bo'i bla 'gug ma// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// nam mkha'i lha mo phur pa'i lha// lag brgya lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// spyan brgya khrag gis mchi ma 'dzag/ zhal brgya gdug pa'i ngan sngags zlos// tshems kyis skye shi rtsa ba chod// phur bu'i las mkhan chen mo la// rab tu mi srun las la brtson// pho nya mang po phyogs bcur 'gyed// rdo rje sku gsung thugs las sprul// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// gzhan yang dam la btags pa rnams// de dag las la skul bar bya'o// de dag mngon par khugs pa dang// bsad pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI ya la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ brdeg pa'i dus tshod kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI ya la// drag po'i las la 'jug byed pa// dregs pa nyams pa bdun po la// gang dang gang du gdab par bya// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ gang gis gang la gdab bstan pa// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug bdud bdul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings

nas bzhengs// mthing nag gcer bu khro gtum ral pa can// dbus kyi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// ngag 'khyal rdzun du smra ba'i snying la rgyob// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// zhe sdang bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// dkar nag gcer bu khro gtum ral pa can// shar gyi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// zhe sdang 'dod chags can gyi snying la rgyob// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rat+na 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// ser nag gcer bu khro gtum ral pa can// lho yi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// srog gcod log par lta ba'i snying la rgyob// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar nag gcer bu khro gtum ral pa can// nu?b kyi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// phra ma ma byin len pa'i snying la thob// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// ljang nag gcer bu khro gtum ral pa
