can// byang gi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// ngag rtsub gnod sems can gyi snying la rgyob// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// phra men drag po las la bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rengs par khug pa smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// dam can gnad dbab las la bskul// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// las sngags so sos gzir gnon bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo

chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// btab pa'i rting gnon mtshon gyis gtub// khro bos mtshon cha'i char phab bsam// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// bsgral ba rnams kyi mthu rnams dang// rdzu 'phrul ldang mi nus par bya// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'gal byed sdig can dag/ rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// yak+sha kro ta'i zhal du ni// khams gsum bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'bul// lha rnams dkyil 'khor dam can lha srin rnams// ma nyes dpang gzugs bden pa bdar la ni// chos nyid bden pa gsang sngags byin rlabs dang// sangs rgyas mthu yis a b+hi tsar+Ya yi// brnag pa de dag dkar nag mtshams su gdab// sems gnas dran gzhi tsit+ta'i dkyil na ni// tshon gang 'od kyi kun gzhi lung ma bstan// phyi rtsa nang rtsa phyi nang gnyis kyi rtsa// nyon mongs yid dang rnam shes kun gzhi gsum// phyi rgyu nang gnas phyi nang gnyis kar rgyu// khrag rlangs byi'u ni leb ma'i mgo tsam la// de dkyil nr-i dud til 'bru tsam yang gnas// rtsa zhon khrag rgyu dbugs kyi rta byas nas// dkar nag mtshams kyi rtsa chen gsum la ni// drod tshad gtan la phab par gdab byas nas// srid pa gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chu rgyun 'bab// ma rig gnas su bsgral na ji ltar bsgral// bsgral tshe ba rgya 'dra bas gtums gnas pa// dug gsum rgyu la a yi gnas len gdab// ye shes drag po'i las sngags gnad la thebs// nyon mongs rgyu nyid gtor gyis 'phros pa las// ye shes 'od zer chen por gyur 'phros nas// bde gshegs thugs dam bskangs nas 'gro ba'i don kyang byas// thams cad a dkar byang chub sems su gyur// bsdus pas gser dngul zhig gar blugs pa bzhin// phur pa'i rtse yi a ni gnas len des// khab len rdo la lcags rnams 'du ba bzhin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dkar la 'tsher// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su bstim par bya// snang srid tshe bcud tshe yi dngos grub thob// khams gsum 'khor ba'i bag chags gdar sha bcad// nyon mongs 'khor ba thams cad dbyings su bsgral// rdo rje phur pas skye shi rtsad nas chod// dper na dri ma chu yis bkrus pa bzhin// khams gsum ye shes byang chub chu yis bkru// tshe lung khrus lung sgrol mchog dam pa yin// gzhan yang phur

pa'i gnas bstan pa// rtsa gcig bcwa brgyad bcu gnyis dang// brgyad dang lnga gsum gcig tu bstan// gdab pa'i dmigs ni re re la// rtsa bran rta rnga tsam gyi mgo// sran tsam 'od nag dkyil du ni// khrag gi nr-i ni til 'bru tsam// de la dmigs la gdab par bya// gzugs mthong nyon mongs phra dog skyes// mthong byed rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// mig gnyis la yang sras mchog ste// rna thos nyon mongs zhe sdang skyes// nyan byed rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// rna ba gnyis la sras mchog re// dri tshor nyon mongs nga rgyal skyes// snom byed rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// sna bug gnyis la sras mchog re// ro tshor nyon mongs 'dod chags skye// ro myong rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// lce yi dkyil du sras mchog re// dbang po rten byed gti mug gnas// tshe gnas rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// dpral ba'i dbyes su sras mchog gcig/ nga rgyal rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// tshig chad dam// bya byed rten dang dbral ba'i phyir// dpung pa gnyis la sras mchog re// srid pa rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i gnas su sras mchog re// gti mug 'khor rgyu rten dbral phyir// lte ba'i dkyil du sras mchog re// thams cad snyegs par byed pa'i rgyu// nyon mongs snyegs byed rten dbral phyir// rkang dbyi gnyis la sras mchog re// khams gsum 'khor ba skyed pa'i rgyu// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// pho mtshan dkyil du sras mchog gcig/ zhe sdang rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// snying gi dkyil du sras mchog gcig/ srid gsum rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// rtse chen gsum la sras mchog gsum// dbang po'i dngas ma mgo yin pas// khro bo mtshon cha'i char phab la// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sras mchog gcig/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa'i phyir// spyi bo'i gtsug nas rkang mthil du// sras mchog phur pa phyung la ni// khams gsum bsgral ba'i mchod pa bya'o// sran tsam 'od nag dkyil du ni// khrag gi nr-i ni til 'bru tsam// gnad sa de ru kun khyab pas// kun la de gzhin dmigs la gdab// gnad sar btab pa re re la// tshe lung khrus lung rdzogs pa re// bdag dang phur bu gzas pa po// sku gsung thugs su gnyis med bstim// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las gsum// gab pa'i gdams pa khong bkrar bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sras mchog phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gsang sngags dam pa ji ltar

lags// bskyed pa'i sngags ni ji ltar lags// gsod pa'i sngags ni ji ltar lags// phrin las sngags ni gang dang gang// gsang sngags bdag pos lung bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma kI la ya// dang po stong pa nyid du bsgom// rdo rje mtshon pa'i yi ge hUM// 'od 'phros bde gshegs dkyil 'khor gsal// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// de nas phyi nang mchod pa 'bul// A+oM ma hA shu+u n+ya tA dz+nyA badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de rjes mtshon pa'i yi ge hUM/ hUM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nIn baM hUM phaT// rtsa bas don bzhi rig par bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dIp+ta tsakra ha na hUM phaT/ yum bskyed pa'i sngags so// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho// dzaHhUM baM hoH// yab yum bskul ba'i sngags so// e ma sUr+ya maN+Da la// yaM pad+ma maN+Da la/ aM yum gyi mkha' dbyings byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags so// a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la// hUM A+oM badzra oM AHhUM swA hA// yab kyi mkha' byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags so/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM// khro bo bskyed pa'i sa bon byang chub kyi sems kyi sems kyi sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ sgrol chom kI la ya sod chom// dzaHhUM baM hoH// kI li kI la ya/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ti ra baM/ in+d+ra ya ti ra baM/ ag+na ye ti ra baM/ ya mA ya ti ra baM/ nair r-itA ya ti ra baM/ ba ru NA ya ti ra baM/ pA la be ti ra baM/ ku be rA ya ti ra baM/ I sha nA ya ti ra baM/ a d+hA praM thi bi ti ra baM/ dregs pa bcu bsgral ba'i sngags so// ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la/ dregs pa can rnams nyi zla pad+ma sum brtsegs kyis mnan pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta bi dza ya hUM// A+oM badzra kro ta nI la daN+Da hUM// A+oM badzra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta ha ya grI wa hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta a pA ra ji ta hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM// khro bo bcu bskyed pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kro tI sha ya tI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro ta lA se ki hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tA' tA dza hUM// A+oM badzra kro tI sh+ma shA na pa ti hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tI mu sa lI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tI tsaN+Da li hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tI sha bya ti hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tI sa byAM mi ta hUM/ A+oM badzra kro tI ma ra NI hUM/ oM badzra kro ti tsun da ya tI hUM/ khro mo rnams bskyed pa'i sngags so// badzra sU ka ra mu khA he/ badzra u pi Sha mu kha he/ badzra bya g+h+ra mu kha he/ badzra gra D+ha mu khI he/ badzra tsa ma ra mu kha he/ badzra dro Na mu khI he/ badzra ha ri Na ka mu kha he/ badzra U lu ka mu khI he/ badzra bya g+h+ra mu khA he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra pi DA la mu kha he/ badzra bak+Sha ti mu khA he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra ba tri mu khI he/ badzra sing ha mu kha he/ badzra ti

tI la mu khI he/ badzra tak+Shu mu kha he/ badzra na ku la mu kha he/ badzra ha r-ik+Sha mu kha he/ badzra mU Shi ka mu khI he/ de ni phra thabs bskyed pa'i sngags so/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la spu ta spu ta sarba na sha sa na hUM phaT// de ni sku'i sngags so/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+tAn pA ka shri ta sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ gsung gi sngags so/ A+oM badzra kI la ya/ tsit+ta tsit+ta hUM phaT/ de ni thugs kyi sngags so// gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ ti sta ti sta hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ s+pho ta s+pho ta hUM phaT/ khro bo bcu'i phrin las kyi sngags so// ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ra ya ha ta na hUM phaT/ shI g+h+rin A na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa la dz+wa la pa la hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ phra thabs yang sprul rnams kyi phrin las kyi sngags so// A+oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra nAn/ A+oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tAn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kI la ya d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA la wAka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags so/ A+oM laM hUM laM s+t+waM b+ha nan mo ha g+ha ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ hriHSh+t-I bi kri/ badzra hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ kI li kI la la/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAn/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra hUM kA ra a/ phrin las thams cad grub par byed pa'i sngags so// hUM pa ra bid+yan/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban+d+hA ban+d+hA hUM phaT/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka te/ dza ye be dza ye/ a tsid te/ a pa ra dzi ta/ ma ra sai na pra mar+d+ha na ye hUM phaT/ gdab pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+tAM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas lcags phur drag po'i phrin las kyi mi bzad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya su ru su ru u tsusma kro ta ya hUM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas skyer pa'i phur pa rgyas pa mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ bing bing mA ra ya hUM/ bde bar gshegs pas mchog phur zhi ba'i phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya aM ku sha tsan+d+hi tsan+d+hi mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas seng ldeng gi phur pa dbang gi phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya byA gri kha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas bya phur mngag pa'i phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya na ma sa man+ta

bi shud+d+he b+hai ra be mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas tsan+dan gyi phur pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi bzad pa'i bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// A+oM mA ma pa shaM ku ru ma tam dz+nyA ka ra i daM d+ha ti ma ma ka ra ma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ khro bo mtshon cha'i sngags so// sarba A na ya hUM phaT/ mthu 'phrog pa'i sngags so// ta thA ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ zil gyis gnan cing ldang mi nus par bya ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya// badzra kro ta/ kha tham kha tham kha tham// hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya badzra yak+sha kro ta khA hi khA hi badzra kro ta khA hi/ ha ha ha/ gtun du brdung zhing bstab pa'i sngags so// A+oM laM hUM laM la sogs pa ni gnan pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra kro ta phyi nan/ ha na ha na badzra la sogs mig gi rnam par shes pa gnan pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra kro ta sed sU nan/ ga sha trag nan/ da ha da ha badzra rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnan sngags so// oM badzrakI li kI la ya/ badzra kro ta shu la kha sa me nan// pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ a ra li tshal pa kha nan/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ nyos nyos 'byung ba bzhin du yang byung/ nyon mongs pa 'byung ba'i/ khub kum nan ma tha ma tha badzra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra/ go ro tsa na nan/ tshal pa nan/ tshal pa nan/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha badzra/ tsa na thil nan/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ kha ra phra thum khum nan/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM laM/ lhu gdum shig nan/ bin+da bin+da hUM laM/ sa ta su ha su ta nan/ su ru su ru hUM laM/ ka tang ka ye dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te a pa ra dzi ti mA ra sai na pra mar+d+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM laM/ mnan phur brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gnan pa'i sngags so// A+oM badzra satwa sa ma ya kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ sa ma ya hUM/ thams cad bka' nyan par byed pa'i sngags so// de nas A+oM laM la sogs pa'i sngags ni ri bo chen po'i 'og rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du gnan pa'i sngags so// karma sa twa sUr+Ya tsan+t+ra nan/ bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub par byed pa'i sngags so// raM dz+wa la raM s+pha ra na phaT/ ces me bskyed pa'i sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra kro ta dz+nyA na dz+wa la raM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye ma hA ka ru Ni Sha dr-i sh+yaho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ye shes kyi me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so// badzra kI li kI ka ya dz+nyA na ag+ne d+he ba dz+wa la raM hUM phaT/ me lha bskyed pa'i sngags so// s+pha ra na phaT/ spro ba'o// saM ha ra na hUM/ bsdu ba'o// raM sku sad phaT kyang bya sad hUM kur ye mo sad sku/ me bskyil ba'i sngags so// man man man ti phus/ rgyung le phus spyi ti kha la phus/ sarba sa phus/ mu le phus/ me sbar ba'i sngags so// oM AHhUM tri d+hi dris shi raM/ ma ma raM/ nyer nyer raM/ dz+wa la raM/ dz+nyA na raM/ ag+ne raM/ A+oM ba ya ba yu/ sa ra na ya/ s+pha ra na ya/ lam phu ye swA hA// me'i snying po drang ba'i sngags so// me gzi

byin bskyed pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya badzra kro ta ag+ne ye dz+nyA na dz+wa la raM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags so// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dz+nyA na de wa ag+ne rA tsa/ mA ra ya dz+wa la raM khA hi/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT/ kha raM DA ki dz+wa la raM khA hi/ kro d+ha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ ha la raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ to sha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ ma ma dz+wa la raM khA hi/ stam sham dz+wa la raM khA hi/ kro tI kha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ yo gI kha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ nyon mongs pa bsgral ba'i phung po ni/ dkyil 'khor lha'i zhal du/ kr-i kro ti kha raM dz+wa la raM kha hi/ mi bzad pa'i rdzas gdug pa can dang/ rnam rtog gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsreg pa'i sngags so// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs kyi sngags// bskyed dang rdzogs dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang// dgug dang de bzhin bstim pa dang// bcing dang mthu 'phrog gzir ba dang// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las gsum// gab pa'i sdom pa man ngag 'di'i// rgyud dkrug lung gcus bye brag rnams// bla ma'i thugs la rag lus pas// bla ma mnyes na rin chen rnyed// ras chod can la rgyud lung gcus// rang shes rig pa mi gzhug pa// rtog ge ba yis las skal min// lta ba zab mo rgyang du bor// spyod pa brlang po dang du blangs// gsang sngags zab mo bon du gyer// nga rgyal gtum khro rang gar byed// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// dam tshig yid la mi dran pas// gang la bsam pa mi 'grub cing// bar du srog la bar chad 'byung// de nas rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// de lta bu ni ma yin te// mang du thos la las la mkhas// rgyud 'grel blo zhen sgrub la zhugs// gdeng can ldog med sems dang ldan// phrag dog med cing khong khro med// gzhan la re ba mi 'jog cing// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// ma nyams nges thub gzhung bzhin bsrung// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor des// las su bya ba thams cad 'grub// dang por shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la yid ches nas// de nas dbang gsum rdzogs pa dang// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba gzung bar bya'o// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang// rdzun tshig brlang po spyad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang// zil pa mAM sa dang du blang// phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid ngang du gnas// theg pa bsam yas sems la gsal// lta ba mi 'gyur gdeng du 'jog/ sgom pa ma yengs don rab gsal// dam tshig nyan thos khrims bzhin bsrungs// rgyud 'grel sgrub thabs kun la mkhas// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu 'chang// don dang man ngag gzhung du bsgrub// tha ma phyogs rab 'dzin la mkhas// tshul dang ngang tshul bzang la shis// sbyor sgrol mchod pa rgyun mi gcod/

rnal 'byor rtogs ldan dam pa des// las su bya ba kun rdzogs nas// 'dzab zlos grangs med rgyun 'don pas// sngags dang phyag rgya mthu byin che// las dang bya ba gdon mi za// nges par brtsams pas ci 'dod 'grub// las su gtor ma gzhung srong zhing// ci bgyis bka' nyan 'khol mkhas pas// ci bgol phrin las sgrub par byed// drag shul thabs kyi pho nya ni// rdzu 'phrul phrin las shugs kyis 'gyed// rnam rtog mtshan ma thabs kyis 'joms// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur// shes pa'i nang na dam pa ni// rgyud 'grel blo zhen sgrub la zhugs// yi dam lha la rtag gnas pas// de la ras chod 'byung mi srid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan khrag 'thung badzra kI la ya// phyag rgya'i byin rlabs yon tan dang// sngags zlos phyag rgya ji ltar lags// nges pa'i don rnams ji ltar 'grub// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// badzra kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya dang// phyag rgya'i yon tan bshad pa ni// lag g.yas rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcas// g.yon pas phur pa bcangs nas su// brkyang bskum bgrad nas khro tshul gnas// spyan bzlog mtshe gtsigs zhal yang gnyer// ku mA ra yi phyag rgya yin// rtsa ba'i sngags ni drag tu bzlas// las sngags zhabs la btags pas ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// lha srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol// srid pa gsum yang zil gyis gnon// phan gnon smon lam 'gyur shog 'grub// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis stangs stabs mdzad// yum gyi gsang sngags drag tu bzlas// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad mnyes// dngos grub chen po thob par nges// g.yas pa dor zhing g.yon pa bgrad// lag g.yas s+t+wa re gyen du phyar// g.yon pa phur bu 'debs pa'i tshul// gzugs phung gcu zhing zur mig blta// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag po bzlas pa ni// sras mchog phur pa'i phyag rgya yin// sangs rgyas nyid kyang brgyal bar 'gyur// dgra bgegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// g.yon pa mdzub bsgreng snying gar gtad// g.yas pa thal mo gyen du bsgreng// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// hUM kA ra yi phyag rgya yin// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas pas ni// dgra bgegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// srid gsum ma lus dbang

du sdud// rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni// g.yon pa mdzub bsgreng snying gar gtad// g.yas pa mdzub bkug lcags kyu'i tshul// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// rlung dang thog ser chu chen dang// gang ltar 'dod pa zlog par byed// dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgya ni// g.yon pa mdzub bsgreng snying gar gtad// g.yas pa rtse gsum gyen du phyar// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// ri rab yul mkhar 'jigs pa dang// gang la dmigs pa chom par 'gyur// gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs la ni// gung gnyis sprad de bsgreng bar bya// rgyab kyi tshigs pa mdzub mos dkri// mtheb gnyis gshibs te mdun bzhag la// kha yi tshul du byas la ni// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// gzhan gyi smyo 'bog thul bar 'gyur// bsad bcad dgug pa thogs pa med// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe chung bkug/ mdzub mo gung mo'i srin lag bsgreng// g.yon pa phur pa 'debs pa'i tshul// g.yas pa ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// 'jig rten lha 'dre 'dar zhing sngangs// gang la mngags pa'i phrin las byed// gnod pa bskrad na myur du zhi// rta mgrin rgyal po'i phyag rgya ni// mthe'u chung gnyis ni lu gu rgyud// mdzub mo gnyis ni gshibs bsgreng la// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// gdug pa klu yi 'jigs las thar// mdzub ris byas pas ser ba bzlog/ bzlog pa gang yang thogs chags med// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis khu tshur so sor bcangs// rgyab sprad mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad nas ni// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// dam can gnad la phebs pa dang// lha srin sde brgyad 'dar zhing bred// ma bcol bar yang phrin las mdzad// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gis// mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan// lhag ma gsum po dpung mgor bsnol// gzugs phung gcu zhing brgyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don la bskyod// lha srin rnams ni

las la bskyod// bgegs dang 'byung po'i gnod pa bskyod kyang skyob// ngan song 'khor ba gnas nas bskyod skyob// las dang bya ba thams cad 'grub// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs la ni// mdzub gnyis bsgreng ste sdigs mdzub 'phyar// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// brag la dmigs na brul bar 'gyur// chu la dmigs na skams par 'gyur// me la dmigs na 'chi bar 'gyur// rlung la dmigs na 'chad par 'gyur// khams gsum 'khor ba las rgyal 'gyur// stobs po che yi phyag rgya ni// g.yon pa phur bu 'debs pa'i tshul// g.yas pa gtun shing brdeg pa'i tshul// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// tha nang byung na char pa 'bebs// char pa ches na gcod par byed// phan gnon 'gyur shog stobs dang ldan// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// rnal 'byor rjes 'jug dngos grub thob// thar pa'i lam las ldog mi srid// lag gnyis sor mo nang du bsnol// nang du phur pa bcug pa ni// phur pa bskyed pa'i phyag rgya yin// mtheb mdzub gnyis kyi bar du ni// phur pa bcug la yas mar mngag/ phur pa bskul ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// phur pa bcug ste dril byas na// phur pa 'dril ba'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas gtad// g.yas pa tho ba brdeg pa'i tshul// phur pa brdeg pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi rting sbyar nas// gung mo'i rtse mo sprad pa ni// phur pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub bkug lcags kyu'i tshul du byas// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon lag pa sor mo sbrel yang bsgreng// tshigs chen bkug nas zur du bya// mthe bong gshibs nas mdun bzhag pa// ri rab kyis gzir phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub bsgreng dmigs la gtad pa ni// g.yas pa zhags pa 'phen tshul bya// yan lag bcings pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon sor mo bsnol la ni// brkyang ste kha ni sbub pa ni// gzugs la 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// gung mo bsgreng nas rtse sprad pa// brdeg pa'i tshul du byas pa ni// bka' bsgo bran bzhin nyan pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis mthe bo mthe'u chung mnan// sor mo gsum po gshibs bsgreng nas// ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul

du byas// dgra bgegs rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyag rgya yin// phra thabs yang sprul so so rnams// gtso bo'i phyag rgya ji bzhin bya// nges pa med pa rgyal bas gsungs// gzhan yang phyag rgya la sogs pa// yang dag rtogs na kun kyang rgya// ma rtogs pa la rtog pa gzhil// sngags dang ting 'dzin ma nor na// las dang bya ba de yis 'grub// ting 'dzin zhan na gzhung du bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI li ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bde gshegs phyag rgya de lags na// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// sku mdog phyag mtshan ji ltar lags// so so'i bye brag bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor nga yi rjes 'jug rnams// bskyed rim ting 'dzin thabs ni 'di yin gyi// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ku mA ra la bstod phyag 'tshal// nga ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i yab// khams gsum snying rje sgrol mchog ste// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag/ sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang// rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang// snying rje rngams dang zhi ba la sogs pa// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yis// bdud bzhi gtan nas 'joms pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg sgeg 'dra// sku che yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhad pas rgod rgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs pas gshe gshe 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la gnag pas khro khro 'dra// zhal nas gdug rtsub 'byin pas rngam rngam 'dra// rgyud drug thugs rjes 'dzin pas snying rje che che 'dra// chos sku mtshan ma med pas zhi zhi 'dra// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs sku gshegs su gsol// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs sku gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse lngas rgyud lnga'i rtog pa sgrol// me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum nyon mongs bsreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ri rab phur bus khams gsum dbang du sdud// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po hUM kA ra// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngon zhal// phyag

drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis be con sogs le bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur bu bsnams// thod pa skam rlon phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje sgra 'byin chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// dbu+u gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje mda' snyems chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngo// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis me dbal dbyug to bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje sder mo chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// g.yas sngo g.yon lngang dbus sngo zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis dgra s+t+wa be con bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje dur khrod chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dur dmar yab la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon// g.yas sngo g.yon smug dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma gshol dang ral gri bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje gtun khung chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis sbrul zhags khra yang bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje gtum mo chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus dmar skya// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis ba dan rnga yab bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje mda' snyems chos kyi

dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ni// g.yas ser g.yon dud dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma rgya gram dbyug to bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje rlung 'byin chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang ser// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma tri shUl mda' gzhu bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje gsod ma chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo chen po stobs po che// g.yas nag g.yon dmar dbus dud ka/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rdo b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar gnyis gtun shing mdung thung bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje bskyod ma chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// phra thabs nyi shu'i sku mdog ni// g.yas g.yon rigs dang sbyar bar bya// phra thabs nyi shu'i phyag rgya ni// gtso bo rnams kyi bar ma byin// shar gyi sgo ma lcags sku mdog dkar// lho yi sgo ma zhags pa sku mdog sngo// nub kyi sgo ma lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar// byang gi sgo ma dril bu sku mdog ljang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la// 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya// lus 'di dngos por blta ba la// dngos po gzhil na ji ltar lags// thugs nyid ye nas ma bcos nyid// gdug pa 'dul ba'i skur bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ lus 'di dngos por 'dzin pa la// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// g.yeng ba'i sems can don du bsdu// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor lus la bskyed// phung po lnga ni gnas su dag/ gzugs kyi phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rtsa la bud+d+ha he ru bskyed// rnam shes phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// sa yi rtsa la badzra he ru bskyed// tshor ba'i phung po

gnas su dag pa'i phyir// chu yi rtsa la rat+na he ru bskyed// 'du shes phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// me yi rtsa la pad+ma he ru bskyed// 'du byed phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rlung gi rtsa la karma he ru bskyed// 'byung ba lnga ni rgyal ba'i yum lnga'i mkha'// dngos por 'dzin pa gnas su dag pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku ru bskyed// zhe sdang gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rna ba'i gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba bskyed// nga rgyal gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dpung pa'i gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bskyed// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i phyir// pho mtshan gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo rta mgrin bskyed par bya// phra dog gnas su dag pa'i phyir// mig 'bras gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed// rdzun du smra ba gnas su dag pa'i phyir// lce yi gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po bskyed// srog gcod gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dpung g.yon gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po bskyed// ma byin len pa gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rkang mthil gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub bskyed// gnod sems gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rkang g.yon gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal bskyed// log lta gnas su dag pa'i phyir// mig g.yon gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo hUM kA la ya bskyed// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i phyir// lte ba gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo chen po stobs chen bskyed// btang snyoms byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men phag gi mgo can bskyed// g.yo sgyu byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men smig bu'i mgo can bskyed// dpa' rtsal byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men stag gi mgo can bskyed// thogs med byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men bya rgod mgo can bskyed// gzi brjid byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men g.yag gi mgo can bskyed// rang rig byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men bya rog mgo can bskyed// gtsang ma srong byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men sha ba'i mgo can bskyed// phra la gting zab don rtogs byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men 'ug pa'i mgo can bskyed// 'khor ba rngam 'joms byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men gzig gi mgo can bskyed// mi tshor 'joms byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men khA yi mgo can bskyed// gzi myur 'joms byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men byi la'i mgo can bskyed// thabs mkhas rdzu 'phrul byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men pu shud mgo can bskyed// rngam mgyogs gsod byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men spyang mo'i mgo can bskyed// 'dzin cing mgyogs byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men khra yi mgo can bskyed// gnyen po gzhal [(1[)]

med byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men seng ge'i mgo can bskyed// shes rab thabs mkhas byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men pha wang mgo can bskyed// gtum shing gdug pa byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men drod kyi mgo can bskyed// mgyogs shing gze ba byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men zer mo'i mgo can bskyed// rtsal chen thogs med byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men dom gyi mgo can bskyed// rku mkhas sgrol byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men byi ba'i mgo can bskyed// yang sprul sum sprul rang rang gis// srid pa rlung yang mi thar gtams// snying rje byang chub sems dang ldan// rkang mthil g.yas pa lcags kyu ma// byams pa byang chub sems dang ldan// lag mthil g.yas la zhags pa ma// dga' ba byang chub sems dang ldan// lag mthil g.yon pa lcags sgrog ma// btang snyoms byang chub sems dang ldan// rkang mthil g.yon pa dril bu ma// lus 'di dngos por 'dzin pa rnams// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'dzin pa las// lus 'di ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// ye nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// bskyed kyang mi dgos rang bzhin gnas// sngags dran snying po brjod pa tsam// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs su rtogs// rgya mtshor nyi zla gza' skar ltar// snang la rang bzhin med par stogs// thugs ni ye nas stong pa nyid// stong pa nyid kyi cho 'phrul ni// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gnas// spyan drang mchod bstod bya ru med// lhangs kyis rtogs na spyan drang yin// gnyis su med na mchod pa yin// de nyid gus brtson bstod pa yin// ting 'dzin mi gtong sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// lus dngos por blta ba gnas su dag par bya ba dang// gdug pa can btul ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// mchod byin mchod pa mi 'tshal lam// phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod gsum// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod gsum// rmad du byung ba'i mchod sbyin zhes// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// ting 'dzin brtan pa thob nas ni// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan sems can snying re rje// zhing bcu rgyu 'bras mi shes pa// blo ngan 'jig rten yun du 'khor// snying rjes bzung zhing bsgral

ba'i thabs// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// gnas ni yab yum mkha' la 'phang// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur phyir// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bsgral ba'i rnam shes hUM gsal bsgom// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bteg/ dza yi lcags kyus dgug bstim bya/ bdag gi thugs nas khar bton la// shangs kyi rlung sgrom dung khang nang// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bskur bya// sgal tshigs rta brgyud rdo rje'i lam// yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' la spros// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o// yum gyi mkha' gsang dkyil 'khor las// spros pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mchod// bsdus pas bdag gi thugs kar thim// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum du// gnas nas thim nas rdo rje'i lam// yum gyi mkha' la gang bar spros// yum gyi mkha' gsang dkyil 'khor las// rgyal ba mchod cing bdag mchod la// de nas mgal me bskor ba bzhin// yang nas yang du spro bsdus mchod// bdag nyid mnyes pas thams cad mnyes// gsang mchod rmad du byung zhes pa'o// nang mchod rmad du byung ba ni// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha lngar// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang// mAM sa byang chub sems bkod la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// so so'i bcud bsdus phyogs phyogs bstim// thim pas 'od du zhu ba las// A+oM a mr-i ta hrI hUM tha zhes brjod pas// dkar 'tsher byang chub sems su gyur// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// bden pa'i sngags dang byin brlabs rdzas// nus mthu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag par bsngo// bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// gang dang gang gis phul mchod na// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob par nges// rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa yi// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nang mchod rmad du byung ba'o// phyi ma mchod rmad du byung ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la// rin po che yi snod dag tu// 'tsho ba'i zas rigs ci yang rung// 'og tu yi ge yaM bsams la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bus// rgya gram ba dan phyar pa'o// rlung gi sa bon 'khrigs par bsam// de steng raM las me'i dkyil 'khor// kha dog dmar po 'bar ba la// me yis sa bon 'khrigs par bsam// de steng oM AHhUM swA hA lnga// s+pha ra Na phaT kyis rlung g.yos pas// me spar thams cad dngos po bsregs// hUM nyid dkar por yongs su gyur// rdo rje dkar po gcig gyur te// rdzas kyi skyon rnams dag par gyur// de nas a dkar gcig tu gyur// a las 'od zer spros pas ni// so so'i gnas rnams rin chen khang// de dag byin gyis brlab par bya// ri bo phang phung rin chen phung por brlab// chu rnams bdud

rtsi chen por brlab// rtsi shing dpag bsam 'dod dgur brlab// sgra skad mchod mchod bstod byed par brlab// gos rnams lhab lhub byin gyis brlab// 'gro ba mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// rgyan gyis mdzes shing mchod rdzas thogs// bder gshegs rnams la mchod byed bsam// sngon du ci 'phrad la sogs pa// me tog phung por byin gyis brlab// me tog phreng ba rab mchog ste// bde gshegs rnams la mchod par bsngo// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma yang// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams su// thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di brjod// pU dza s+pha ra Na phaT/ ba liM b+huny+dza/ dzi g+h+ra phul+la/ d+hup+pe duSh+pe A lo ke g+han+d+he/ pUts+tsha s+pha ra Na hUM/ maM sa biM ga/ am+ba saspa kadz+dza sA dA/ khan+ti khu Ni/ phe Da ga da a kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twa ta oM AHhUM swA hA// ting 'dzin sngags dang tshigs su brjod// skad cig mi dmigs chos nyid bstim// de ltar gzhung byed rnal 'byor de// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de la dam du bcas pa ni// tshul khrims pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de la bsam pa yongs su dag/ bsam gtan pha rol phyin par 'gyur// rnal 'byor de la brtson pa ni// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de la yang dag don dgongs pa// shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di la tshe ring zhing// nad med gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// bu lon lan chags bral ba dang// phas kyi rgol tshar chod 'gyur// longs spyod 'byor pa 'phel ba dang// 'jig rten 'di la bde skyid tshogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi mchod pa de// phyi yi mchod pa dam pa'o// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi rgyal po karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// dpyang thag chad pa'i ngan khung 'khor ba la// thugs rjes bzung nas rdzu 'phrul bstan pa 'di// 'di lta bu yi rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar che// 'di yi rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lung bdun bskyed pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas yang badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ nga yi rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang po kun gzhi stong pa nyid// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// thugs ni yang dag rdo rje nyid// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog pa las 'das// de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya// de rjes mtshon pa'i rgyu

bstan pa// ye shes mtshon pa rgyu yi lung// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// thugs kyi mtshon pa rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang rig ci yang ma yin pa// hUM nyid byang chub sems su bsgom// ye shes rtog pa gzhil ba'i lung// sa bon dgu yis sbyong byed bskyed yang bya// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// de rjes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa'i lung// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// kun rdzob sgyu mar snang ba yis// rig pa so sor gnas gyur pa// srog sems go ru shar bas rdo rje gzhon nur shar// thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya'o// tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang du ye shes sems dpa'i thugs// rdo rje'i chang zung bzlas pa'i 'bras bus bskor bar bsgom// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// rang rig ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang// rig pa so sor snang ba ku mA rar bsgoms la// snying rje byang chub sems ni gnyis su med// shes rab dbyings kyi rtags su yum nyid bsgom// dam tshig snying rjes bsgral bas bsad mnan ma yin no// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// bdag dang snang srid bsgral ba'i lus ngag yid gsum ni// rig pa so sor snang ba sku gsung thugs su shes// ye shes sku la phra mo mang pos gtams// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i bdag dang sems can rnams// bdag dang snang srid rnam par shes pa'i tshogs// 'dus ma byas kyi rdo rje dbyer med bsgom// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bdag rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces zhus so// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// snang srid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// ku mA ra ru yab yum bsgom// mkha' gsang gnyis ni byin brlabs la// e steng nyi ma pad+ma brgyad// zla ba rdo rje rtse lnga A// dzaHyis dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzung// hUM gis stod smad 'khyud la ni// baM gyis thugs mtshan sbyar ba'o// hoHyis dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o// s+t+waM dang ho yis bskul ba ni// de nas gnyis med sbyor ba bya// pad+ma la ni rdo rje gzhug/ rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor 'khyil// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa// byang chub sems su rab phab nas// yab yum gnyis med bstab pas dgyes// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang

la bzhugs// byang chub sems ni dkar la 'tsher// yum gyi mkha' la gang bar lud// thogs med 'od zer lan gcig spros// rdo rje'i brag chen gtams pa'o// gnyis pa sras mchog grangs med spros// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa la// tho ba g.yas na lcags kyu g.yon// dregs pa pho mo bzung zhing ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas la brdeg/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcur// dregs pa spyi chings bsnol mar dbab// gsum pa me yi 'od zer spro// bzhi pa a yi 'od zer spro// lnga pa baM gyi 'od zer spro// drug pa byang sems hUM sgril bcu// spro ba yum gyi mkha' la spro// skyed pa yab kyis bskyed par bya// rang rang gsang sngags skur rdzogs pa'o// snang srid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la// yang sprul sum sprul grangs med kyis// rlung yang mi thar gtams pa'o// ye shes gnyis med spyan drangs bstim// kI la ya yi sgra chen ni// gsang sngags rab tu 'brug stong ldir// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// skye shi 'khor ba dbyings su bsgral// dregs pa thams cad mngon spyod bsgral// nyom mongs bag chags gdar sha bcad// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang badzra karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzrakI la ya// srid pa gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chu rgyun 'bab// ma rig gnas su bsgral na ji ltar bsgral// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ srid pa gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chu rgyun babs// ma rig gnas su bsgral ba ngas bstan gyi// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// ku mA ra ru bdag bsgoms pas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer bskul// dbyings las ye shes gzugs kyi skur bzhengs la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa// rtse mo ye shes 'od zer 'pho// gsal ba rnam gsum ldan par bya// khrus lung rnam gsum rdzogs byas la// rnam shes rten ni dag par bya// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// gab pa'i man ngag sdom pa klong bcu yis// gnad chen bdun la gdab par bya// re re la yang rtsa brgyad do// tha ma rtsa gcig bdun du'o// 'byung ba bzhi dang rgyu bzhi la// thog brdzis klong phab 'gyur med kyis// bzhi'i mdo'i dngas ma zhe sdang rtsad nas bcad// dbugs kyi rta bsgral phrag dog rtsad nas bcad// sems kyi yul phyung nga rgyal rtsad nas bcad// dngas

ma'i gnas slebs 'dod chags rtsad nas bcad// tshe yi rten dbral gti mug rtsad nas bcad// kun gyi gnas bcom rten 'brel gting byung la// khab len rdo la lcags rnams 'du ba ltar// bkrag mdangs phrogs nas tshe lung bstan par bya'o// tshe lung la yang rnam gnyis te// dug lnga gnas su dag pa ye shes lnga// rnam shes gnas su dag pas rgyal ba'i sras su bya// de ka kho yi tshe lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ man ngag phur gcig ma'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom badzra kI la ya// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas// gsal ba rnam gsum gsal byas la// mngon spyod bsgral ba mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// gsang ba mchog gi phrin las zab mo la// nyon mongs phyin ci log gi dbang byas te// snying rje byang chub sems dang ma ldan par// zhe sdang dbang gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// thos bsam shes rab gsal bar ma gyur par// gti mug dbang gis gsang ba'i don ma rtogs// gsang sngags gnyis med yon tan ma rtogs par// nga rgyal dbang gis bdag nyid gcig pur bzung// khengs drag dbang gis slob dpon sku la bsdos// sri zhu chung bas rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams// dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i rnal 'byor dam bsrung la// phrag dog dbang gis bdag bstod gzhan la smod// khe rngam dbang gis ras chod 'dod dgar spyod// gzhan mthong tsam na snying nas skur 'debs shing// gnyis med don dam zab mo rgyab tu bor// rgyu 'bras don ma rtogs pas zhe sdang chen po bskyed// nga ni theg chen khro bo'i rgyal po zer// spyod pa dpa' brlangs dang du blangs// nga rgyal khro gtum rang khar gtong// gsang sngags zab mo'i don la bon du gyer// thugs rje byang chub sems dang mi ldan pas// kha la gnas sbyong zer zhing sbyor sgrol byed// rgyu mthun 'bras bus las kyi srin por skyes// sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi lha srin mthu bo che// 'jig rten khams su mdangs 'phrog srog bcad nas// de yi rnam smin rdo rje dmyal bar skye// de rnams rgyu mthun rnam smin de 'dra bas// gsang sngags rdo rje'i rnal 'byor de ma yin// gsang sngags rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag don// da lta nyid du sku gsung thugs 'dod na// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// mun pa'i nang du rin chen stor ba ni// sgron me btegs pas rin chen rnyed par 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di

la thos bsam na// da lta nyid du sku gsung thugs nyid do// lta spyod brlang po spyad na tshogs su 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// lcags kyi rim bu chur bsgyur gting du 'gro// de nyid snod du byas pas kha ru phyo// lta spyod brlang po spyad pas tshogs su 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// nam mkha' stong pa nyid las sprin dang na bun 'byung// 'brug dang khu rlangs bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bab// sa gzhi snum nas lo tog rgyas pa dang// 'bras bu smin nas sems can gsos su 'gyur// lta spyod brlang po spyad pas tshogs su 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam nas// skye med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nyid las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang bstan pa ni// thugs nyid zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sku nyid khro bo'i cha lugs bstan// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum yang// gtso bo'i dbyings las ye shes gcig/ rang rig nyid du shes spyad na// mtho yor las ni mir shes bzhin// sgyu ma lta bu'i blo dang ldan// spyod bzhi ma chags chu la nya// mkha' la bya lta bu yi tshul gyis ni// skyon ma gos par tshogs gnyis 'gyur// gdul bya'i dbang gis sangs rgyas bstan// rang rig ye shes gnyis med gzhan nas btsal du med// rig pa yul gyis mi 'phrogs rig 'dzin sa// rgyu dang 'bras bu mnyam pas mthong grol rdzogs/ sga ma rdzas kyang// nus mthu go phye rig pas khyab pa'i phyir// gang du nus pa'i mthur ldan mthar phyin kho na'o// rgyu 'bras drag zhan med pas ro gcig pas// rgya mtsho chen por nyi zla gza' skar ltar// snang la rang bzhin med pas gzhan gyi gzugs// dang po gang la byung ba tha dad ma yin te// gzugs snang thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum sku// grag pa thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsung// shes rig thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum thugs// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// gnyis med don de shes na yang dag don// gsal ba rnam gsum bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ltar// nam mkha'i sprin dang lung stong bra cha bzhin// gnyis med so so ma yin tha dad med// don de shes na yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// de nyid rnal 'byor gnyis med dngos med bsgral/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ lta spyod dngos med kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bde bar gshegs pa'i lung zab thos bsam pas// de nyid sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs nyid dam// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa

rnams// nad pa nad kyis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal ba// sman pa mkhas brtson phrad na nad sel ltar// sman pa mkhas mchog gso bar brtson pa yis// nad kyi gnyen po brlang por bstan pa las// nad pas ma spyad nad kyang sel mi 'gyur// sngags kyi brtul zhugs bsgoms bsgrub de bzhin no// skyes bus 'gros kyis rta yi lam btsal na// mdur gyi dkyus kyi rta yi lam bstan kyang// ma brgyug bar du dus sar sleb mi 'gyur// sngags kyi brtul zhugs bsgom bsgrub de bzhin no// dper na mi gcig so ka'i nags tshal bsreg 'dod pas// rtsa dang gtsub shing lag gi 'du byed shes// ma bsrubs bar du me ni 'byung mi 'gyur// bsrubs nas me mthong bar du 'phro mi gcad// rtags phran tsam la yengs nas me nyid chad par 'gyur// sngags kyi brtul zhugs bsgom bsgrub de bzhin no// ri klung shod nas ri bo chen po'i rtse mo ru// ka la ping ka'i phru gu'i sgra dbyangs ltar// yud tsam gyis ni nam 'phang bcad nas slebs// sngags kyi bsgoms sgrub brtul zhugs de bzhin no// dpe mang rigs pas btsud na lung dang 'gal// de bas bla ma'i lung dang gdams ngag la// gdong can bzlog med bsgrub na 'bras bu myur du rnyed// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa'i dus tshod ni// rab kyis zla ba gcig na 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig dag na 'grub// tha mas lo gsum dag na 'grub// phyi ma'i dus la mi sdod par// tshe gcig 'di nyid dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// man ngag rtseg ma gsum gyi don rtogs rnal 'byor de// ting 'dzin mi gtong da ltar sangs rgyas nyid// grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bring ni bdun 'bum mam// rab ni nyin zhag re la bcu phrag bcu// mi tshe gnyis kyis phyag rgya'i rig 'dzin sa// dngos grub rnam gnyis dus der thob par 'gyur// dus kyi bsnyen pa lo zla ma yol bar// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang gsum rdzogs byas shing// bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin dam tshig ma nyams na// mi tshe gsum gyis phyag rgya'i rig 'dzin sa// dngos grub rnam gnyis dus der thob par 'gyur// mchod pa lo zla 'das na nyams pa dang// rdo rje spun gyi nang du khong khro mnar sems nyams// ngan sems dpya sems khro sems nyams pa la// lo zla dus su nyams skongs bshags brtson bya// phyi bshags nang bshags tshogs ni brgya rtsa dbul// de yis nyams skongs sor gsol gong bzhin 'gyur// dus las 'das pas nyams pa skong mi 'gyur// 'bras bu med cing de nyid brlag par 'gyur// rdo rje spun la ngan sems dpya sems pas// dbul po'i nang nas lkugs pa mdze can dag/ kha mig yon po

yan lag ma tshang pa// de nyid bor nas dmyal khams bcu po dag/ yang dag don dam gnyis med mi shes pas// da ni theg chen sbyor sgrol dngos por blta// rgyu mthun pa yis gnod sbyin mthu bo che// mdangs 'phrog srog gcod de yi las rdzogs nas// de nyid bor nas dmyal khams bcu po dag/ dam log rdo rje 'khus pa'i khong khro can// rkyen las byung ba'i dam sri'i lus len drod nyul ma// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs byas nas// brag bar phyir mi thon pa'i sbrul du skye// de nyid bor nas dmyal khams bcu po dag/ rdo rje dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sngags kyi brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// rnal 'byor las ni dang po la// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal lam// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gru gsum mthing nag drag po'i dbus// zla gam dmar po dbang gi rten// zlum po dkar po zhi ba nyid// ser po gru bzhi rgyas pa'o// bar khyams sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang// dug lnga'i rten gyi rdzas rnams la// yang sprul rtod cing za ba'i tshul// phyogs bzhi mtshams su bri bar bya// dar mtshon sna lnga'i 'phan phran gdags// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi rtags// sgo rnams dag la bri bar bya// stong gsum ye shes gzhal yas khang// mthing nag me 'bar phur bu'i lha// 'od zer 'bum phrag bsam mi khyab// de lta bu ru bskyed par bya// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor kyi le'u ste shu gcig pa'o//// yang karma he ru kas/ kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phrin las rnam bzhi gzhal yas khang// yon tan yid bzhin dkyil 'khor 'di// bde gshegs thugs rje 'byung ba'i shul// snang srid 'khor ba bsgral ba'i gnas/ rnal 'byor dngos grub thob pa'i sa// dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i sa// bskyed dang spyan drang gnyis med bstim// mchod bstod yan lag rdzogs byas na// dngos grub ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru

kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// snang srid ye nas sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid phung po ye sangs rgyas// gzhan nas spyan drangs mchod bstod mi 'gal lam/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// gang la gang nas ji ltar du// gang du gang phyir gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir// kI li ya yi dngos grub stsol// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sbyan drang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bde gshegs thugs kyi gsang sngags 'di// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags 'di// chos kyi sku yi ngo bo yin pas na// ye shes lnga yi sgra yis dug lnga gnas su bsreg/ dregs pa 'dul mdzad dug 'dul sngags kyi sgra// sngags ni byin rlab che bas sangs rgyas mthu// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab gsang sngags 'dis// smra bzhin ma yin yid la bzlas mi chad// bum pa'i nang du mar me btang ba bzhin// rang la gsal zhing gzhan gyis mthong ba min// glen pa'i rtul zhugs brtson 'grus drag po yis// rnam gsum gsal zhing sngags sgra ma nyams par// mi tshig bar ma chod cing sems g.yeng min// shes rab me la brtson 'grus rlung gis bskyod// dug gsum gnas su bsreg pas sku gsum 'grub// tshe gcig nyid la sku gsung thugs nyid do// mtshams med rigs pas log pas dmyal bar ltung nges pa// rnam gsum gsal zhing sngags kyi 'od zer spro// tshur 'dus gnyis su med par bstim byas na// gzhan gyi rig pa sbyor ba lta ci smos// ngan song de yi gnas su ltung mi srid// thar pa'i lam la rig pa'i me tog bor 'bar yang// sngags kyi sgra la yan lag bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi sgra bshad byin nyams dngos grub yal// gsung gi sdom pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di// dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis gnyis su med// bskyed mi dgos par rdzogs pa'i lung// mthu dpung 'od zer rab tu 'bar// bde bar gshegs pa'i mthu ni rang gi rig pa'i mthu// gzhan la re ba 'jog pas mthu mi rnyed// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud

las/ thugs kyi gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// nyams pa bdun po bsgral ba la// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// rnam shes rten ni ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// 'byung ba bzhi ni pad+ma bzhi// rgyu bzhi rtsa chen bzhi po dag/ rnam par shes pa'i rten can yin// dkar po dmar nag mthing ga ser// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rtsa// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtsa// glo bur rgyud la 'dzin pa'i rtsa// skyon yon dbang po dang byed rtsa// khrag dngas dbugs dngas dbang po dngas// rtsa dngas nyid la zhe sdang rgyu// de bzhin rim pas rgyu ba'o// kun gzhi yid dang rnam par shes// dbang po la sogs de bzhin rgyu// bzhi mdo'i dngas ma dag la ni// rta rnga bcur gshags dkar po la// khrag dngas dmar po byi'u leb mgo/ de la dbugs dngas drod gnas pa// yod de mi mngon ser rlangs tsam// de la 'od kyi dngas ma chags// kha dog lnga yi sems yul rgyas// de la tshe yi rten gnas pa// dkar po ba rgya bcings pa'i tshul// de rnams dbus na rnam shes bcud// sems gnas dran gzhi'i dngas ma la// sems can dran gzhi tsit+ta'i dkyil// tshon gang 'od kyi thig ler gnas// kun gzhi cha phra yid rig dang// rnam shes brgya dang nyon mongs lnga// rtog pa thams cad de yi cha las byung// rnam shes bcud dang dran pa'i dngas ma ni// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med rang bzhin gnas// glo bur rgyud las 'dzin pa'i log rtog gis// srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing rgyud drug smin// thog ma med par bsags pa'i bag chags sgrib// nyon mongs rgyu mthun rnam smin 'bras bu ni// gos dreg gang bzhin rtsegs nas ma gyag gnas// de yi sa bon las rnams rim bzhin 'byung// las dbang btsan pa'i mthu ni zlog par dka'// gal te las dbang btsan te bzlog med min// de bas rnal 'byor rjes 'jug bzlog med mthus// rtsa kha'i me shor nags ri bcom pa bzhin// rnam gsum a yi gnas len byang sems kyis// nyon mongs rten can gnas ni dus gcig bcom// bskul ba las kyi gsang sngags 'di// gab pa'i man ngag klong bcu yis// gnad chen bdun la phur gcig mas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyis// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas shing gdab// re re la yang rtsa brgyad do// tha na rtsa gcig bdun du'o// rnam shes rten ni

brtag par gces// bskul ba las kyi gsang sngags la// yon tan nyi shu gcig rdzogs pa// dwangs ma bdun po rim bzhin du// gab pa'i sdom pa rim bzhin bzung// gzas pa'i tshe yi rten ni phral// nyon mongs kun gyi gnas kyang bcom// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas pa'i gab sbas dang// rnam gsum a yi gnas len byang sems kyis// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad dag sbyar la// rnam shes rten rtogs tshe rten phur btab na// de la mi thebs mi srid 'gyur ba med// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa mod la 'jig/ min mda' bzhin du phyogs tshod 'phangs pa yis// thebs par mi 'gyur rang rgyud bsreg pa las// gong ma'i don de de ltar de bzhin na// skye ba'i sgo lnga rnam shes tshogs brgyad dang// dbang po'i rten dang mthu phrog zil gnon rnams// drag po'i gdab dmigs der 'dus mang na skyon// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ nyams pa bdun po bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// nyams pa bsgral ba de lags na// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang/ badzra kI la yas 'di skad gsungs so// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad dag sbyar ba// 'u khams ji khams shang khams dang// kung keg khams la sogs te bla chen rnams// ba glang sha ba lug dang nya// de rnams so sor rgyu bar bshad// g.yag dang ra dang gla ba gsum// de rnams bla chen phyi ru rgyu bar bshad// de yi drod tshad dag sbyar ba// dang po'i bla ni 'khor nyul ba// bar ma'i bla ni khug pa'o// gsum pa'i bla ni bu li d+ha ra ya// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa yi// khugs ma khugs kyi drod tshad sbyar// gcig pa gnyis pa'i drod tshad la// lha dbral dgug bstim byad 'jug go// gab sbas klong gi man ngag sbyar// gsum pa'i drod tshad rab bsleb na// bla phur bstun la gdab par bya// drod tshad zhan na btab phan med// rab tu sleb na ma btab 'chor// khugs ma khugs kyi drag zhan drod// sbyar te de bzhin bla phur gdab// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bla chen rgyu ba de lags na// lha bral dgug bstim byad gzhug gi/ gab sbas klong gi man ngag 'di// de yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// nyon cig karma he ru

ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad sleb// lus la lha dbral gnas nas dgug/ rnam shes gzugs bstim byad du gzhug/ smra smyo thal bar rlog par brdeg/ phung po zhal du+u stob dang drug/ re re la yang drug drug ste// dang po lha dang dbral bar bya// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phra men drag po'i las la bskul// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// dam can gnad dbab las la bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rengs par khug la grogs dang bral bar gyis// pho nyas lha dbral dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing ldang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// pho nya bkug bstim dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// pho nyas byad gzhug dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing ldang sems byed pa rnams// rnam par gzir la smyo chug cig/ pho nyas smyor gzhug dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// rgyob cig gtogs shig thal bar rlogs// pho nyas rtogs byed dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// bstab po dpal chen zhal du bstab// bstim mo yum chen dbyings su stim// 'khor rnams rol cig kha raM khA hi// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ lha bral dgug stim byad gzhug gi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// pho nyas dgug bstim de lags na// drag po rdzas kyi dgug bstim gang// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ bla yi drod tshad rab sleb pa// gu gul sbyar ba'i dud pas bdug/ rdzas drag lha bral dam pa'o// nyung dkar rdo rje rgyal po la// bdun 'bum nyi khri bzlas nyung brab// dgug bstim rdzas drag dam pa'o// zangs thag mnyen pas bkyig pa dang// lcags sgrog dam por gzhug pa dang// sngon dmar rdzas kyis bcings pa ni// rdzas drag byad gzhug dam pa'o// a shog pa yi 'bras bu dang// lug

mig grib skams byas pa dang// bzlas nyung gsum du brdeg pa ni// smra sbyor gzhug pa'i rdzas drag dam pa'o// kha tham gyis ni tho ba dang// aM ku sha yis dkar nag dang// rdo rje tho bas brdungs pa ni// rtog byed rdzas drag dam pa'o// lo zla lon pa'i gtor ma dang// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// nyung dkar khrag dang snying sna sha/ dam rdzas drag po bsreg pa ni// ling+ga dag dang sbyar la bstab// stob byed rdzas drag dam pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rdzas drag pos lha dbral dgug bstim byad gzhug gi le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// rdzas drag dgug bstim de lags na// drag po sngags kyi dgug bstim gang// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ bla yi drod tshad rab tu sleb pa dang// lha dbral drag po'i gsang sngag bzlas// rtsa brgyad rtsa gcig lha bdun du// gsang sngags lha dbral dam pa'o// dgug bstim drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsang sngags dgug bstim dam pa'o// byad gzhug drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsang sngags byad gzhug dam pa'o// smra smyo drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsang sngags smra smyo dam pa'o// gtog byed drag po gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsang sngags gtog byed dam pa'o// stob byed drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsang sngags stob byed dam pa'o// kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gsang sngags drag po lha dbral dgug bstim byad gzhug gi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// gsang sngags dgug bstim de lags na// smon lam drag po'i dgug bstim gang// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bla yi drod tshad rab sleb pa// lha dbral smon lam drag po gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bder gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar gcod dgra bgegs rnams// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// khyed rnams 'tsho ba'i lha lnga dang phrol cig/ lha dbral smon lam dam pa'o// dgug bstim smon lam drag pos

gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bde gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar chad dgra bgegs rnams// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// khyed rnams rings par dzaHhUM baM hoHyis// rnam shes ling+gar phob cig gnyis med bstim// dgug bstim smon lam drag pos gdab/ byad gzhug smon lam drag po dgab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bde gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar chad dgra bgegs rnams// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// yan lag smad lnga gru gur skong// gzas pa ma nor byad du chug/ slon lam byad gzhug drag po dam pa'o// gzir te smyor gzhug smon lam drag pos gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'i sa// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bder gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar chod dgra bgegs rnams// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// nyams pa bdun po gzas pa 'di// smyo ru smra ru myos su chug/ khong nas me 'bar kha nas khrag/ drag tu skyug cing lkugs su chug/ smra smyo smon lam drag po dam pa'o// rtog byed smon lam drag po gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bde gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar chod byed pa'i bgegs// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// khyed kyis nyams pa'i gzas pa 'di// phung po thul cig lus ngag rdul du rlog/ rtog byed smon lam drag po dam pa'o// stob byed smon lam drag pos gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bde gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub bar chod dgra dang bgegs// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// gzas pa'i sha khrag gzugs phung gsol// b+ha ga bAn badzra ku mA ra sarba pU dza khA hi bud+d+ha sa ma ya/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM// stob byed smon lam drag po dam pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ smon lam drag po'i [(2[)]

le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// drag po'i smon lam de lags na// ting 'dzin drag po mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// ting 'dzin drag po ngas bstan gyis// lha dbral ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i phyag rgya bzhis// ye shes 'od zer drag po phob// lha rnams bya nag rdos bdas bzhin// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'thor bar bsam// lha dbral ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// de rjes rnam shes bkug bstim ting 'dzin bya// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i phyag rgya bzhis// 'od zer drag po'i tsha tshar brdabs// gzas pa'i rnam shes mi 'chor bkug/ chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa'am// phye ma mar dkar thim pa bzhin// rnam shes ling+gar gnyis med thim par bsam// rnam shes bkug bstim ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// byad du gzhug pa'i ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// ye shes 'od zer drag po 'phros// dzaHhUM baM ho'i phyag rgya bzhis// zangs thag lcags thag byad du bzhugs// 'gyur mi shes par gru gu thul// 'brub khung dkyil 'khor nang du ni// gru gu bzhin du+u bskongs par bsgom// byad gzhug ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// gzir gnon smra smyo'i ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// dzaHhUM baM ho'i phyag rgya bzhis// 'od zer tsha tsha brdabs bzhin gzir// smyo ba smra ba mtshams med pa// tha mar myos shing lkugs pa dang// khong nas me 'bar kha nas khrag/ 'phongs nas ngan khrag 'dzag par bsgom// smra smyo'i ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// gtogs byed ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// ye shes 'od zer drag po yis// dzaHhUM baM ho'i phyag rgya bzhis// pho nya tho ba can dag ni// grangs med 'od zer bcas pa byung// gzas pa'i gzugs kyi phung po ni// lus ngag rdul du song bar bsam// gtogs byed ting 'dzin drag po'o// stob byed ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// sprul pa'i pho nya bsam mi khyab// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum de bzhin du// 'od zer sprul pa grangs med kyis// gzas pa'i dbang po bsdus pa dang// sha khrag rus 'chang rgyu ma gzer// bstab pas de bzhin rol par bsam// stob byed ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// lha dbral dgug stim ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang phrin

las kyi rgyal po karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// lha rnams dgug bstim byad gzhug de lags na// rdzas drag sngags kyi nus mthu'i bye brag ni// so so'i nus mthu bde gshegs bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// nyung dkar rgyal po rdzas drag don// nyung dkar nang nas zur bzhi pa// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i rtags// pho mo gnyis kyi thod pa ru// go ro tsa na ma bral bar// thabs dang shes rab kha sbyar la// b+han d+ha'i spyi bo brtol la ni// de yi nang du sa bzhag lud// mi ro bsregs pa'i thal chen dang// nyung dkar sa bon gsum du sbal// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rtsa ba'i sngags// bsnyen pa zhag bdun bzlas brjod bya// brgya mtshams stong mtshams mchod pa yis// chu lud du ni bran bzhin dbul// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyis// khyad par mchod pa bdud rtsi dang// phyag rgya'i mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// 'bras bu ma smin bar du dbul// nyung dkar khyad par thob par 'gyur// nyung dkar rgyal po rdzas drag 'di// gsang sngags brgya'am stong tsam du// dam bcas lus la bcangs gyur na// las dbang dag kyang bzlog 'gyur cing// bar chad rkyen gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// yid la dran pas smon lam btsan// rig 'dzin byang chub sa gnon cing// gang la mngags pas nus mthur 'gyur// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// nyung dkar rgyal po'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// nyung dkar rdzas drag de lags na// gu gul sbyar ba'i rdzas drag ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sun tri ka yi thang chu dang// mi khyi gnyis kyi dri ma dang// spyang ki'i la du rta phur mo// sme ba lnga dang za 'og dang// 'bob tshangs mi gtsang sna tshogs sbyar// 'brang ru g.yas kyi nang du blug/ lam po che yi bzhin mdo ru// sbra nag phub la zhag bdun du// gsang sngags bzlas shing mchod pa 'bul// khyad par 'phags pa'i dri 'byung ste// khro bo rnams kyis sngon byung dran// sgrub rdzas sems bskyed yid dran gyis// sras mchog khro bo gzi mdangs bskyed// bar gcod rten dang dbral bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor dmigs pa grub pa'i rdzas// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// gu gul sbyar ba rdzas drag gis le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// gu gul

rdzas drag de lags na// rak+ta'i rdzas drag ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mU la rak+ta rtsa ba'i khrag/ rdo shing rtsi thog dmar po brgya// pad+ma rak+ta lnga brgya dang// bsgral ba'i ma hA rak+ta stong// na chung mtshan dang ldan pa yi// b+han+d+ha'i nang du rdzas blug la// mtshan ldan gzhon nu'i pad+mas bcad// bsnyen pa zhag bdun bar du ni// skyes pa dar ma'i rdo rje yis// dkrug cing gsang sngags rgyun du bzlas// 'bru bcud bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// rak+ta khol ba'i rtags 'byung ste// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyas btab na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lha srin rnams kyang bran du khol// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// dngos grub sgrub la bar mi gcod// sras mchog rnams kyang de bzhin du// thugs dam rjes dran gzi mdangs bskyed// gang la nus mthu mthar phyin pa'o// dbang du bsdus pa'i rdzas drag ste// gang la dmigs pa 'gugs par byed// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rak+ta rdzas drag gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po la// phyi nang maN+Dal gsum gyi don// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// byin rlab gzhung bzhin gong nas 'byung// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin br-i// phur pa bcu gcig so so yi// logs la thugs kyi snying po bri// dpal la phrin las gsang sngags bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las kyi// rdzas drag gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// so so'i gnas nas bkod la ni// spyan drang mchod bstod gnyis med bstim// rtags dang dngos grub nod pa'i phyir// 'di rnams sgrub phur dam pa yin// phur pa nyi shu gong bzhin du// logs dang dbal la snying po bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin rdzas drag gsum// byin brlab so so'i gnas su dgod// bran dang pho nya de bzhin du// gong du mngags par 'gro ba'i phyir// 'di rnams mngag phur dam pa yin// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// logs la badzra gu ya man+t+ra bri// dpal la karma gu ya man+t+ra bri// thugs kyi sras mchog dngos la bstim// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha ru// gru gsum kha ru bzhugs su gsol// ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas drag gsum// 'og min gnas nas spyan drang bstim// rgyun du bsnyen pa 'bral mi bya// sku gsung thugs su rtag par bsnyain// 'di ni bsnyen phur dam pa yin// gzhan yang rtsa gcig rtsa brgyad dam// sngags dang ting 'dzin snying po bri// gong bzhin gru gsum mkha' la dgod// log par

blta ba'i nyams pa la// thugs rje dbyer med 'debs pa'i phyir// 'di ni gdab phur dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum de bzhin la// bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer bskul// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dran te// rngam pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gnyis med bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod bstod nas// ting 'dzin mi gtong yun du bsrings// skyo ngal med na sangs rgyas yin// sngags dang smon lam mthu byin che// las dang bya ba gdon mi za// nges par brtsams pas ci 'dod 'grub// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'di// ma byin par yang rgyun du blang// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin yin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dam pa'i mchog/ nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ni// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// dang po kun gzhi stong pa nyid kyi lung// gnyis pas 'gro don rgyu 'bras mtshams sbyor lung// gsum pas ye shes mtshon pa rgyu yi lung// de rjes ye shes rtog pa gzhil ba'i lung// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gtan la dbab// bdag gis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dang// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam gsum spyan drangs nas// sngags dang ting 'dzin gnyis su med par bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun du 'bul// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa rgyun du drang// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum yang// gtso bo'i dbyings su ye nas gcig/ so so ma yin gnyis su med// de bzhin gzhung byed rnal 'byor yin// de las ldog med sangs rgyas yin// nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dam pa'o// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gyi le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// rnal 'byor gang zhig dngos grub myur 'dod pas// nang rtogs nub tu sku gsung thugs kyi don// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum don ci lags// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// nang rtogs nub tu sku gsung thugs kyi don// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ngas bstan gyi// log par ma g.yel don la gus par nyon// dang por shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs gtan la ma phebs par// rang bzhin med par mi shes pas// dngos po mtshan ma'i chos bzung nas// theg chen khro bo'i rgyal po zer// don dam zab mo rgyab tu bor// gsang sngags zab mo'i don la bon du gyer// spyod pa 'ba' brlang dang du blangs// gti mug dbang btsan rgyu \u0f84'bras don
