ma rtogs// nga rgyang dbang gis rlom sems chen po bskyed// phrag dog dbang gis bdag bstod gzhan smod byed// 'dod chags dbang gis slus 'debs khrel 'dzem med// zhe sdang dbang gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// rgyud dang sgrub thabs man ngag blor ma zhan// ras chod thod rgal tshogs kyi dpon byas nas// tshogs 'dus rdzas la mi yin mchod rdzas bsgral ba zhes/ bsgral ba de la phan zhes pU dza khA hi// long bas long ba khrid pas ngam grog g.yang sar lhung// rnam smin zlog par dka' ba snying re rje// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// gab sbas gu ru'i gdams ngag med pa ru// bka' rkun bka' 'khyal dkrug cing dam mi bsrung// g.yo sgyu tshul 'chos byed pas yod tshul ston// bsod nams che ba dag la khungs phyung nas// pha rol 'dren la bslus 'debs log pa'i chos// rang la yid ches med par sgrub gzhung phar la ston// bsgrubs kyang mgo 'khor don med sa bon bsregs// rlan la me btsal me nyid sos mi 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// tshig gi theg chen don du mi spyod par// tshogs sogs phra mo rnams la sun 'byin skur ba 'debs// snga rabs 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa yang// dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// bar du tshogs bsags tha mar mngon sangs rgyas// 'dab can rjes su 'dab med mkha' la 'phyo 'dod pas// nus pa'i mthu med g.yang la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// gsang sngags theg chen nyid la rig pa'i rgyun bcad nas// theg pa 'og ma'i chos la sa zin 'thas// de la gsang ba bshad na skur 'debs dad mi skye// rnam smin dbang gis theg chen 'phrad mi srid// bskal pa chen por 'bad rtsol sangs mi rgya// snang srid ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la// mi rgod lta bur lcags sgrog bcug pas bsdams// rang gis rang bcings 'khor rgyu smin pa'i chos// rdza be'u so ma btang bas rlan phrad 'jig pa'i nyan// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// theg pa 'og ma'i chos la lce sbyangs nas// lam drang rjes zhugs pa yi rnal 'byor la// sgra dang tshig gi rig pa btsud nas ni// gsang sngags zab mo'i chos la sun phyung nas// 'bras bu rdo rje'i chos la skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags don la ma brten 'bras bu thob thabs med// bskal pa stong du+u rang don phyal par gtong// rtsod pa'i tshig rgyal rlom sems 'bras bu med// zhabs rdol snod du blugs kyang chags mi srid// rtog ge ba dang mig rnon mkhan// gsang sngags dngos grub sgrub pa'i bar chod yin// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// de la gsang sngags bshad na nyams chen yin// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// nang rtogs nub ni sku

gsung thugs nyid ni// rnal 'byor chen po gdeng chen zlog med kyis// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig ma nyams nges thub na// dbang gsum rdzogs pas gzhan la re mi 'jog/ re dogs gnyis dang bral ba'i byang sems kyis// bud+d+ha rang nyid gzhan nas btsal du med// phung po b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang// khog pa dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs lnga 'dus pa'i rtsa chen tsit+ta ni// dngas ma dag ni ye nas rdo rje'i thugs// rdo rje gzhon nu gdod nas rang byung gnas// srog dang ma bral ye shes sems dpa'i thugs// glo ba ma gnyis bu gnyis bzhi la ni// rtsa bzhi dag la 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi// gsang ba'i yum bzhi gdod nas rang byung gnas// sum mdo'i rtsa la de bzhin rigs kyi dngas// khrau bo'i rgyal po rnam rgyal rang byung gnas// g.yas na 'bad rtsol byang chub sems// g.yon na thogs med byang chub sems// mchin pa'i rtsa la pad+ma rigs kyi dngas// khro chen rta mgrin rang byung gnas// g.yas na gze myur byang chub sems// g.yon na gsal bkra byang chub sems// mkhris pa'i rtsa la yon tan rigs kyi dngas// gshin rje'i gshed po rang byung gnas// g.yas na gtsang ma byang chub sems// g.yon na mun mthong byang chub sems// gsang ba'i rtsa la phrin las rigs kyi dngas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rang byung gnas// g.yas na gnyen po byang chub sems// g.yon na shes rig byang chub sems// mthong byed rtsa yi dngas ma la/ khams gsum rnam rgyal rang byung gnas// g.yas na dpa' 'dul byang chub sems// g.yon na gsod byed byang chub sems// thos byed rtsa yi dngas ma la// dbyug pa sngon po rang byung gnas// g.yas na gzi brjid byang chub sems// g.yon na rang rig byang chub sems// tshor byed rtsa yi dngas ma la// mi g.yo mgon po rang byung gnas// g.yas na rngam 'joms byang chub sems// g.yon na mi tshor byang chub sems// myong byed rtsa yi dngas ma la// ta ki rA tsa rang byung gnas// g.yas na rngam mgyogs byang chub sems// g.yon na sgrol byed byang chub sems// 'di 'jam dpal dbyangs phrin las che// tshangs pa'i rtsa yi dngas ma la// khro bo hUM chen rang byung gnas// g.yas na btang snyoms byang chub sems// g.yon na g.yo sgyu byang chub sems// srid len rtsa yi dngas ma la// khro bo stobs chen rang byung gnas// g.yas na gtum byed byang chub sems// g.yon na rku mkhas byang chub sems// rtsa chen rnams kyi dngas ma ni// sha khrag rus pa chu+u ba len// rin chen gser gyi sbu gu'i nang// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rang byung gnas// mgo gzhug rtsa ba na 'dzam pa la g.yengs// sras mchog tshon gang grangs med kyis// 'od zer rno myur chas par

gtams// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rang byung gnas// me mdag bus pa'i 'dab ma bzhin// lham me lhang nge 'od zer bcas// gu ya man tra'i sgra chen sgrogs// shel gyi bum par rin chen bcug pa bzhin// phyi dang nang med kun tu ma bsgribs par// snang la rang bzhin med pa bzhin gyi gzugs// da ltar de bzhin rtogs pa'i rnam 'byor des// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'grangs// kun la phan pa'i zas mchog 'di// thams cad gza' zhing brgyan par bya'o// gsol ba'i zas ni ci yang rung// dang po raM yaM khaM gis sbyangs// a dkar 'od dang bcas pa las// g.yas phyogs 'khyil zhing 'khor bar bsam// 'od zer don gnyis byang chub sems// ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis med bstim// a mr-i ta yi gsang sngags kyis// 'od zhu bdud rtsi chen por gyur// A+oM sa ma ya a mr-i ta oM AHhUM swA hA// zhes lag pa ye shes phrin las hom gzar gyis// kha yi hom khung dbyings kyi gzhal yas su// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med mchod pa dbul// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas yongs su dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// longs spyod lnga ldan bdud rtsi'i mchog/ gnyis med yongs su dag par bsngo// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// chos nyid la yang chod nyid thim// ye shes bdud rtsis dgyes shing thim// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yis// sku gsung thugs su rnam par dag/ dman pa'i zas la bza' mi bya// de la ldog med ma g.yel na// nang rtogs nub ni sku gsung thugs// dngos grub chen po'i mtshan chen po// pha rol skye ba len pa por// gsang sngags ting 'dzin ma g.yengs na// sku dang gdung dang 'od dang sgra// don gyi rtags dang mtshan ma yang// sangs rgyas rtags rnams dus su 'byung// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhan yang gsol ba'i lhag ma la// dang po sbyang spel gong bzhin du// ku mA ra nyid gsal bsgoms la// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum du// ting 'dzin sngags kyis rim bzhin bskyed// ye shes 'od zer bskul bas ni// ngams pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// gsang ba'i sngags kyis gnyis med bstim// bran dang pho nya de bzhin du// rang rang snying pos spyan drangs nas// bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul bar bya// dbul ba'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas// bdud rtsi rnam gsum tshim par bsam// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i maN+Dal na// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum dang// phyogs bcu khro rgyal yab yum sras mchog za byed tshogs// 'khor gyi dam can bran dang pho nya tshogs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i gtor ma 'di 'bul bas// bar chad med cing gnod pa zhi ba dang// las kyi 'bras bu bsam pa 'grub par mdzod// dngos

grub rnam gnyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs gyur cig/ bde bar gshegs so gtan du ma lags par// thugs rje 'gro don rtse gcig mdzad par hUM/ dngos grub thob par skad cig mi dmigs sam// rnal 'byor gang zhig tshe ring 'dod pa dang// na nyung gnod pa zhi zhing lan chags khyer bar 'dod// phas gyi rgol ba tshar gcod gnod pa zhi ba dang// longs spyod 'byor pa 'phel zhing bsam pa 'grub pa dang// bar chad med par dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// le lo med par brtson pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'gyur// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// dgra bgegs bskrad dang dgug pa dang// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor des// thogs pa med par thams cad 'grub// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gyi le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// bskul ba las kyi gsang sngags la// yon tan nyi shu gcig rdzogs pa// de yi don rnams ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi gsang don ngas bstan gyi// badzra gu ya man+t+ra la// gi ti wa ti d+ha ra ya// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// gsum pa mngon spyod ma ra dgug/ 'gug byed man ngag klong du sbyar// 'gug pa dag kyang thogs pa med// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// tsit+ta sa ma d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+t+ra sbyar// dngas ma gnas kyi d+hA ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// ta su ko ra d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+t+ra la// dbugs kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// gi rti wi ti d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+t+ra sbyar// 'od kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// ku sA la hi d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+t+ra sbyar// khrag gi dngas ma d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// ku li khad de d+ha ra ya// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// drod kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// su tri ku te sha d+ha ra ya// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// 'byung ba'i dngas ma d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// lo ma bu hi d+ha ra ya// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// dbang du sdud pa d+ha ra ya// badzra gu h+ya man+t+ra la// se 'bru ra shi d+ha ra ya// karma gu h+ya man+t+ra sbyar// dgug pa mi 'chor d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// ka pa la d+ha ra ya// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// dbang po 'du rten d+ha ra ya// badzra guh+ya man+t+ra la/ gu h+ya nre bu d+ha ra ya// karma gu h+ya man+t+ra sbyar// bskyed par byed pa d+ha ra ya// badzra gu ya man+t+ra la// karma gu ya man+t+ra sbyar// bskyed pa byed dang rten 'brel d+ha ra ya// badzra gu ya man+t+ra la// u pa ti ko d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+t+ra

sbyar// 'khor ba rtsad gcod d+ha ra ya// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// rten 'brel karma g+hu ya man+t+ra yis// lha dbral dag gi klong dang sbyar// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// karma 'bebs pa'i gu ya man+t+ra yis// dgug bstim dag gi klong dang sbyar// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// karma byad gzhug gu ya man+t+ra yis// bcing ba dag gi klong dang sbyar// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// karma smra smyo gu ya man+t+ra yis// smra smyo dag ni klong dang sbyar// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la/ karma gtogs byed g+hu ya man+t+ra yis// gtogs byed drag po klong dang sbyar// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// stob byed karma g+hu ya man+t+ra yis// stob byed drag po'i klong dang sbyar// badzra gu+u h+ya man+t+ra la// b+hi hi ra d+he tso phra li hi ti// karma d+ha d+he he tsu+u na d+ha hi// karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sarba mA ra ya/ wi hi wi hI li/ de dag klong du sbyar ba yis// zhag bdun zhag bdun wi hi li wi hi li/ klong drug de ltar gdon mi za// ka pa la g+hu ya man+t+ra yis// tsit+ta du hi de la tri hUM/ dun tri ha tri mA ra ya/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gdon mi za// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la/ karma g+hu ya man+t+ra/ 'du hi ri 'du hi ri ta/ gzhan gyi rig pa sbyor ba tshur phrog pa// zhag gsum dag na gdon mi za// badzra gu ya man+t+ra la karma gu ya man+t+ra 'ba' hu la d+h+rim pa hu la hrim/ gu ya man+t+ra stong gis ni// tri d+hi lam tri hri la ma// mA ra ya sreg par 'gyur ro// badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la// karma gu ya man+t+ra la ma lu hri ni ti hUM hUM/ nyi shu rtsa gcig man+t+ra yis// b+hi ta hri b+hi ta ri// phyis kyi rgyud gcod gdon mi za// hUM hUM hUM/ badzra gu ya man+t+ra// karma gu ya man+t+ra ka pa tsa// lan gsum brjod pas gdon mi za// phaT phaT phaT/ dza bi ta/ mod la srog 'phrog par 'gyur/ b+hu dza d+ho bi ba d+ho/ dgyes par don grub pa'o// hUM phaT gr-i ba sa ma ya/ karma g+hu ya man+t+ra/ oM laM dz+ha bid+ha ra ya/ hUM laM badzra ma ti dza/ s+t+wam b+ha nan/ rengs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// mo ha g+ha ya mA ra tu d+ha ra ya/ myur bar sbyar ba'o/ b+ha g+ha wAn da thim ma// myur bar bka' bsgo ba'o// hrI Sh+t-I wi kri shi hi gung ba/ shrI badzra hUM ka ra/ phur pa 'du wi ra d+hi 'du wi ri d+ha/ de la sems can thams cad kyi tshe ni srog yin/ srog gi dbang po ni dngas ma yin// dngas ma ni dbugs so// dbugs ni gnad bdun no// de ni gzhi'o// de rnams kyi rta ni dbugs so// dbugs kyi rta ni khrag yin/ khrag gi rta ni rtsa'o// rtsa thams cad gzhi ni snying ngo// snying gi snying po dngas ma bdun no// gu ya man+t+ra badzra karma man+t+ra b+ha hu d+ha la de he// hu h+ya man+t+ra tshe yi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ gu ya man+t+ra srog gi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ gu ya man+t+ra dbugs kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ gu ya man+t+ra 'od kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya// gu ya man+t+ra khrag gi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ gu ya man+t+ra rtsa yi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ g+hu ya man+t+ra 'byung ba'i dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ badzra g+hu ya man+t+ra la/ karma g+hu ya man+t+ra sbyar// gsang sngags yon tan nyi shu gcig rdzogs pas// dngas ma

bdun la sbyor ba mes// zhag gsum dag gis gzas pa 'jig/ ka ba tsa sa lus ngag yid tri d+ha ra ya/ ses ni d+ha ra ya/ nas ni d+ha ra ya/ sras ni d+ha ra ya/ mar gyis ni d+ha ra ya/ rdas kyis rda ra ya/ sbyor ba gsum gyi d+ha ra ya/ sgra yi yi ge bcu drug gis/ dz+wa la raM wi hi li/ zhag bdun gyis ni d+ha ra ya// sgra yi yi ge dgu dag gis/ don gsum du ni shes par bya// sgra yi yi ge bcu gcig gis// mnan phur gyis ni d+ha ra ya/ bcu drug dag gis ni/ badzra yak+sha kro ta khA hi ni d+ha ra ya/ dz+wa la raM wi hi laM/ bcu drug dag gi ni dang sbyar te/ mu ka he yi tshogs rnams/ dz+wa la raM badzra yak+sha kro d+ha khA hi ni d+ha ra ya/ yi ge drug pa'i byin brlabs snying po nyi shu gcig gis 'phang pa d+ha ra ya/ gnan pa d+ha ra ya/ gdab pa rnams tri a sa da du las d+ha ru d+ha ra ya/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bskul ba las kyi gsang sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// phrin las gsang sngags de lags na// drag po hom nag gis nr-i tri bsregs pa ji ltar lags/ lung bstan du gsol zhes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// stong gsum ye shes gzhal yas khang// ye shes me dpung dbyings nas bzhengs// me yi snying po sku dang phyag rgyar gsal// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum me sku dmar po la// me zhal dmar po chos nyid chen por brdal// me so dmar po mi mthun phyogs la gtsigs// me mig dmar po rdul gyi cha dang mnyam// me lag dmar po nam mkha' khyab pa la// me phur dmar po srid pa gsum la 'debs// me zhal dmar po stong gsum khyab pa la// me dpung 'bar bas 'khor ba dbyings su bsreg/ me skad 'bar ba 'ur 'ur chems chems sgrog/ thams cad ma lus ye shes rdo rje'i me// rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba la// lus ngag yid gsum bag chags bsreg/ rdo rje sa yi mi ni dkar nag 'bar// zhe sdang 'khor ba'i sha rus bsreg par bya'o// rdo rje chu yi me ni sngo nag 'bar// nga rgyal 'khor ba'i khrag ni dz+wa la raM// rdo rje me yi me ni dmar nag 'bar// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i drod ni dz+wa la raM// rdo rje rlung gi me ni ljang nag 'bar// phrag dog 'khor ba'i dbugs ni dz+wa la raM// rdo rje nam mkha'i me ni mthing nag 'bar// gti mug 'khor ba'i yid ni dz+wa la raM// ye shes klong yangs hom khung du// thugs rje 'bar ba'i me sbar nas// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// mtshan ma ming du bcas nas bri// dbang po mngon sum bcas pa gtam// klong drug dag gi dgug bstim bya// stod kyi klong dang smad kyi klong// 'bru dgu

dgongs don gsum dang sbyar// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// bka' las 'gal byed sdig can 'di// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// bcu drug dang ni bsgrags la ni// drag po'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya// bsod nams tshogs su bsreg pa dang// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa bsreg/ ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po hom nag nr-i tri rnam gsum gyis bsreg pa'i le'u ste gsum cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// drag po hom nag bsreg pa de lags na// hom gyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ hom gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// hom lnga ya thog brtsegs mar brtsigs// gru bzhi phrin las rgyas pa'i hom// tshe dang dbang thang rgyas pa'i phyir// b+ha ga yum gyi mkha' la brtsigs// zlum po zhi ba chen po'i hom// dgra bgegs ma lus zhi ba'i phyir// ma skyes thig le chen por brtsigs// zla gam dmar po dbang gi hom// dgra bgegs dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// stong gsum yum gyi mkha' la brtsigs// gru gsum mthing nag drag po'i hom// dgra bgegs dug gsum bsreg pa'i phyir// dur khrod chen po'-i klong du brtsigs// me ri khro bo 'bar ba'i hom// dgra bgegs ma lus bsreg pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor la ni bri bar bya// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams dang// dug shing gdug pa can rnams dang// gsang ba'i shag pa bcu gsum la// maN+Dal rnam gsum gsang sngags la// nr-i ni bar du bcug la ni// mo ha g+ha ya bri bar bya// lcags thag gis ni bsdams la ni// gru gsum nang du bzhugs su gsol// bcu drug ni dang bcas pa yis// brgyad dang stong du sreg phyir bshams// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po hom nag gi le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya/ drag po hom nag dkyil 'khor de lags na/ sreg rdzas bcu drug gis bsreg pa yi/ de yi don ni ji ltar lags/ lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// b+ha yi sgra ni b+hi sha sta// mi sha khyi sha ra dang rta// nr-i dang gnyis su bsreg pa ni// mod la srog ni phrog par 'gyur// he ni he che'i tshil dang rkang// mi khyi rta spyang glang dred tshil// nr-i dang gnyis su bsreg pas ni// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab sangs rgyas mthus// a b+hi tsAr+ya'i gnag pa 'di kho na// rtsa ba

kha skong mi skong bar// skor tshoms dkyus su man ngag sdebs// bde gshegs thugs dam skong ba dang// rnal 'byor dngos grub thob pa dang// dgra bgegs gag pas mod la 'chi// nr-i dang thal ba sbrags nas ni/ chu bdag dag la gtad na ni// mdze rims dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ ra ni rak+ta chen po ste// mi khyi ra spyang 'phar ba spre'u// chen po gsum ni rab mchog ste// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg nas ni// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// khrag nad gzir nad dag gis 'chi'o// te ni ti la'i mar khu ste// gang gi rkang mar 'bru mar dang// tsha mar ni dang sbrags la bsreg de ltar de bzhin rjes su'o// tsha ba'i rims gyis 'chi bar 'gyur// rtso ni rtso mo nyung mo dang// nyur dkar nyung nag skye tshe til// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg la ni// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// snying ni gas nas 'chi bar 'gyur// phra ni phra dug dag yin te// ra dug spyang dug re dug bong dug/ bse zho dang ni sbrags la bsreg/ lkugs nas 'chi ba dag tu 'gyur// li ni li khri mtshal rnams te// nr-i dang sbrags la bsreg pa ni// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// skye ba'i rgyu sbyang 'chad par 'gyur// hi ni hi sman chen po ste// bdud rtsi dbul zhing bsreg pas ni// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// kan ni kan rdo chen po zhes bya ste// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg pas ni// lus bsreg gti mug sangs nas su// sku yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// gtal ni gta' gtor gtor ma ste// dam rdzas tshangs pa'i gtor ma la// lo zla mchod pa'i bye brag rdzogs// bsreg pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// he ni he za zangs phye ste// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg pas ni// ngag bsreg bkres skom sangs nas ni// gsung gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// btsun ni btsun cha lcags phye ste// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg pas ni// yid dang tsha grang bsreg sangs nas// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// d+ha ni d+ha la gu gul te// bdun 'bum thon pa'i bzlas nyung dang// nr-i dang sbrags te bsreg pas ni// dgra bgegs rten dang bral bar 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// hi ni hi shog pa zhes bya// d+ha du ra yi 'bras bu dang// lug mig pa yi me tog dang// nri dang sbrags nas bsreg pas ni// smyo dang brgyal dang 'bog nas 'chi// ka ni kA pA la zhes bya// ka pA la yi snod dag tu/ ka ni phrin las chen po ste// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las gsum// brtul zhugs bskyed de phrin las bya// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// klong drug de ltar gdon mi za// zhag bdun tsam gyis wi hi li// zhes ki la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bsreg rdzas

bcu drug gis nr-i bsreg pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// sgra ni yi ge dgu dag la// don gsum 'gro la ji ltar gsal// zhes gsol pa dang/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// ka ni phrin las chen po ste// sku yi snying po dag tu bshad// dza ni 'dzin cing 'gug par byed// gsung gi snying po dag tu bshad// a ni 'debs par byed pa yin// thugs kyi snying po dag tu bshad// mA ra bsad pa drag po'i sngags// nr-i ni sgrol bar byed pa'o// sa ni nus pa'i mchog yin te// mthu+u dbrog sras mchog snying po yin// ra ni chags pa dbang du sdud// dbang gi sras mchog snying po yin// pra ni gzir zhing sdig pa ste// bsdigs pa'i sras mchog snying po yin// mar ni slar yang mi ldang ste// zil gnon sras mchog snying po yin// rda ni mngag pa'i phrin las te// dgug pa'i sras mchog snying po yin// stod gyi drug dang smadakyi dgu// dgug bstim bsreg dang 'phang ba'o// drug dang dgu dang bcu gcig dang// yon tan nyi shu gcig las sogs// kha skong ba dang bskang mi dgos// snying po nyi shu gcig gis ni// 'dod pa'i bya ba don sgrub pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sgra'i yi ge'i don dgrol ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// drag po hom nag de lags na// zor gyi phrin las ji ltar lags// zhes gsol nas/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// drag po zor gyi dkyil 'khor la// thig dang chag chag gzhung bzhin bya// drag po'i maN+Dal gzhung bzhin bri// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu la// sprul pa'i khro bo rnams byung ba// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan mo'i dus la bab// khro bo bcu yi phyag brnyan te// mon mo 'di ltar ya mtshan can// mon mo'i lus la phra thabs mgo/ g.yas pa thabs kyi phyag mtshan la// g.yon pa zor gyi mda' 'phen ma// phur bu'i zor 'phen krol lo lo// nyung mo'i zor 'phen si li li// mtshon zor mang po zangs se zang// dug zor mang po thibs se thib// nad khrag khrag zor chi li li// khrag zor chen po dgra la ya// gnag pa'i khong du dug mda' spyaus// khro bo bcu yi phyag brnyan te// mon mo 'di ltar ya mtshan can// mon mo'i lus la phra men mgo/ g.yas pa rtags kyi phyag mtshan la// g.yon na zor gyi mda' 'phen ma// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// dam tshig drug gi dus la bab// bran

dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas pa// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// dam can gnad la phab la bskul// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// de ltar de yi rjes su bya// smad kyi stod dang smad kyi smad// smad kyi smad kyi dang po dang// smad kyi stod kyi dang po'i smad// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi sbyor kha'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po zor gyi las kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// drag po zor gyi phrin las de lags na// drag po zor gyi drag sngags gang// zhes gsol pa dang// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// ka ni sku yi snying po yin// gzugs can sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// dza ni gsung gi snying po ste// ngag ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// a ni thugs kyi snying po yin// yid ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// mu ni mu ka he zhes bya// shwa na ma yi drag sngags yin// ru ni rak+sha srin mo ste// bdag nyid ma yi drag sngags yin// sa ni bdud kyi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ra ni btsan gyi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// pra ni gza' yi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// mar ni klu yi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// rda ni ming po dag yin te// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// smad kyi stod kyi drag sngags dang// stod kyi bar gyi drag sngags dang// sgra yi yi ge dgu dag dang// dgra yi yi ge bcu gcig gis// bskul ba las kyi gsang sngags sbyar// phur pa zor gyi drag sngags so// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po zor gyi drag sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la gsol pa// drag po zor gyi drag sngags de la lags na// drag po zor gyi rdzas rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe mtshe// gnyan po'i khrag thun zor dag la// mche ba can dang mchu gug khrag/ thun du brab ste zor 'phangs na// khrag gzer nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// nyung dkar nag ske tshe mtshe// mdze pho'i khrag thun zor 'phangs na// mdze rims nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// nyung dkar la sogs mi ra khyi// sna tshogs dug dang khrag thun gyis// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// myos dang rlabs dang lkugs nas 'chi// nyung dkar la sogs mi ra khyi// d+ha du+u ra dang lug mig dang// sna tshogs dug

dang khrag thun gyis// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// smyo 'bog brgyal nad 'chi bar 'gyur// 'brum nag nad kyis shi ba'i khrag/ nyung dkar dug dang sbyar ba yis// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// yul khams 'brum nag nad kyis 'chi// mkhris nad rtsa yi khrag dang ni// nyung dkar nyungs nag dug sna tshogs// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// mkhris nad rims kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// nyung dkar nyungs nag ske tshe mtshe// mu zi nag po khrag sna tshogs// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// pho log glang thabs nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// myos rims tsit+ta'i khrag dang ni// nyung dkar la sogs dug sna tshogs// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// rims nad chen pos 'chi bar 'gyur// yul mkhar sa dang mtshon phye dang// lo zlar bshams pa'i gtor ma dang// nyung dug la sogs dme khrag dang// khyim mam yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// yul mkhar shor dang dme yis 'chi// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po zor gyi rdzas kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// drag po zor gyi rdzas rnams de lags na// gnan phur brgya rtsa brgyad kyi don ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// dam tshig drug gi dus la bab// smad kyi stod kyi skor tshoms dang// smad kyi stod kyi bar gyi skor tshoms kyis// badzra gu ya man+t+ra/ karma gu ya man+t+ra/ 'du hi ri ta 'phrogs ba hu la d+hi ma/ lus ngag yid gsum wa hi li// snying tshigs nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ hUM bi ta// phyis gzhan gyi rigs rgyun 'chad do// stod kyi skor tshoms bar dag gis// bcu gcig dang ni nyi shu dang// smad kyi stod kyi las sngags dang// dus la bab ni drug po yis// gnad chen re la bdun tsho re// stod kyi gu ya man+t+ra bcu gcig dang// smad kyi stod kyi bar gyi gu ya man+t+ra ni// drug po dag ni btu bar bya// smad kyi stod gyi karma man+t+ra yi// bcwo brgyad dag gis byin gyis brlabs// kha skong ba dang kha mi bskang// man ngag gis ni btu bar bya// stod kyi smad kyi bar gyi mtha' btul bya// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// mnan phur brgya rtsa brgyad kyi gdab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// brgya rtsa brgyad gdab pa de lags na// rtsa brgyad mnan sa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// mnan pa rtsa brgyad btab pa de// gnyen [(3[)]

pa'i thod chen dag tu ni// mnan phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// sbyor ba gsum gyi gu ya man+t+ra yis// chu yi mig tu mnan nas ni// gnag pa du tshud mdze rims kyis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// pha mes thod chen dag tu ni// mnan phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// gu ya man+t+ra sbyor ba gsum// chu yi mig tu mnan na ni// gnag pa du tshud mdze rims kyis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// rabs chad glen lkugs thod pa ru// mnan phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// gu ya man+t+ra sbyor ba gsum// chu yi mig gi rgya mtsho'i gting// mnan par du tshud bdun rgyud chad// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// gshed po'i thod pa dag tu ni// mnan phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// gu ya man+t+ra sbyor ba gsum// dur gyi dkyil du mnan na ni// mnan pa du tshud bdun rgyud chad// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// gnyen po'i thod pa dag tu ni// mnan phur sbyor ba gsum gyis gdab// mnan pa mtsher gyi 'og tu mnan/ smas phung 'byung zhing 'chi bar 'gyur// shi ma thog gi mdze can gyi// ya mkhal ma mkhal ma brul ba// kha yi nang du gnag pa la// sbyor ba gsum gyis them bar gzhug de ltar de bzhin rjes byas nas// rtsig rmang nang du bcug mnan na// smas phung chen po byung nas 'chi// pho rog 'ug pa'i thod pa ru// mnan phur rnams la de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// gnag pa'i them yig bcug la ni// mnan pa'i gnas su bcug pas ni// phyis kyi rigs pa rgyun bcad nas// de yi mthu yang thob nas ni// gnag pa'i sngags pa 'chi bar 'gyur// mdze can thod pa'i nang du ni// sbrul gyi pags pa thod pa la// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// gnag pa'i them yig bcug nas ni// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// klu btsan gnas sar gnan na ni// mdze dang pho log rdzings pa'i nad// sngags pa'i gnag pa 'jigs par 'gyur// gla ba wa yi thod pa ru// gnan phur rnams kyang de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// btsun pa gnag pa them yig gzhug/ dmu bdud gnas pa'i sar mnan na// gnag pa'i btsun pa bdun chad 'gyur// seng ge dag gi thod pa ru// gnan phur rnams kyang de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// rgyal po gnag pa them yig gzhug/ gsang bdud g.ya' bdud sar mnan na// rgyal po'i chad pa bzlog gyur nas// rgyal po'i lus kyang 'jig par 'gyur// spyang ki gcan gyi thod pa ru// gnag phur rnams kyang de bzhin du// skor tshoms gsum gyi man+t+ra yis// blon po gnag pa them par gzhug/ lha khang mchod rten dur dkyil du// gnag pa'i blon po 'chi bar 'gyur// byi la 'phar ba khra yi thod pa ru// mnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor

tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// skyes pa gnag pa'i them yig gzhug/ mdze can mgo lpags gril la ni// chu bdag dag la gtad byas na// skyes pa'i lus kyang mod la 'jig/ dre'u dang khyi yi thod pa ru// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra yis// rje'u rigs gnag pa them yig gzhug/ khyi lpags mi lpags gril nas ni// klu bdud klu btsan sar gnan na// de yi lus rdzings 'chi bar 'gyur// grum pa khyi nag mi yi thod pa ru// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// bud med gnag pa them yig gzhug/ sa bdag gnas pa'i sar mnan na// zha grum smad rdzings 'chi bar 'gyur// spre'u zer mo'i thod pa ru// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyis man+t+ra la// byis pa gnag pa them yig gzhug/ klu srin gnas pa'i sar gnan na// gnag pa'i byis pa'i srag 'phrog 'gyur// srin bya sreg pa'i thod pa ru// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyis man+t+ra la// phra ma gnag pa'i them yig gzhug/ mdze can thod par bcug la ni// mdze can pags pas gril nas ni// rgya mtsho'i gting ngam chu mig tu// nag po klu la gtad byas nas// kha 'thams lce ldebs rjings nad kyis// gnag pa'i phra ma mdze nad kyis// myur bar 'chi ba the tshom med/ stod kyi stod kyi skor tshoms dang// smad kyi dkyus kyi skor tshoms la// de la gsum gsum dbye ba yi// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyi// sgra yi yi ge btu bar bya// gdab dang bsreg dang 'phang dang gnan// gdams ngag gi ni btus nas ni// sgra yi bod cing dgug pa dang// sgra yi gdab dang bsreg pa dang// sgra yi 'phangs shin mnan pa dang// dgongs pa rlabs chen 'khrugs pa dang// phrin las zab mo thog brdzis dang// blta ba zab mo khyab gdal dang// bsgoms pa'i khog dang dgongs pa 'dod// don ni so so'i bya ba sgrub// kha bskang ba dang skong mi dgos// kha bskang sgrub thabs bcu bzhi pa// re re la yang tha dad ste// de yid 'dod pa'i bya ba sgrubs// sgra yi yi ge'i nang nas ni// bskang mi dgos pa'i bya ba sgrub// 'dod pa'i bya ba zab mo yin// rdo ba gnyis las brus nas ni// thod pa la sogs shong bar bru// de yi nang du rdzas rnams gzhug/ thod chen la sogs them yig bri// rdo ba dag la them yig bri// sbyor ba rnam gsum them par gzhug/ rgya skyegs mtshal chen sbyar la ni// rdo yi gzugs ni sbal par bya// sbal pa nag po dmar thig can// la cha bse yis bskul bar bya// lcags gzer dag gis gdab par bya// klu chen gnas pa'i rgya mtsho'am// byang du bltas pa'i klu chen la// de yi nang du gnan par bya// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las

gsum// smon lam drag pos gdab par bya// gnag pa'i gzas pa du tshud pa// de rnams thar med lus srog 'jig/ rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra dang// rnal 'byor yongs kyi spyi dgra dang// dkon mchog bstan pa 'jig pa dang// dam tshig nyams pa bdun po dag/ de rnams bsgral na bstan pa gnyan// lta spyod brlang po spyad na tshogs su 'gyur// phran tshegs tsam la brlang po spyad rgyur na// rang gi srog zad dmyal bar skye// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mnan phur rtsa brgyad kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// mnan phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad de lags na// dkyus ni smad kyi stod dang ni// smad kyi smad dang skor tshoms su// gdab cing mnan pa de lags na// dkyus ni dbu zhabs dag tu ni// gdab cing mnan pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// phur pa bdun tsho re re la// gu ya man+t+ra grangs ni them pa dang// rdo rje khros pa zhes sogs pas// dngas ma gsang sgo chen po la// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// de ltar de bzhin de rjes la// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// de sogs phung po rdo rjes gtams// lus ngag yid gsum phung po la// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// dkyus dbu zhabs kyi phung po mgo zhabs su mnan phur gdab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya// phung po mgo gzhug mnan phur btab pa de lags na// dkyus ni dbu zhabs dag gis ni// so sor gdab pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// mnan phur bdun tsho re re la// gu ya man+t+ra dag gis gtem// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig sogs nas// lus ngag yid gsum phung po la// ye shes khro bo grub par bsgom// de ltar de bzhin de rjes la// khro bo hUM mdzad dag gis ni// g+hi te wa ri dag tu gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo rnam par rgyal bas ni/ ku sa la hi gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo dbyug sngon dag gis ni// u pa ri ka ra ta gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo gshin rje gshed po yis// ku be ra la gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis// ta su ko ra gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po yis// su+u 'u ra shi se'u sha ri gdab mnan

bsgom// khro bo rta mgrin dag gis ni// ku li kha te gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo ta kI rA tsa yis// su tri ku tre sha la gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// tsit+ta dag la gdab mnan bsgom// khro bo stobs chen dag gis ni// gu ya pre pu gdab mnan bsgom// srin mo rak+sha dag gis ni// lam bu hi la gdab mnan bsgom// 'dus pa'i gdab bya gsum gyis ni// ka pA la hUM tun tri tri mA ra ya/ gnag pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ni/ ka pA la ni gdab mnan bsgom// gu ya man+t+ra gnyis po yis// b+han d+ha su tri gdab mnan bsgom// 'du hi ri ta 'du hi ri ta// ba hu la hU ba hU la d+h+r-i/ smad kyi smad kyi gtan 'pho ba// de ltar de bzhin phyag rgyas mnan// yon tan nyi shu gcig rdzogs kyi// b+hi ta hri ma b+hi ta hri ma/ rgyun chod phyis ni ldang mi srid// 'bras bu gsum ni 'phangs pa yis// dza b+hi ta ni mod la'o// bi ho gnyis pas don grub pa'o// de ltar de bzhin pUts+tsha ho// pUts+tsha la yang rnam gsum don// khams gsum dus gcig bsgral mchod dang// khams gsum ma dag pa yi don// grub dag rdo rje smon lam sems// drag po hom gyi mchod pa ni// sgra yi yi ge bcu drug la// mtshan ma'i ming du bsdus la ni// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg go// smad kyi stod kyi dang po'i dkyus tshig drug/ smad kyi stod kyi dkyus mthar gnas bzhi// smad kyi stod kyi dkyus bar drug/ snying po nyi shu gcig gi don// dgug bstim drag po'i phrin las bya// mthar gnas dkyus tshig smon lam gdab// smad kyi stod kyi dang po'i dkyus tshig drug/ smad kyi stod kyi dang po dkyus tshig bcu gcig/ smad kyi stod kyi bar pa'o// gsang sngags dkyus tshig gnyis pa la// sbyor ba gsum gyis gdab par bya// gnad bdun gcig tu man ngag sbyar// smad kyi smad kyi mthar gnas dkyus tshig gsum// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las gsum// 'bras bu gsum ni 'phangs pa yis// dza bi to na rmod pa lo bi to// mnyes par don grub pa'o// de ltar de bzhin du sdud pa'i smad kyi stod kyi stod kyi dkyus tshig drug/ smad kyi stod kyi dkyus tshig bab ma dang po gnyis// smad kyi smad kyi dkyus tshig mthar gnas gzhi// stod kyi skor tshoms gsum gsum dag la// gsang sngags bcu gcig re re la// skor tshoms lnga yi gsang sngags la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas la ni// re re la yang bcu drug go/ bcu drug re la brgya ni rtsa brgyad rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg go/ smad kyi smad kyi dkyus tshig lnga// smon lam drag po de bzhin no// smad kyi stod kyi dkyus tshig drug/ stod kyi stod gsum dkyus tshig bcu gcig dang// stod kyi smad gsum stod kyi mthar gnas bzhi// re re la yang bzhi bzhir sbrel// zor gyi phrin las de bzhin man ngag

sbyar// stod kyi stod gsum gsang sngags so so la// drug dang nyi shu gcig rdzogs zor// de ltar de bzhin man ngag sbyar// thugs kyi gsang sngags sku gsung thugs// drug ni gsang sngags dril ba yis// de ltar de bzhin gdams ngag bzhin// smad kyi smad kyi mthar gnas mtshon pa ni// dang po thugs kyi sa bon dang// khams gsum bsgral ba byang sems mchod pa dang// rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i cher gsang byang sems lung// gnyis pa thugs kyi sa bon ni/ gsang rgyud rdzogs rgyud byang sems rin po che// gsum pa thugs kyi sa bon ni// sku mchog rgyun gyi ting 'dzin byang chub sems// las kyi mtha' brtul dgug cing gdab// mnan pa rtsa brgyad gdams ngag sbyar// de ltar de bzhin zor kha sbyar// b+ha he ra te tso la sogs rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg go/ smad kyi yi ge drug dang dgu// stod kyi yi ge drug pa dang// sbyor ba gsum gyi man+t+ra yis// don gsum lnga ru gzhug par bya// smad kyi stod kyi yi ge drug/ kar ma'i yi ge rgyun du drang// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// dkyus dbu zhabs su gdab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// dkyus ni dbu zhabs 'debs pa de lags na// dkyus ni dbu zhabs gdab mnan zhe sdang rgyu// 'bras bu dmyal bar skye ba mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// mdzad spyod thams cad dngos po med pa'i lung// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// dug sdong rtsad nas gcod pa'o// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// snang srid lus ngag yid gsum rtog pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// nam mkha' gting mtha' med pa chos dbyings gzhal yas khang// thigs pa lta bur snang srid dngos med shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// srid pa'i lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// sems rig phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ye nas yin par shar// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya'o// srid pa'i rtog tshogs phung po ni// lung ni gsum rgyud rdo rje bsgom// srid pa'i lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su bsgral// 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas gsad gnan ma yin no// phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas// srid pa'i lus ngag yid gsum phung po ni// ye nas rdo rje'i thugs ni yang dag gtams// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// bdag dang snang srid rnam par shes pa'i tshogs// ye nas 'dus

ma byas kyi rdo rje dbyer med bsgom// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod ma 'gags dbyings dang ye shes nyid// blta ba zab mo khyab gdal nam mkha' ltar// dgongs pa zab mo bskal pa'i me dpung khrugs// phrin las zab mo thog rdzis klong phab nas// mtshau la rlang byung chu yi ngo bor gcig/ lta spyod brlang por spyad na tshogs su 'gyur// zhes kI la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mdzad spyod dngos med kyi lung gi le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// gtso bo mdzad spyod dngos med lung gi le'u de lags na// phyogs bcu khro bo'i mdzad spyod dngos med ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// gardzas gdug pa ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i phrin las chags pa ma btang bas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ha nas In+d+ra gdug pa ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i 'khor ba bag chags rnam par rgyal// gdug pa'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// da has gdug pa ag+ni ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i 'khor ba bag chags dbyug pas 'joms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// pa tsas gdug pa ya ma ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa 'khor ba'i bag chags gshin rje gshed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ban d+has gdug pa nird-i ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i 'khor ba bag chags mi g.yo mgon// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// hu lus gdug pa ba ru ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags myur drag 'joms// rengs pa'i rta mchog phrin las bzhi// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// tiSh+Thas gdug pa ba ya ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags bar gcod gzhan mi thub// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ha nas gdug pa ku be ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags ye shes bdud rtsir 'khyil// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ts+tshin+das gdug pa in+t+ra ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// s+pho Tas gdug pa u ti ti ra bam// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags gnas stobs stobs po

che// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// gtso bo badzra dz+nyA na yis// mu kha he yi rtags dang don// byang sems lus dang yan lag tshul// srid pa ye nas sku gsung thugs// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// phyogs bcu khro bo mdzad spyod dngos med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// khro bo mdzad spyod dngos med de lags na// theg pa 'og ma'i dngos med sgyu mar 'dod// gzugs stong stong gzugs gzhan ni ma yin 'dod// rang bzhin med pas snang stong dbyer med 'dod// gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar// chos nyid stong pa nyid du 'og mas 'dod// snang ba sems nyid chos nyid rang rig 'dod// brtags pas dben pa'i bzhin ltar 'dod// chos nyid yongs su grub pa 'og ma 'dod// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// theg pa 'og ma'i sgyu ma de yin te// bden pa gnyis kyis sems nyid gtan la dbab// sgyu ma'i blo ldan bden pa dbyer med 'dod// gzugs stong stong gzugs bden pa gnyis// gzugs sku sgra rtog sku gsung thugs nyid de// de nyid bden pa dbyer med ye yin 'dod// rang bzhin med pas snang stong dbyer med pa// de ltar de bzhin bden pa dbyer med 'dod// bden pa gnyis kyis stong pa'i don tshol ba// mnyam par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dbyings su ltung// langs pas kun rdzob gang dang tha dad 'dod// snang ba'i sems nyid chos nyid rang rig pa// chos nyid skad cig grangs grags pa yang ma'i rdzas nyid do// brtags pas bden pa'i chos nyid yongs su grub// ma brtag nyams dga'i chos nyid nga mi 'dod// snang ba'i chos nyid rang rig ye shes yin// rang rig bden pa dbyer med sku gsung thugs// gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar// bden pa gnyis kyis stong pa'i don tshol ba// bskal pa grangs med kun tu 'od kyi sa// nga yi lung 'di gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// snang tsam nyid na rang bzhin med pa de// bden pa rang bzhin med pa dbyer med do// snang srid ye nas sku gsung thugs nyid de// de bzhin nyid kyi gzugs brnyan bden pa dbyer med do// snang srid ye nas gtso bo'i thugs nyid do// snang tsam nyid nas bden pa dbyer med yin// snang srid ye nas mnyam pa chen po ste// mnyam nyid tsam na bden pa dbyer med yin// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bden pa dbyer med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bden pa dbyer med de lags na/ gdab dang gnan bsreg 'phang ba 'di// zhe sdang la sogs nyon mongs lnga// de yi cha las gtogs gyur na// dngos po dbyer med mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// zhe sdang lam du zhugs nas ni// zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag/ gti mug lam du zhugs nas ni// gti mug ma spangs gnas su dag/ nga rgyal lam du zhugs nas ni// nga rgyal ma spangs gnas su dag/ 'dod chags lam du zhugs nas ni// 'dod chags ma spangs gnas su dag/ phrag dog lam du zhugs nas ni// phrag dog ma spangs gnas su dag/ de ltar de bzhin lam zhugs ma spangs gnas su dag/ dngos med bden pa dbyer med do// rtsa dngas khrag dngas dbugs dngas dang// 'od dngas tshe dngas 'byung ba dngas// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin rgyu// byang chub sems su gnyis med bstan// ma spangs gnas su dug lnga dag/ gnyen po la ni ltos ma yin// dug lnga khro bo'i phur pa yis// dug lnga byang sems ye shes lnga// zhe sdang gnyen po byams pa yin// zhe sdang la sogs bdo ba'i dus// mtho yor la ni mir shes tshul// mdzad spyod bden pa dbyer med don// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mdzad spyod bden pa dbyer med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mdzad spyod bden pa dbyer med de lags na// gsang ba rgyud kyi bsgom rdzogs ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bskyed pa'i rim pa byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni sems nyid don// rtag dang chad dang sems nyid la// gzung 'dzin dran rtog stong ldan dang// kha dog dbyibs bral nam mkha' la// dkar po dmar ser mthing ljang dang// gzung dang gdags su yong med de// ser bu dang ni 'ja' tshon ltar// snang ba thabs la gting mtha' med pa yum// thams cad thabs dang shes rab ma gyur med// ma lus med pa gtan la ji ltar 'bebs// yul dang rig pa phar shar tshur 'jug gnyis// phung po lnga dang sangs rgyas lnga// khams dang skye mched de bzhin du// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod spyod lam rnam bzhi la// spyod dang rol dang lha thim dkyil 'khor ro// ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga gsum// chos rnams thams cad skye med gcig/ thugs rje chen po khyab pa che// cho ga gsum ni sprul pa'i sku// 'jig dang chags dang srid pa'i

tshul// mtha' dbus med pa'i gzhal yas khang// bcas dang bcos dang sangs rgyas rnams// gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te// kha dog lnga dang phrin las lnga// thams cad sems nyid gcig pa ste// sems las ji skyes sangs rgyas so// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gsang ba rgyud kyi bsgom rdzogs kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang ba rgyud kyi bsgom rdzogs de lags na// cher gsang lung gi bsgom rdzogs ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i sku dang 'jig tshogs dang// mtshan mar snang ba'i snang srid las// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klong du// yid byung kun tu bzang po'i rol par shar// gzugs su snang ba'i lus ni sku ru shar// sgra ru grag pa'i ngag gi gsung du shar// dran rtog gshes rig yid ni thugs su shar// nam mkha' yangs pa'i mkha' dbyings la// nyi zla gza' skar shar ba bzhin// kun gzhi dbyings la yid ni sku gsung thugs// lus dang yan lag tshul du shar// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur shar// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gsung// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// gsung gi dbyig tu bdag gyur shar// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes thugs// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// thugs kyi dbyig tu 'dag gyur shar// kun gzhi me long lta bu la// yid ni bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan shar/ kun gzhi rgya mtsho lta bu la// yid ni nyi zla gza' skar shar// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// yid ni kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi sku ru shar// thugs kyi gsung dang thugs kyi thugs// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// bkag pa med par dus gcig tu// sku gsung thugs su rang las shar// snang ba'i rang bzhin med par shar// yid dran sngags brjod tsam yang lta bar ma bsnyegs so// kun gzhi dbyings la yid ni ye shes shar// ci spyod rnam rtog mtshan ma ci byung yang// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pas byang chub sems// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi sku dang thugs kyi gsung du shar// thugs kyi thugs ni thabs cad dbyer med shar// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ cher gsang lung gi bsgom rdzogs kyi le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// cher gsang lung gi bsgom

rdzogs de lags na// man ngag yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snang ba thams cad yul yin te// yul gyi rnam pa sems yin no// cir snang cir mthong sems yin pas// sems las ma gtogs gang yang med// sems ni yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// yang gsang thugs ni chos kyi sku/ snang ba'i sems nyid yang gsang thugs/ rnam rtog skye ba'i gzhi med par// rnam rtog gnyid kyang yang gsang thugs// rnam rtog yang gsang thugs la 'char nub med// sems nyid yang gsang thugs la yul dang yul can med// sems kyi ngo bo yang gsang gnyis med pa// nyams su len pa'i bsgom bya sgom byed med// yang gsang thugs ni rdo rje phur pa'o// phur ni kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// pa ni yid de kun tu bzang po'o// phur ni kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// bu ni yid de kun tu bzang po'o// phur ni kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// bu ni yid de kun tu bzang po dkyil 'khor rnam gsum mo// phur ni kun gzhi thugs nyid la// bu ni sku dang gsung nyid do// rdo rje kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// khros pa yid de kun tu bzang po'o// gnyis med dug sdong rtsad gcod zhe sdang gcod// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ye nas thugs su mtshon// gnyen po med pas ye nas bsregs// kun gzhi kun bzang nam mkha'i dkyil// yid ni snang srid ye nas thigs pa shar// lus dang yan lag tshul du srog gi go ru shar// kun gzhi stong pa snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya// dam tshig kun tu bzang mo yis// yid ni snying rje thugs su bsgral// kun tu bzang po yab yum thugs// rol bsad mnan pa ma yin no// snang srid lus ngag yid gsum phung po ni// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo rdo rjer gtams// rnam par shes pa yid ni kun tu bzang// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo rdo rje dbyer med bsgom// srid pa ye nas phur bu ru// yang gsang thugs su rtogs pas bsgrub// yang gsang phur bu rtogs pas dbang dang dngos grub blangs// rang gi sems nyid rtogs pas ye shes khro bo dag/ rang la rang nyid spyan drangs drang du+u med// gzhan nas spyan drang med par sems nyid rtogs nas ni// rtags dang mtshan ma'i byin rlabs bcu bzhi 'byung// ki la ya yi dngos grub mngon shes drug dag 'byung// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ man ngag yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u stai lnga bcu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// man ngag yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de lags na// dman pa rnams la

don 'di ji ltar bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gsum// dman pa rnams kyis yang dag don// gsang sngags lta ba mar snyogs pas// dngos grub ster ba myur du thob// bde gshegs thugs rje mi 'byung na// sems can don ni 'byung mi srid// bde gshegs byin rlabs mi 'byung na// sems can dngos grub mi thob pas// bskyed dang spyan drang phyag 'tshal dang// mchod bstod cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab pha rol phyin// de la bzlog med ma yengs pas// dngos grub myur du thob par nges// de phyir rnal 'byor gdeng can bzlog med kyis// rdo rje khros pa 'khor bcas kyis// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bskyed pa ni// de la thabs dang thabs la brten// dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyi don// zla gcig lo gcig lo gsum dang// rab 'bring gsum gyi rtags rnams ni// dus der mi 'byung mi srid do// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pas dngos grub myur du thob pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thabs dman pa la snyegs pas dngos grub myur du thob pa de lags na// de yi bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje khros pa zhes sogs pas// rnam par shes pa rdo rje bsgom// ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga gsum// bzhi dag gis bskyed par bya// yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs nas// bsgul bskyod bde ba'i drod tshad las// 'od zer drug gis bya ba bsgrubs// A+oM dang hUM gnyis phaT dang bzhi// bar du mtshan nyid so sor bcug/ cho ga gsum gyis bzhi pa bskyed// karma gu ya man+t+ra yis// 'dod pa'i bya ba so sor bsgrub// srid pa'i phur bu zhes sogs pas// byin brlabs bcu gcig bzhi yang sras mchog bskyed// 'od zer bkug nas sku gsung thugs// gsang lam pad+ma las 'phros pas// 'od phung gu ya tha mar gtad// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bskyed rim ni// dang po thun du bcad de bsgom// nus pa gzhug dang nus pa bskyed// nus pa brtas dang nus pa thob// nus pa bzhi pa thob nas ni// gar mkhan lag pa de bzhin du// gang ltar byas pa de bzhin snang// snang ba'i nus pa thob pa ni// gdams ngag rin chen dag las 'byung// byin rlabs bcu bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pas dngos grub myur du thob pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun

pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pas// dngos grub myur du thob pa de lags na// de yi cho ga'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje khros pas zhes sogs nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// rtsa ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// A+oM dang hUM nyid phaT dang bzhi// bar du mtshan nyid so sor gzhug/ karma gu ya man+t+ra yis// 'dod pa'i bya ba don grub pas// rdo rje he yis bar du ni// mtshan nyid so sor bcug pa dang// phyogs bcu cho ga'i rim pa'o// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa nas// gshegs su gsol ba'i bar du ni// bcu gcig rtsa gcig cho ga ni// rdzas kyi cho ga'i rim pa'o// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa nas// gshegs su gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// gang la gang nas gang dag gang du gang phyir du// spyan drang cho ga'i rim pa'o// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// dngos grub gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyi don// bstim pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// dbang dang byin rlab 'dir stsol cing// 'dod pa'i don la gsol btab dang// dbang dang byin rlab nod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// bud+d+ha'i mdzad spyod phrin las ni// tshad med bzhi ni sngon du 'gro// theg pa chen por mi tshud bzhin// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor dang// thabs che thabs mang thabs mkhas dang// thabs myur cho ga'i rim pa'o/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// 'dod pa'i bya ba don grub gsol gdab pa// longs sku gnyis thim srid pa'i lha// dbab pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// badzra yak+sha kro ta khA hi/ rtsa ba gu ya man+t+ra la// mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// 'dod bya gnyis su dbul bar bya'o// mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las// thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pa'i dngos grub myur du thob pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// cho ga'i rim pa de lags na// gzhal yas khang du gsal ba yi// 'di yi don rtags ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhal yas gsal ba'i don rtags ni// gzhal yas gru bzhir 'byung ba ni// tshad med bzhi yi don rtags yin// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhi 'byung ba ni// rnam thar

ye shes don rtags yin// rta babs yang dag spang ba bzhi/ ye nas rnam par dag pa'i don rtogs yin// dra ba dra phyed brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs che chung gnas su dag pa'i don rtags yin// zhing smug ka ba brgyad btegs pa// 'phags pa'i lam brgyad don rtags yin// tshangs pa'i gdung lnga bkye ba ni// dug lnga gnas su dag pa'i don rtags yin// nyi zla'i ka gdan ka zhu byas pa ni// thabs dang shes rab don rtags yin// zhing gi ya mkhal ma mkhal gyis// ya them ma them byas pa ni// pha ma gnas su bsad pa'i don rtags yin// sbrul nag skyes bu byas pa ni// 'khor ba zhe la sdang ba'i don rtags yin// dur khrod chen pos brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs cho 'phrul mngon du phyung// yang sprul sum sprul stod cing za ba'i don rtogs yin// 'dod yon lha mos brgyan pa ni// longs spyod lnga ldan don rtags yin// rin chen pha gu la sogs brgyan// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rtags// rin chen lnga yi brtsigs pas brgyan pa ni// ye shes lnga yi don rtags yin// zur sgor rgyal mtshan bzhis brgyan ni/ rnam rtog bdud las rgyal ba'i don rtags yin// dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa ni// thugs rje yongs la khyab pa'i don rtags yin// ri dwags sA ras brgyan pa ni// byang chub sems dpas bskor ba'i don rtags yin// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni// sa bcu'i byang chub sems kyis ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don rtags yin// zhing gi gdugs dang 'phan gyis brgyan pa ni// sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la// so so yang dag don ni ston pa'i rtags// nang ni thod pa'i gzhal yas khang// gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i don rtags yin// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag byung ba ni// chos kyi dbyings nyid skye med la// sku gsung thugs gsum 'byung ba'i don rtags yin// zla gam dmar po gsum du byung ba ni// srid gsum dbang du sdud pa'i don rtags yin// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'byung ba ni// don gyi 'khor lo rgyas par bskor ba'i don rtags yin// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po 'byung ba ni// skye med lhun gyis grub pa'i don rtags yin// dkar po zlum po byung ba ni// zhi ba chen po'i don rtags yin// ser mo gru bzhi byung ba ni// rgyas pa chen po'i don rtags yin/ rdo rje ra bas bskor ba ni// thugs ni yang dag don rtags yin// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgong rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gi don rtags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gi don rtags de lags na// 'od zer bskul ba'i don rtags ji

ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshil gyis 'od zer bkye// dam tshig mkha' la ri dwags 'grog pa bzhin// 'og min gnas nas 'od zer bskul spyan drangs// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// dam tshig mkha' la ri dwags 'grogs pa dang// mar me gnyis dag gcig tu bsdom pa bzhin// dam tshig 'od zer bskul bas gnyis med gcig tu bab// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// snga chu'i steng du phyi chu bab pa bzhin// gnyis su med par ma thob bar du bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// dkar dmar mthing gsum gnas rnams su// so mal lcags la ngar blud bzhin// yon tan gsum du byin rlab bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// so mal lcags la ngar blud bzhin// dbang dang byin brlabs nus pa thob par gyur// dam tshig sems dpa'i 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams nas thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od spros pas// srin mtheb thabs dang shes rab kyis// 'bru gsum sgrub mchog dngos grub blang// dam tshig sems dpa'i 'od zer spro// de ltar de bzhin bde gshegs bskul// bde mchog bde sbyor b+ha ga'i klong yangs nas// rab dgyes byang chub sems kyi dngos grub bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// de ltar de bzhin byang sems dgye// ye shes bdud rtsi dam tshig bdud rtsir thim// 'od zhu gnyis med kha dog lnga ru spros// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni char bzhin phab/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa dam pa 'dis// mchod pa'i bye brag rnams la mchod par 'bul// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ 'od zer bskul bas dngos grub kyi nus pa myur du thob pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'od zer bskul bas dngos grub kyi// nus pa myur du thob pa de lags na// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// rnal 'byor las ni dang po yis// bde bar gshegs ba'i zhal mthong ba'i// snang ba'i nus pa ji ltar thob par 'gyur// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor las ni dang po yis// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa dang po la// re re la yang brgya brgya yi// dbugs dang sbyar te 'phro 'du bya// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i gnas gsum du// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa 'jug par 'gyur// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa gnyis pa la// re re la yang gsum gsum mo// dbugs dang sbyar te 'phro 'du bya// ting 'dzin gsal bas gnas gsum du// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa bskyed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa gsum pa la// re re la yang re re'o// dbugs dang sbyar te 'phro 'du bya// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i gnas gcig tu// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa brtas par 'gyur// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa bzhi pa la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bla 'og bcur// re re la yang gting mtha' med// dbugs dang sbyar te 'phro 'du bya// ting 'dzin gsal ba rgyun mi 'chad// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa thob par 'gyur// rin chen gling du phyin pas sa rdo nub par 'gyur// snang ba'i nus pa thob pas snang ba nub par 'gyur// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin pas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang gnon// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces kI la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bde bar gshegs pa zhal mthong ba'i snang ba'i nus pa ji ltar thob pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag nyid bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs su byas nas dbang dang dngos grub slad kyis pha rol las nod pa'i don ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bde gshegs snang ba'i nus pa ma thob par// sngon gyi thugs dam thugs bskyed pas// bde gshegs thugs rje'i byin rlab 'byung// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// dpal be'u gsum brgyud gsang lam nas// pad+ma las 'phros sras mchog byung// gzhal yas khang la lan gsum du// bskor ba byas te phyag byas la// pad+ma dbang gi sgor zhugs la/ bskal pa'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i lha// ring ba'i dus nas bsnyen pa'i lha// thugs dam gcig cing dbyar dam skong// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dang// gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchod pa lan grangs brgya stong dang// khri 'bum [(4[)]

bye ba dbul bar bya// gsang sngags lan grangs brgya stong dang// khri 'bum bye ba dbul bar bya// dngos grub bye ba brgya stong dang// khri 'bum bye ba blangs byas na// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs rje 'byung// bdag sras gzhan sras de bzhin du// thabs mkhas thabs mang thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// dbang dang byin rlab 'dir gsol bas// ye shes khro bo grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// bdag la bsdu zhing 'od du thim// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub 'byung// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba de lags na// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i dus// de la bar chod 'phrog 'tshe mi 'byung ngam// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyu skar mgo dang rgyal skag dang// byang sems phur pa pa wa sangs// ra ba bzhi yi skya rengs gsum// bde bshegs rig 'dzin pho nya gsum// bde bar gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin gang na gnas par yang// dbang dang dngos grub dus der 'byung bar 'gyur// dbang dang dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor la// dam log dam sri ru dra yis// ye shes rtsal 'phang 'thon po sgrib// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe bar byed// dge ba'i bsam par bar chod byed// khro bo chen po'i cha lugs kyis// bar chad drag tu bsgral bar bya'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i dus tshod dang/ dam sri bar chod bsgral ba'i dus kyi le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dbang dang dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor la// dam srid dam log ru dras bar chod byed// 'di nyid ci las gyur pa yin zhes gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// 'di yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// lha sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom las gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod sngon du ma bzung bar// dngos po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed// bde gshegs yi dam gcig bzung bde gshegs kun gyi ngang// yi dam bzang ngan bde bar gshegs la phye// chos la phyogs char bzung bas dam log phyogs chad nyams// lta ba sgos khur bcad pas sangs rgyas dgongs ma longs// nga ni theg chen khro bo'i rgyal po yin// sku dang yan lag rags pas 'jigs par bstan// ting nge 'dzin gyis stong gsum khengs par sprul// dgug dang bstims dang gzir

gnon drag pos brdung// 'dre srin rnams kyang lha ru bzung ste bran du khol// 'dong ngo gzas pa'i sha dang khrag la 'dong// srog chod dbugs phrogs rtags ni myur du ston// mgo sprugs so gtsigs mig bzlog brang brdung cing// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod bor bas don mi 'grub// 'jig rten 'di la phar bas tshur gnod che// sa bon me yis tshig pa la// 'bras bu skye ba ga la srid// sangs rgyas dgongs spyod bor ba las// dngos grub thob pa ga la srid// de yi rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'byung ba ni// dam log dam sri rU dra gsum du smin// 'jig rten khams gsum mdangs 'phrog srog gcod cing/ rnal 'byor dngos grub 'phrog dang bar chod byed// sngon gyi las dbang btsan pa'i mthu yis ni// gcig la stong gsum khengs par sprul nas ni// yi dwags 'dre srin mthu bo cher gyur nas// 'jig rten khams gyi srog dang dbugs kyi bdag/ dge ba'i phyogs la dad pa'i bar chod byed// 'jig rten khams la gnod pa sha stag go/ de yi rnam smin dmyal khams rdo rjer bcu/ zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pas// dam sri dam log rU tra gsum du gyur ba'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa las// rU tra dang ni dam srir skye ba de lags na// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// lha sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa yis// sangs rgyas dgongs pa blang ba'i don ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// sangs rgyas dgongs pa blang ba'i don// lha sku phyag rgya chen por bsgom// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag dang// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// gcig la gsum rdzogs ma rtogs par// mun mda' bzhin du phyogs tshod kyis// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs mi 'gyur// dang por shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la phebs par dpyad// de nas bla ma dam pa las// gdams ngag rin chen thob byas la// thabs mang thabs chen thabs mkhas thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// tshad med bzhi ni sngon du 'gro// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul bas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs par bya// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub 'byung ba yin// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs pa la// lnga bcu gcig nas lnga yi bar// bzhi po dag nas blang bar bya'o// zhes kI la yang gsang ba'i dgongs

rgyud las/ sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa longs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la// longs spyod tshogs 'bul ji ltar bgyi// 'di yi don rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// bsgom pa'i khog gsum dgongs don sbyar// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// rak+ta chags pa chen po mtsho ltar 'khyil// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dbyings nas bzhengs// yum chen 'khor ba rgyas 'debs sku+u la 'khril// phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal tshogs ni sprin ltar gtibs// pra thabs yang sprul tshogs ni skar ltar 'khrug/ ci bgyi bka' nyan tshogs ni glog ltar 'gyu// dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni mun ltar gtibs// thugs dam dbyings nas bzhengs te gshegs su gsol// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub sogs nas// gshegs su gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// bsgom pa'i khog gsum dgongs don sbyar// longs spyod tshogs kyi zhal zas ri ltar spungs// zhing chen gsar rnying tshogs ni bye ltar bkram// mAM sa tsit+ta'i tshogs ni rdza ltar lhags// rak+ta mang po'i tshogs ni mtsho ltar 'khyil// sbyang ba'i yi ge gsum pos sbyang// spel ba'i yi ge lnga pos spel bas ni// so so'i bcud bsdus lhar thim pa// bskyil ba'i snying po dag gis bskyil// longs spyod bdud rtsi chen por gyur// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par spro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi char bzhin phab// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dam pa 'di// bsgom pa'i khog dang dgongs don gsum// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las gsum// mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// thams cad du ni dbul bar bya// rgyal ba mnyes te dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor pa yis myur du thob// theg pa chen po sman pa'i sa// bskyed rdzogs tshogs sbyor mthong bskal gcig/ bsags brabs tshogs chen khyad par gyis// bsags bsregs dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ longs spyod tshogs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos// 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// mos pa'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal bas// dngos grub thob pa'i don ci lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos dang longs sku sprul pa yi// 'ja' tshon nam mkha'

dbyer med bzhin// mos pa'i bsnyen bkur dbu+u la bkod// phyogs bcu'i rigs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags gnas su dag/ 'khor ba rgyas 'debs sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rmongs byed za byed che 'phel rgyas 'debs ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi la yang phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes drag snyems gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// 'jigs byed khro bo bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo'i chags pa thugs dam skong mdzad ma// 'jigs byed srin mo bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod// pho nya thogs pa med par rgyug pa yi// phra thabs nyi shu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos grub bar chad dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs pa med// 'dod pa sna tshogs sgyur ba'i 'phrul mo che// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshol lo// rnal 'byor dngos grub don 'dod pa// dgongs don gsum gyis bde gshegs la// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// mos pa'i sgo nas gdams ngag gis// phyag btsal dngos grub myur du thob// ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mos sgo phyag 'tshal dngos grub myur du thob pa'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o//// de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// phyag 'tshal don ni de lags na/ dgongs don gsum la mos pa'i sgo nas bstod pas/ dngos grub myur du thob pa'i don ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// dgongs don gsum la mos bstod pa/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu+u ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan pa// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// chos dang longs spyod sprul sku'i rtags// nyon mongs bag chags thams cad zhal du rngub pa'i phyir// zhal nas khrag gi rba klong 'khyil ba yin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa yin// bag chags 'thor zhing g.yeng ba'i phyir// shangs nas rlung nag 'tshubs ma 'thor ba yin// nyon mong bag chags sreg pa'i phyir// spyan nas me yi phung po 'bar ba yin// phrin las thogs pa med par mdzad pa'i phyir// smin mtshams khro gnyer glog tu 'gyu ba yin// khams gsum srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// snyan nas bskal pa'i

'brug stong ldir ba yin// thugs rje'i sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i phyir// dbu skra ral pa kham nag phyogs bcur 'khyil ba yin// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// phyag drug g.yas kyi bar pa'i phyag mtshan ni/ rdo rje rtse lngas rgyud lnga rab tu sgrol// phyag drug g.yon gyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// me dpung 'bar bas nyon mongs khams gsum bsreg/ phyag drug g.yon gyi bar ma'i phyag mtshan ni// kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// phyag drug g.yas g.yon tha ma'i phyag mtshan ni// ri rab phur bus khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yin// badzra ku mA ra yi rgyan gyi cha lugs ni// gti mug lam du zhugs nas ni// gti mug gnas su dag bya'i phyir// glang chen dag gi lpags bshus nas// sku stod glang chen na bza' gsol ba yin// zhe sdang lam du zhugs nas ni// zhe sdang gnas su dag pa'i phyir// zhe sdang sbrul gyi chun po ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gdol pa'i rigs// dbu rgyan mgur chu snyan cha phyag gdub zhabs gdug rgyan gyis brgyan pa yin// nga rgyal gnas su dag bya'i phyir// nga rgyal stag gi lpags bshus nas// sku smad stag gi sham thabs gsol ba yin// 'dod chags lam du zhugs nas ni// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dregs pa brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// se ral kha ru brgyan pa yin// phrag dog lam du zhugs nas ni// phrag dog ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i phyir// phrag dog mi yi lpags bshus nas/ sku la zhing chen g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yin// snang srid thugs rjes snum pa'i phyir// zhag gi zo ris sku la brgyan pa yin/ snang srid thugs rjes chags pa mi gtong phyir// rak+ta'i thig les sku la brgyan pa yin// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin phyir// thal chen tshom bus sku la brgyan pa yin// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// thod pa skam rlon ra ri'i phraing ba yis// dbu rgyan se ral kha ru brgyan pa yin// dregs pa thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// brkyang bskum tshul gyis lha chen pho mo gdan du bting ba yin// 'khor ba'i bag chags gting nas sreg pa'i phyir// sku la bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yin// de 'dra khro bo 'jigs tshul bstan la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// sgom pa'i khog dang dgong pa'i don// phyogs kyi don dang ldan bstod na// mthu 'phrog dgug dang bstim pa dang// gdab dang gnan bsreg 'phang ba

dang// gnyen po stobs dang 'jigs las thar// gnyen po grub pas gang yang 'grub// mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob// ces kI la ya la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gtso bo la mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob pa de lags na// khro bo bcu+u la mos pas bstod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// phrin las gsum gyis bag chags dbyings su sdud// khro rgyal hUM kA ra la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i thugs mchog 'khor ba rnams las rgyal// khro rgyal rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i don la phrin las 'joms byed pa// khro rgyal dbyug sngon dag la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung 'dzin log rtog 'chi bdag tshar gcod pa// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i skyon spangs sdug bsngal mgon mdzad pa// khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdangs skad rngam bzhad tsham rngams phyogs bcur sgrogs// khro rgyal rta mgrin sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes 'gro don chags pas skyon mi gos// khro rgyal gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i bdud la thugs rje'i rtsi gtong ba// khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal bstod// khams gsum 'khor ba thugs rjes bsgral bas rgyal// khro rgyal khams gsum rnam rgyal sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba thugs rje'i stobs kyis bla med gnas su sgrol// khro rgyal stobs po che la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i khro rgyal yab yum bcu// 'khor ba'i byang sems phra thabs nyi shu'i tshogs// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs spyan bzlog 'gying bag can// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad sgeg phyir brgyan// 'khor ba'i bag chags sreg phyir sku la me yi phung po 'bar// brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gying bag stangs stabs can// dregs pa thams cad dbang sdud phyogs skyong bcu dag mnan// bdud 'dul dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgom pa'i khog dang dgongs pa'i don// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// dgongs don gdams ngag sbyar bstod nas// thun mong stobs kyis 'jig las thar// gnyen po stobs dang dngos grub dag/ myur du thob par the tshom med// ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs

don las// khro bcu la mos pas bstod pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// phur pa sras mchog bstod pa ni// byin gyis brlabs dang gzi byin bskyed// bzhengs su gsol dang las la gzhug/ gyen du gsor zhing glad la bskor// hUM bzhi gsal 'phro la sogs bdun pa bzhin// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ma g.yos chos mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// gti mug chen pos gti mug 'joms mdzad lha la 'tshal bstod// gru gsum dka' nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// badzra 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// zhe sdang bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// zhe sdang chen pos zhe sdang 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gru gsum ser nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rat+na 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// nga rgyal chen pos nga rgyal 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gru gsum dmar nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// 'dod chags chen pos 'dod chags 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gru gsum ljang nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// phrag dog chen pos phrag dog 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// phur pa sras mchog bstod pa ni// thur du bstan la drag tu gzer// gdab pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dIp+ta tsakra phur pa'i lha// mi bzad drag po'i phur pa drug po yang// de ltar de bzhin rjes su'o// sku stod khro bo chen po la// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// lte ba man chad chas rnams ni// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// drag por gyur pa'i phur pa ste// dgra bgegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// gdab dang mngags dang sdigs la sogs// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// rtag tu mchod cing bcangs gyur na// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi stobs// stobs chen khro bor bdag gyur nas// gnyen po stobs kyis 'jigs las thar// de yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sras mchog phur pa la mos pa bstod pa'i don gyi le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//// de nas phrin las

kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// phur pa bcangs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa
