gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badzra kro ta a pa ra tsi ta hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ byang nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang bcas// byang phyogs gnod cing pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT// byang shar khro bo khams gsum rgyal// gsod byed drod dang sre mor bcas/ byang shar dbang ldan pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du

'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badzra kro ta trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ 'og nas khro bo stobs po che// bskyod chen dom dang byi bar bcas// 'og gi sa bdag pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa la hUM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rdo rje khro bos rnam par gtams// dbus su ma hA de ba dang// ru dra chen po khyo shug bsnol// bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nu dang// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs dag tu bya// khro bo bcu gcig dkyil 'khor du// kun kyang mthing nag rngam pa'i sku// rdo rje phur pa thod khrag bsnams// sprul pa lcags kyu phur pa 'debs// ru dra chen po'i sde dpon rnams// dbang sdud bran du gzir nas kyang// dpa' rtags dpa' bo'i chas brgyad ldan// sa gnon nyi zla pad+ma tshogs// nyon mongs sreg pa'i me dpung 'bar// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// mtshon cha sras mchog phur pa bskyed// sku stod khro bo chen po la// sku smad phur pa zur gsum mo// gzas pa'i snying dkyil thebs par bskyed// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa'i gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las lha rnams kyi rang bzhin dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po badzra kI la yas bka' stsal pa// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas btsal te// rdzas dang yo byad 'khor ldan pas// phyi dang nang gi mtshams kyang gcad// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha ru// nas nag sngon mo blug par bya// phur bu bco lnga dar gyis gril// rgyu rkyen dbang bskur byin brlab bya// thog mar dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// bzhi bcu gnyis dang lnga bcu brgyad// zhi dang khros pa rigs brgya mchod// 'dzab dang bstod pa bskang bshags bya// dza gad bdud rtsi lhag ma yis// rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor brtsam// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis// gang la mos dang shis pa bris// ye shes khros pa bco lnga dang// pho nya dpung tshogs bcas pa yi// phur pa dkyil 'khor gnas la dgod// gdug cing rtsub pa gzas pa'i gzugs// 'dra 'bag rtsa dang gzugs su bca'// zag pa'i rdzas dang dme khrag byug/ yang na chu sna'i 'jim pas bya// ming dang rus dang srog yig gzhug/ smug nag dang ni thal dkar bya// lcags thag btags la e la gtod// rta mgrin skur gnas dpang btsugs te// srid pa'i bgegs la zhal lce bcad// mthing nag me 'bar dkyil 'khor du// smug nag sngo nag dmar nag 'bar// 'jigs byed khro bo'i sprul pas drangs// dpal gyi pho nyas gnas nas dgug/ sgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa dgod// bco lnga khro bo ma mo gsum// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa

tshul bzhin bya// mtshan ma mthong ngam dus bab na// phrin las drag po brtsam par bya// drag po'i rdzas dang phur pa dang// lha dang sngags kyi dgongs mtsho sdeb// rta mchog skul gsal gnas nas dgug/ dbang drag chas su zhugs nas kyang// gsur chen dud pa sgra bcas nas// ma mo 'bod cing dam la bsdu// bkrag mdangs dbrog cing tshe lung bya// gnad sgor gdab cing khrag thun dbab// byang gi pho nyas sha khrag bstab// byad kyi ma mos byad du gzhug/ nub kyi khro bos gnas sbar te// lho sgo sras kyi sems lung bstan// nyon mongs bsad nas gso ba shar// rtag pa rgyun gyi ye shes bsgom// de ltar phrin las mthar phyung na// tshangs pa'i tshe yang 'jig par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las khro bo gsang ba'i las nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi bdag po dpal rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la spu Ta spu Ta na sa pa na ye hUM phaT// sarba duSh+taMn hri da ya hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru hUM phaT/ bi da ya bid bid hUM phaT/ na maHsa man ta bing bing hUM phaT/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man ta bi shwa d+ha ya be ra be ra hUM phaT/ aM ku sha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT// byA g+h+ri pa la sho da hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las sras mchog rtsa ba'i snying po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ mtshams med pa la mtshams kyang gcad// khro bcus phyogs bcur phur pas gtams// khro bo 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad re mig la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// kI la ya yi 'od zer gyis// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdab pa ltar// gang la bab pa rdul du rlag/ skor mtshams bzhi dang skor tshoms gsum// smad kyi dkyus tshig drag po las// rak+ta tshar gsum tshar lnga sbreng// rngam pa glog gi dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// dpa' bo khro bo 'jigs par bcas// rigs sngags don la yang dag sbyor// rak+ta'i mtsho dang keng rus ri// mAM sa'i nyor tshogs zhing chen gsur// rngam pa'i mkha' 'gro tshogs la bstab// rdo rje khro rgyal he ru kas// gtum khro gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// hUM mdzad hUM la ho ste rol// hUM mdzad hUM'u gis thugs dam bskang// gar dgu khros pa'i zhal du bstab// stong gsum thams cad phur pa'i lha// bdud 'dul khro bo'i skur bstan pa// phyogs bcu dgra bgegs thams cad kun// dengs par mi byed 'dug gyur na// thams cad ma lus thebs

par gdab// dam log dam sri rUtra'i sde// 'di dag tshar ni ma bcad na// sgrub la bar chod ma rungs byed// nyams pa bdud ni 'di rnams te// dgra dang bgegs dang bdud tshogs kyang// 'di gsum ma thul sku dgrar ldang// de phyir sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dam sri gnan cing dam log gsad// rU tra'i sde rnams gdul bar bya// bcu gcig dpal dang phyag rgya bzhi// ye shes khro bo bco lnga'i thugs// srog dang ldan pa'i ye shes sems// 'khor dang bcas pa'i bdag po bskyed// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med bstim// gzir gnon sgrol ba'i sku ru bsgom// sku dang gsung thugs srog dbang bskur// zhi ba bsnyen cing khros pa bsgrub// dngos grub kun gyi gzhi ma yin// sman rag gtor ma la sogs pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// lo zla'i dus su brtson par 'bad// bsnyen pa'i bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor gang la mos pa ni// 'jigs byed e ya dkyil 'khor bskyed// rang bzhin sgrub phyir bstod cing bskul// zhes gsungs so// kI la ya gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las bsnyen pa'i le'u drug pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi bdag po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg sgeg 'dra// bdud bzhi gtan du bcom pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// sku che yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhad pas rgod rgod 'dra// g.yon pa dmar la gdangs pas gshe gshe 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la rngams pas khro khro 'dra// rgyu drug spyan gyis gzigs pas snying rje che che 'dra// dug gsum zhal du rdubs pas rngam rngam 'dra// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs pa'i skur bstan pas// chos sku mtshan ma med pas zhi zhi 'dra// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtselngas rgyud lnga gnas su sgrol// me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum nyes pa sreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ri rab phur bus khams gsum rdul du rlog/ 'khor lo rgyas 'debs dpal gyi sku la 'khril// khro bo khro mo rab 'jigs 'bar ba'i sku// sku ni me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// gsung ni drag po'i sgra skad 'brug stong ldir// thugs ni mi rtog rnam rtog thams cad 'joms// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum la// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// hUM chen mthing ga rdo rje thod khrag dang// mda' gzhu rdo rje ri rab phur pa 'dril// sku mdog mthing ga dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi

brag steng nyi zla pho mo mnan// sgra 'byin phag dang smig bu 'khor gyis bskor// rnam rgyal dkar po rdo rje thod khrag dang// tri shUl 'khor lo ri rab phur bu 'dril// zhal mdog dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng brgya byin pho mo mnan// snyems ma stag dang bya rgod 'khor gyis bskor// gshin rje sngon po rdo rje thod khrag 'thung// nr-i mgo dgra s+t+wa ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog sngon po dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng gshin rje pho mo gnon// dur khrod sha ba 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// rta mgrin dmar po rdo rje thod khrag dang// zhags pa spu gri ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog dmar po sngo dang dkar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng klu dbang pho mo mnan// gtum mo byi la pu shud 'khor gyis bskor// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram dbyug tho thogs// sku mdog ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng gnod sbyin pho mo mnan// rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang 'khor gyis bskor// dbyug pa sngon po dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal// rdor thod dbyug pa me thab phur pa 'dril// zhabs bzhi brag steng me lha pho mo mnan// sder mo g.yag dang bya rog 'khor gyis bskor// mi g.yo ljang sngon rdo rje thod khrag dang// ral gri zhags pa ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog ljang sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhing// zhabs bzhi brag steng bden bral pho mo mnan// gtun khung gzigs dang khwa ta 'khor gyis bskor// gzhan gyis mi thub dmar skya rdo rje thogs// rnga yab b+han d+ha ri rab phur pa 'dril// sku mdog dmar skya dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng rlung lha pho mo mnan// mda' stems spyang ki khra yi 'khor gyis bskor// khams gsum rnam rgyal tri shUl mda' dang zhu// sku mdog ljang ser dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng dbang ldan pho mo mnan// gsod byed dred dang sre mo 'khor gyis bskor// stobs chen dud kha rdo rje thod khrag 'thung// zhags pa tho ba ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog dud kha dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag steng sa bdag pho mo mnan// skyod byed dom dang byi la'i 'khor gyis bskor// khro rgyal kun kyang dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong nA bzhugs// shar gyi sgo ba dkar mo lho sgo ser// nub gyi sgo ba dmar mo byang sgo ljang// bya phur skyer phur mchog phur lcags phur bsnams// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu g.yon// rang byung khro bo rnams kyi mthu dang rtsal// badzra kI la ya yi dus la bab// lha rnams bstod cing thugs dam bskul// sras mchog khro bo bco lnga yis// btab na lha yang rlag par byed// sri can rdul du rlog pa'o// mi bzad drug gi

'khor dang bcas// sprul pas srid gsum gtams par bsgom// de nas shes pa 'du sar gdab// btab nas bde ba'i sa la dgod// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa// de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// ngag ni gsang sngags dkyil 'khor bsgom// sems ni chos nyid dkyil 'khor bsgom// dben par sa sbyangs maN+Dal bca'// 'khor gnas yo byad blo ldan pas// khro mo yum gyi gtun khung bri// gru gsum rtsa gcig 'bar ba tsam// yang na bcu gcig bdun yang bri// las kyi dkyil 'khor gru gsum e// rdo ba dag gam sa la bya// lcags sna ljang dang dug shing dang// mi dang bya yi rus pa la// sras mchog phur pa gzi ldan bya// gu gul rak+ta yungs kar gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin bskyed// ka pA la yi gnas bzhugs nas// rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pa rtsam// sku dang chos nyid gsal ldan pas// bsnyen pa gdeng dang ldan par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing// rang rgyud dag par bshags sbyang bya// 'phro 'dus nye bar bsnyen bya ste// bdun 'bum nyi khri'i grangs rdzogs nas// rdo rje khro bo rol pa sgrub// 'phang dang ldeg 'khrab bro brdung dang// nyams dang rmi ltas bzang mthong nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// rang rgyud byin dang ldan gyur pas// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur yang// rang dang gzhan la rgyas btab ste// dbang dang byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// de nas bdud dang dgra bgegs la// rdo rje kha T+wAM rol pa rtsam// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa// gang gis bar gcod tshar gcad phyir// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin gsum gsal bya// nr-i srog can dang nA srog can// tri srog ldan pa bstan pa'i dgra// yid gzugs can dang gdos bcas gzugs// de la de brten srog ces pas// a nr-i su tri pre du ldan// rigs drug sa bon gzung bar bya// gang la bya ba'i dmigs rten ni// 'byung ba'i snyigs ma zags la bya// yang na bla srog gnas pa dbab// gtso bo 'jag ma dme khrag sogs// srin mo'i khang sa la sogs dang// shing shun zhing ras gang ldan la// gang la bya ba'i ming gzugs bri// srog gi yi ge gnad sngags bskor// dbye dgug bstim dang byad du gzhug/ smra smyo rdul du brlag par bya// 'bar ba'i e dang zhal du bstab// de ltar byas na rU tra'i sde// bstan pa'i dgra gsum drungs nas 'byin// oM badzra [(7[)]

kI li kI la ya che ge mo ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra ha ta na hUM phaT/ shri krin A na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bi ta ya bi ta ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las sgrub pa'i bar chod rU tra bsgral ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus dam log bsgral ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sum tri rak+sha mA ra ya nan sa du rak+sha nan// bi bi tri dam sri nan/ 'gong po ya na ma sho nan/ 'byung po ya na ma sho nan/ dza dgra nan/ sho dgra nan/ sho nan/ dza dza de ba badzra yag+sho nan/ 'byung po duSh+tAn mA ra ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pa ra bi ta na ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzrarag+sha rA tsa tsit+ta zung zung/ kha la rag+sha tsad tsad// kha rag+sha rma sha na rbad sto/ 'khu na dum bu shig shig 'da' na rag sha tsit+ta phyung rbad/ ldog na rag sha rbad/ sdoms ting ting sdoms zung zung/ gtubs gtubs sdoms/ rag sha tsit+ta gtubs/ rA tsa shag thum kha tri rbad// tsa pu tri tri tri nan sod/ badzra kro d+ha rA dza sid+d+hi a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ bdud tri ma tri tha tri/ shu+u la tri baM tri ya ma tri/ nA ga tri sa ma tri sum tri pu tri a sha tri/ a sha tri rA tsa tri/ trig nan hur thums dza/ badzra ang+ku sha ya dza dza/ badzra A be sha ya a/ a pasta ya d+ha ro a dz+nyA pa ya ti a/ hUM snying khrag tsit+ta gu lu nan// baM ts+tshin da ts+tshin da srog rbad/ mA ra ya snying rtsa phyung phyung/ so shig srog rbad/ kha kha ha ha mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT rbad rbad/ ha na ha na badzra ru tri/ srog la breng breng dza dza thums ril shag da ha da ha badzra srog la dun dun thums ril shag pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ tsit+ta rbad thums ril shag/ ma ta ma ta badzra/ rtsa la rbad thum ril shag dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ srog la hur thum ril shag su ru su ru badzra/ kham nan thum ril shag/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ dum ling khas thum ril shag/ ka tang ka ye badzra snying gzir sbur nan thum ril shag dza yi bi dza ye badzra rA dza tri shu+u la gzir nan thum ril shag a tsi ti a pa ra tsi te badzra tsa tri du me ru snying la gzir/ rtsa spur nan srog la breng breng/ rtsa la dun dun kham shag rbad/ mA ra se na pra marda nA ya badzra sarba duSh+tan trig nan rA dza ya ma dza ha ma sha ma tri hur thum dza/ du me ma ma srog la gzer thums ril shag oM rni du rni du hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rA dza ni hUM hUM phaT phaT// tri ling sham/ ro ling sham/ kha thun tri thun/ bur tri dza rag sha ni dza dza/ hUM ma ma pa shaM ku ru ma taM nya ka ra i dan d+ha ti ma ma shI g+h+raM karma kA ra ya/ tri'u tri'u ya na mo sha dza// badzra ma da ni tri dza/ tri mA ra ya dza/ dam sri tri mA ra ya dza/ nA ga rA dza stag sha dza/

ma nya hi ko sha gar+tha ma ni/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sha lung ni ti sta pa la a sho ma b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT phaT rA dza thum a ti rbad/ rA dza zung a ti rbad/ rA dza kha tshings lus stoms dun tri pa ri pa ri stoms/ tsit+ta kar pa sha phag pa rA dza stoms/ rA dza shag thum khram khra nan/ rA dza a kri pa kri na sod/ thum thum ril ril/ pa tsang shig pa tshang shig chings snyoms sa ma ya/ rig ru thum ril/ bu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ rA dza si ti sa ma ya bying hUM phaT/ rA dza a ho hUM phaT/ sha ma ru tri ma ho dza/ thum ri li li/ ru lu ru lu sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA dza sa ma ya ging ga rag pra ma shang ka du ri stoms/ tsakra mA ra ya chings stoms/ oM badzra rag sha rA tsa'i tsit+ta zung zung/ kham rag sha rtsad rtsad/ kha rag sma sha rmad stoms/ 'khu+u na dum bu shig shig shig stoms/ 'da' na rag sha tsit+ta phyung rbad/ stoms zung b+huM si rag sha ma ra Na b+h+yo// tri rA dza oM aM hUM mA ra ya stam b+ha nan nan// spyi ti spyi ti ma snying kha rag dza dza// oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha gA wAn// shi kri bi kri badzra hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ badzra sum tri rag sha gtubs/ tsi tri mA ra ya hUM phaT/ khyod dam las ldog na/ su tri mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sa ru ke pa ya/ su ta mA ra ya hUM phaT// badzra sig nan sig nan/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ trig nan hUM phaT// badzra dug nan hUM phaT/ badzra tsag du tsag du sod/ tsag tsag yer yer sod/ thum myogs sod// raM yaM ting bu sod// badzra kI li kI la ya// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rA dza tsit+ta zung zung khug nan/ dum bu shig ldog na rbad/ s+t+waM pa nan/ he ling nan/ tsa tri rbad/ a tri rbad/ ma tri rbad/ ma he la rbad/ rA dza trig nan rA dza hur thums/ pa tsang 'dri ma thib ra rA dza rba sbur srog nan/ snying gzir bring shag ya ma rbad/ sarba big+h+nAn/ baM hUM phaT// badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ badzra hUM kA ra a/ du me nA ga mo trig nan me hur thums dza/ ru tri trig nan ru hur thums dza/ dun tri pa ri pa ri tsit+ta garba sha yag pa sod/ tri tsit+ta garba sha yag pa sod/ snyan tsit+ta garba sha yag sha sod// dung skyong pa ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ tig tig zho 'thung skyugs sod/ tsha bang mdzod bsren mA ra ya hUM phaT// chu ha na tri dza ya mar na byi dza ya hUM phaT/ sha ma sa ru tri rA dza a ho bru rbad/ rA dza chings chings gtubs gtubs// 'khu+u na du tsit+ta shig rag sha tsit+ta zung/ rma na rbad/ thub rbad/ rbad ti dum rbad/ ya rbad ya khra ri b+ha sha ya dza// badzra sho na sa ma ya/ ya ma sho na sa ma ya/ nA ga sho na sa ma ya/ kha rag sho na sa ma ya/ rgyal 'gong rgyal tshe la ma sha/ dom rol khrag 'thung/ snying khrag 'byung po sa ma ya dza// badzra dza ra trig rog ta 'byung po mA ra ya snying khrag dzaHhUM baM ho/ badzra aM ku sha dza/ 'byung po tshe la ma sha dom rol khrag 'thung// snying khrag 'byung po 'byung po pra ti pri mo ma sha dom la khrag 'thung/ ro la khrag

'thung/ snying khrag ma la ma la yes yes b+h+yo b+h+yo troM troM swA hA/ oM sarba duSh+tan ti ra ti nan/ rA dza nan/ rbad nan/ tri hur thum dza/ mA ra ya rbad// tad+ya thA tad+ya thA hUM phaT// sarba A na ya hUM phaT/ ni sha ku ru yaM/ kha sod dbang rol ya ma// thod khrag spyos shig tsit+ta ku lu nan/ snying khrag spyos shig tsakra raM/ rnam shes spyos shig sho na raM// 'dod chags spyos shig su tri kha ram// gzugs phung shig shig/ su ni tri ni yan lag chings shig/ oM sarba dza ni hUM dza/ nri tri su tri nri hUM dza/ shan tri ni hUM dza/ ka tri ni hUM dza/ gan tri ni hUM dza/ guM guM guM sri can dza dza hUM phaT// oM rtsa hUM ka te pu ra tsa te swA hA/ sri can nan ra dza nan/ he du+u ma b+h+yo ku ka ka re dza dza/ he du prid pu ka skye mi skye swA hA/ e ra lig shi na shig he ri ha ti pra ma le shag he ri lig sha li sha li byi/ thuM leng swA hA/ sha li b+h+yo thuM/ na ga tshe na gu tse rgu ru shad ti rbad rbad// badzra badzra badzra badzra/ badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra/ kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham kha tham/ badzra yag sha rag sha kro ta kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha/ hi hi hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ces gsungs so// phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las dam log dam sri rU tra'i sde bsgral ba'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus las kyi sbyor thabs bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa la// dam log dam sri rU tra'i sde// gnas dang 'khor dang longs spyod dang// chags nas dbang byed shul 'breng dang// 'khor dang longs spyod dbang thang dpal// rgyas su mi ster 'phel ba 'grib// dkar sgyur sra rtsi bre sre snyab byed pa// de dag drag po'i las 'dis 'dul// 'jig rten gzhan du 'phang la btang// rdo 'am sa la 'brub khung bca'// rnon po rtsang gis bskor nas kyang// nang du 'byung po'i gzugs rten gzhag/ khyi phag spre'u dang byi la'i mgo/ bgegs dang 'gong pa'i rU pa gzhug/ 'brog te nag po mgo dgu dang// dam sri nag mo bya mchu ma// bar du rgyal 'gong sprul pa brub// byi chings tshul du lto sbyar nas// bla shing sho mang khud du dril// blo rdo pha bong long bu la// mtshal gyis phyogs bzhir srog yig bris// se ba nya thod sdig pa'i rwa// byi ba'i snying dang spyang ki'i brun// lam chen rgya gram sa dag ni// zhang po ma dang sprul pa bu// 'og gi rta dang rtse sa'i gnas// bla gnas yin te bla la dbab// rgya grog sked dmar khang sa dang// chu sna'i 'dag la na tshwa dang// srub ka rtswa yi lo ma dang// gong gsum lung gnas rtsi 'jags la// gzug bcas shing shun ming rus gzhug/ thal dkar byas te byad thag gdags// gdab dang sreg dang mnan pa yi// rU pa bye brag so sor sbyar// 'brub

khung thod pa hom la gdags// re ba shug shing tsher mas dgab// dus gsum dang ni dus bzhi drug/ gshed mar gyur pa'i mtshon cha ni// lcags sna lnga yi phur bu dang// stag pa'i beng dbyug tho ba dang// gor ma shing phur rdo rje dang// ral gri 'khor lo la sogs pas// drag tu brdung zhing brnag pa bya// mo la mda' thun zor gyis brdeg/ pho la khrag thun gri mtshon gdab// bdun dang bdun gsum gang nus par// ma yengs brtson pas brab par bya// sngags drug rgyal po'i las sbyar te// gdab dang mnan bsreg bkar bar byed// ces gsungs so// phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las/ las sbyor thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus gdon ngos bzung ba'i don du bka' stsal pa// srid pa kun la gnod pa yi// 'gong po pho mo 'di dag ni// rnal 'byor can la lha slubs 'jug/ phal pa rnams la mi slub 'jug/ bgegs dang 'bras la bgegs slubs 'jug/ yul brgyud gang zag brgyud par byed// skye ba brgyud dang sprul pa brgyud// dngos po brgyud nas gnod par byed// rku zhing ngo sbed sna tshogs ston// 'di dag drag tu gdon gyur na// klu bdud klu btsan mes po dang// ma mo mtsho sman ma sru dang// dkar nag rgyal 'gong bcos pa shis// rgyab rten phral nas sna 'dren bsad// mi dkar rta dkar 'bag seng dang// lha khang byung na dkar po bcos// mi nag rta nag dar nag dang// lha khang nag mthong nag po bcos// rlan dang na klung chu mig tshan// ko mog rgya mtsho klu+u gnyan bcos// drag ri gzar po ri rtse zang// brag dmar btsan bdud klu yang bcos// gad phug khang stong thigs pa can// khang rul dam can bsad pa rtsom// sbrang bu sbur ba ba lang mdzo// gnag mthong sa bdag sa srin bcos// bya dang bud med ral pa can// khyi mo nag mo dam can bsad// rta dang bu chung spre'u dang// byi la btsun pa rgyal 'gong bsad// ma smad ming sring bu chung can// pho mo'i grogs dang rog sa 'gras// rgyal 'gong pho mo srog rtsa gcad// btsun pa sprang po ngan pa'i btsos// beg te ltog 'gong drung nas gdon// de la sogs pa dud 'gro'i tshogs// 'byung po la sogs tha dad rdzu// nges par brtag la gnad srog gtem// be phur hor smug bya yi mchu// sprul par bcas pa rdul du brlag/ spun gsum sprul par bcas pa yang// rgyab dang phral nas brlag par bya// klu gdon gnyan sogs brid cing bsdig/ dkor du mnga' gsol 'gong po rnams// dkor 'bog rgyal khrims la la bkar// bsgrub pas 'khor byung dam log bslus// shi sa'i 'khor lo bskor zhing mnan// gso ba chu bo'i gzhung la btang// rbad pa phyir

bsad log 'khor bskor// smyo 'bog skar chu yungs kar dang// gu gul bdug cing brab par bya// sde gnod nang nub dus gsum brdung// dus dus gnad la phur bu gdab// phung po bsreg cing sha khrag bstab// 'khrul pa'i rtog gzhi gnan par bya// mchod rten lha khang rgya gram lam// rnal 'byor mal 'og them sgo dang// phyugs ra bres dang ma sgyed sogs// gang la gnod pa'i lam gnas su// gnan pa byas na nus pa 'jig/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las rtags kyis ngos bzung zhing las kyi gnad bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa/ ras sam gro ga shog shog gam// zhing ras la sogs 'khor lo yi// rdzas la srid pa'i lto ba bri// gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// bsad dang mnan dang bzlog dang bskrad// gso dang srung dang shi sa dang// ji ltar dmigs pa de bzhin bri// pho dang mo yi 'khor lo brtsam// sngags dang srog dang ming yig dgod// bsrung ba rdo rje khong par bri// bu smad nor phyug gang dmigs gdags// gu gul mu zi sgog pa sogs// sme rdzas gdags shing dud pas bskor// 'byung po lha yi phra men bcas// srid gsum khyab cing nyul byed pa// 'di dag ma bcos ma bkar na// byas pa'i las rnams don med 'gyur// 'di dag bcos bkar sprul pa bsgral// 'jig rten khyab cing dbang byed pa// dam log sde gsum dngos po'i srog/ shi nas rang srog rang gis bcad// srog dang ming dang shes pa'i rten// snying gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa de// pho g.yas mo g.yon bskor bar bsgom// 'gugs par byed pa hur thums dza// ya ma trig nan 'bru bzhis gzir// mA ra ya rbad gcod pa'i mtshon// dgug dang bcing dang bstim dang gzhug/ brul dang rtseg dang gtor dang bskrad// bsad dang bsreg dang gnan dang bkar// sngags kyis so sor gang dmigs pa// skyes bu shes rab rig pas zung// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las srog gi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi rgyal po dpal rdo rje gzhon nus/ lha rnams las la gzhug pa 'di gsungs so// dang po dbyings las ye shes bskyed// stong bdag med pa'i snying rje bsgom// rig pa gnas pa'i sgyu 'phrul hUM// rtog pa gzhil cing zhal yas bskyed// 'brub khung b+ha ga khro mo'i gtun// gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// 'di ltar snang ba rnam par bsgyur// rdo rje khro bo'i gtun tshogs kyang// gsang ba yab kyi phur pa bskyed// rdo rje 'khor lo'i mkha' gsang nas// 'bar ba'i khro bo phyung nas kyang// phyogs bcur dregs pa'i

gdan la gdab// khro bo khro mo'i mkha' klong nas// za byed 'gug pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i sbyor mtshams nas// sras mchog rdo rje khro bo bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlab gzi byin bskyed// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum lha tshogs la// spyan drang bzhugs bstim mchod bstod bya// so so'i snying pos bsnyen byas te// thugs dam bskul zhing pho nya 'gyed// ye shes sprul pa pho nya rnams// mgyogs byed thugs rjes mngags pa'i ging// srid gsum thams cad gang byas te// srid pa'i khyams khang btson dong du// rdo rje phur pa'i gru char dbab// sngags kyi 'khor lo me ltar 'bar// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdab pa bzhin// drug gi pho nyas las la sbyar// phyag rgya rnam bzhis kun tu khyab// drag po'i rtsal ldan kun gyis grub// bsod nams tshogs chen rdzogs pa dang// sngags grub dbang dang ldan pa la// 'dul sdom rnam par dag pas kyang// 'di dag tshar bcad dngos grub thob// de dag ldan par ma gyur kyang// 'di dag bsgral las ma byas na// dngos grub bdud kyi lag tu shor// shin tu brtson pas bsgral bar bya// dus gsum rgyun du gsad cing gnan// de ltar byas na 'bras bu thob// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las pho nyas tshar bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang zhe sdang gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus// sri can drungs nas 'byin pa'i las bka' stsal to// mi yi srid pa dang po la// dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab srid// ri rab kyi ni dbus nas yar// dpag bsam shing gi ljon shing srid// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo la// bdud pho thod pa'i phreng ba dang// bdud mo nag mo bzhin mi sdug/ tshogs pa'i ming sring bcu gcig ni// gang na dkar po'i las dar la// de na phung ba'i sri can te// 'di dag rnal 'byor can gyis gdul// rgyal dang blon dang dmangs dang gsum// dgra sri dme sri sgo sri dang// chung sri dur sri god sri dang// dam sri dbyal mo'i gong sri mnan// rgyal po phung byed phung sri ni// rigs ngan hor mo sbyi rings mgor// chos 'khor dbus su gnan par bya// blon po phung ba'i phung sri ni// pha wang ne tso spre thod du// mdun sa chen por gnan par bya// dmangs rnams phung ba'i phung sri ni// spre'u mdzo rtol thod pa ru// yul gyi dbus dang yul mdor mnan// dgra bos phung ba'i phung sri ni// rta dang g.yag dang ra thod la// so mtshams lam gyi rgya gram gnan// dme yis phung ba'i phung sri ni// g.yi dang gsa' dang spyang thod du// grong brdal chen po'i dbus su mnan// sgo sgo sri can langs pa ni// khyi dang phag pa'i thod pa ru// gnas pa'i sgom pa'i them par mnan// skye rgyud gcod pa'i chung sri ni// khyi phag phru+u gu sre bya'i

mgor// ma gnas mal gyi 'og tu mnan// rigs tshan gnas pa'i dur sri ni// se bya grun pa wa thod du// dur gyi 'dabs su gnan par bya// rnal 'byor pho mo'i dam sri ni// mi phag ra khyi'i sog pa la// mchod rten dkyil 'khor 'og tu mnan// dbyal mo gong gi sri can ni// khyi dkar sha ba'i thod pa ru// lam dang la btsas chen por mnan// nor phyugs god 'grams god sri ni// lu gu be'u ri'u thod du// nor phyugs gnas pa'i ra bar gnan// phung bar byed pa'i sri can ni// tshe rabs sngon gyi lan chags 'ded// dus 'di nyid du 'bab par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnams kyi sku dgrar 'gyur// sri can bsgral ba'i zhing yin pas// gsang ba'i gnas su 'dus tshogs nas// slob dpon sku la phyag 'tshal te// gnod par byed pa'i phung sri dang// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra bo gnyis// sbrags te rgya gad drag pos brgal// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis bshig/ dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis smad// dge la rgyab kyis khyod kyis phyogs// yon bdag rnams la gnod pa byas// sngags 'chang rnams kyi sku la bsdos// tshe rabs snga ma'i lan chags pa// sdang bar byed dang gnod pa'i bgegs// skad cig tsam gyis phung bar bya// gru gsum 'bar ba 'dir stsol bas// nor gyis dogs pa'i ming rus 'di// rdo rje khro bo 'khor bcas kyis// khyed kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// sri can 'di las 'dre che med// sri can 'di las tshe ring med// tsha ba'i dbal dang gson gyi bdud// gshin gyi lcags su che ba'i sri// chung sri rgyal blon dmangs kyi sri// rje khol zhang po tsha yi sri// pha sri bu sri phu nu'i sri// dgra sre dme sri yod med sri// dur sri god sri sgo sri rnams// sri can ma lus gdul ba'i phyir// dpal chen khro bo skur bsgoms nas// thams cad rdul du brlag par bya// rdo rje gzhon nus phur gdab bya// gshin rje nag po'i lto bar gzhug/ ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin// ma mo rnams la mchod par 'bul// pho nya rnams kyis dgug 'dren bya// ri rab chen po'i rmang du sba// gshin bu rje yi lag tu gtad// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du sgyur// mtshon chen 'bar ba'i rtse mos bcad// rdo rje phur pa'i dpal gyis gdab// ye shes rnon po'i rtse la gtong// rag ta 'bar ba'i rba la g.yengs// yungs kar gser mde'u be mdu gzug/ gu gul sbyar ba'i dud pas bdug/ dug gi gtor mas myos su gzhug/ lcags phye zangs phye'i dbal gyis bcad// gtun khung rdo rje tho bas brdung// khro bo rol pa'i tshogs su dbul// pho mo'i snying la snying gzir gdab// de ltar byas na gdon mi za// las rnams brtsam pa thams cad 'grub// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las sri gdon

mnan cing brub pa las kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas zhe sdang gi rgyal po dpal rdo rje gzhon nus/ sems dpa' chen po la/ bstan pa bzung ba gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po dpal// sems dpa' chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams// bstan pa dus kyi tha ma'i tshe// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// sems can nyon mongs snyigs ma rgyas// de ru log pa rnam gsum gyi// bstan pa dar zhing thar lam bgegs// rnal 'byor can rnams slu bar byed// dngos grub thob pa'i bar du gcod/ sems can kha lo log par sgyur// kun kyang ma rungs phung bar byed// de ru skal ldan don yod cing// dngos grub thod dang rtags phyin dang// dpal 'phel dbang thang dar ba dang// 'bru dang bang mdzod ldan pa dang// bde skyid bsam pa 'grub 'dod pas// rdo rje phur pa sngags kyi rgyud// phrin las gsang ba rdzogs pa'i lung// 'bar ba'i khro bo rol pa 'di// spyad cing zung du gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gi bdag po chen po/ ma 'ongs pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung dang// khro bo 'bar ba'i gtun tshogs// gtun khung rdo rje tho ba bka' stsal pa ngo mtshar ro// a la la ho// rjes su yi rang ngo// don thams cad lhun gyis grub par bya'o// zhes gsol te 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cho 'phrul slar btul te gnas par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las gtad cing bzung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma thod phreng gis// bi d+yot+ta ma 'bum sde'i tan+t+ra las phyung ba/ bod yul dbus kyi bsam yas bdud 'dul sngags pa'i gling du/ lce dz+nyA ku ku ra dang/ brang ti dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur te/ mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal la gtad cing gdams pa/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las gsang ba'i phrin las rdzogs pa 'byung po kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya gu h+ya tan+t+ra u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag can gyi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal badzra kI la ya la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku can de/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang nyid las// 'bar ba'i khro bo shin tu mi bzad pa/ sku yi dbyig tu gyur par bzhengs te/ ye shes

'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rang snang gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor na/ keng rus gsar rnying brtsegs pa'i ri rab kyi steng/ me ri 'bar ba'i klong/ rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i maN+Dal na/ rgyu rin po che dang thod pa gsar rnying las grub pa/ drag po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rtsibs brgyad la sgo bzhi pa dur khrod kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas bklubs par/ bdud dang phyogs skyong dang nyi zla'i gdan la rab tu bzhugs te/ thugs kyi sras mchog badzra 'dus pa dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ za byed dang/ gsod byed dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul brjod kyis mi lang ba dang/ gzhan yang dur khrod kyi ce spyang dang// zangs kyi wa mo dang/ lcags kyi spyang mo dang/ dur khrod kyi khyi dang/ rdo rje lha mo ya byin dang/ de byin dang/ chu byin dang/ phag byin dang/ nag mo'i tshogs re ma ti dang/ re ma dzi dang/ re ma dza dang/ re ma dzu dang/ gzhan yang dur khrod kyi ma bdun dang/ sring mo bzhi dang// skyes mchog pho mo dang// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rab tu mang po dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe thugs kyi sras mchog badzra kI la ya 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// gu h+ya b+ha ga wAn/ shrI badzraku mA ra na maH sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM kI la ya dza hUM baM hoH/ a la la ho zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srid pa thams cad rdo rjer grub par mdzad de/ 'bar ba'i khro bo sha stag pas// gtum pa dang/ rngam pa dang/ brtul zhugs kyis gdug pa'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdu ba dang/ tshar bcad nas slar chos kyi dbyings su bsdu bar mdzad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas thugs kyi sras mchog badzra kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// gdams ngag gsang ba'i rgyud chen po// ma 'ongs pa yi don ched du// 'khor rnams la ni bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra kI la ya// snying rje bsgral ba'i dam tshig ste// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// rnam shes gnas su dag phyir bshad// ces gsung so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// rgyud 'di dmigs pa'i yul dang ni// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pa dang// grub pa'i 'bras bu dag dang gsum// man ngag bdag gi bshad kyi nyon// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdam ngag gi rgyud las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas thugs

kyi sras mchog des// de yi don nyid yang dag zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin ma bcos gnas pa de// ma rtogs gdul bya'i zhing du dmigs// snying rje dmigs par bya ba yin// bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs la yang// gzhi dang don gyi khog nyid dang// srog dang ye shes dbang dang ni// spyan 'dren mchod bsnyen dngos grub blang// mjug sdud las kyi kha bskang ba'o// grub pa'i 'bras bu chos sku dang// gzugs sku rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// gzhi ni phun sun tshogs pa ste// bdag nyid gnas dang rdzas dus te// 'khor rnams phun sum tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dag las// sngon 'gro'i las rnams bya ba dang// dngos la rten dang brten nas te// 'byung ba lnga dang gzhal yas khang// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i phyogs bcu'i khro// phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ro// khams gsum srog la sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ 'od 'phros bsam gyis mi khyab pas// dgug dang bstim ste bcing byas nas// mtshan ngan thod par bcug la btab// thun sngags brab ste mnan byas la// rim par g.yogs te sngags kyis mnan// 'phang ba thun gyi las rnams ni// rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// de ldan pas ni bya bar bshad// gzhan yang nA ga klu 'dul dang// tshe dang byin rlab la sogs pa// kun kyang 'di yis 'grub par byed// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ las kyi mjug bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang// bcom ldan 'das la rab bstod pa// e ma ho// chos kyi dbyings las 'bar ba'i skur snang zhing// sangs rgyas kun dang ye shes rdzogs pa'i sku// rgyal ba'i sprul sku phrin las rdzogs mdzad cing// dpa' sgeg 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces bstod do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gzung zhig kI la ya// snying po bsdus pa man ngag rgyud// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i don// khyod nyid la ni gtad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las ston pa la bstod pa dang// sdud pa po la gtad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba man ngag gi rgyud gdams ngag gi bcud ston par byed pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kI la ya d+ha sha dwa ya tan+t+ra ma hA yA na/ bod skad du/ phur bu bcu gnyis 'byung ba'i rgyud chen po bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po// badzra kI la ya drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gnas na bzhugs nas// gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba/ dregs pa can thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyis byin rlab las// karma he ru ka zhes brjod pas// khro bo karma he ru ka/ sku ljang nag shin tu mi bzad pa bton nas// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI ka la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mi 'dul na/ thugs rje gang gis 'dul ba'i dus la bab par shes pa lags/ gang gis 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs pa lags// khro bo chen pos lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol// thabs

mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can/ de'i dus la bab pa lags so// phrin las kyi mnga' bdag ces gsol pa dang/ dpal badzrakI la ya sa e h+ye ho sha hUM zhes brjod pas/ nam mkha'i gtos kyi phyogs ris med pa// chos nyid bde ba'i ro bdal ba bskyed do// yaM karma rak+sha hUM zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje rlung nag 'tshubs mas dbang du bsdus shing byin gyis brlab nas rgyas btab pas/ phrin las thogs pa med pa'i don mdzad/ ma hA rak+ta dz+wa la maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ khrag gi rgya mtsho gting dpag med pas/ sdug bsngal dbang du bsdus nas/ 'bras bu gcig gi rang bzhin du shar bar mdzad/ keng ni ri dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas 'khor ba gnas su dag pa dang/ cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir/ keng rus gyi ri rab tu gyur/ b+han d+ha dz+nyA na tsakra dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ b+han d+ha'i gzhal yas khang gru gsum mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba gcig tu gyur/ de nas khro bo karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dpyang thag chad cing ngan song 'khor bar skyes nges pa la/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// 'di'i rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas ni gang dang gang du bstan/ dmigs pa ni gang dang gang la bgyi/ rnal 'byor rgyu dang ldan par bya// phur pa'i rgyu ni gang dang gang lags/ phur pa bsgom pa ci ltar sgom/ byin gyis brlab pa ci ltar rlab/ brdeg pa'i dus tshod gang la bab pa lags/ dam tshig gang du bstan pa lags/ lta ba ci la dmigs pa lags/ yo byad dang rdzas gang 'tshal/ rtags du nas 'byung/ 'di brtsam pa'i dgos ched dang/ yon tan ci thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad cing lung bstan du gsol/ kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phur pa bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni// yang dag don du bshad par bya// dang por gzhung dang ldan byas nas// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung// rgya gram lam du bya ba dang// 'byung po mang po gang yod sar// drag po'i las 'di bya bar gyis// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang// grims 'byin shugs kyis ting 'dzin legs// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bdag gi gzugs phung rlag pa dang// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong// nags tshal chen po'i nang na ba// der ni legs bar dpyad pa yis// klu yi mig dang 'byung po'i srang// sa yi bgegs dang ma rungs pa// tsha sgo dmyal ba'i rgyu med par// las kyi bya ba gzhung brtsams nas// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// sgrub yun ring na bkra shis so// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan bya// 'bru sna tshogs dang gnam sa

legs// dbyibs legs lung pa ran par ni// bkra shis gzhung bsrang yun ring bas// gnas kyi dam pa yin zhes bshad// drag po'i las su bya ba la// dang por phur pa sgrub pa'i gnas// nags ri tsher ma can gyi shing// gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni gri 'dra ral gri'i shul// sa ni gru gsum me dpung 'bar// logs la dur khrod gling yod pa// mkhas pas brtags te btsal byas na// de ni phur pa'i sgrub gnas yin// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang// dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang// brag la ra rod mang ba dang// grog po mang po gting zabs dang// stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rA 'dra chu srin kha// ban glang snang 'thab brag chu'i bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// sngon chad lha mi phung sa dag/ g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon 'thab dang// bsad bcad pa dang ma rungs dus// srin po bsgral ba'i bcas gzhi dang// srog chags bsgral ba'i khrag rjes dang// g.yul ngo bgos pa'i sa mkhar rnying// mang por bsad cing phung ba'i sa/ brag ni srin mo ngus pa 'dra// ri ni thal phung bsnyil ba 'dra// lung pa me yis bsregs 'dra ba// shing rtsi rkang thang bros 'dra ba// sgang de'u mi ro sbas 'dra ba// 'di ni brdeg cing bsgral gnas yin// sems la chos nyid mi gsal zhing// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel bas ni// gnas 'di dag tu yongs mi bya// nam phugs rnal 'byor dag la 'gyod// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bkra shis pa yi gnas dag tu// yun rings bsrings na gnas rtol med// dam tshig ma nyams nges thub dang// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo chen gyis// gnas ni de dang de dag tu// cho ga'i las ni brtsams byas na// nges par grub na gdon rngol med// de ltar bu yi sa rnyed na// dang por byin brlabs mtshams bcad nas// ma rungs yod na gtor ma sbyin// de bas zhag grangs 'di tsam mam// drag po'i las 'di ma 'grub par// gnas 'dir rnal 'byor bdag gnas pas// gtor ma byin pa 'di long ba// ma 'grub bar du gzhan du dengs// de skad byas la gtor ma sbyin// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bsgo bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin brtsigs// dam rdzas chag chag gzhung bzhin gdab// kha dog tshon rnams dgye byas nas// dbus su drag po gru gsum bri// mtha' ma mtshon gyi 'khor lo la// khro bo rnams kyang rim bzhin dgod// de bzhin brgyad dang brgyad du bstan// bzhi po dag tu gang bstan dang// nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa// mkhas pas gzhung bzhin dgod par bya// gzhan yang phur pa'i rdzas dgod pa// 'og nas 'byung bas shes par bya// de phyi mtshan dang ldan pa dang// zhag grangs tshang ba'i sgrub rdzas bzhi// yo byad tshogs par mchog tu bya// gnas rnams 'di dag

yon tan ni// myur ba 'grub dang shugs 'byin dang/ ngan pa'i las kyis ngan pa 'grub// don la the tshom med par ni// ngan pa'i gnas su 'grub par bshad// bkra shis bzang po'i gnas su ni// yun ring bsring na phung 'tshengs med// don la des kyang 'grub par bshad// bzang ngan gnas kyi cha dbye ba// bdag gi rtogs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// rtogs pa chung na bzang po bdam// ting 'dzin zab na ngan pa bdam// myur bar thogs pa med par ni// gang la dmigs pa 'grub ces bshad// 'di ni phur pa gnas bstan pa'i le'u dang po'o//// bsgral ba'i dmigs rnams bstan pa ni// kun la bya ba gzhung la med// nyams par gyur pa bdun yod de// srog las nyams dang dam las nyams// bka' las nyams dang don las nyams// las kyi nyams dang mtshan mas nyams// 'dod pa 'gyur bas nyams pa ni// 'di la nyams pa zhes bya ste// de dag so so'i mtshan nyid ni// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha dang ma dang mkhan po gsod// slob ma gsod dang nang dme can// 'di ni nam yang lhung bas na// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni 'di yin no// dam las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bslu dang// ngan sems 'phya sems byed pa dang// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod dang// gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan la spel// 'di ni nyams pa chen po ste// 'di ni bsgral ba'i dmigs gcig yin// bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dam la btags na rku mtshang 'bru// sgrub la sbran na ya ga 'dogs// man ngag bstan na skur pa 'debs// bden par bstan na log par khrid// don rtags bstan na gol bar 'dzin// 'di ni nyams pa'i dam pa ste// 'di la bsgral ba lhur yang brtsam// 'di dag bsgral ba'i phrin las ni// gzhung kun las ni gsal bar 'byung// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'dzin// tan gan sbyor sgrol dngos por spyod// lta ba'i ting 'dzin rgyab tu bor// spyod pa dpa' brlangs dang du len// khro gtum nga rgyal rang gar gtong// don gyi mnangag log par go/ pha rol log par 'dren pa'i chos// phyin ci log gi don la mkhas// bka' gzhung bor la rdzob pa che// log par spyod pa mtha' dag yod// 'di ni rU tra dngos yin te// mngon spyod bsgral kyang mi skyon no// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang skye gnas mi gcig par// bsgral ba'i las kyi glor 'ongs nas// sngon chad mkhan 'khon yongs med par// glags la bab par dran nas kyang// zhi ba drang pos mi nyan par// nyes med gzhan la 'dzugs pa dang// dpung pa snyogs la klan ka tshol// kha lce rgod cing bzhin mdog

bzlog/ brgal sa med cing bdag la rgol// phrog mi dgos par dag la phrog/ bdag gis nyes par ma dran zhing// bdag gis brgal bar ma bsams kyang// las kyis bdag la gnad 'dzugs shing// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'ded pa// las kyis nyams pa 'di yin no// gzhan yang las kyis nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar klan ka tshol// phan rgyu med par bdag la 'tshe// 'ong rgyu med par bsgrubs sar 'ong// las kyi nyams pa'i rtags yin pas// 'di ni nam yang bsgral dgos pas// las kyi 'khor bas sdig med bshad// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs char bzung bas nyams// lta ba sgos khur bcas pas nyams// dam can yongs la thugs dkrug cing// rang bzhin med pa'i chos bshad kyang// mtshan ma can gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran du ngas 'khol lo// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig yod// nga yi nyams su dpal chen byung// nga ni khro bo'i rgyal po yin// gzhan la khro zhing 'tshe la sogs// 'di ni mtshan mas nyams pa ste// bsgral ba byas kyang dam mi nyams// 'dod par gyur pas nyams pa ni// de yi mtshan nyid bshad bya ba// nyan pa go rtogs gsal med par// la lar mthu chen btsan 'dod pas// las kyi don du mtshan ma spyod// sdig pa'i phyag rgyar mi mgo thogs// ral pa bsig cing so gtsigs byed// dmar gyi gtor ma glo la thogs// zhing gi pags pa phrag la bkal// sgro ba nag po sha dang tshil// snod bkang khur zhing log chos spyod// spyod pa'i don kun gzhung bor nas// bya ba mi 'tsham sna tshogs byed// ngo dang gdong pa khrag gis byugs// tshul 'gal dam 'dral sna tshogs byed// tho cor spyod cing dam mi bsrung// spyod pa brlang pos bka' gzhung smad// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhabs 'dren byas// rnal 'byor sngags pa'i rkang nas drangs// dpal chen 'bar ba thugs khral bskyed// ma mo mkha' 'gro gzan tshogs bkram// rnal 'byor yongs la dme tshogs byas// gzhan yang mtshan nyid gang yin pa// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod chags nor gyis bslus pa dang// she bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phung bar shes kyang sngags 'chang 'joms// dug tu snang yang lto ru za// gnyan pa yin kyang thabs kyis smod// btsun pa yin kyang ngams par shom// thob tu 'dod na gsang sngags rku// bza' ru yod na rnal 'byor za// zas su sgrub pa'i longs spyod rku// nor du gzhung spyod rnal 'byor 'joms// 'di dag 'dod pas nyams pa ste// 'di dag bsgral na rnal 'byor btsun// btul zhing tshar bcad bstan pa gnyan// med cing stongs na bar chad nyung// 'di dag bsgral bar ma byas na// mtho ris 'gribs la dmyal khams

'phel// rnal 'byor dam can sgyid lugs nas// theg pa chen po'i chos sgo 'gag/ 'di dag bsgral bar byas na ni// rnal 'byor bsgrub la bar chad med// theg pa chen po'i mthu+u ngar bas// legs pa'i yon tan brjod las 'das// thabs kyi tha ma'i tha ma ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal chung na// 'di dag bsgral bar byas na ni// dmyal ba'i gnas su yun thung 'gyur// 'di ni bsgral ba dmigs bstan le'u gnyis pa'o//// rnal 'byor gang dag gis bya ba// 'di dag nyid du bshad pa ste// dang po shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la yid ches nas// de nas nges par dbang thob ste// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba gzung bar bya// don 'di dag dang mi ldan zhing// nges pa'i lung rnams ma thob dang// mkhas la sgro skur 'dogs pa dang// gsang sngags theg chen skur 'debs dang// rang shes spyad tshig tshul gnas dang// dam tshig nyams par gyur pa dang// don med phyal bar gtong ba rnams// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma yin te// log pa'i lam du shes par bya// de yis spyad kyang yong mi grub// slar la rang sems rlag pa dang// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs kyi rnal 'byor gral du smos// theg pa bsam yas sems la gsal// blta ba phyogs med gdeng du 'jog/ bsgom pa ma yengs gser phur 'debs// dam tshig nyan thos khrims bzhin bsrung// rgyu dang sgrub thabs mtha' dag 'chang// phyogs su 'jig rten mkhas pa brten// rdzas dang lag cha rtags su 'chang// don dang man ngag gzhung du bsgrub// tshul ldan ngang tshul bzang la shis// sbyor sgrol mchod pa rgyun chad med// phung po lha dang gnyis med mchod// sems ni chos nyid ngang la gnas// rnal 'byor rtags ldan dam pa des// las su bya ba kun rdzogs nas// 'dzab bzlas grangs med rgyun 'don pas// sngags dang phyag rgya mthu phyin che// las dang bya ba gdon mi za// nges par brtsams pas dgos pa 'grub// dmar gyi gtor ma gzhung bsrang zhing// cib gyi bka' nyan 'khol mkhas pas// dgar zhing dgug pa bya bar shis// drag shul thabs kyi pho nya ni// rdzu 'phrul shugs las thabs kyis 'gyed// rnam rtog mtshan ma las kyis 'grub// de dag byas na chud mi za// shes pa'i nang na dam pa ni// rgyud la blo zhen sgrub la zhugs// yi dam lha la rtags gnas na// de la bar chad yongs mi 'byung// gal te 'byung bar gyur na yang// de la reg pa tsam gyis 'grub// gzhan gyi las 'di brtsam pa yi// rnal 'byor pa ni gang yin na// phrin las bye brag phyed pa dang// rnam rtog mtshan ma spangs pa dang// gtsang sme med par spyod pa dang// blang

dor med par sgrub pa yis// gang la dmigs pa 'grub par byed// phun sum tshogs pa gsum ldan zhing// dus tshod grangs su bstan pa shes// nya dang shi ka tshes brgyad la// drag po'i las la rab brtson pas// las su bya ba de byas te// ma mo mkha' 'gro bka' nyan tshogs// de yis bkol na bran bzhin nyan// de yis bkol na bu bzhin sgrub// de yis bya ba chud ma zos// tshe dang longs spyod 'byor pa dang// legs pa kun rdzogs dngos grub ster// de yis yid la bsams pa bzhin// ci 'dod rang la 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang 'jig rten bsam pa dag/ phan pa dang ni gnod pa gnyis// gzhan la phan cing sgrub 'dod na// sad dang ser ba bcad pa dang// char chu dus su phebs pa dang// mi nad phyugs nad chad la sogs// de yi gtan tshigs 'di la gnas// gzhan la gnod pa'i rgyu btsal na// dbyar ston gnyis la gnod bya ba// sad dang ser gtong gtan tshigs dang// shwa dang chu dang thog bting ba// dbyar dgun mi nad rims gtong ba// bu tsha rabs chad tshe thung ba// de yi gtan tshig 'di na yod// de ltar gtan tshigs sus shes pa// rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa ste// 'di ni brtsam par bya bar gsungs// rnal 'byor ci ldan brtsam pa'i le'u gsum pa'o//// kI la ya yi rgyud rnams ni// gang dang gang la bya ba dang// don dang gtan tshigs 'dir zhib ste// mchog tu bsngags pa 'di las 'byung// lcags sam zangs sam gang rnyed pa// drag po'i lcags kyi phur pa la// gri lcags mde'u rnying rtags phyin dang// gnam lcags thog gi lcags dag dang// gcod dang rno dang sra la sogs// lcags sna lnga po dag las ni// khro rgyal gnas pa'i rgya mdud dang// gzhal yas khang gi rtags su bya// logs brgyad khro mo brgyad po la// bar gyi rgya mdud brtseg pa la// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med do// gzhal yas khang rang brtseg mar gnas// rtse mo zur gsum 'joms pa'i tshul// drag po rkyen gyis yang dag bshad// dbang la zangs kyi phur pa dang// rgyas pa gser la sogs pa dang// zhi ba tsan+dan dkar po dag/ rtse mo dbyibs ni so sor 'bar// bya ba'i tshad rnams mthun par bshad// gzhan yang tsher ma can gyi shing// rab tu mi srun gnas dag nas// gang dag skyed pa gang yin dang// dug dang gcan gzan gdug pa dang// rab tu gtum pa'i gnas dag nas// skyes pa'i shing mchog tsher ma can// skyer pa dang ni sing lding dang// gang dag skyer lding mdzo mo shing// rtsa ba'i logs su rgya mdud bya// rtse mo'i logs su zur gsum bya// dbyibs dang kha dog gong dang mthun// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tsher ma can// gong ma de dag ma 'byor na// gang rnyed pa la bya bar bshad// gzhung dang

mthun pa rnyed na legs// de dag gang yang ma rnyed na// ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor lha// yid la dran zhing gsal bsgom nas// sngags dang bya ba ma nor na// des kyang bya bar gzhung las bshad// de dag ring thung tshad bstan pa// sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa// bcu gnyis dag tu bshad pa ste// de las thung bar ma gsungs shing// de las ring bar yang ma bstan// sor bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi tshad// sor brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi tshad// bcu gnyis skye mched bcu gnyis te// rtags dang sbyar te de rnams bstan// rtags phyin pa yi lcags rnams kyis// de yi yon tan bshad pa ni// dper na nags kyi sdong po la// sngon chad bcad pa'i s+t+wa re dag/ de dag yod par gyur na ni// chod mi chod kyi the tshom med// de dag sngon chad ma bcad pas// chod dam mi chod yongs ma nges// de bzhin rgyu yang de dang 'dra// mdor na rnal 'byor rtsal mchog gces// re zhig de yang skyon med de// yon tan yod par 'di las bstan// nag po'i shing gi dug can las// phur pa byas pa'i phan yon ni// nag po gzhan gyis mi tshugs la// dug gis pha rol gsod par byed// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams ni// skyer pas tshe dang longs spyod 'phel// mdzo mos dbang du bya ba 'grub// gzhan yang kha dog rigs su sbyar// mdor na bde gshegs sa bon gyis// byin gyis brlab pa gces bar bshad// de bas kyang ni dam tshig gtso// rnal byor rnams la dam par bsngags// dang por gzhung las bstan pa bzhin// de dag ma nor bsham par bya// tshogs pas the tshom med ces bya// bshams pas bya ba chud mi zos// kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni bsngags pa ste// rgyu ni rgyal por rang shar ba'o// gzhan yang phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// zangs lcags 'khar ba gang yod par// de yang dod cing legs par bya// ma dod pa yi skyon rnams ni// gang dgar byas na tshul las nyams// stam col byas na bka' las 'gal// rnyed btsan byas na byin rlab chung// yod btsan byas na sgom mi bde// ngan dgur bshams na rtog par 'gyur// legs par byas na yi rang zhing// tshogs par bsags na gzhung dang mthun// dad par byas na dang ba skye// bka' bzhin byas na byin rlabs yod// mdor na rtogs pa gtso bo yin// rtogs pa'i don la mthar phyin na// rnam rtog las 'di yongs mi dgos// ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pas// log pa'i phyogs rnams 'dul slad du// 'di la rgyu bsham 'byung ba yin// mi rtog pa la rtog mi dgos// rnam par rtog la khro 'dul bzang// nyon mongs pa la gnyen po 'jebs// rtog pa bsal bar bsham pa gces// gzhan la tshugs na grangs mang

zlos// rtags phyin 'dod na yun du bsring// don la rub na ma yengs kyis// rings par 'dod na brtson 'grus skyed// don 'di yid la bzhag nas kyang// sngags pas de la nan tan skyed// 'di ni phur pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// phur pa ji ltar bsgom pa yi// don 'di yang dag bstan pa ni// nges pa nyid du bshad bya ste// byin gyis brlab pas thabs la ni// nges par rnam pa lnga yod de// gnyis su med par byin brlab dang// khro bo chen por byin brlab dang// shin tu brjid che byin brlab dang// phur pa rdzas su byin brlab dang// mthu dpung che bar byin brlab pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya kI la ya/ hUM hUM ha he phaT/ dzaHb+h+yo ru lu mA ra ya phaT/ de la lag pa gting sbyar nas// sor bcu'i bar du phur pa bcug/ bcu yis byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// hUM hUM kI la ya sarba bi nA ya ka sarba ta thA ga ta ha hi khA hi hUM phaT// de nas byin gyis brlab par bya// lcags sam shing ngam gang yin pa// khyi khrag ra khrag gis byugs la// dug dang ma rungs pas kyang byug/ hUM dang dzaH dang phaT la sogs// spro bsdu tshul bzhin byas nas kyang// byin brlab bsam rgyud nges pa bzhag/ yang na byin brlab nges pa ni// dbu yi rgya mdud chos kyi sku// bar gyi rgya mdud longs spyod rdzogs// rtse mo sprul pa'i sku yin te// khro rgyal dpal chen yab yum dang// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bkod dang// pho nya yang sprul la sogs pa// ci bgyi la sogs rim bzhin spro// 'bar 'thung sngags kyi rgyal po yis// nges par legs pa'i phur pa la// yang dag brtan pas byin gyis brlabs// rnal 'byor sngags kyi blo ldan pas// dam pa'i don du gzhung bsrang nas// drag pos bzlas la yid rtsom bya// nges par snying po 'bru bkod de// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// tsa na ka tsam dgod par bya// rim pas 'phro ba mang po yis// stong gsum 'jig rten phur pas brlab// mtha' yas sems can la sogs pa// bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yin pa// raM yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs nas// rnam shes snying gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub sems kyi rtse gtad de// dkar nag mtshams su brgyab nas kyang// dge sdig las kyi gshag phye ste// rnam par rtog pa'i sdig sbyangs nas// maN+Dal 'od kyi 'dul sbyong gis// dug gsum rim par bcom nas kyang// ha ta kha yis brngam pa byas// gser zhun bzhin du sems gnas pa// 'phro ba'i dgongs pas btegs nus kyang// gnyis med yum gyi mkha' la bstim// nges par rim gyis sras byas la// oM AHhUM gis byin brlabs te// sku gsung thugs su gsal byas nas// phyir yang ngan song sgo gsum bcad// rnam rtog bsgral ba'i zhing bcur brlags// bsgral ba

dbyings dang ye shes te// don du thabs dang shes rab la// chos kyi sku yi byin rlabs kyis// rnam par dag pa'i ngang du bsgom// 'di niphur pa bsgom pa'i le'u lnga pa'o//// byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa ni// rgya mdud rtsa ba'i logs su ni// chos kyi sku yi khro bor brlab// logs brgyad khro mo brgyad yin te// bar kyi rgya mdud longs spyod rdzogs// rtse mo sprul pa'i skur brlab ste// don du mnga' gsol 'di skad do// hUM bzhi gsal 'phro hUM las bzhi tshogs brgyad// dbu la rgya mdud bstan pas khro rgyal bcu// rtsibs la logs brgyad pa bstan pas khro mo brgyad// rtse mo zur gsum bstan pas sku gsung thugs// khong stong byang chub sems kyi thig le las// khro rgyal 'das pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ma g.yos chos mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams/ thugs rjes bye brag dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// thabs kyis bsgral ba'i skal dang mi ldan yang/ shugs kyi bsgral ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// oM badzra g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya// sarba pA paM kI la ya d+ha ro/ A dz+nyA pA ya ti// kA ya wAka tsit+ta hUM hUM phaT phaT// byin rlabs mtshams bcad drag po yis// dbang bsdus yongs su spang bar bya// thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// yongs kyis bsdu zhing gzir ba dang// thabs kyi dbang du bya ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i thugs rjes mtshams bcad do// 'di ni phur bu byin rlabs le'u drug pa'o//// brdeg pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// gnam stong dang ni tshes brgyad la// bco lnga nyi shu gnyis la bya// mig dmar phur bu gza' rnams kun// brdeg pa'i dus la 'bab par shes// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhung btsugs te// bsnyen bsgrub cho ga tshang byas nas// 'dzab grang bsnyen pa 'bum du gdon// bzlas brjod nyin mtshan bar mi gcad// rtags dang mtshan ma phyin pa dang// brdeg pa'i dus la bab par shes// nam gyi gung dang nyi ma dros// de la brdeg pa'i rab tu shis// dur khrod chen po gang na bar// bsgral ba la sogs tshul bzhin bya// rgya gram lam gyi gang na bar// brdeg pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// 'di dag brdeg pa'i dus tshod kyang// srod la zhugs pas tho rangs kha// 'di dag brdeg par yong mi bya// 'di dag brdeg par bya ba ni// yun ni lo dang zla tsam ni// grangs ni bye ba 'bum du bzlas// mchod pa dus drug rgyun mi gcod// cho ga bzlas brjod tshang byas nas// dbang po mngon par khug na rab// tha na mig rnon la sogs pas// der ni nges par 'ong ba yin// bya ba la sogs mtshan ma la// brdeg pa'i dus tshod yin par ni// rnal 'byor pas ni shes par

bya// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// dang por bsgrub pa khas blangs pa// ma thon bar du dus tshod min// tshang nas brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// bla dgug pa yi pho nya la// 'di dag btang nas brdeg bya ste// hUM// dpal gyi pho nya las mkhan mo// dmar dkar yangamo dung gi mche ba can// mkha' la 'byung ba'i mdzod bskyil ma// lag na sems can srog gcod ma// zhal ni sems can yongs su gsol// bskal pa'i thog thog char bar 'bebs// bskal pa brgyad kyi pha rol na// dam nyams dgra bo'i bla 'dren ma// dgra bo'i bla la nan ma chung// nag mo lcags kyi lan tshar can// khyung gi kha thogs g.yas pa na// b+han+d+ha gri thogs gsod la rngams// tshangs pa bskyil ba'i cha lugs can// mi sdug mgo la gcer bu'i lus// bskal pa brgyad nas bla tshol tshol// dpag tshad brgyad nas srog 'gugs 'gugs// dgra bo'i bla dang srog la ya// dmar mo chen mo me 'gro ma// gdug pa 'dul ba gang ba las// gsod la rngams pa las la btson// mche gtsigs g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// rab tu mi srun bla 'gugs pa// dam nyams dgra la sa ma ya// ljang nag bsgyings pa'i thod gdengs can// ser mo ral can 'bum gyis bskor// sngon nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs ma// gang la bya ba grub par byos// nam mkha'i lha mo phur pa'i lha// lag brgya gzugs kyi phur pa 'dril// spyan brgya khrag gis mchi ma 'dzag/ zhal brgya gdug pa'i sngags zor zlo// tshems kyis skye shi rtsad kyang chod// phur pa'i las mkhan chen mo la// rab tu mi srun las la brtson// gang la bya ba grub par byos// gzhan yang pho nya grangs med kun// de dag las la gtang bar bya// de dag mngon par khugs pa dang// ting 'dzin rab 'bring gsum du bya/ rab kyis mngon du khug par bya// 'bring gis lang+gi 'gul bar byas// tha mas nyams dang rtags tsam 'ong// gzod cig brdeg pa'i dus tshod yin// de rnams med par dus tshod min// cho ga tshang bar gyur na ni// brdeg pa'i dus tshod yin par ni// dus la bab par shes par bya/ 'di ni brdeg pa'i dus tshod le'u bdun pa'o//// dam tshig gang yin bstan pa ni// gzhi ni dam tshig gtso bo ste// dam tshig ma nyams gzhung tshugs na// 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad// nyams pa 'gyur pas mi 'grub ste// slar la rang nyid rlag par 'gyur// sku yi dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'i/ gsung gi dam tshig bar mi gcad// thugs kyi dam tshig gsang thub pas// las ni brtsams nas 'grub ces ni// dpa' bo khro bos yang dag bshad// dam tshig dag pa 'di yis ni// rgyal ba mnyes te dngos grub thob// bka' bzhin spyod la gzhung bzhin

bsgrub// nges pa'i dam tshig dam pa yin// nges pa'i dam tshig bstan par ni// yang dag rgyal pos yang dag gsungs// 'di ni dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o//// lta ba ci la dmigs pa ni// yang dag nyid du bstan bya ste// lta ba'i rgyal po nges pa'i dbyings/ gzod nas ma skyes sems kyi dbyings// rnam par dag pa yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs kyi sku// rigs pa'i rgyal po rang byung bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// thabs kyi rgyal por bdag gnas pas// 'gro kun bla na med par sgrol// chos kyi rtsa ba sems yin pas// brtag pa'i don du rang sems bzang// rang gi sems kyi don rtogs shing// mnyam pa'i rgyal po klong gyur na// zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad dang// tshig tu brjod pa bsnyen pa la// thugs la dgongs pa ting 'dzin te// phyag gis bsgyur ba phyag rgya ste// phur pa'i phyag rgya lnga ru bshad// phur pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi rting sbyar nas// gung mo rtse sprad drag tu gzir// de ni phur bu'i dam tshig rgya// chang bas sor brgyad rim pas bzung// gung mo rtse mo man chad la// phug pa brdeg pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni thal sbyar nas// gung mo rtse sprad mthe'u chung brgyad// srin lag 'dzub mo rgyab bsnol te// mthe bong gshibs te rab tu dril// 'di ni phur pa dril ba'i rgya// lag pa gnyis kyi rting sprad nas// sor bcu khro bcur byin rlabs te// sras mchog dkyil du gzhag nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa byas na ni// phur pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgya// mtheb mdzub gnyis kyi bar du ni// phur pa bcug la yar 'phangs pas// babs pas brdeg pa'i gzugs la bskul// 'di ni phur pa bskul ba'i rgya'o// don du phyag rgya la sogs pa// yang dag rtogs na kun yang rgya// ma rtogs mtshan mas rtog pa'i zhing/ rtog pa'i rgyu nyid chos nyid la/ 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid byang chub ste// bsad pa 'ba' zhig las su rung// rnam rtog sems can kun bsad na// dam pa'i bde gshegs kun mnyes te// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'phel// sangs rgyas bka' las de ltar 'byung// dam pa sems kyi rang bzhin pa'o// lta ba 'di la dmigs pas bya/ 'di ni lta ba dmigs pa'i le'u dgu pa'o//// yo byad rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// sbyang dug la sogs dug rnams kyi// drag pos bsgral phyir bsad par 'byung// khyad par la sogs gtor ma ni// mkha' 'gro skul phyir dgod par 'byung// zangs lcags mchog tu tsher ma can/ drag pos gdul phyir gong bzhin bsham// rkang rjes sa dang dri ma rnams// nges par yod na bzang bar bstan// gzhan yang phur pa'i rdzas rnams kun// gong nas

'byung ba de shes bya// 'di ni yo byad rdzas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//// rtags kyi zhags grangs bstan pa ni// khyad par bsnyen pa gzhung btsugs te/ bka' yi sgrub pa tshul bzhin du// gzhung las 'byung ba de byas na// rab kyis zla ba gcig gis 'grub// rtags ni zhag bdun nyid kyis 'grub// 'bring pos lo gcig byas na 'grub// rtags ni zla ba phyed na phyin// tha mas lo gsum tshun chad kyis// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// rtags ni lo dus dag na 'gyur// yan lag bskums pa'i nad la sogs// rtags rnams kun ni tshul bzhin 'byung// 'di ni phur pa rtags bstan pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// 'di brtsams dgos ched yon tan ni// sems can gang zag phal pa dag/ ras chod byed pa'i tshul las nyams// bka' 'gal byed cing dkyil 'khor 'dral// ma nyes 'joms shing skur pa 'debs// de la 'di brtsams dgos ched yod// don 'di ma nor gang spyod pa// kI la ya yi yon tan ni// tshe ring nad kyang med pa dang// dpal dang 'byor pa 'phel ba dang// gdon dang 'byung po thul ba dang// lha srin mthu chen kun 'khol dang// dregs pa dbang phyug bka' nyan dang/ ci bgyi la sogs bran bzhin 'khor// 'jig rten 'dir yang kun bsam 'grub// gzhan yang yon tan brjod mi lang// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang// bsgral ba dag kyang mtho ris thob// bdag kyang byang chub gnyis su med// bsam pa 'byor pa'i shes rab lags// chos kyi sku dang dbyer med na// ngan song gsum po sgo bkag nas// thar pa bde ba'i gnas kyang 'dren// sdig can bsad na las ngan bcad// dam nyams bsgral na bka' gzhung brtan// phyogs spyod yin nam log bsgral na dkyil 'khor brtan// sku dgra bsgral na bar chad chung// de nas yon tan thob pa yin// des na legs pa kun 'phel te// 'bras bu nges par chud mi za// bla med go 'phang thabs kyang che// khro bo'i rgyal po thabs mkhas pas// bsgral bas las rnams byang bar 'gyur// dpa' bo chen pos yang dag bshad// 'di dag yon tan bstan pa ni// rig 'dzin rnam gsum 'di las 'grub// dpal ldan dad pa'i 'byor pas 'grub// legs pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs te// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams// yid la dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni brtsams pa'i dgos ched dang/ yon tan ci 'thob bstan pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das dpal ki la yas bka' bstsal nas/ de nas karma he ru kas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ nyid kyi sku la mi snang ba'i tshul gyis thim par gyur to/ phur pa bcu gnyis 'byung

ba'i rgyud chen po gsum tsam 'gyur ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya dwi da sha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du// rdo rje phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po badzra kI la ya dang/ kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga la yid kun tu bzang po ye shes 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par gnas par bzhugs so// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i nang nas/ bcom ldan badzra kI la ya bzhengs nas/ chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs la ma bab ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang bral/ mtshan ma can la zhen chags pas/ gdug pa can dregs pa can du smin te sems can thams cad gnod cing 'tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan la gnod pa thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba rab tu drag po'i dpung rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thabs mkhas pa'i drag po'i phrin las kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ sku rab tu khros pa mi bzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di byung ngo/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas nas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sprul lo// ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za dang/ dri za dang/ 'byung po dang/ skem byed dang/ brjod byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ lha chen po dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcu dang// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams thams cad gti mug gi dbang gis las rgyu 'bras kyi don ma rtogs shing/ mtshan ma med pa dang bral// mtshan ma can la mngon par chags pas// ngan song gsum du yang bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal zhing/ mi bde ba mang po nyams su myong zhing/ las kyi 'bras bus las kyi srin por skyes nas/ rgyu mthun pa'i dbang gis shin tu 'jigs shing rngam pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ dri nga ba dang/ dregs pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs su byung nas/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid/ mdangs 'phrog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ bred skad 'don par byed/ yid mi bde ba mang por bgyid/ 'khrug par byed/ mya ngan du byed/ srog dang bral bar byed/ 'joms par byed pa rnams la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ dbu dgu pa/ phyag bco brgyad pa zhabs bgrad// spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs pa/ sku gsung thugs mi [(9[)]

bzad pa gcig tu gyur to// gsang ba'i sngags bcu gnyis phyung nas kyang/ sbyang sgyur ye shes kyi cho 'phrul du gyur to// nyid kyi sku las dIp+ta tsakra zhes 'khor lo rgyas 'deb ma g.yon phyogs su 'thon to/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las sras mchog rdo rje tho ba lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya dza dza hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ti ra baM kI la ya/ sod chom/ gtogs/ thabs shes rab las/ cha 'dzin nyi shu byung/ de las cha 'dzin grangs med pa byung ste/ gdug pa can bsgral te/ rtsa ba dbyings dang ye shes las cha 'dzin nyi shu byung/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyi shu byung/ de las byang chub kyi sems grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ste/ yid la dran pa'i snying po brjod pa tsam gyis/ nyi zer la ser ba 'bab pa bzhin du sprul pa'i sku byung ste/ gdags shing bsgral lo// de nas 'jigs byed dregs pa'i bdag po rgya mtsho tsam zhal du rngubs so// de nas badzra kI la ya'i 'od zer lus la bstim pa la/ bsgral 'bog bcol ba brgyal bsangs te/ dran pa rnyed de badzra kI la ya'i yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong ngo// de'i gdug can dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par bcug pa de'i tshe de'i dus su// phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi khro bo dang/ dbyings dang khro mo las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ gti mug byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'o/ 'jigs byed chen po'i byin rlabs las/ karma shrI he ru ka zhes pas/ khro bo karma he ru ka ljang nag/ sku gsung thugs nyid las mi gzhan pa 'thon to// thugs ka nas kyang sras mchog stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa la/ smad lcags phur zur gsum pa grangs med pa thon to// sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rjes su dran nas gdug pa can tshar bcad de/ de'i tshe 'jigs byed chen po dang/ khro bo rnams kyis lus gdan du phul lo// yid phyi rabs kyi rjes 'jug gi tshogs kyi grogs dang chos skyong ba'i bsrung mar dam bcas te/ rgyal po btson du bzung na dmangs cham la phebs te/ dbang med dad pas bsdus pa'i 'khor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// dpyang thag chad pa'i blo ngan 'khor ba la/ thugs rjes bzung nas cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar che/ de'i rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de ltar de bzhin yang dag don// gsang

ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas// de nas kI la ya'i bdag pos// sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// yang dag don ni ngas bstan gyi// gsang sngags yang dag don dam ni// theg pa gsum ni rgyab kyis phyogs// skal ba chung ba snod med de// dka' thub bsdams shing dam tshig med// don gyi gsang sngags ming du ming bsgrag cing// nye lam gol te don las 'gyang// e ma ho/ rgyud 'di rtogs par dka'// bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa'o// dbyings nyid rigs pa rgyun mi gcad// rtog pa bor ba'i pha rol na// rtog med btsal bas mi rnyed pas// rtog dang ma rtog gnyis med la// yang dag don gyi snying po ni// bde bar gshegs pas mi gzigs so// kun kyang byang chub snying po pas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// de bzhin nyid ni brdal ba'o// stong nyid ye shes dag pa la// gzugs sku rnam gnyis byin rlab can// 'di ni rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di ni don dam nas bsngags te// don dam blo yi spyod yul min// rang bzhin snod min gsang bas grub// sangs rgyas phyi slad mi re bas// snga ma sbyangs pa'i mkhyen rabs can// rang las sangs rgyas ye shes rtogs// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab mthus// thabs mang thabs mkhas thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// gsang sngags 'bral sha dIp+ta tha dang// rdo rje khros pa zhes sogs nas// mthar gnas thugs kyi sa bon bar dag gis// rnal 'byor dgongs don slong bar bya// yang dag dbyig gi gter brus la// zhing rab gshin la sa bon gdab// glen pa'i brtul zhugs drag po dang// b+hu su ku yi spyod pa yis// bden rdzun le lo re dogs dang// the tshom med na kun gyis grub// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// re re la yang gsum gsum mo// ma dang bu mo chung ma dang// rab tu brgyan pa dag dang ni// ngag snyan tshig mtshon ma shor ba// snod ngan gsang ba mi spel ba// sems bskyed nga rgyal ma yengs pa// gsang sngags dam las mi 'da' bas// don dam sems bskyed srog dang mi 'bral la// rdzun tshig brlang por smra ba dang// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang// mAM sa zil pas brgyan par bya'o// don dam kun rdzob phyin ci log/ gnang bkag gnyis ni bder gsungs pa// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag dang// rab 'bring

gsum du bshad par bya// thugs sku mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// snang ba ye shes cho 'phrul gsum gyis sbyangs// phyi nang ye shes cho 'phrul gsum gyis sbyangs// phyi nang ye shes rtog pa gzhil bar 'gyur// a hUM raM yaM khaM/ e aM ra suM keM b+han d+ha b+h+rUM/ raM khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni// zhing khams 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// rdo rje gzhon nu rgyas 'debs mo// hUM kA ra dang sgra 'byin ma// rnam pa brgyal dang rnam snyems ma// dbyug pa sngon po sder mo dang// gshin rje'i gshed po dur khrod ma// mi g.yo mgon po gtun khung ma// rta mgrin rgyal po gtum mo ma// gzhan gyis mi thub mda' snyems ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil brlung 'byin ma// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod ma dang// stobs po che dang bskyod ma dang// gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa phra men dang// phag mgo g.yag mgo stag mgo dang// sha ba gzigs dang byi la'i mgo/ spyang mo'i mgo dang seng ge'i mgo/ dred mo dom gyi mgo ru bstan// smig bu bya rog bya rgod mgo/ 'ug pa khwa ta pu shud mgo/ khra yi mgo dang pha wang mgo/ sre mo'i mgo dang byi ba'i mgo/ yang sprul sum sprul grangs med kyis// srid pa rlung yang mi 'chor gtams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs// kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las/ yang dag pa'i don gyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ rdo rje gsang sngags drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyaums par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rjes 'jug rnams// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// 'da' dka' de bzhin mi shigs pa// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig can// phyogs bcu dus gsum rang bzhin dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang gi rtog pa phra rgyas kyis// so sor smin cing sdug bsngal ba// grol bar bya phyir bla med rnams// bstan phyir rdzogs longs sprul par mdzad// 'og min btsun mo'i b+ha ga nas// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba bzhengs// mgon po bdag nyid chen po bas// rdo rje gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor// sngags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// kun gyi don du gsungs pa 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang// rnal 'byor rjes 'jug brtan por bzung// nam mkha' mtha' med chos dbyings gzhal yas khang// thigs pa lta bur snang srid dngos med shar// srog sems go ru rdo rje gzhon nur shar// snang srid phung po rdo rjer yang dag gtams// gsang sngags don gyi dang po la// dkyus tshig 'bru tshig don tshig

dang// dkyus tshig gnyis dang 'bru tshig dgu// don tshig brgyad dang man ngag ni// rin chen dag la bri bar bya// dang po gnyis med byang chub sems ldan// gnyis pas rigs ni so sor bstan// gsum pas drag po'i badzab dgongs bstan// bzhi pas sku gsung thugs su bstan// don de shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bzlas pa'i las la 'jug par bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI shwa ya byi ti hUM phaT// oM badzra kro d+hI lA s+ya mu kha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI dra tre dza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI tra na ba ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI dza la ri ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI dza ya hi hi hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI sha ya ti hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI ba ya be hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI ma ra na hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+hI tsu na de hUM phaT/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ badzra u ka mu kha he/ badzra byA g+h+ri mu kha he/ badzra tsa te mu kha he/ badzra ha ri mu kha he/ badzra bya ri mu kha he/ badzra tsa la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra sing ha mu kha he/ badzra sha ta mu kha he// badzra rag+sha mu kha he/ badzra yag+sha mu kha he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu kha he/ badzra kaM kA mu kha he/ badzra hu lu mu kha he/ badzra ba ya ta mu kha he/ badzra bi sha mu kha he/ badzra tsa ra mu kha he/ badzra na ku la mu kha he/ badzra ti ti mu kha he/ badzra ka si ka mu kha he/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ye/ in+d+rA ya/ ag+na ye/ ya ma ye/ ne r-i ti/ ba ru na/ ba ya be/ ku be ra/ in+d+rA ya/ u ti shan re/ ti ra baM/ oM AHhUM/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya/ oM rat+na kI li kI la ya/ oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ oM karma kI li kI la ya/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ b+ha ga bAn bid+ya rA dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la sarba na sa ba ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba duSh+tan bag pri sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+tan hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya pu ru pu ru u tsusma ma hA kro d+hA hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI ya bing sid hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya u tsu sha ts+tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya kro d+ha mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya na maHsa man+ta

pu shud de be ra be ra hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM laM s+t+waM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha ga bAn/ shi kri bi kri shrI badzra hUM kA ra hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI ya dza hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nAn/
